engChrName: [04I_25_00]Change expected party for [Heading Out to Ishgal Mountains Cliff Path - Searching for Yumé] - ※▽Remove when Foggy Longlai Morning - Seeking Yumé is properly implemented.
engSearchText: [04I_25_00]Change expected party for [Heading Out to Ishgal Mountains Cliff Path - Searching for Yumé] - ※▽Remove when Foggy Longlai Morning - Seeking Yumé is properly implemented.
jpnChrName: [04I_25_00][イシュガル山脈崖道に出る～ユメの捜索の開始]時の 想定パーティーに編成しなおします ※▽霧の龍來の朝～ユメの捜索について周辺が正式入力しましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
[04I_25_00][イシュガル山脈崖道に出る～ユメの捜索の開始]時の
想定パーティーに編成しなおします
※▽霧の龍來の朝～ユメの捜索について周辺が正式入力しましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: Temporary placement tools for checking event progression. Remove when Longlai Day Exploration events, et. al. are properly implemented.
engSearchText:
Temporary placement tools for checking
event progression. Remove when Longlai Day
Exploration events, et. al. are properly implemented.
jpnChrName: イベント進行確認用に仮配置しています。 ※龍來昼の自由行動等が正式入力しましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
イベント進行確認用に仮配置しています。
※龍來昼の自由行動等が正式入力しましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: These settings are for checking mob placement during day/evening/night. Remove these once they are no longer needed.
engSearchText:
These settings are for checking mob placement
during day/evening/night. Remove these once they
are no longer needed.
jpnChrName: 昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。 ※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。
※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select accompanying members.
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: Select accompanying members.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：同行メンバーを選んでください。
jpnSearchText: ★DEBUG：同行メンバーを選んでください。

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select accompanying members.
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: Select accompanying members.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：同行メンバーを選んでください。
jpnSearchText: ★DEBUG：同行メンバーを選んでください。

engChrName: HP and EP were fully restored!
engSearchText: HP and EP were fully restored!
jpnChrName: ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復した！

engChrName: Last night there was a problem with the eastern rails, causing a delay.
engSearchText:
Last night there was a problem with the eastern rails,
causing a delay.
jpnChrName: 昨晩は東方の路線で問題があって一時的に 便が止まっていましたが……
jpnSearchText:
昨晩は東方の路線で問題があって一時的に
便が止まっていましたが……

engChrName: Everything's back in order, though, so east-bound train traffic should resume this morning.
engSearchText:
Everything's back in order, though, so east-bound
train traffic should resume this morning.
jpnChrName: 無事復旧できたようで、今朝から東方行きの 専用列車が運行再開できる見通しです。
jpnSearchText:
無事復旧できたようで、今朝から東方行きの
専用列車が運行再開できる見通しです。

engChrName: I'm sympathetic to the passengers who got delayed, but it's just a fact of life that you see this happen east of Longlai every now and then.
engSearchText:
I'm sympathetic to the passengers who got delayed,
but it's just a fact of life that you see this happen east
of Longlai every now and then.
jpnChrName: 待たせてしまったお客様には申し訳ないですが…… 龍來以東では、時折発生するのが現実です。
jpnSearchText:
待たせてしまったお客様には申し訳ないですが……
龍來以東では、時折発生するのが現実です。

engChrName: I gather the rail company's trying to address the issue, but they haven't solved the fundamental problem, unfortunately.
engSearchText:
I gather the rail company's trying to address the issue,
but they haven't solved the fundamental
problem, unfortunately.
jpnChrName: 鉄道公社でも、対策はしているのですが…… 根本的な解決は出来ず……お恥ずかしい限りです。
jpnSearchText:
鉄道公社でも、対策はしているのですが……
根本的な解決は出来ず……お恥ずかしい限りです。

engChrName: That being said, there's quite a number of people in the lurch this time.
engSearchText:
That being said, there's quite a number of people in
the lurch this time.
jpnChrName: とはいえ……それでもこの問題に立ち向かう 人たちも少なからずいらっしゃいます。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ……それでもこの問題に立ち向かう
人たちも少なからずいらっしゃいます。

engChrName: Last night a lady from an NGO happened by. Professor Hamilton's been working to find the cause of the desertification, and is bringing in help.
engSearchText:
Last night a lady from an NGO happened by.
Professor Hamilton's been working to find the cause
of the desertification, and is bringing in help.
jpnChrName: 昨晩もＮＧＯの方がいらしましたし…… ハミルトン博士も荒廃の原因を解き明かそうと……
jpnSearchText:
昨晩もＮＧＯの方がいらしましたし……
ハミルトン博士も荒廃の原因を解き明かそうと……

engChrName: Perhaps the Transcontinental Railroad still has some hope after all.
engSearchText:
Perhaps the Transcontinental Railroad still has some
hope after all.
jpnChrName: そう考えると……やはり大陸横断鉄道公社も、 まだ諦めるべきではないのでしょうかね……
jpnSearchText:
そう考えると……やはり大陸横断鉄道公社も、
まだ諦めるべきではないのでしょうかね……

engChrName: A little while ago, I saw a man from the East who came here for work visiting the temple... It seems things are rough.
engSearchText:
A little while ago, I saw a man from the East who
came here for work visiting the temple... It seems
things are rough.
jpnChrName: 先ほど、東方からの出稼ぎの方を寺院で 見かけたのですが……何やら大変なようで。
jpnSearchText:
先ほど、東方からの出稼ぎの方を寺院で
見かけたのですが……何やら大変なようで。

engChrName: Working here at the station, you meet a fair number of immigrants. Seems like things are rough all over these days.
engSearchText:
Working here at the station, you meet a fair number
of immigrants. Seems like things are rough all over
these days.
jpnChrName: この町で駅員をしていると、移民の方などとも 会いますが……やはり大変な地も多いらしく……
jpnSearchText:
この町で駅員をしていると、移民の方などとも
会いますが……やはり大変な地も多いらしく……

engChrName: Maybe if the Transcontinental Railroad had been able to operate as planned, things wouldn't be so hard for them...
engSearchText:
Maybe if the Transcontinental Railroad had been
able to operate as planned, things wouldn't be so hard
for them...
jpnChrName: 大陸横断鉄道が、予定通りに開通していれば救えた 人もいたかと思うと……辛いものがありますねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
大陸横断鉄道が、予定通りに開通していれば救えた
人もいたかと思うと……辛いものがありますねぇ……

engChrName: Welcome to Longlai, Doorway to the East. I see you've come by automobile?
engSearchText:
Welcome to Longlai, Doorway to the East. I see
you've come by automobile?
jpnChrName: 東方への玄関口《龍來》へようこそ、 皆さんは車でお越しのようですね。
jpnSearchText:
東方への玄関口《龍來》へようこそ、
皆さんは車でお越しのようですね。

engChrName: Ours is a small town, but the main line of the Transcontinental Railroad runs through here. I hope you get to ride it someday.
engSearchText:
Ours is a small town, but the main line of the
Transcontinental Railroad runs through here. I hope
you get to ride it someday.
jpnChrName: 小さい町ですが大陸横断鉄道公社の本線が 通っておりますし、機会があればご利用ください。
jpnSearchText:
小さい町ですが大陸横断鉄道公社の本線が
通っておりますし、機会があればご利用ください。

engChrName: Oh, yeah! To reach the eastbound train, you'll need to change over on the platform on the opposite side of the station.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah! To reach the eastbound train, you'll need to
change over on the platform on the opposite side of
the station.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、東方行きの列車はこの入口の反対側の ホームで乗り換えていただく形になります。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、東方行きの列車はこの入口の反対側の
ホームで乗り換えていただく形になります。

engChrName: There's still a train every few days, but...well, I think things are unstable out that way, what with the environmental problems and all.
engSearchText:
There's still a train every few days, but...well, I think
things are unstable out that way, what with the
environmental problems and all.
jpnChrName: 一応、直通便も数日に一本はありますが…… 何分、向こうは環境問題もあり不安定で……
jpnSearchText:
一応、直通便も数日に一本はありますが……
何分、向こうは環境問題もあり不安定で……

engChrName: Hmm... There aren't as many as there once were, but still...
engSearchText:
Hmm... There aren't as many as there once were,
but still...
jpnChrName: ちなみに、昔に比べれば相当減って しまいましたが……
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、昔に比べれば相当減って
しまいましたが……

engChrName: Even these days, many people of Eastern heritage pass through this city.
engSearchText:
Even these days, many people of Eastern heritage
pass through this city.
jpnChrName: 今でも多少は東方からいらっしゃる方も この町を通る事はありましてね。
jpnSearchText:
今でも多少は東方からいらっしゃる方も
この町を通る事はありましてね。

engChrName: Nowadays, to keep things convenient for train-goers, you can go through customs procedures inside the station.
engSearchText:
Nowadays, to keep things convenient for train-goers,
you can go through customs procedures inside
the station.
jpnChrName: 今では主流になった鉄道で来る方については 入国検査も駅内でしております。
jpnSearchText:
今では主流になった鉄道で来る方については
入国検査も駅内でしております。

engChrName: Now, then, I'm off to take care of the tea plants. Have to do what I can now for next year's crop.
engSearchText:
Now, then, I'm off to take care of the tea plants.
Have to do what I can now for next year's crop.
jpnChrName: さて、今日も茶葉の手入れと行きますか。 来年の実りのためにも念入りにやらないと。
jpnSearchText:
さて、今日も茶葉の手入れと行きますか。
来年の実りのためにも念入りにやらないと。

engChrName: That fog might've been thick as soup this morning, but it doesn't seem to have harmed things much.
engSearchText:
That fog might've been thick as soup this morning,
but it doesn't seem to have harmed things much.
jpnChrName: 今朝は霧も出たけど、霜の影響なんかも 今のところは無さそうですしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
今朝は霧も出たけど、霜の影響なんかも
今のところは無さそうですしねぇ。

engChrName: If I start preparing things now, we'll have excellent tea next year, too.
engSearchText:
If I start preparing things now, we'll have excellent
tea next year, too.
jpnChrName: しっかり今から準備すれば、 来年も今年同様に良い茶葉が採れそうですよ。
jpnSearchText:
しっかり今から準備すれば、
来年も今年同様に良い茶葉が採れそうですよ。

engChrName: Ahh... A good day's work, a dip in the springs, and then a cup of tea. This, my dears, is living.
engSearchText:
Ahh... A good day's work, a dip in the springs, and
then a cup of tea. This, my dears, is living.
jpnChrName: ふう……働いて、温泉で汗を流した後は お茶を一杯……我ながら充実した暮らしですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……働いて、温泉で汗を流した後は
お茶を一杯……我ながら充実した暮らしですよ。

engChrName: And our tea's a real hit with the tourists. That's what really makes working on a 'specialty' like this worth it.
engSearchText:
And our tea's a real hit with the tourists. That's what
really makes working on a 'specialty' like this worth it.
jpnChrName: しかし、観光の人にもお茶は人気みたいで…… その様子を見ていると、本当にやり甲斐を感じますよ。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、観光の人にもお茶は人気みたいで……
その様子を見ていると、本当にやり甲斐を感じますよ。

engChrName: Seeing new faces enjoying the fruits of your labor... there's no other feeling like it.
engSearchText:
Seeing new faces enjoying the fruits of your labor...
there's no other feeling like it.
jpnChrName: これが特産品に関わる仕事の醍醐味なのでしょうねぇ、 観光客の笑顔を見るとやる気が湧きますよ。
jpnSearchText:
これが特産品に関わる仕事の醍醐味なのでしょうねぇ、
観光客の笑顔を見るとやる気が湧きますよ。

engChrName: Hello there. Tourists, are you? Welcome to Longlai.
engSearchText: Hello there. Tourists, are you? Welcome to Longlai.
jpnChrName: やあ、観光の方ですか？ ようこそ龍來へ、歓迎しますよ。
jpnSearchText:
やあ、観光の方ですか？
ようこそ龍來へ、歓迎しますよ。

engChrName: I'm sorry to say you've come at the wrong season for tea-growing. They're a sight in the summer, let me tell you!
engSearchText:
I'm sorry to say you've come at the wrong season
for tea-growing. They're a sight in the summer, let
me tell you!
jpnChrName: 時期的にお茶の実りを見せてあげられないのは 少し残念ですね、夏だと見物なのですが。
jpnSearchText:
時期的にお茶の実りを見せてあげられないのは
少し残念ですね、夏だと見物なのですが。

engChrName: Still, it's just the season for autumnal reds. Not as great as fresh tea leaves, but I'm sure you'll love it.
engSearchText:
Still, it's just the season for autumnal reds. Not as
great as fresh tea leaves, but I'm sure you'll love it.
jpnChrName: でも、今の季節は紅葉が綺麗ですしね。 替わりと言っては何ですが、楽しんでください。
jpnSearchText:
でも、今の季節は紅葉が綺麗ですしね。
替わりと言っては何ですが、楽しんでください。

engChrName: When you work on growing a local specialty, seeing visitors enjoying your work is the real payoff.
engSearchText:
When you work on growing a local specialty, seeing
visitors enjoying your work is the real payoff.
jpnChrName: やはり特産品の栽培に携わると、お客さんの 反応もあってやり甲斐がありますよね。
jpnSearchText:
やはり特産品の栽培に携わると、お客さんの
反応もあってやり甲斐がありますよね。

engChrName: You probably didn't know, but black tea, green tea, matcha, and oolong tea can all be made from the same tea leaves.
engSearchText:
You probably didn't know, but black tea, green tea,
matcha, and oolong tea can all be made from the
same tea leaves.
jpnChrName: 知っていますか？　紅茶も緑茶も抹茶も烏龍茶も、 実は皆、同じ茶葉から作っているんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
知っていますか？　紅茶も緑茶も抹茶も烏龍茶も、
実は皆、同じ茶葉から作っているんですよ。

engChrName: The difference actually lies in when you harvest them and how you process them. That's where tea gets interesting.
engSearchText:
The difference actually lies in when you harvest them
and how you process them. That's where tea
gets interesting.
jpnChrName: 収穫時期や加工次第であそこまで変わるのも、 お茶の不思議で面白いところですよね。
jpnSearchText:
収穫時期や加工次第であそこまで変わるのも、
お茶の不思議で面白いところですよね。

engChrName: Sounds like the eastbound train is scheduled to depart just before noon.
engSearchText:
Sounds like the eastbound train is scheduled to depart
just before noon.
jpnChrName: 東方行きの列車、お昼前には発車する めどが立ったらしいわね。
jpnSearchText:
東方行きの列車、お昼前には発車する
めどが立ったらしいわね。

engChrName: The inn that put me up for the night gave me their best wishes. I've got to do my very best on this!
engSearchText:
The inn that put me up for the night gave me their
best wishes. I've got to do my very best on this!
jpnChrName: 泊めてくれた宿の人も応援してくれたし、 向こうでの仕事をしっかりやらないとね。
jpnSearchText:
泊めてくれた宿の人も応援してくれたし、
向こうでの仕事をしっかりやらないとね。

engChrName: I'll go out, expand my horizons, and contribute everything I can!
engSearchText:
I'll go out, expand my horizons, and contribute
everything I can!
jpnChrName: 東方で見分も広めて、団体の一員として 一層役に立てるようになるわ。
jpnSearchText:
東方で見分も広めて、団体の一員として
一層役に立てるようになるわ。

engChrName: The eastbound line of the Transcontinental Railroad was delayed, I guess? I'd made all my preparations, and now there's no train today.
engSearchText:
The eastbound line of the Transcontinental Railroad
was delayed, I guess? I'd made all my preparations,
and now there's no train today.
jpnChrName: 大陸横断鉄道、東方の便が遅れているらしくて…… 準備はできたけど、今日は出発できなさそうね。
jpnSearchText:
大陸横断鉄道、東方の便が遅れているらしくて……
準備はできたけど、今日は出発できなさそうね。

engChrName: But this is another problem caused by the environmental issues eastern Zemuria is facing. I'm sure a lot of people have it tougher than me.
engSearchText:
But this is another problem caused by the
environmental issues eastern Zemuria is facing.
I'm sure a lot of people have it tougher than me.
jpnChrName: でも、その原因は大陸東部の環境問題…… 助けが必要な人も多くいるわ。
jpnSearchText:
でも、その原因は大陸東部の環境問題……
助けが必要な人も多くいるわ。

engChrName: There aren't a lot of people passing through Longlai lately, and folks here in Calvard tend to forget about what's happening out there.
engSearchText:
There aren't a lot of people passing through Longlai
lately, and folks here in Calvard tend to forget about
what's happening out there.
jpnChrName: 最近では龍來を通ってくる人も減って、 共和国の人も向こうの事は忘れがちだけど……
jpnSearchText:
最近では龍來を通ってくる人も減って、
共和国の人も向こうの事は忘れがちだけど……

engChrName: Which is exactly why people like my group have to stick with them till the very end!
engSearchText:
Which is exactly why people like my group have to
stick with them till the very end!
jpnChrName: だからこそ、私達のような存在が 最後まで寄り添うようにしないと。
jpnSearchText:
だからこそ、私達のような存在が
最後まで寄り添うようにしないと。

engChrName: The group I'm with is still pretty small, but we're blessed with someone who can do anything perfectly. Deskwork, whatever, you name it.
engSearchText:
The group I'm with is still pretty small, but we're
blessed with someone who can do anything perfectly.
Deskwork, whatever, you name it.
jpnChrName: 私の所属してる団体、まだ小さいのに デスクワークなら何でもできて凄い後輩がいてね。
jpnSearchText:
私の所属してる団体、まだ小さいのに
デスクワークなら何でもできて凄い後輩がいてね。

engChrName: The amazing thing is that this person's also a...school teacher, I think? Anyway, they're even younger than me, to boot!
engSearchText:
The amazing thing is that this person's also a...school
teacher, I think? Anyway, they're even younger than
me, to boot!
jpnChrName: 何でも、あの歳で学校の先生？　まで兼業してる とかっていうし……年下だけど尊敬するわ。
jpnSearchText:
何でも、あの歳で学校の先生？　まで兼業してる
とかっていうし……年下だけど尊敬するわ。

engChrName: I'd say I have to work harder not to look bad, but I'm just incredibly proud to work with someone so motivated!
engSearchText:
I'd say I have to work harder not to look bad, but I'm
just incredibly proud to work with someone
so motivated!
jpnChrName: ああいう優秀な後輩も持てて誇らしいものよ。 私も負けないよう頑張らないと。
jpnSearchText:
ああいう優秀な後輩も持てて誇らしいものよ。
私も負けないよう頑張らないと。

engChrName: Well, hello Doorway to the East. Here's my chance to get everything I need before I head out!
engSearchText:
Well, hello Doorway to the East. Here's my chance
to get everything I need before I head out!
jpnChrName: さて、ようやく玄関口の町に着いた事だし…… 向こうに行く準備を整えましょうか！
jpnSearchText:
さて、ようやく玄関口の町に着いた事だし……
向こうに行く準備を整えましょうか！

engChrName: I couldn't get out here in time for the direct line, but hey, that gives me a chance to actually prepare.
engSearchText:
I couldn't get out here in time for the direct line, but
hey, that gives me a chance to actually prepare.
jpnChrName: 直通便には日付が合わなくて乗れなかったけど、 むしろ準備期間が出来たんだと思う事にするわ。
jpnSearchText:
直通便には日付が合わなくて乗れなかったけど、
むしろ準備期間が出来たんだと思う事にするわ。

engChrName: There's a lot of people hoping for our support across the mountains...
engSearchText:
There's a lot of people hoping for our support across
the mountains...
jpnChrName: あの山の遥か向こうには、支援を待っている 人たちがたくさんいる……
jpnSearchText:
あの山の遥か向こうには、支援を待っている
人たちがたくさんいる……

engChrName: I've never gone this far east before, but as a proud NGO worker, I've got to do everything I can!
engSearchText:
I've never gone this far east before, but as a proud
NGO worker, I've got to do everything I can!
jpnChrName: 東方は初めてだけどＮＧＯの一員として、 本腰を入れて臨まないと！
jpnSearchText:
東方は初めてだけどＮＧＯの一員として、
本腰を入れて臨まないと！

engChrName: Goodness, the fog is thick! It's not terribly common to see fog like this off the Kunlun Mountains in this season.
engSearchText:
Goodness, the fog is thick! It's not terribly common
to see fog like this off the Kunlun Mountains in
this season.
jpnChrName: 霧が濃いな……この時期に崑崙から濃霧が 出るのは少々珍しい。
jpnSearchText:
霧が濃いな……この時期に崑崙から濃霧が
出るのは少々珍しい。

engChrName: Yet it's times like these that sharpen the senses— enough to feel even the faintest changes in the energy of the land...
engSearchText:
Yet it's times like these that sharpen the senses—
enough to feel even the faintest changes in the energy
of the land...
jpnChrName: だが……こうした時にこそ感覚を研ぎ澄まし、 この地における“気”の些細な変化も……
jpnSearchText:
だが……こうした時にこそ感覚を研ぎ澄まし、
この地における“気”の些細な変化も……

engChrName: ...What? What is this bone-chilling sensation?!
engSearchText: ...What? What is this bone-chilling sensation?!
jpnChrName: ……ムッ……！？　何だこの悪寒は……？
jpnSearchText: ……ムッ……！？　何だこの悪寒は……？

engChrName: I've trained here for many years, but I've never felt something like this. ...Ahh, it's no good! I can't get a grasp on it.
engSearchText:
I've trained here for many years, but I've never felt
something like this. ...Ahh, it's no good! I can't get a
grasp on it.
jpnChrName: この地で修練をするようになって長いが、 この気は一体……駄目だ、掴みどころがない……
jpnSearchText:
この地で修練をするようになって長いが、
この気は一体……駄目だ、掴みどころがない……

engChrName: I can't get into the Kunlun Mountains, but there's other worthy places to train.
engSearchText:
I can't get into the Kunlun Mountains, but there's
other worthy places to train.
jpnChrName: 崑崙には立ち入れなかったが、他にも 出来る修行は相応にあるからな。
jpnSearchText:
崑崙には立ち入れなかったが、他にも
出来る修行は相応にあるからな。

engChrName: Most important of all is to ensure one maintains an even heart in the face of the unexpected, and calmly determine a course of action.
engSearchText:
Most important of all is to ensure one maintains an
even heart in the face of the unexpected, and calmly
determine a course of action.
jpnChrName: こうした予想だにしない時でも心を乱さず、 平静のまますべき事を見出すのも肝要だろう。
jpnSearchText:
こうした予想だにしない時でも心を乱さず、
平静のまますべき事を見出すのも肝要だろう。

engChrName: Though... It, erm, seems this trail closure will hold for longer than expected. I should go tell my fellow students.
engSearchText:
Though... It, erm, seems this trail closure will hold for
longer than expected. I should go tell my
fellow students.
jpnChrName: とはいえ……思ったよりも封鎖は長引いている、 同門の皆にも伝えておいた方が良さそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ……思ったよりも封鎖は長引いている、
同門の皆にも伝えておいた方が良さそうだな。

engChrName: I'm part of the Gekka school, but every time I come to visit, I find new reasons to respect the Taito school.
engSearchText:
I'm part of the Gekka school, but every time I come
to visit, I find new reasons to respect the
Taito school.
jpnChrName: 自分は月華流だが、この地に来るたびに 泰斗流への敬意を新たにしているものだ。
jpnSearchText:
自分は月華流だが、この地に来るたびに
泰斗流への敬意を新たにしているものだ。

engChrName: I think that the mentality of the Taito school, born of Longlai, is something we of Gekka can take to heart.
engSearchText:
I think that the mentality of the Taito school, born of
Longlai, is something we of Gekka can take to heart.
jpnChrName: 龍來の地で育まれた泰斗の精神は、 月華から見ても学びが多いものだからな。
jpnSearchText:
龍來の地で育まれた泰斗の精神は、
月華から見ても学びが多いものだからな。

engChrName: I can't do anything for them, but they have my best wishes in rebuilding their dojo.
engSearchText:
I can't do anything for them, but they have my best
wishes in rebuilding their dojo.
jpnChrName: かの道場の立て直しについても 陰ながら応援させてもらっている。
jpnSearchText:
かの道場の立て直しについても
陰ながら応援させてもらっている。

engChrName: Hmm... So the Kunlun Mountains are still off limits? I gather it's some decision handed down by the government.
engSearchText:
Hmm... So the Kunlun Mountains are still off limits?
I gather it's some decision handed down by
the government.
jpnChrName: ふむ……崑崙方面の山道はまだ立ち入り禁止か。 政府の測量が入ったとは聞いていたが……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……崑崙方面の山道はまだ立ち入り禁止か。
政府の測量が入ったとは聞いていたが……

engChrName: Yet as a member of the Gekka school, I come here every year to train in those mountains.
engSearchText:
Yet as a member of the Gekka school, I come here
every year to train in those mountains.
jpnChrName: 自分は月華流を修める者として、毎年この時期は 崑崙に入って修行してきたのだがな。
jpnSearchText:
自分は月華流を修める者として、毎年この時期は
崑崙に入って修行してきたのだがな。

engChrName: I suppose this year I'll have to admit defeat to the circumstances. Besides, it isn't like there aren't other places to train.
engSearchText:
I suppose this year I'll have to admit defeat to
the circumstances. Besides, it isn't like there aren't
other places to train.
jpnChrName: 今年は致し方ない、潔く諦めるとしよう。 他にもできる修行はある事だしな。
jpnSearchText:
今年は致し方ない、潔く諦めるとしよう。
他にもできる修行はある事だしな。

engChrName: The Kunlun Mountains have long been known as a place to train, in part precisely because of how treacherous they are.
engSearchText:
The Kunlun Mountains have long been known as a
place to train, in part precisely because of how
treacherous they are.
jpnChrName: 崑崙は古くから修練の場ともなってきたが、 それはその険しさ故でもあるのだ。
jpnSearchText:
崑崙は古くから修練の場ともなってきたが、
それはその険しさ故でもあるのだ。

engChrName: Few would go into the mountains except to train, so I doubt the closure is of any trouble to the people of Longlai.
engSearchText:
Few would go into the mountains except to train, so I
doubt the closure is of any trouble to the people
of Longlai.
jpnChrName: 修行以外で山に入る者はそういないし、 龍來の住民も困りはしないと思うが……
jpnSearchText:
修行以外で山に入る者はそういないし、
龍來の住民も困りはしないと思うが……

engChrName: I heard about the missing child. I've been speaking to people in town and ensuring no stone goes unturned.
engSearchText:
I heard about the missing child. I've been speaking to
people in town and ensuring no stone goes unturned.
jpnChrName: 迷子の件は聞いています、皆さんに呼びかけつつ、 町内で見落としが無いか見ていたのですが……
jpnSearchText:
迷子の件は聞いています、皆さんに呼びかけつつ、
町内で見落としが無いか見ていたのですが……

engChrName: Especially with the thick fog this morning. I'm very concerned she might get in a traffic accident, due to the awful visibility.
engSearchText:
Especially with the thick fog this morning. I'm very
concerned she might get in a traffic accident, due to
the awful visibility.
jpnChrName: しかし、今朝は霧が濃いですしねぇ…… 視界不良で事故に遭わないか一層心配です。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、今朝は霧が濃いですしねぇ……
視界不良で事故に遭わないか一層心配です。

engChrName: If we haven't found any sign of her by noon, then... well, might be time to contact the border patrol and have them start searching as well.
engSearchText:
If we haven't found any sign of her by noon, then...
well, might be time to contact the border patrol and
have them start searching as well.
jpnChrName: 昼までに見つからない場合は……国境警備隊の方でも 捜索を出してもらうのも検討すべきですね。
jpnSearchText:
昼までに見つからない場合は……国境警備隊の方でも
捜索を出してもらうのも検討すべきですね。

engChrName: On my night patrol, one of the locals invited me to drink.
engSearchText:
On my night patrol, one of the locals invited me
to drink.
jpnChrName: 夜の見回り中でしたが……ご近所さんに 一杯誘われてしまいましてね。
jpnSearchText:
夜の見回り中でしたが……ご近所さんに
一杯誘われてしまいましてね。

engChrName: Naturally, I don't drink on duty, so I simply had a quick bite to eat instead. Did appreciate the thought, however.
engSearchText:
Naturally, I don't drink on duty, so I simply had a
quick bite to eat instead. Did appreciate the
thought, however.
jpnChrName: まあ、流石に勤務中なので夜食だけ頂きましたよ。 ただまあ、ここの人は本当に気が良くてね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、流石に勤務中なので夜食だけ頂きましたよ。
ただまあ、ここの人は本当に気が良くてね。

engChrName: I was regrettably unfamiliar with Eastern culture when I first came here, but the folks here have done a lot to help me fit in.
engSearchText:
I was regrettably unfamiliar with Eastern culture
when I first came here, but the folks here have done a
lot to help me fit in.
jpnChrName: もともと東方文化に疎かった自分がこうして 馴染めたのも、地元の人たちのお陰ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
もともと東方文化に疎かった自分がこうして
馴染めたのも、地元の人たちのお陰ですよ。

engChrName: Maybe it wasn't just coincidence that landed me here. Either way, the best thing I can do in return is do my duty to my utmost!
engSearchText:
Maybe it wasn't just coincidence that landed me here.
Either way, the best thing I can do in return is do my
duty to my utmost!
jpnChrName: そう思えばここに派遣されたのも縁なのでしょうね。 ならば自分も、しっかり務めを果たさねば。
jpnSearchText:
そう思えばここに派遣されたのも縁なのでしょうね。
ならば自分も、しっかり務めを果たさねば。

engChrName: Welcome to Longlai. We're a border city, but as you can see, we're pretty quiet, all told. I hope you have a relaxing time here.
engSearchText:
Welcome to Longlai. We're a border city, but as you
can see, we're pretty quiet, all told. I hope you have a
relaxing time here.
jpnChrName: ようこそ龍來へ、国境の町ですが見ての通り 静かな場所ですし、ごゆっくりどうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ようこそ龍來へ、国境の町ですが見ての通り
静かな場所ですし、ごゆっくりどうぞ。

engChrName: There's still a number of folks from the East passing through, but nowadays customs are done at the train station or border crossing.
engSearchText:
There's still a number of folks from the East passing
through, but nowadays customs are done at the train
station or border crossing.
jpnChrName: 今でも多少は東方から来る人もいるのですが、 入国審査は駅の臨検や国境門で行われています。
jpnSearchText:
今でも多少は東方から来る人もいるのですが、
入国審査は駅の臨検や国境門で行われています。

engChrName: These days, I focus on keeping peace in town, and help visitors with any trouble they run into.
engSearchText:
These days, I focus on keeping peace in town,
and help visitors with any trouble they run into.
jpnChrName: ですので自分は町内の治安や来訪者の方々の トラブルへの対応に専念している形ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ですので自分は町内の治安や来訪者の方々の
トラブルへの対応に専念している形ですね。

engChrName: Of course, with how peaceful it is, that's not too hard. If you need anything, come by anytime. Trust me, you won't be a bother.
engSearchText:
Of course, with how peaceful it is, that's not too hard.
If you need anything, come by anytime. Trust me,
you won't be a bother.
jpnChrName: まあ、基本的には平和な町で私も余裕はあります、 何かあれば遠慮なく言って下さいね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、基本的には平和な町で私も余裕はあります、
何かあれば遠慮なく言って下さいね。

engChrName: It's been a while since I saw Yumé. I hope you can find her.
engSearchText:
It's been a while since I saw Yumé. I hope you can
find her.
jpnChrName: オレがあの子を見かけてから大分経つけど、 本当に見つかると良いな……
jpnSearchText:
オレがあの子を見かけてから大分経つけど、
本当に見つかると良いな……

engChrName: For as much energy as she's got, she seemed kinda different when I saw her. And, like, not in a good way.
engSearchText:
For as much energy as she's got, she seemed kinda
different when I saw her. And, like, not in a
good way.
jpnChrName: 元気過ぎるあの子だったけど、さっき見た 時は昨日と雰囲気も違って不安だったし……
jpnSearchText:
元気過ぎるあの子だったけど、さっき見た
時は昨日と雰囲気も違って不安だったし……

engChrName: I'll bounce from work early and go look with the rest of the Tourism Bureau.
engSearchText:
I'll bounce from work early and go look with the rest
of the Tourism Bureau.
jpnChrName: オレも店の準備は早めに済ませて、 観光協会の人らと一緒に探すとするよ。
jpnSearchText:
オレも店の準備は早めに済ませて、
観光協会の人らと一緒に探すとするよ。

engChrName: As a guide, I'm pretty familiar with the parts of the city where people tend to get lost.
engSearchText:
As a guide, I'm pretty familiar with the parts of the
city where people tend to get lost.
jpnChrName: ガイドだしな、町の中で迷い込みそうな 場所なんかは一通り把握してるしさ。
jpnSearchText:
ガイドだしな、町の中で迷い込みそうな
場所なんかは一通り把握してるしさ。

engChrName: My mom's food is always the best!
engSearchText: My mom's food is always the best!
jpnChrName: うーん、やっぱり母ちゃんの 作るまかないは最高にうめぇな！
jpnSearchText:
うーん、やっぱり母ちゃんの
作るまかないは最高にうめぇな！

engChrName: She was the one who helped me get a job as a guide, and she even packs me lunch so I can do my best at work! Moms are great.
engSearchText:
She was the one who helped me get a job as a guide,
and she even packs me lunch so I can do my best
at work! Moms are great.
jpnChrName: これがあるからガイドも頑張れるし、この仕事を 紹介してくれたのといい、頭上がんないよ。
jpnSearchText:
これがあるからガイドも頑張れるし、この仕事を
紹介してくれたのといい、頭上がんないよ。

engChrName: Looking for dinner? For what it's worth, guests always go nuts for my mom's cooking.
engSearchText:
Looking for dinner? For what it's worth, guests
always go nuts for my mom's cooking.
jpnChrName: アンタ達も晩御飯はどうだい、母ちゃんが 出してくれる家庭料理はお客にも人気だよ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタ達も晩御飯はどうだい、母ちゃんが
出してくれる家庭料理はお客にも人気だよ。

engChrName: We'll keep an eye on your kid, so please go find the other guest.
engSearchText:
We'll keep an eye on your kid, so please go find the
other guest.
jpnChrName: こっちのチビは見ているから 悪いけどあの人を探してきてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
こっちのチビは見ているから
悪いけどあの人を探してきてくれ。

engChrName: I don't get it, I told her it was dangerous up there. What did she even want to do?
engSearchText:
I don't get it, I told her it was dangerous up there.
What did she even want to do?
jpnChrName: ふう、それにしても危ないって言ったのに 一体何をしに行ったんだろう……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、それにしても危ないって言ったのに
一体何をしに行ったんだろう……

engChrName: Oh, yeah. This is the season for waterfall viewing. It's really lovely right about now.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. This is the season for waterfall viewing.
It's really lovely right about now.
jpnChrName: そうだなぁ、今の時期だと本来なら瀑布の 景色が見ごたえあるんですけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
そうだなぁ、今の時期だと本来なら瀑布の
景色が見ごたえあるんですけどねぇ。

engChrName: That said, there's a fallen tree so it's a no-go right now. Though, uh, there's lots of other lovely sights to take in!
engSearchText:
That said, there's a fallen tree so it's a no-go right
now. Though, uh, there's lots of other lovely sights to
take in!
jpnChrName: 残念ながら、今は倒木で通行止めになっていて…… でも、雄大な自然を見れるところは他にもあります！
jpnSearchText:
残念ながら、今は倒木で通行止めになっていて……
でも、雄大な自然を見れるところは他にもあります！

engChrName: Wow! Why's a kid showing these two old folks around?
engSearchText:
Wow! Why's a kid showing these two old
folks around?
jpnChrName: あれー、なんでコドモがオジサンオバサンに なにかをおしえてるのー？
jpnSearchText:
あれー、なんでコドモがオジサンオバサンに
なにかをおしえてるのー？

engChrName: H-Hey! Rude! And...wait! You're even younger than I am!
engSearchText:
H-Hey! Rude! And...wait! You're even younger than
I am!
jpnChrName: い、いきなり失敬な……てか、キミの方が 小さい子供じゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
い、いきなり失敬な……てか、キミの方が
小さい子供じゃないか。

engChrName: I'm a part-timer with the Tourism Bureau. Mom asked me to help out—and she even gave me an allowance, too!
engSearchText:
I'm a part-timer with the Tourism Bureau.
Mom asked me to help out—and she even gave me
an allowance, too!
jpnChrName: オレは観光協会のバイトなんだ、母ちゃんに頼んで、 手伝わせてもらって小遣いもらってるの。
jpnSearchText:
オレは観光協会のバイトなんだ、母ちゃんに頼んで、
手伝わせてもらって小遣いもらってるの。

engChrName: Your name's 'part-timer?' Wow! You've got a funny name!
engSearchText:
Your name's 'part-timer?' Wow! You've got a
funny name!
jpnChrName: カンコウキョウカイノバイトっていうの？ あはは、かわったナマエだねー！
jpnSearchText:
カンコウキョウカイノバイトっていうの？
あはは、かわったナマエだねー！

engChrName: Uhh... No, that's my job. I'm Senri!
engSearchText: Uhh... No, that's my job. I'm Senri!
jpnChrName: ふう、あのな……それは仕事の名前だよ。 センリ、オレの名前はセンリっていうんだ！
jpnSearchText:
ふう、あのな……それは仕事の名前だよ。
センリ、オレの名前はセンリっていうんだ！

engChrName: Well, she's sure...hyper. Umm, so are you her guardians? Keep a close eye on her. Or...two. Or three, if you got 'em.
engSearchText:
Well, she's sure...hyper. Umm, so are you
her guardians? Keep a close eye on her. Or...two.
Or three, if you got 'em.
jpnChrName: 何てか、元気と言うか調子の狂うチビで…… アンタは保護者？　ちゃんと見てて欲しいな。
jpnSearchText:
何てか、元気と言うか調子の狂うチビで……
アンタは保護者？　ちゃんと見てて欲しいな。

engChrName: Heh. Yeah, sorry she got in your way. I'll keep an eye on her, don't worry.
engSearchText:
Heh. Yeah, sorry she got in your way. I'll keep an eye
on her, don't worry.
jpnChrName: はは、頑張ってるところ悪かったな。 一応気ぃつけておくとするぜ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、頑張ってるところ悪かったな。
一応気ぃつけておくとするぜ。

engChrName: ...Ahem. I hope you'll forgive me. Umm, let me get back to showing you around.
engSearchText:
...Ahem. I hope you'll forgive me. Umm, let me get
back to showing you around.
jpnChrName: ……こほん、ちょいと失礼しましたねお二人さん。 そんじゃ、引き続き案内しますね。
jpnSearchText:
……こほん、ちょいと失礼しましたねお二人さん。
そんじゃ、引き続き案内しますね。

engChrName: The trees are in their autumn colors, which makes for an amazing sight at night, with the moon reflecting off the river.
engSearchText:
The trees are in their autumn colors, which makes for
an amazing sight at night, with the moon reflecting
off the river.
jpnChrName: 今の季節は紅葉も楽しめますが、夜もまた 川に映った月との組み合わせに風情があって……
jpnSearchText:
今の季節は紅葉も楽しめますが、夜もまた
川に映った月との組み合わせに風情があって……

engChrName: Oh, yeah. This is the season for waterfall viewing. It's really lovely right now.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. This is the season for waterfall viewing.
It's really lovely right now.
jpnChrName: そうだなぁ、今の時期だと本来なら瀑布の 景色が見ごたえあるんですけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
そうだなぁ、今の時期だと本来なら瀑布の
景色が見ごたえあるんですけどねぇ。

engChrName: That said, there's a fallen tree so it's a no-go right now. Though, uhh, there's lots of other lovely sights to take in!
engSearchText:
That said, there's a fallen tree so it's a no-go right
now. Though, uhh, there's lots of other lovely sights to
take in!
jpnChrName: 残念ながら、今は倒木で通行止めになっていて…… でも、雄大な自然を見れるところは他にもあります！
jpnSearchText:
残念ながら、今は倒木で通行止めになっていて……
でも、雄大な自然を見れるところは他にもあります！

engChrName: Even from town, you can see the valley in all its autumn colors, and as for other special geography...
engSearchText:
Even from town, you can see the valley in all its
autumn colors, and as for other special geography...
jpnChrName: まず、町内の温泉からでも紅葉に彩られた渓谷が 見られますし、他にも特別な地形として……
jpnSearchText:
まず、町内の温泉からでも紅葉に彩られた渓谷が
見られますし、他にも特別な地形として……

engChrName: Are you tourists, too? I can show you around later, if you'd like.
engSearchText:
Are you tourists, too? I can show you around later, if
you'd like.
jpnChrName: アンタ達も観光かい？ だったら後で、オレが案内しようか。
jpnSearchText:
アンタ達も観光かい？
だったら後で、オレが案内しようか。

engChrName: I'm only a part-timer, but I'm as good as any professional guide. The Tourism Bureau chief approved me personally!
engSearchText:
I'm only a part-timer, but I'm as good as any
professional guide. The Tourism Bureau chief
approved me personally!
jpnChrName: バイトだけど、案内の方は心配ご無用、 観光協会会長のオッチャンのお墨付きだからさ！
jpnSearchText:
バイトだけど、案内の方は心配ご無用、
観光協会会長のオッチャンのお墨付きだからさ！

engChrName: Ahh, a morning bath is a wonder. Wakes you right up! Makes you feel vitalized!
engSearchText:
Ahh, a morning bath is a wonder. Wakes you
right up! Makes you feel vitalized!
jpnChrName: ふう、朝風呂というのも良いものだねぇ、 目が覚めて身体に活力が入るようだ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、朝風呂というのも良いものだねぇ、
目が覚めて身体に活力が入るようだ。

engChrName: Especially an outdoor bath. Tasting that morning air while you gaze out at the mountains? Why, I don't have the words for it.
engSearchText:
Especially an outdoor bath. Tasting that morning air
while you gaze out at the mountains? Why, I don't
have the words for it.
jpnChrName: 特に、朝の空気を吸いながらあの山々を 眺められる露天風呂は……言葉にできないな。
jpnSearchText:
特に、朝の空気を吸いながらあの山々を
眺められる露天風呂は……言葉にできないな。

engChrName: A shame I'm leaving tomorrow. I'd have liked to spend another night in this wonderful, restful place.
engSearchText:
A shame I'm leaving tomorrow. I'd have liked to
spend another night in this wonderful, restful place.
jpnChrName: 明日帰るのがもったいないよ、こんなにも 休まる場所なら、もう一泊しておけばよかった。
jpnSearchText:
明日帰るのがもったいないよ、こんなにも
休まる場所なら、もう一泊しておけばよかった。

engChrName: What a bath that was. I could spend forever in there, truly. And the dinner! I was a bit surprised at the style of it, but the taste!
engSearchText:
What a bath that was. I could spend forever in
there, truly. And the dinner! I was a bit surprised at
the style of it, but the taste!
jpnChrName: 良い湯だったな……あれなら何度でも入りたいよ。 夕食も、様式には驚いたが絶品だった……
jpnSearchText:
良い湯だったな……あれなら何度でも入りたいよ。
夕食も、様式には驚いたが絶品だった……

engChrName: Come to think of it, I remember hearing from the lodge owner that the Divine Blade of the Empire and his family stayed here rather recently.
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, I remember hearing from the
lodge owner that the Divine Blade of the Empire and
his family stayed here rather recently.
jpnChrName: そういえば旅館の主人から聞いたが、少し前に 帝国の《剣聖》とその家族が泊まったとか……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば旅館の主人から聞いたが、少し前に
帝国の《剣聖》とその家族が泊まったとか……

engChrName: You know, 'Divine Blade' is a name I associate more with Liberl. I'm sure you know, that is a title belonging to a national hero of ours.
engSearchText:
You know, 'Divine Blade' is a name I associate more
with Liberl. I'm sure you know, that is a title
belonging to a national hero of ours.
jpnChrName: 剣聖と言えばリベール人にも馴染みのある渾名でね。 何せ、護国の英雄がそう呼ばれていたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
剣聖と言えばリベール人にも馴染みのある渾名でね。
何せ、護国の英雄がそう呼ばれていたんだ。

engChrName: I suppose it wasn't THAT Divine Blade who stayed here, though. Still, it does make me feel connected to this place, a little.
engSearchText:
I suppose it wasn't THAT Divine Blade who stayed
here, though. Still, it does make me feel connected to
this place, a little.
jpnChrName: ここに泊まったのは別の人だけど……こんな遠い地で その名を聞く事になるとは……縁を感じるねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ここに泊まったのは別の人だけど……こんな遠い地で
その名を聞く事になるとは……縁を感じるねぇ。

engChrName: All right! We've packed our luggage away, so shall we go look about, Torte?
engSearchText:
All right! We've packed our luggage away, so shall we
go look about, Torte?
jpnChrName: さて、ひとまず荷物も旅館に置いてきた 事だし、一回りしてみようかトルテ。
jpnSearchText:
さて、ひとまず荷物も旅館に置いてきた
事だし、一回りしてみようかトルテ。

engChrName: Ah, this feeling... It was well worth coming all the way out here from Liberl.
engSearchText:
Ah, this feeling... It was well worth coming all the
way out here from Liberl.
jpnChrName: この雰囲気……遥々リベールから 来た甲斐があったものだね。
jpnSearchText:
この雰囲気……遥々リベールから
来た甲斐があったものだね。

engChrName: Of course, even in Liberl, we're loosely familiar with Eastern culture, but reading of it and experiencing it are two different things!
engSearchText:
Of course, even in Liberl, we're loosely familiar with
Eastern culture, but reading of it and experiencing it
are two different things!
jpnChrName: 東方文化自体はリベールでも知られているけど…… 実際に肌で感じるとやはり違うものだね。
jpnSearchText:
東方文化自体はリベールでも知られているけど……
実際に肌で感じるとやはり違うものだね。

engChrName: Also, that guide showed me a few places that were breathtaking!
engSearchText:
Also, that guide showed me a few places that
were breathtaking!
jpnChrName: ガイドの彼が教えてくれた見所も どこも見応えがありそうだしね。
jpnSearchText:
ガイドの彼が教えてくれた見所も
どこも見応えがありそうだしね。

engChrName: I've never had the chance to slip into a hot spring right after waking up before, but it really 'warms away' the sleepiness.
engSearchText:
I've never had the chance to slip into a hot spring
right after waking up before, but it really 'warms away'
the sleepiness.
jpnChrName: 朝に温泉に入るのは初めてだったけど、 身体を温めると寝起きのだるさも無くなるわね。
jpnSearchText:
朝に温泉に入るのは初めてだったけど、
身体を温めると寝起きのだるさも無くなるわね。

engChrName: We've still got some time, so maybe I can scope out a nice, relaxing massage a bit later.
engSearchText:
We've still got some time, so maybe I can scope out a
nice, relaxing massage a bit later.
jpnChrName: せっかくだし今日はこの後、マッサージでも 受けてさらに癒されようかしらね。
jpnSearchText:
せっかくだし今日はこの後、マッサージでも
受けてさらに癒されようかしらね。

engChrName: This fog, though. Is this normal weather for Longlai?
engSearchText: This fog, though. Is this normal weather for Longlai?
jpnChrName: ところで……何だか霧が出てるけど、これも この場所の名物だったりするのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
ところで……何だか霧が出てるけど、これも
この場所の名物だったりするのかしら？

engChrName: The guidebook did mention the occasional foggy morning. There's fog and 'fog,' though...
engSearchText:
The guidebook did mention the occasional
foggy morning. There's fog and 'fog,' though...
jpnChrName: 朝露ならガイドブックにも 書いてあったんだけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
朝露ならガイドブックにも
書いてあったんだけどねぇ。

engChrName: Ahh, the hot springs here seep into your very bones. It even loosened up my shoulders. It's unreal!
engSearchText:
Ahh, the hot springs here seep into your very bones.
It even loosened up my shoulders. It's unreal!
jpnChrName: いやぁ、温泉も身体に染みわたるようで…… 凝りも解れちゃって、不思議なくらいよ。
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、温泉も身体に染みわたるようで……
凝りも解れちゃって、不思議なくらいよ。

engChrName: The Hekizanro Inn, with its Eastern-style hospitality, is something else.
engSearchText:
The Hekizanro Inn, with its Eastern-style
hospitality, is something else.
jpnChrName: それにしても、碧山楼の東方流の おもてなし……感心しちゃうわよね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、碧山楼の東方流の
おもてなし……感心しちゃうわよね。

engChrName: It's like, they really care about even the finest details. You can SEE the sincerity of it all. They actually care.
engSearchText:
It's like, they really care about even the finest details.
You can SEE the sincerity of it all. They
actually care.
jpnChrName: こう、些細な部分にまで気遣いがあって、 一つ一つの所作に誠意が見て取れて……
jpnSearchText:
こう、些細な部分にまで気遣いがあって、
一つ一つの所作に誠意が見て取れて……

engChrName: It's a very different experience than back in Elmo— not that I'm knocking their bona-fides. This just feels more...authentic?
engSearchText:
It's a very different experience than back in Elmo—
not that I'm knocking their bona-fides. This just feels
more...authentic?
jpnChrName: 同じ東方系でも、リベールのエルモとかとも 全然違って……より生に近いというか……
jpnSearchText:
同じ東方系でも、リベールのエルモとかとも
全然違って……より生に近いというか……

engChrName: I can't really put it into words. It just...is.
engSearchText: I can't really put it into words. It just...is.
jpnChrName: 言葉に言い表せないわ……でも、それだけ 凄いという事なのかもしれないわねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
言葉に言い表せないわ……でも、それだけ
凄いという事なのかもしれないわねぇ……

engChrName: The inn, too, is more than I imagined. It really was worth saving up our mira for the trip over the past few years.
engSearchText:
The inn, too, is more than I imagined. It really was
worth saving up our mira for the trip over the past
few years.
jpnChrName: 旅館も、想像以上に良さげで……何年も ミラを貯めた甲斐があったわ……
jpnSearchText:
旅館も、想像以上に良さげで……何年も
ミラを貯めた甲斐があったわ……

engChrName: *sniff* That there's the smell of fog...
engSearchText: *sniff* That there's the smell of fog...
jpnChrName: くんくん……霧の香りだぁ……
jpnSearchText: くんくん……霧の香りだぁ……

engChrName: Strange. I hadn't heard of fog being common in this season.
engSearchText:
Strange. I hadn't heard of fog being common in
this season.
jpnChrName: 今の季節に霧が出るとは あまり聞いてなかったけど……
jpnSearchText:
今の季節に霧が出るとは
あまり聞いてなかったけど……

engChrName: Still, this fog's kind of great. Fog, mist—it's all part of the travel experience!
engSearchText:
Still, this fog's kind of great. Fog, mist—it's all part of
the travel experience!
jpnChrName: いや、それでもこれは良い霧だ、 霧とか霞も旅先を彩る空気の一部だしね！
jpnSearchText:
いや、それでもこれは良い霧だ、
霧とか霞も旅先を彩る空気の一部だしね！

engChrName: This isn't just about here, but y'know, local shops should try selling the air—their fogs and whatnot—as souvenirs, right? Bottle it!
engSearchText:
This isn't just about here, but y'know, local shops
should try selling the air—their fogs and whatnot—as
souvenirs, right? Bottle it!
jpnChrName: ここに限らず、土産屋も霧とか空気とかを 売れば良いのにねぇ、缶詰とかにしてさ。
jpnSearchText:
ここに限らず、土産屋も霧とか空気とかを
売れば良いのにねぇ、缶詰とかにしてさ。

engChrName: You can't beat the smell of this souvenir shop. You can catch the scents of the wood, the paper, the materials...
engSearchText:
You can't beat the smell of this souvenir shop.
You can catch the scents of the wood, the paper,
the materials...
jpnChrName: 土産屋さんの匂い……良いものだと思わないかい？ この、香木とか紙とか素材の香りがさ……
jpnSearchText:
土産屋さんの匂い……良いものだと思わないかい？
この、香木とか紙とか素材の香りがさ……

engChrName: The dining place on the second floor here's got such an alluring scent that it even tints what you get down here. It makes things even better!
engSearchText:
The dining place on the second floor here's got such
an alluring scent that it even tints what you get
down here. It makes things even better!
jpnChrName: ここは二階の食事処でも料理の香りを感じれて、 一階でも綺麗な香りを味わえて二度おいしいよ。
jpnSearchText:
ここは二階の食事処でも料理の香りを感じれて、
一階でも綺麗な香りを味わえて二度おいしいよ。

engChrName: All right! That was a nice bath, so now I'll just go take in a breath of the night air, and that'll end my day right.
engSearchText:
All right! That was a nice bath, so now I'll just go
take in a breath of the night air, and that'll end my
day right.
jpnChrName: さて……温泉も堪能した事だし後は夜の空気を 感じて寝る、それが旅先の一日の締めさ。
jpnSearchText:
さて……温泉も堪能した事だし後は夜の空気を
感じて寝る、それが旅先の一日の締めさ。

engChrName: I like the lovely mountains, the feel of the hot springs, all that, of course. But for me, traveling is as much about the nose knowing.
engSearchText:
I like the lovely mountains, the feel of the hot springs,
all that, of course. But for me, traveling is as much
about the nose knowing.
jpnChrName: あの壮麗な山々や温泉も当然だけど…… オレの場合は、場所の匂いってものに惹かれるね。
jpnSearchText:
あの壮麗な山々や温泉も当然だけど……
オレの場合は、場所の匂いってものに惹かれるね。

engChrName: I'm not sure I can express it. It's the scent of the air that really makes you realize you're in a different place.
engSearchText:
I'm not sure I can express it. It's the scent of the air
that really makes you realize you're in a
different place.
jpnChrName: 伝わらないかい……空気の匂いで 旅先にいるのを実感する感覚。
jpnSearchText:
伝わらないかい……空気の匂いで
旅先にいるのを実感する感覚。

engChrName: It's that moment when you get off the train, or when you wake up in your lodging, embraced by a scent unlike anything you get at home.
engSearchText:
It's that moment when you get off the train, or when
you wake up in your lodging, embraced by a scent
unlike anything you get at home.
jpnChrName: 列車を降りた時とか、宿で目覚めた時に 普段と違う匂いに包まれてさ。
jpnSearchText:
列車を降りた時とか、宿で目覚めた時に
普段と違う匂いに包まれてさ。

engChrName: For me, those scents really affect my impressions of the places I travel.
engSearchText:
For me, those scents really affect my impressions of
the places I travel.
jpnChrName: それ次第で、旅先の印象って 結構変わると思うんだよね……
jpnSearchText:
それ次第で、旅先の印象って
結構変わると思うんだよね……

engChrName: I was over at the temple just a bit ago. The scent of that place? Top class!
engSearchText:
I was over at the temple just a bit ago. The scent of
that place? Top class!
jpnChrName: さっき寺院に行ってきたけど…… トップクラスに香りが良いね。
jpnSearchText:
さっき寺院に行ってきたけど……
トップクラスに香りが良いね。

engChrName: The scent of the trees and the incense really invokes that Eastern mood.
engSearchText:
The scent of the trees and the incense really invokes
that Eastern mood.
jpnChrName: 木や線香の香りも東方の情緒が あっていかにもって感じだけど……
jpnSearchText:
木や線香の香りも東方の情緒が
あっていかにもって感じだけど……

engChrName: The Longlai temple serves tea, too, and the tea here in Longlai has a really mysterious scent to it.
engSearchText:
The Longlai temple serves tea, too, and the tea here
in Longlai has a really mysterious scent to it.
jpnChrName: 龍來寺院はお茶のもてなしもしてるからね、 龍來茶の香りが絶妙に雰囲気を引き立てて……
jpnSearchText:
龍來寺院はお茶のもてなしもしてるからね、
龍來茶の香りが絶妙に雰囲気を引き立てて……

engChrName: Hmm... This fog's quite thick. The guidebook didn't mention fog being an issue in autumn...
engSearchText:
Hmm... This fog's quite thick. The guidebook didn't
mention fog being an issue in autumn...
jpnChrName: 随分と霧が深いわね……今の季節に出るとは ガイドブックに書いてなかったけど……
jpnSearchText:
随分と霧が深いわね……今の季節に出るとは
ガイドブックに書いてなかったけど……

engChrName: That said, the fog does add a wonderfully mysterious feel to this Eastern cityscape!
engSearchText:
That said, the fog does add a wonderfully mysterious
feel to this Eastern cityscape!
jpnChrName: ま、何にせよ東方風の町並みに映えてるし、 神秘的な雰囲気にはなってるわよね！
jpnSearchText:
ま、何にせよ東方風の町並みに映えてるし、
神秘的な雰囲気にはなってるわよね！

engChrName: I wonder if this is just phenomenally rare? I wish I'd brought a camera!
engSearchText:
I wonder if this is just phenomenally rare? I wish I'd
brought a camera!
jpnChrName: うーん、もしかしたらレアなのかもしれないし、 こんな事ならカメラ持ってくればよかったわ……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、もしかしたらレアなのかもしれないし、
こんな事ならカメラ持ってくればよかったわ……

engChrName: I was just going to stop by the temple to get a look at it, and I ended up taking their little class on tea.
engSearchText:
I was just going to stop by the temple to get a look at
it, and I ended up taking their little class on tea.
jpnChrName: 雰囲気を味わおうと思って寺院に参拝したら、 お茶のお作法とかも教えてもらえて……
jpnSearchText:
雰囲気を味わおうと思って寺院に参拝したら、
お茶のお作法とかも教えてもらえて……

engChrName: I guess tea's an important part of Eastern hospitality, too. It really is a deep subject, isn't it?
engSearchText:
I guess tea's an important part of Eastern
hospitality, too. It really is a deep subject, isn't it?
jpnChrName: あれが東方流のおもてなしなのね、 改めて奥深いものよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
あれが東方流のおもてなしなのね、
改めて奥深いものよねぇ。

engChrName: While she was teaching me though, I couldn't help noticing that Mother Izumi carries herself with a sort of otherworldly grace...
engSearchText:
While she was teaching me though, I couldn't help
noticing that Mother Izumi carries herself with a sort
of otherworldly grace...
jpnChrName: あの司祭さんも、振る舞いがもはや 神秘的というかなんというか……
jpnSearchText:
あの司祭さんも、振る舞いがもはや
神秘的というかなんというか……

engChrName: The experience was all so very... I feel like I'm about to discover something about myself!
engSearchText:
The experience was all so very... I feel like I'm about
to discover something about myself!
jpnChrName: 何というか……何かに目覚めちゃいそう……！
jpnSearchText: 何というか……何かに目覚めちゃいそう……！

engChrName: So this is Longlai... It's amazing! Talk about an Eastern feel!
engSearchText:
So this is Longlai... It's amazing! Talk about an
Eastern feel!
jpnChrName: ここが龍來……すっごーい！ まさにオリエンタルってやつかしら！？
jpnSearchText:
ここが龍來……すっごーい！
まさにオリエンタルってやつかしら！？

engChrName: It's different in its own way compared to Langport, and the geography's quite unique, too. I'm thrilled to be here!
engSearchText:
It's different in its own way compared to Langport,
and the geography's quite unique, too. I'm thrilled to
be here!
jpnChrName: ラングポートとも雰囲気が違うし、不思議な 地形も見れるし……胸が高鳴るわ！
jpnSearchText:
ラングポートとも雰囲気が違うし、不思議な
地形も見れるし……胸が高鳴るわ！

engChrName: Where to go first? Hmm... What a hard decision this is!
engSearchText:
Where to go first? Hmm... What a hard decision
this is!
jpnChrName: どこから見ようかしら……うーん、 こんなの迷うしかないじゃないッ！
jpnSearchText:
どこから見ようかしら……うーん、
こんなの迷うしかないじゃないッ！

engChrName: Daddy sometimes spends nights drinking stuff with his friends, but he also spends time with me!
engSearchText:
Daddy sometimes spends nights drinking stuff with
his friends, but he also spends time with me!
jpnChrName: おとうさん、よるはオトモダチとおさけのむ こともあるけど、イノとあそんでくれるの！
jpnSearchText:
おとうさん、よるはオトモダチとおさけのむ
こともあるけど、イノとあそんでくれるの！

engChrName: Even when he's with his friends, they sometimes give me yummy, umm, bar snacks, they call them!
engSearchText:
Even when he's with his friends, they sometimes give
me yummy, umm, bar snacks, they call them!
jpnChrName: オトモダチがいるときも、オツマミって おやつくれて、イノもだいすきなの！
jpnSearchText:
オトモダチがいるときも、オツマミって
おやつくれて、イノもだいすきなの！

engChrName: Dad and his friends say there's neat snacks in a place called the cap-ittel! I wonder what?
engSearchText:
Dad and his friends say there's neat snacks in a place
called the cap-ittel! I wonder what?
jpnChrName: シュトってとこにも、かわったオツマミあるって おとうさんたちいってたけど、どんなのだろう？
jpnSearchText:
シュトってとこにも、かわったオツマミあるって
おとうさんたちいってたけど、どんなのだろう？

engChrName: Mommy says she wants me to see a lot of the world.
engSearchText: Mommy says she wants me to see a lot of the world.
jpnChrName: おかあさんたち、イノにひろいセカイを みせたいってまえにいってたの。
jpnSearchText:
おかあさんたち、イノにひろいセカイを
みせたいってまえにいってたの。

engChrName: I've never gone anywhere but Longlai. I wonder what other towns are like?
engSearchText:
I've never gone anywhere but Longlai. I wonder what
other towns are like?
jpnChrName: イノ、ロンライのおそとでたことないけど、 ほかのまちって、どんなのだろう……
jpnSearchText:
イノ、ロンライのおそとでたことないけど、
ほかのまちって、どんなのだろう……

engChrName: Mommy was talking to one of the people who's visiting for vacation, and she said how much she wants to show me places!
engSearchText:
Mommy was talking to one of the people who's
visiting for vacation, and she said how much she
wants to show me places!
jpnChrName: リョコウのひととおはなししてたら、 おかあさんがおそとみせたいっていったの。
jpnSearchText:
リョコウのひととおはなししてたら、
おかあさんがおそとみせたいっていったの。

engChrName: Hi there! Are you all visiting for a vacation?
engSearchText: Hi there! Are you all visiting for a vacation?
jpnChrName: あ、おにいちゃんたちリョコウのヒト～？
jpnSearchText: あ、おにいちゃんたちリョコウのヒト～？

engChrName: Some of you're dressed kinda funny. You're not like the other people who visit!
engSearchText:
Some of you're dressed kinda funny. You're not like
the other people who visit!
jpnChrName: おもしろいカッコウしてるヒトもいて、 なんかほかのカンコウのみんなとちがうね！
jpnSearchText:
おもしろいカッコウしてるヒトもいて、
なんかほかのカンコウのみんなとちがうね！

engChrName: Hey, where did you come from? I wanna hear all about it!
engSearchText:
Hey, where did you come from? I wanna hear all
about it!
jpnChrName: ねーねー、どこからきたのー？ おはなしききたいなー！
jpnSearchText:
ねーねー、どこからきたのー？
おはなしききたいなー！

engChrName: Now, now, Ino. Don't pester the customers, okay?
engSearchText: Now, now, Ino. Don't pester the customers, okay?
jpnChrName: こらこらイノちゃん、あんまりお客様に 迷惑かけないの。
jpnSearchText:
こらこらイノちゃん、あんまりお客様に
迷惑かけないの。

engChrName: Didn't Mikasa from the inn just make time to play with you? Come on, now.
engSearchText:
Didn't Mikasa from the inn just make time to play
with you? Come on, now.
jpnChrName: さっき、旅館のミカサさんに遊んでもらった ばかりでしょ、少し落ち着きなさいな。
jpnSearchText:
さっき、旅館のミカサさんに遊んでもらった
ばかりでしょ、少し落ち着きなさいな。

engChrName: I'll get you something to eat in just a little bit, okay?
engSearchText: I'll get you something to eat in just a little bit, okay?
jpnChrName: もう少ししたらおやつ食べさせてあげるから。
jpnSearchText: もう少ししたらおやつ食べさせてあげるから。

engChrName: I love hearing people who come to Longlai talk!
engSearchText: I love hearing people who come to Longlai talk!
jpnChrName: イノ、ロンライのまちに来るヒトのおはなし きくのだいすきなの！
jpnSearchText:
イノ、ロンライのまちに来るヒトのおはなし
きくのだいすきなの！

engChrName: They tell me about other towns, and they aren't like Longlai! I wanna go do a tourism too someday!
engSearchText:
They tell me about other towns, and they aren't
like Longlai! I wanna go do a tourism too someday!
jpnChrName: ほかのまちって、ゼンゼンちがうんだね、 イノもいつかリョコウしてみたいなー。
jpnSearchText:
ほかのまちって、ゼンゼンちがうんだね、
イノもいつかリョコウしてみたいなー。

engChrName: I heard about your missing child. Sadly, all I can say is that I don't know anything.
engSearchText:
I heard about your missing child. Sadly, all I can say is
that I don't know anything.
jpnChrName: 迷子の幼子がおると聞いたが…… 申し訳ないが、儂は心当たりは無いのう。
jpnSearchText:
迷子の幼子がおると聞いたが……
申し訳ないが、儂は心当たりは無いのう。

engChrName: I can tell you that I've been watching the river this whole time. If she'd fallen in, I'd know.
engSearchText:
I can tell you that I've been watching the river this
whole time. If she'd fallen in, I'd know.
jpnChrName: だが、川はずっと見ておった。 水に落ちたりはしておらんのは確かじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
だが、川はずっと見ておった。
水に落ちたりはしておらんのは確かじゃ。

engChrName: Even the worst aside, the autumn river can give you a frightful chill. Still, I think we're safe from all that, at least.
engSearchText:
Even the worst aside, the autumn river can give you
a frightful chill. Still, I think we're safe from all that,
at least.
jpnChrName: この季節に川に入れば低体温症になるかもしれん。 その点、溺れておらんのは幸いと言えよう。
jpnSearchText:
この季節に川に入れば低体温症になるかもしれん。
その点、溺れておらんのは幸いと言えよう。

engChrName: I'll make sure to keep a close eye on the river for the time being.
engSearchText:
I'll make sure to keep a close eye on the river for the
time being.
jpnChrName: とりあえず、儂も川辺を中心に 気を配っておくとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず、儂も川辺を中心に
気を配っておくとしよう。

engChrName: Come to think of it, the Revolution Festival is coming up next month, yes? The big one in the capital?
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, the Revolution Festival is
coming up next month, yes? The big one in
the capital?
jpnChrName: ……ところで、共和国の都では来月、 噂に聞く革命記念祭があるそうじゃな。
jpnSearchText:
……ところで、共和国の都では来月、
噂に聞く革命記念祭があるそうじゃな。

engChrName: I've been to the interior of the Republic a number of times, but never quite had the time to make it to the festival.
engSearchText:
I've been to the interior of the Republic a number of
times, but never quite had the time to make it to
the festival.
jpnChrName: 共和国には何度か来とるが、どうにも 都合がつく事は少なかったものでの。
jpnSearchText:
共和国には何度か来とるが、どうにも
都合がつく事は少なかったものでの。

engChrName: I don't have any reason to rush back east, so perhaps it would make for a good change of pace to go see it this time.
engSearchText:
I don't have any reason to rush back east, so perhaps
it would make for a good change of pace to go see it
this time.
jpnChrName: 今年は東方へ帰るのもさほど急がぬしな、 顔を出してみるのもまた一興やもしれん。
jpnSearchText:
今年は東方へ帰るのもさほど急がぬしな、
顔を出してみるのもまた一興やもしれん。

engChrName: It's been a while since I had such a pleasant time fishing in the day. I do hope I was able to convey to the young folk a bit of fishing lore.
engSearchText:
It's been a while since I had such a pleasant time
fishing in the day. I do hope I was able to convey to
the young folk a bit of fishing lore.
jpnChrName: ふふ、昼の釣りは久方ぶりに楽しめたのう。 極意の一端でも若人に伝わったなら幸いじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、昼の釣りは久方ぶりに楽しめたのう。
極意の一端でも若人に伝わったなら幸いじゃ。

engChrName: I must say, the fish of Longlai grow as well as they've ever done. They're always a pleasure to catch.
engSearchText:
I must say, the fish of Longlai grow as well as they've
ever done. They're always a pleasure to catch.
jpnChrName: それにしても、龍來の魚は相変わらずよく 肥えており、釣り甲斐もあるものじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、龍來の魚は相変わらずよく
肥えており、釣り甲斐もあるものじゃ。

engChrName: There's a number of places out east where the fish are doing poorly, so I can't help but appreciate this land's richness every time I come.
engSearchText:
There's a number of places out east where the fish are
doing poorly, so I can't help but appreciate this land's
richness every time I come.
jpnChrName: 東方では魚も減りつつある地も多いしのう、 この地の豊かさには毎度感心する。
jpnSearchText:
東方では魚も減りつつある地も多いしのう、
この地の豊かさには毎度感心する。

engChrName: Of course, a fisherman who has mastered the true essence of fishing, such as myself, can catch fish even in the most beset of lands.
engSearchText:
Of course, a fisherman who has mastered the true
essence of fishing, such as myself, can catch fish even
in the most beset of lands.
jpnChrName: ──もっとも、儂の様に極意に至りし釣師なら、 例え痩せた地でも釣るものは釣れるがな。
jpnSearchText:
──もっとも、儂の様に極意に至りし釣師なら、
例え痩せた地でも釣るものは釣れるがな。

engChrName: Ah, speaking of the time since I was last in the Republic proper, there's been this new trend, orbal films, yes?
engSearchText:
Ah, speaking of the time since I was last in the
Republic proper, there's been this new trend, orbal
films, yes?
jpnChrName: ところで、共和国に来るのは久しいが、最近は 何やら導力映画なるものが流行っておるとか。
jpnSearchText:
ところで、共和国に来るのは久しいが、最近は
何やら導力映画なるものが流行っておるとか。

engChrName: The advertisements make them look quite interesting. I should find a day to experience them and expand my horizons.
engSearchText:
The advertisements make them look quite interesting.
I should find a day to experience them and expand
my horizons.
jpnChrName: 宣伝を見る限りなかなか興味深そうじゃな。 この機に見聞を深めるのも良かろう。
jpnSearchText:
宣伝を見る限りなかなか興味深そうじゃな。
この機に見聞を深めるのも良かろう。

engChrName: (Especially since I understand some of those movies have quite appealing women dancing and such.)
engSearchText:
(Especially since I understand some of those movies
have quite appealing women dancing and such.)
jpnChrName: （……何やら麗しき女子の舞も   見られると聞くしな……）
jpnSearchText:
（……何やら麗しき女子の舞も
見られると聞くしな……）

engChrName: Fishing, too, is an art one can master. To become one with the mountains, to read the flow of the rivers...
engSearchText:
Fishing, too, is an art one can master. To become one
with the mountains, to read the flow of the rivers...
jpnChrName: 釣りもまた極めれば“理”に至れるもの…… 霊山と一体となり、川の流れを読む……
jpnSearchText:
釣りもまた極めれば“理”に至れるもの……
霊山と一体となり、川の流れを読む……

engChrName: You there! Do you enjoy fishing? I am a master fisher from the East, and I've come to this land to share my knowledge.
engSearchText:
You there! Do you enjoy fishing? I am a master fisher
from the East, and I've come to this land to share
my knowledge.
jpnChrName: おぬしら、釣りは嗜むか？　儂は東方で 極めし釣りの極意をこの地に伝えに来た。
jpnSearchText:
おぬしら、釣りは嗜むか？　儂は東方で
極めし釣りの極意をこの地に伝えに来た。

engChrName: Should you wish, I'd be happy to instruct you. Speak to me whenever you'd like lessons.
engSearchText:
Should you wish, I'd be happy to instruct you.
Speak to me whenever you'd like lessons.
jpnChrName: ふふ、もしよければ儂が指南してしんぜよう。 声をかけるが良い。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、もしよければ儂が指南してしんぜよう。
声をかけるが良い。

engChrName: (Especially if you happen to have any sprightly young ladies needing instruction...)
engSearchText:
(Especially if you happen to have any sprightly young
ladies needing instruction...)
jpnChrName: （……できれば魚のように活きの良い   麗しき女子を連れてな……）
jpnSearchText:
（……できれば魚のように活きの良い
麗しき女子を連れてな……）

engChrName: The mountains this morning are somehow... No, no. Best not to say anything.
engSearchText:
The mountains this morning are somehow... No, no.
Best not to say anything.
jpnChrName: ……今朝のお山はどうにも…… いんや、触れぬ方が良いかのう……
jpnSearchText:
……今朝のお山はどうにも……
いんや、触れぬ方が良いかのう……

engChrName: The air of this place flowed so well last night, yet now... I cannot help but worry.
engSearchText:
The air of this place flowed so well last night,
yet now... I cannot help but worry.
jpnChrName: 昨日は気も良く整っておっただけに…… 少し心配ではあるがのう……
jpnSearchText:
昨日は気も良く整っておっただけに……
少し心配ではあるがのう……

engChrName: This night, as the calendar turns, will be the fifteenth night of the month... The moon heightens my power to see.
engSearchText:
This night, as the calendar turns, will be the fifteenth
night of the month... The moon heightens my power
to see.
jpnChrName: 今宵の十五夜……見通す力を ……高めてくれるようでの……
jpnSearchText:
今宵の十五夜……見通す力を
……高めてくれるようでの……

engChrName: Your thoughts—they are drawn to a certain location.
engSearchText: Your thoughts—they are drawn to a certain location.
jpnChrName: ……おんし……何やら、気にかけておる 場所でもあるようじゃの……
jpnSearchText:
……おんし……何やら、気にかけておる
場所でもあるようじゃの……

engChrName: From what I can tell, you have ties to Longlai...and those ties will tie a knot to a deeper tie yet.
engSearchText:
From what I can tell, you have ties to Longlai...and
those ties will tie a knot to a deeper tie yet.
jpnChrName: 龍來に何某の縁があるなら……その縁は、 更なる縁を紡ぐことになるじゃろう……
jpnSearchText:
龍來に何某の縁があるなら……その縁は、
更なる縁を紡ぐことになるじゃろう……

engChrName: The will of the mountains in the air is strong today... Are you travelers?
engSearchText:
The will of the mountains in the air is strong today...
Are you travelers?
jpnChrName: 今日はお山の気も満ちておる…… お前さん達、旅行者かの……？
jpnSearchText:
今日はお山の気も満ちておる……
お前さん達、旅行者かの……？

engChrName: Things are clear today... I could read your palms to see your fortune, if you'd like.
engSearchText:
Things are clear today... I could read your palms to
see your fortune, if you'd like.
jpnChrName: 今日は冴えるしのう……手相で 運勢を見てあげるぞえ……
jpnSearchText:
今日は冴えるしのう……手相で
運勢を見てあげるぞえ……

engChrName: Okay! I took a nice, warm bath, so time for another day of hard work!
engSearchText:
Okay! I took a nice, warm bath, so time for another
day of hard work!
jpnChrName: さーて、朝風呂で身体も温まった事だし、 今日も張り切ってお仕事といきますか。
jpnSearchText:
さーて、朝風呂で身体も温まった事だし、
今日も張り切ってお仕事といきますか。

engChrName: I'm a bit spooked about this fog, though. I hope the tourists don't get lost.
engSearchText:
I'm a bit spooked about this fog, though. I hope the
tourists don't get lost.
jpnChrName: とはいえ……ちょっと霧が深くて心配ね、 観光の人達、迷ったりしないかしら。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ……ちょっと霧が深くて心配ね、
観光の人達、迷ったりしないかしら。

engChrName: Come to think of it, the Tourism Bureau was going on about a missing child, weren't they?
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, the Tourism Bureau was going
on about a missing child, weren't they?
jpnChrName: そういえば観光協会の方で迷子の話も あったようだけど……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば観光協会の方で迷子の話も
あったようだけど……

engChrName: I'll keep an eye out while I warn the visitors around here.
engSearchText:
I'll keep an eye out while I warn the visitors
around here.
jpnChrName: 私もこの通りのお客さんは 注意して見ておくとするわ。
jpnSearchText:
私もこの通りのお客さんは
注意して見ておくとするわ。

engChrName: How about ice cream for your dessert tonight? It's great after a bath!
engSearchText:
How about ice cream for your dessert tonight?
It's great after a bath!
jpnChrName: 夜のデザートにもアイスはどうかしら、 それに、お風呂上りにもアイスは合うわよー。
jpnSearchText:
夜のデザートにもアイスはどうかしら、
それに、お風呂上りにもアイスは合うわよー。

engChrName: Longlai's a quiet place, but I still wish there were more young people around.
engSearchText:
Longlai's a quiet place, but I still wish there were
more young people around.
jpnChrName: 龍來はこういう静かな感じだけど、やっぱり 若い人にももっと来て欲しいしね。
jpnSearchText:
龍來はこういう静かな感じだけど、やっぱり
若い人にももっと来て欲しいしね。

engChrName: It'd be a lot of fun to recommend all the hottest sweets made locally, y'know?
engSearchText:
It'd be a lot of fun to recommend all the hottest
sweets made locally, y'know?
jpnChrName: こうやって特産品で作ったポップなスイーツを どんどんお勧めしていきたいのよねー。
jpnSearchText:
こうやって特産品で作ったポップなスイーツを
どんどんお勧めしていきたいのよねー。

engChrName: Ah, the visitor from before. Lemme try and upsell you on this matcha ice cream again!
engSearchText:
Ah, the visitor from before. Lemme try and upsell
you on this matcha ice cream again!
jpnChrName: あ、さっき通りがかったお客さんね。 改めてデザートに抹茶アイスはどう？
jpnSearchText:
あ、さっき通りがかったお客さんね。
改めてデザートに抹茶アイスはどう？

engChrName: Western style, Eastern flavor! It's all the rage these days.
engSearchText:
Western style, Eastern flavor! It's all the rage
these days.
jpnChrName: 最近はこういう西方系のお菓子に東方の 味わいを混ぜたものも人気なのよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
最近はこういう西方系のお菓子に東方の
味わいを混ぜたものも人気なのよねぇ。

engChrName: There's nothing wrong with real old-fashioned treats like mantou, but this ice cream has a real neat flavor.
engSearchText:
There's nothing wrong with real old-fashioned treats
like mantou, but this ice cream has a real neat flavor.
jpnChrName: 饅頭みたいな伝統的な東方のお菓子も良いけど、 こういうのもまた絶妙に味わい深いものよ。
jpnSearchText:
饅頭みたいな伝統的な東方のお菓子も良いけど、
こういうのもまた絶妙に味わい深いものよ。

engChrName: The fog's just awful... I was going to go harvest some bamboo from near the waterfall, but in this cloudbank, maybe not.
engSearchText:
The fog's just awful... I was going to go harvest some
bamboo from near the waterfall, but in this
cloudbank, maybe not.
jpnChrName: 霧が濃いねぇ……瀑布の方に竹を 取りに行こうと思ったけどやめておこうかな。
jpnSearchText:
霧が濃いねぇ……瀑布の方に竹を
取りに行こうと思ったけどやめておこうかな。

engChrName: The mountain roads get perilous when you can't see well. Plus I heard people were seeing strange monsters yesterday.
engSearchText:
The mountain roads get perilous when you can't
see well. Plus I heard people were seeing strange
monsters yesterday.
jpnChrName: 視界が悪い中での山道は危険だしね、 それに昨日は変わった魔獣も出たって聞くし。
jpnSearchText:
視界が悪い中での山道は危険だしね、
それに昨日は変わった魔獣も出たって聞くし。

engChrName: Don't worry, everyone. I'll help you all create some great memories here in town, so there's no need to go out.
engSearchText:
Don't worry, everyone. I'll help you all create some
great memories here in town, so there's no need to
go out.
jpnChrName: お兄さん達も、町の中で僕らが思い出を作って あげるから、無理に出ようとしないでね。
jpnSearchText:
お兄さん達も、町の中で僕らが思い出を作って
あげるから、無理に出ようとしないでね。

engChrName: Given the time, we won't be doing any more workshops, but I'm still selling souvenirs.
engSearchText:
Given the time, we won't be doing any more
workshops, but I'm still selling souvenirs.
jpnChrName: もう時間が時間だからものづくり体験は 終わりだけどお土産なら売れるよ。
jpnSearchText:
もう時間が時間だからものづくり体験は
終わりだけどお土産なら売れるよ。

engChrName: It's probably no surprise, but I opened this shop because I wanted to share the appeal of handicrafts with people.
engSearchText:
It's probably no surprise, but I opened this shop
because I wanted to share the appeal of handicrafts
with people.
jpnChrName: やっぱりね、工芸品の魅力そのものを 伝えたいと思ってこのお店をやってるしね。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりね、工芸品の魅力そのものを
伝えたいと思ってこのお店をやってるしね。

engChrName: There's a lot you can learn from the experience of actually making something and having the chance to touch and feel things.
engSearchText:
There's a lot you can learn from the experience of
actually making something and having the chance to
touch and feel things.
jpnChrName: 実際に作る体験をした上で色々な品を手に取れば、 案外違った見え方もしてくるものなんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
実際に作る体験をした上で色々な品を手に取れば、
案外違った見え方もしてくるものなんだよ。

engChrName: Hey there, sir. Want to try making some handicrafts?
engSearchText: Hey there, sir. Want to try making some handicrafts?
jpnChrName: やあお兄さん、民芸品の手作りを 体験して行ってみないかい？
jpnSearchText:
やあお兄さん、民芸品の手作りを
体験して行ってみないかい？

engChrName: I sell a few completed products, too, but you can get the chance to touch and feel the materials for yourself and enjoy the sensation of it.
engSearchText:
I sell a few completed products, too, but you can get
the chance to touch and feel the materials for yourself
and enjoy the sensation of it.
jpnChrName: 完成品も売ってはいるけど、やっぱり竹や土に 触れてみる事で味わえる雰囲気もあるしね。
jpnSearchText:
完成品も売ってはいるけど、やっぱり竹や土に
触れてみる事で味わえる雰囲気もあるしね。

engChrName: You seem close to your partners, too, so how about a little suggestion?
engSearchText:
You seem close to your partners, too, so how about a
little suggestion?
jpnChrName: お連れの人とも仲良さそうだし、 何ならサービスしちゃおうか？
jpnSearchText:
お連れの人とも仲良さそうだし、
何ならサービスしちゃおうか？

engChrName: There's a lot to be said for making something special together. Something that'll be a good memory!
engSearchText:
There's a lot to be said for making something
special together. Something that'll be a good memory!
jpnChrName: こういうのは大事な人と一緒に作って、 思い出の品にするのがオツなものだしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
こういうのは大事な人と一緒に作って、
思い出の品にするのがオツなものだしねぇ。

engChrName: Okay then! It's a little early, but I'll get the store open! Need to make sure the folks who leave during the day can stop by.
engSearchText:
Okay then! It's a little early, but I'll get the
store open! Need to make sure the folks who leave
during the day can stop by.
jpnChrName: さて、少し早いが店を開けるとするか！ 昼に帰る人らにも楽しんで欲しいからな。
jpnSearchText:
さて、少し早いが店を開けるとするか！
昼に帰る人らにも楽しんで欲しいからな。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. I heard about a lost child... Gives me the willies, thinking of Ino in that situation.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. I heard about a lost child... Gives me the
willies, thinking of Ino in that situation.
jpnChrName: そういえば、何やら迷子の話を聞いたが…… 小さい娘を持つ身としても心配だな。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、何やら迷子の話を聞いたが……
小さい娘を持つ身としても心配だな。

engChrName: Longlai's a very safe place, but it's surrounded by mountains and there's some real monsters not that far from town.
engSearchText:
Longlai's a very safe place, but it's surrounded by
mountains and there's some real monsters not that far
from town.
jpnChrName: 町自体は危険じゃないが、山に囲まれているし、 少し離れれば魔獣も結構いるしな。
jpnSearchText:
町自体は危険じゃないが、山に囲まれているし、
少し離れれば魔獣も結構いるしな。

engChrName: My daughter's at home now, but I'm still worried. Maybe I should try to keep a closer eye on her from now on.
engSearchText:
My daughter's at home now, but I'm still worried.
Maybe I should try to keep a closer eye on her from
now on.
jpnChrName: 娘は今は家だが……心配だし、今後は もう少しつきっきりで見ておくとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
娘は今は家だが……心配だし、今後は
もう少しつきっきりで見ておくとしよう。

engChrName: Sadly, charcoal mantou aren't too good for dinner, I suppose. Night's when my wife rules folks' appetites.
engSearchText:
Sadly, charcoal mantou aren't too good for dinner,
I suppose. Night's when my wife rules folks' appetites.
jpnChrName: やっぱり竹炭饅頭も晩飯には不向きって ところかね、夜は家内の所のが盛況でな。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり竹炭饅頭も晩飯には不向きって
ところかね、夜は家内の所のが盛況でな。

engChrName: Not that I'm complaining. After I close up, even I go out and grab some of the old folks to go drinking there. Helps contribute to sales!
engSearchText:
Not that I'm complaining. After I close up, even I go
out and grab some of the old folks to go
drinking there. Helps contribute to sales!
jpnChrName: ま、そういう俺もこの後は家内の売上貢献がてら 街のオヤジ仲間誘って飲むつもりさ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そういう俺もこの後は家内の売上貢献がてら
街のオヤジ仲間誘って飲むつもりさ。

engChrName: And hey, the stuff at my wife's place is great with a drink. Perfect way to finish the day!
engSearchText:
And hey, the stuff at my wife's place is great with
a drink. Perfect way to finish the day!
jpnChrName: うちの家内の作る飯は酒にも合って、 本当に一日の締めには最適だからな！
jpnSearchText:
うちの家内の作る飯は酒にも合って、
本当に一日の締めには最適だからな！

engChrName: My wife's business is busy at night, so I take over watching our Ino at this hour.
engSearchText:
My wife's business is busy at night, so I take over
watching our Ino at this hour.
jpnChrName: 夜は家内の方が忙しいからな、 今は俺が娘を見る担当なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
夜は家内の方が忙しいからな、
今は俺が娘を見る担当なんだ。

engChrName: But being able to mind my little girl while I keep up with my old buddies is the best part of having us run our own shops!
engSearchText:
But being able to mind my little girl while I keep up
with my old buddies is the best part of having us run
our own shops!
jpnChrName: まあ娘の面倒を見ながらでも、飲み仲間とも 多少付き合えるのも夫婦で屋台やる甲斐があるな！
jpnSearchText:
まあ娘の面倒を見ながらでも、飲み仲間とも
多少付き合えるのも夫婦で屋台やる甲斐があるな！

engChrName: Hey, you're that fellow who came by earlier! How about some charcoal mantou?
engSearchText:
Hey, you're that fellow who came by earlier!
How about some charcoal mantou?
jpnChrName: おっ、さっき来たお兄さん達だね！ 改めて竹炭饅頭はどうだい？
jpnSearchText:
おっ、さっき来たお兄さん達だね！
改めて竹炭饅頭はどうだい？

engChrName: Charcoal mantou and hot springs eggs might seem like more adult snacks, but their sweetness appeals to kids, too.
engSearchText:
Charcoal mantou and hot springs eggs might seem
like more adult snacks, but their sweetness appeals
to kids, too.
jpnChrName: 竹炭饅頭も温泉卵も、渋いように見えて この香り高い甘さが子供たちにも人気でな。
jpnSearchText:
竹炭饅頭も温泉卵も、渋いように見えて
この香り高い甘さが子供たちにも人気でな。

engChrName: My daughter Ino loves charcoal mantou. That girl needs her nibble to get through the day!
engSearchText:
My daughter Ino loves charcoal mantou. That girl
needs her nibble to get through the day!
jpnChrName: 俺の娘のイノも、ほぼ毎日竹炭饅頭を 楽しみにしているくらいさ！
jpnSearchText:
俺の娘のイノも、ほぼ毎日竹炭饅頭を
楽しみにしているくらいさ！

engChrName: These mantou are great for an afternoon snack, unlike my wife's stuff on the other side of the creek!
engSearchText:
These mantou are great for an afternoon snack, unlike
my wife's stuff on the other side of the creek!
jpnChrName: 向こう岸で家内が売ってるご飯ものと違って、 午後のおやつにも丁度いい重さだぞ！
jpnSearchText:
向こう岸で家内が売ってるご飯ものと違って、
午後のおやつにも丁度いい重さだぞ！

engChrName: Well, then! Time to open the shop.
engSearchText: Well, then! Time to open the shop.
jpnChrName: さてさて、今日も頑張って店開きをしないとねぇ。
jpnSearchText: さてさて、今日も頑張って店開きをしないとねぇ。

engChrName: With this fog I'm not sure how many customers I'll even get, but still...
engSearchText:
With this fog I'm not sure how many customers I'll
even get, but still...
jpnChrName: 随分濃い霧だから客入りが心配だけど……
jpnSearchText: 随分濃い霧だから客入りが心配だけど……

engChrName: No point in whining about it. I'll just have to pull the customers in with my voice instead.
engSearchText:
No point in whining about it. I'll just have to pull the
customers in with my voice instead.
jpnChrName: 文句を言っても仕方ないしねぇ。 声を出して呼び込みしていくだけさ。
jpnSearchText:
文句を言っても仕方ないしねぇ。
声を出して呼び込みしていくだけさ。

engChrName: Come to think about it, a girl about the same age came by very early this morning to buy a fantuan.
engSearchText:
Come to think about it, a girl about the same age
came by very early this morning to buy a fantuan.
jpnChrName: そういえば、同じくらいの年齢の子が 朝一番に飯糰（ファントァン）を買って行ってくれたんだけどね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、同じくらいの年齢の子が
朝一番に飯糰（ファントァン）を買って行ってくれたんだけどね。

engChrName: It seemed odd, but... Oh, come to think of it, she came by yesterday, too.
engSearchText:
It seemed odd, but... Oh, come to think of it, she
came by yesterday, too.
jpnChrName: ……だいぶ珍しいと思ったけど……あら、 そういえば昨日来てくれた……
jpnSearchText:
……だいぶ珍しいと思ったけど……あら、
そういえば昨日来てくれた……

engChrName: (This is what Senri mentioned... She bought one and left immediately, then.)
engSearchText:
(This is what Senri mentioned... She bought one and
left immediately, then.)
jpnChrName: （センリの言っていた話だな……   買ってすぐに去ったという事だが……）
jpnSearchText:
（センリの言っていた話だな……
買ってすぐに去ったという事だが……）

engChrName: Good evening. How about some handy onigiri for a late-night snack?
engSearchText:
Good evening. How about some handy onigiri for a
late-night snack?
jpnChrName: こんばんは、夜食かおつまみに 握り飯を買いに来たのかしら。
jpnSearchText:
こんばんは、夜食かおつまみに
握り飯を買いに来たのかしら。

engChrName: Tourists like to stop by for midnight snacks, so I stay open fairly late.
engSearchText:
Tourists like to stop by for midnight snacks, so I stay
open fairly late.
jpnChrName: 観光の人達も晩御飯やおつまみが欲しいだろうし、 それなりの時間まで開けているわ。
jpnSearchText:
観光の人達も晩御飯やおつまみが欲しいだろうし、
それなりの時間まで開けているわ。

engChrName: My daughter likes to see the travelers, so at night we keep her with my husband or I.
engSearchText:
My daughter likes to see the travelers, so at night we
keep her with my husband or I.
jpnChrName: 娘も旅行の人達を見るの好きだしねぇ、 夜も私か旦那の傍にいてくれるの。
jpnSearchText:
娘も旅行の人達を見るの好きだしねぇ、
夜も私か旦那の傍にいてくれるの。

engChrName: We get to provide for our guests, and my daughter has fun, so it's pretty worthwhile to stay open this late.
engSearchText:
We get to provide for our guests, and my daughter
has fun, so it's pretty worthwhile to stay open
this late.
jpnChrName: お客さん達をもてなして、娘も喜んでくれて。 遅くまでやる甲斐もあるものよ。
jpnSearchText:
お客さん達をもてなして、娘も喜んでくれて。
遅くまでやる甲斐もあるものよ。

engChrName: Ah, you're from earlier! My husband's mantou is nice and all, but how about some of our onigiri?
engSearchText:
Ah, you're from earlier! My husband's mantou is nice
and all, but how about some of our onigiri?
jpnChrName: あら、お昼の……旦那の所の饅頭も良いけど、 私のところの握り飯はどうかしら。
jpnSearchText:
あら、お昼の……旦那の所の饅頭も良いけど、
私のところの握り飯はどうかしら。

engChrName: You probably had lunch just now, but you should stop by tomorrow morning, if you'd rather! I sell some pretty rarefied onigiri.
engSearchText:
You probably had lunch just now, but you should stop
by tomorrow morning, if you'd rather! I sell some
pretty rarefied onigiri.
jpnChrName: 今は食後かもしれないけど、明日の朝とかにもね。 東方のご飯ものでも珍しいし、お勧めよ。
jpnSearchText:
今は食後かもしれないけど、明日の朝とかにもね。
東方のご飯ものでも珍しいし、お勧めよ。

engChrName: In the East, onigiri is a common food for just about everyone. Wouldn't you like to get a feel for that yourselves?
engSearchText:
In the East, onigiri is a common food for just
about everyone. Wouldn't you like to get a feel for
that yourselves?
jpnChrName: 東方では握り飯は誰でも食べるものでねぇ、 その雰囲気を味わうのも良いんじゃないかしら。
jpnSearchText:
東方では握り飯は誰でも食べるものでねぇ、
その雰囲気を味わうのも良いんじゃないかしら。

engChrName: Rice dumplings are said to be a common portable food for the mountain ascetics. Wouldn't you like to try that mountain taste yourself?
engSearchText:
Rice dumplings are said to be a common portable
food for the mountain ascetics. Wouldn't you like to
try that mountain taste yourself?
jpnChrName: チマキは修験者も持ち歩くっていうし、あの山を 見ながら食べて気分を味わうのも良い趣よ。
jpnSearchText:
チマキは修験者も持ち歩くっていうし、あの山を
見ながら食べて気分を味わうのも良い趣よ。

engChrName: We've got more than onigiri, too. How about a fantuan? They're made with a very glutinous rice, different from the kind used in fried rice.
engSearchText:
We've got more than onigiri, too. How about
a fantuan? They're made with a very glutinous rice,
different from the kind used in fried rice.
jpnChrName: チマキ以外にもこの飯糰（ファントァン）って握り飯は、 炒飯に使うのとは違う糯米を使っていてねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
チマキ以外にもこの飯糰（ファントァン）って握り飯は、
炒飯に使うのとは違う糯米を使っていてねぇ。

engChrName: Since this is the kind of rice folks use to make candy, the kids love them. My daughter can't get enough.
engSearchText:
Since this is the kind of rice folks use to make candy,
the kids love them. My daughter can't get enough.
jpnChrName: お菓子にも使われるお米だし、子供たちにも人気。 うちの子もこれが本当に好きでねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
お菓子にも使われるお米だし、子供たちにも人気。
うちの子もこれが本当に好きでねぇ。

engChrName: It's also a great recommendation for kids who don't like eating veggies, since they're happy to eat rice dumplings even with fillings.
engSearchText:
It's also a great recommendation for kids who don't
like eating veggies, since they're happy to eat rice
dumplings even with fillings.
jpnChrName: 野菜が苦手な子でも、具入りのチマキならどうって 子連れのお客さん達にもお勧めしてるのよ。
jpnSearchText:
野菜が苦手な子でも、具入りのチマキならどうって
子連れのお客さん達にもお勧めしてるのよ。

engChrName: Next month will be the Revolution Festival, so I thought I should get home, but this morning I heard something from an acquaintance.
engSearchText:
Next month will be the Revolution Festival, so I
thought I should get home, but this morning I heard
something from an acquaintance.
jpnChrName: 来月は革命記念祭だし、流石にそろそろ帰ろうと 思ってたが……今朝、知人から連絡があってね。
jpnSearchText:
来月は革命記念祭だし、流石にそろそろ帰ろうと
思ってたが……今朝、知人から連絡があってね。

engChrName: It seems they found some kind of rare something-or- others in the free cities, so of course, I need to rush over there now.
engSearchText:
It seems they found some kind of rare something-or-
others in the free cities, so of course, I need to
rush over there now.
jpnChrName: 何やら自由都市圏の方で珍しいジャンクが 見つかったとかで、急遽行く事になったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
何やら自由都市圏の方で珍しいジャンクが
見つかったとかで、急遽行く事になったんだ。

engChrName: My acquaintance in Oración will introduce me to a guide, so it should work out.
engSearchText:
My acquaintance in Oración will introduce me to a
guide, so it should work out.
jpnChrName: オラシオンの知人が道先案内人を紹介して くれるらしいし、まあ、何とかなるさ。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンの知人が道先案内人を紹介して
くれるらしいし、まあ、何とかなるさ。

engChrName: I'll just need to be sure I'm back in time for the festival, and it'll all be another story to share with the kids.
engSearchText:
I'll just need to be sure I'm back in time for the
festival, and it'll all be another story to share with
the kids.
jpnChrName: 記念祭までに帰れれば良いしね、子供らへの 土産話も多いに越した事は無いさ。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭までに帰れれば良いしね、子供らへの
土産話も多いに越した事は無いさ。

engChrName: The souvenir shops here are quite something. They have such a wide selection of Eastern goods.
engSearchText:
The souvenir shops here are quite something.
They have such a wide selection of Eastern goods.
jpnChrName: ここの土産物屋は相変わらず馬鹿にならないね、 東方の品を手広く扱っている。
jpnSearchText:
ここの土産物屋は相変わらず馬鹿にならないね、
東方の品を手広く扱っている。

engChrName: I make sure to come by here every time I'm in Longlai. It's a good place to pick up tidbits of info on rare Eastern finds.
engSearchText:
I make sure to come by here every time I'm
in Longlai. It's a good place to pick up tidbits of
info on rare Eastern finds.
jpnChrName: 龍來に来た時は毎回来るようにしている、 東方の掘り出し物の情報も見て取れるしね。
jpnSearchText:
龍來に来た時は毎回来るようにしている、
東方の掘り出し物の情報も見て取れるしね。

engChrName: I lucked into some especially good rumors this time. I'll need to hit up my acquaintance once I get back to the capital.
engSearchText:
I lucked into some especially good rumors this time.
I'll need to hit up my acquaintance once I get back to
the capital.
jpnChrName: 今回も興味深い噂も聞けた事だし…… 首都に帰ったら、あの人のところも当たるかな。
jpnSearchText:
今回も興味深い噂も聞けた事だし……
首都に帰ったら、あの人のところも当たるかな。

engChrName: Hmm? Ah, didn't we encounter each other at Langport? You're an acquaintance of Jigen, yes?
engSearchText:
Hmm? Ah, didn't we encounter each other
at Langport? You're an acquaintance of Jigen, yes?
jpnChrName: おや、君は確か煌都でも会わなかったかね。 確か、ジゲンの旦那の知り合いだったかな？
jpnSearchText:
おや、君は確か煌都でも会わなかったかね。
確か、ジゲンの旦那の知り合いだったかな？

engChrName: This can't be a coincidence. Well, if you're excited by the antiques here, seek me out anytime.
engSearchText:
This can't be a coincidence. Well, if you're excited by
the antiques here, seek me out anytime.
jpnChrName: これも何かの縁だ、ここでも珍品に関心が 湧いたら適当に声でもかけてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
これも何かの縁だ、ここでも珍品に関心が
湧いたら適当に声でもかけてくれ。

engChrName: I come by Longlai every year to identify rare Eastern finds.
engSearchText:
I come by Longlai every year to identify rare
Eastern finds.
jpnChrName: 東方の掘り出し物を見定めるためにも、 龍來には毎年来ているんだがね。
jpnSearchText:
東方の掘り出し物を見定めるためにも、
龍來には毎年来ているんだがね。
