engChrName: I couldn't get out further East this year, but I WAS able to pick up some odds and ends that were brought by train a few days back.
engSearchText:
I couldn't get out further East this year, but I WAS
able to pick up some odds and ends that were brought
by train a few days back.
jpnChrName: 今年は東方には行かなかったが……数日前に列車便で 来た東方の交易商から仕入れたものもあるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
今年は東方には行かなかったが……数日前に列車便で
来た東方の交易商から仕入れたものもあるんだ。

engChrName: Oh? I believe I saw you at some bar back in Langport, didn't I?
engSearchText:
Oh? I believe I saw you at some bar back in Langport,
didn't I?
jpnChrName: おや、確か煌都の宿酒場で 見かけたような気のする顔だ。
jpnSearchText:
おや、確か煌都の宿酒場で
見かけたような気のする顔だ。

engChrName: A shame we didn't get a chance to talk then, but I'm a traveling antiques dealer.
engSearchText:
A shame we didn't get a chance to talk then, but
I'm a traveling antiques dealer.
jpnChrName: あの時は満足に話せなかったが、 僕は旅の古物商ってところでね。
jpnSearchText:
あの時は満足に話せなかったが、
僕は旅の古物商ってところでね。

engChrName: I only have a few things on me, but if you'd like, I could show you what I've got on hand.
engSearchText:
I only have a few things on me, but if you'd like, I
could show you what I've got on hand.
jpnChrName: 手持ちで良ければ、僕が各地で仕入れた 珍品を見ていったらどうかね？
jpnSearchText:
手持ちで良ければ、僕が各地で仕入れた
珍品を見ていったらどうかね？

engChrName: I couldn't get out to the East this year, but I was able to pick up some things from the people who pass through here.
engSearchText:
I couldn't get out to the East this year, but I was able
to pick up some things from the people who pass
through here.
jpnChrName: 今年は東方までは行けなかったが、この町に 渡来する人から色々仕入れられたんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
今年は東方までは行けなかったが、この町に
渡来する人から色々仕入れられたんだよ。

engChrName: I would've liked to have gone further east, but my trip out to the Central East ended up taking longer than I'd planned.
engSearchText:
I would've liked to have gone further east, but my
trip out to the Central East ended up taking longer
than I'd planned.
jpnChrName: 本当は東方にもまた足を運びたかったんだが、 中東の旅が思ったより長引いてしまってね。
jpnSearchText:
本当は東方にもまた足を運びたかったんだが、
中東の旅が思ったより長引いてしまってね。

engChrName: I'd really rather get back in time for the Revolution Festival, so sadly my grand journey east has to go on the backburner.
engSearchText:
I'd really rather get back in time for the Revolution
Festival, so sadly my grand journey east has to go on
the backburner.
jpnChrName: 流石に革命記念祭までには帰りたいしね、 今年は東方遠征は泣く泣くキャンセルさ。
jpnSearchText:
流石に革命記念祭までには帰りたいしね、
今年は東方遠征は泣く泣くキャンセルさ。

engChrName: Even so, there's plenty of exciting finds for me right here in Longlai.
engSearchText:
Even so, there's plenty of exciting finds for me
right here in Longlai.
jpnChrName: まあ、それでも龍來まで来れば十分に 面白いものは手に入るものなのさ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それでも龍來まで来れば十分に
面白いものは手に入るものなのさ。

engChrName: I'm very sorry about your missing child... Our lodge takes full responsibility for this failure of security.
engSearchText:
I'm very sorry about your missing child... Our lodge
takes full responsibility for this failure of security.
jpnChrName: お子様に関しては……大変申し訳ございません。 当館での入出管理が不完全という事でしょう……
jpnSearchText:
お子様に関しては……大変申し訳ございません。
当館での入出管理が不完全という事でしょう……

engChrName: Far from providing you with a pleasant, relaxing time, we've caused you such worry. We are all so, so sorry.
engSearchText:
Far from providing you with a pleasant, relaxing time,
we've caused you such worry. We are all so, so sorry.
jpnChrName: 慰安旅行でお寛ぎのところ、このような ご心配をおかけし……心よりお詫び申し上げます。
jpnSearchText:
慰安旅行でお寛ぎのところ、このような
ご心配をおかけし……心よりお詫び申し上げます。

engChrName: I've taken the liberty of contacting the local police, the Tourism Bureau, and of course the Bracer Guild.
engSearchText:
I've taken the liberty of contacting the local police,
the Tourism Bureau, and of course the Bracer Guild.
jpnChrName: ……既にお子様の件は駐在所や観光協会、 ギルドに連絡しております。
jpnSearchText:
……既にお子様の件は駐在所や観光協会、
ギルドに連絡しております。

engChrName: I intend to continue searching myself as well, and pray to the Heavenly Mother that we find her safe and sound.
engSearchText:
I intend to continue searching myself as well, and
pray to the Heavenly Mother that we find her safe
and sound.
jpnChrName: 無事に発見される事を天上聖母に祈りつつ、 当方でも改めて探してみる所存でございます。
jpnSearchText:
無事に発見される事を天上聖母に祈りつつ、
当方でも改めて探してみる所存でございます。

engChrName: Did you enjoy your meals and time in the hot springs? I hope you found what we offer fully satisfying.
engSearchText:
Did you enjoy your meals and time in the hot springs?
I hope you found what we offer fully satisfying.
jpnChrName: 温泉とお食事はお楽しみいただけましたか？ ご満足いただけましたら幸いです。
jpnSearchText:
温泉とお食事はお楽しみいただけましたか？
ご満足いただけましたら幸いです。

engChrName: We've had a number of visitors from much farther away lately—and I'm honored to say that our inn was quite popular with them, too.
engSearchText:
We've had a number of visitors from much farther
away lately—and I'm honored to say that our inn was
quite popular with them, too.
jpnChrName: 最近では以前にも増して遠方からいらっしゃる方も 多いですが、そうした方々にも好評で光栄です。
jpnSearchText:
最近では以前にも増して遠方からいらっしゃる方も
多いですが、そうした方々にも好評で光栄です。

engChrName: The lord of the hot springs town in the Empire came by, himself. He said he felt he could learn from us, which was a great honor.
engSearchText:
The lord of the hot springs town in the Empire came
by, himself. He said he felt he could learn from us,
which was a great honor.
jpnChrName: 以前には帝国の温泉郷の領主様もご招待しましたが、 彼らも参考にすると言って下さり誇らしいもので。
jpnSearchText:
以前には帝国の温泉郷の領主様もご招待しましたが、
彼らも参考にすると言って下さり誇らしいもので。

engChrName: I'm sure we'll have customers from all over staying at our inn. I hope we can provide for each and every one's satisfaction.
engSearchText:
I'm sure we'll have customers from all over staying at
our inn. I hope we can provide for each and every
one's satisfaction.
jpnChrName: 今後も多様な来訪者がいらっしゃるでしょうが、 少しでも多くの方に堪能してもらいたいものです。
jpnSearchText:
今後も多様な来訪者がいらっしゃるでしょうが、
少しでも多くの方に堪能してもらいたいものです。

engChrName: Mr. Arkride, I hope you will enjoy your time both here at the Hekizanro Inn and in Longlai.
engSearchText:
Mr. Arkride, I hope you will enjoy your time both
here at the Hekizanro Inn and in Longlai.
jpnChrName: アークライド様、当館《碧山楼》と 龍來の町をどうぞ存分にご堪能下さい。
jpnSearchText:
アークライド様、当館《碧山楼》と
龍來の町をどうぞ存分にご堪能下さい。

engChrName: We hope our hospitality will allow you to rest and relax while you enjoy the natural wonders of our town.
engSearchText:
We hope our hospitality will allow you to rest and
relax while you enjoy the natural wonders of
our town.
jpnChrName: お客様方にお寛ぎいただき、龍來の風土を 味わっていただけるよう、おもてなし致します。
jpnSearchText:
お客様方にお寛ぎいただき、龍來の風土を
味わっていただけるよう、おもてなし致します。

engChrName: Our inn does serve state guests and other VIPs on occasion, but we provide our best service to all customers, no matter their status.
engSearchText:
Our inn does serve state guests and other VIPs on
occasion, but we provide our best service to all
customers, no matter their status.
jpnChrName: 当館は国賓の方なども度々ご宿泊されますが、一般の お客様も等しく誠心誠意対応しております。
jpnSearchText:
当館は国賓の方なども度々ご宿泊されますが、一般の
お客様も等しく誠心誠意対応しております。

engChrName: I've just finished morning prep...but I hear a child's gone missing?
engSearchText:
I've just finished morning prep...but I hear a child's
gone missing?
jpnChrName: 儂は朝の仕込みを終えたところですが…… 幼子が行方知れずとなったとか。
jpnSearchText:
儂は朝の仕込みを終えたところですが……
幼子が行方知れずとなったとか。

engChrName: The inn is helping search, too, so I guess I'll ask our provisioners and other folk I know if they saw anything.
engSearchText:
The inn is helping search, too, so I guess I'll ask our
provisioners and other folk I know if they
saw anything.
jpnChrName: 旅館でも捜索に協力しておりますし、 儂も食材の業者などをあたっておきますぞ。
jpnSearchText:
旅館でも捜索に協力しておりますし、
儂も食材の業者などをあたっておきますぞ。

engChrName: Aside from that, I'll hope and trust that she'll be found safely, and get something warm ready for her return.
engSearchText:
Aside from that, I'll hope and trust that she'll be
found safely, and get something warm ready for
her return.
jpnChrName: 他にも、無事に戻る事を信じて 温かいものを用意しておくとしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
他にも、無事に戻る事を信じて
温かいものを用意しておくとしましょう。

engChrName: I'm pleased you enjoyed our traditional multi-course dinner. That format is a specialty of Eastern cuisine!
engSearchText:
I'm pleased you enjoyed our traditional
multi-course dinner. That format is a specialty of
Eastern cuisine!
jpnChrName: 懐石料理もお楽しみいただけたなら幸いです、 あれもまた東方料理の極みの一つですのでな。
jpnSearchText:
懐石料理もお楽しみいただけたなら幸いです、
あれもまた東方料理の極みの一つですのでな。

engChrName: Hospitality isn't just serving food made with fresh ingredients. It's also arranging the food to visually please, and serving it right.
engSearchText:
Hospitality isn't just serving food made with
fresh ingredients. It's also arranging the food to
visually please, and serving it right.
jpnChrName: 旬の食材と味付けだけでなく、見た目の美しさや 提供方法も含めての一つのおもてなしといえます。
jpnSearchText:
旬の食材と味付けだけでなく、見た目の美しさや
提供方法も含めての一つのおもてなしといえます。

engChrName: Several chefs have come here to train with us before. I hope they picked up on that mindset.
engSearchText:
Several chefs have come here to train with us before.
I hope they picked up on that mindset.
jpnChrName: 当館で修行した料理人もいくらかおりますが、 彼らにもこの精神まで伝えられておれば幸いです。
jpnSearchText:
当館で修行した料理人もいくらかおりますが、
彼らにもこの精神まで伝えられておれば幸いです。

engChrName: In fact, one of my students is over in Langport. I hope they, especially, were able to take those lessons to heart.
engSearchText:
In fact, one of my students is over in Langport.
I hope they, especially, were able to take those lessons
to heart.
jpnChrName: 煌都にも一人弟子がおりますが……あれにも そうしたものを継承していって欲しいものですな。
jpnSearchText:
煌都にも一人弟子がおりますが……あれにも
そうしたものを継承していって欲しいものですな。

engChrName: I'm glad to hear you enjoy our local cuisine. Dinner tonight will be a traditional multi-course affair.
engSearchText:
I'm glad to hear you enjoy our local cuisine.
Dinner tonight will be a traditional
multi-course affair.
jpnChrName: 龍來の郷土料理をお気に召して頂けて光栄です。 夜は懐石料理を御覧に入れましょう。
jpnSearchText:
龍來の郷土料理をお気に召して頂けて光栄です。
夜は懐石料理を御覧に入れましょう。

engChrName: The key to these dishes is to use the best of Longlai's natural resources to fully bring the appeal of our seasonal best to life!
engSearchText:
The key to these dishes is to use the best of Longlai's
natural resources to fully bring the appeal of our
seasonal best to life!
jpnChrName: これらは龍來の風土を活かし、旬の食材の 素材本来の魅力を引き出す事が肝要でしてな。
jpnSearchText:
これらは龍來の風土を活かし、旬の食材の
素材本来の魅力を引き出す事が肝要でしてな。

engChrName: I believe that the work done at the earliest stages in particular, like marinating in alcohol and such, is key to a good meal.
engSearchText:
I believe that the work done at the earliest stages in
particular, like marinating in alcohol and such, is key
to a good meal.
jpnChrName: 特に儂は、酒への漬け込みなど前仕込みこそが ものを言うと心得ております。
jpnSearchText:
特に儂は、酒への漬け込みなど前仕込みこそが
ものを言うと心得ております。

engChrName: No matter how long it takes, if it allows me to offer the best dishes imaginable, that's where my honor comes from.
engSearchText:
No matter how long it takes, if it allows me to offer
the best dishes imaginable, that's where my honor
comes from.
jpnChrName: どれだけ時間を要そうと、仕込みを経て 至上の料理を提供できれば光栄ですからな。
jpnSearchText:
どれだけ時間を要そうと、仕込みを経て
至上の料理を提供できれば光栄ですからな。

engChrName: Cooking, too, is a key piece of culture that carries within it Eastern ideas and thoughts.
engSearchText:
Cooking, too, is a key piece of culture that carries
within it Eastern ideas and thoughts.
jpnChrName: 料理もまた東方の精神を伝える 重要な文化の一つと存じております。
jpnSearchText:
料理もまた東方の精神を伝える
重要な文化の一つと存じております。

engChrName: As someone entrusted with the position of master chef at a historic inn like this, I owe it to each and every customer to bring that to life.
engSearchText:
As someone entrusted with the position of master
chef at a historic inn like this, I owe it to each and
every customer to bring that to life.
jpnChrName: こうした歴史ある旅館にて厨師長を任せられた以上 それを如何にお客様のため、活かしていくか……
jpnSearchText:
こうした歴史ある旅館にて厨師長を任せられた以上
それを如何にお客様のため、活かしていくか……

engChrName: After all, there is no limit to how well you can provide hospitality—especially the Eastern sort!
engSearchText:
After all, there is no limit to how well you can provide
hospitality—especially the Eastern sort!
jpnChrName: 東方流のもてなしに、 上限などありませんからな。
jpnSearchText:
東方流のもてなしに、
上限などありませんからな。

engChrName: As the master chef, I believe I have a responsibility to constantly improve my own skills.
engSearchText:
As the master chef, I believe I have a responsibility to
constantly improve my own skills.
jpnChrName: 厨師長となったからこそ、更に精進し、 この道を極める責任があるものと捉えております。
jpnSearchText:
厨師長となったからこそ、更に精進し、
この道を極める責任があるものと捉えております。

engChrName: I'm sure you're very worried about your child. We've contacted the Tourism Bureau and the police.
engSearchText:
I'm sure you're very worried about your child.
We've contacted the Tourism Bureau and the police.
jpnChrName: お子様の行方……心配ですね。 観光協会や警察へも連絡いたしました。
jpnSearchText:
お子様の行方……心配ですね。
観光協会や警察へも連絡いたしました。

engChrName: Our inn's employees will of course be helping you search, and we'll also be ready to help safeguard her once she's returned.
engSearchText:
Our inn's employees will of course be helping you
search, and we'll also be ready to help safeguard her
once she's returned.
jpnChrName: 当館でも、職員で周辺を探しつつ 保護の準備をしております。
jpnSearchText:
当館でも、職員で周辺を探しつつ
保護の準備をしております。

engChrName: I'll go contact a few of my acquaintances as well.
engSearchText: I'll go contact a few of my acquaintances as well.
jpnChrName: 私の方でも、個人的な知人を 何人か当たってみるつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
私の方でも、個人的な知人を
何人か当たってみるつもりです。

engChrName: I just do hope we find her...
engSearchText: I just do hope we find her...
jpnChrName: 本当に早く見つかればいいのですが……
jpnSearchText: 本当に早く見つかればいいのですが……

engChrName: Did you enjoy the hot springs of our inn?
engSearchText: Did you enjoy the hot springs of our inn?
jpnChrName: 当館の温泉の方は ご堪能いただけましたでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
当館の温泉の方は
ご堪能いただけましたでしょうか。

engChrName: The Longlai hot springs have long been known for their restorative and beautifying effects. They're the blessing of the Tianshan Mountains!
engSearchText:
The Longlai hot springs have long been known for
their restorative and beautifying effects. They're the
blessing of the Tianshan Mountains!
jpnChrName: 龍來の温泉には疲労回復や美肌の効果が知られ、 古くより天山の恵みとして名高いものです。
jpnSearchText:
龍來の温泉には疲労回復や美肌の効果が知られ、
古くより天山の恵みとして名高いものです。

engChrName: We also offer shiatsu and seitai massages, if you'd like. We are confident we can provide whatever you need to banish your exhaustion.
engSearchText:
We also offer shiatsu and seitai massages, if
you'd like. We are confident we can provide whatever
you need to banish your exhaustion.
jpnChrName: 他にも指圧や整体のサービスもございますので、 必ずやお疲れを癒して頂けるかと。
jpnSearchText:
他にも指圧や整体のサービスもございますので、
必ずやお疲れを癒して頂けるかと。

engChrName: Please relax and enjoy yourself here, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText: Please relax and enjoy yourself here, Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: どうぞごゆっくりお寛ぎくださいませ、 アークライド様。
jpnSearchText:
どうぞごゆっくりお寛ぎくださいませ、
アークライド様。

engChrName: We will have your room cleaned while you are out. Should you have any questions or points of interest, please inform us.
engSearchText:
We will have your room cleaned while you are out.
Should you have any questions or points of interest,
please inform us.
jpnChrName: お部屋の方もお戻りまでに改めてお整えしますので、 何かお気づきの点等ございましたら何なりと。
jpnSearchText:
お部屋の方もお戻りまでに改めてお整えしますので、
何かお気づきの点等ございましたら何なりと。

engChrName: We would love to hear your insights and thoughts so we can best help you enjoy your time here at Longlai.
engSearchText:
We would love to hear your insights and thoughts so
we can best help you enjoy your time here at Longlai.
jpnChrName: 龍來の観光をお楽しみいただけるよう、 見どころなどもお聞きいただければと存じます。
jpnSearchText:
龍來の観光をお楽しみいただけるよう、
見どころなどもお聞きいただければと存じます。

engChrName: If you are going out to tour, one popular spot to see would be Longlai Temple.
engSearchText:
If you are going out to tour, one popular spot to see
would be Longlai Temple.
jpnChrName: 町内の見所ですと、やはり龍來寺院が 人気のスポットでございます。
jpnSearchText:
町内の見所ですと、やはり龍來寺院が
人気のスポットでございます。

engChrName: It is a lovely place where one can closely experience the culture, values, and history of the East, as well as experience Eastern art.
engSearchText:
It is a lovely place where one can closely experience
the culture, values, and history of the East, as well as
experience Eastern art.
jpnChrName: 東方の文化や価値観、歴史を感じていただけますし 東方の芸道の体験などもできます。
jpnSearchText:
東方の文化や価値観、歴史を感じていただけますし
東方の芸道の体験などもできます。

engChrName: Also, you may enjoy the hands-on workshop and fortuneteller that are just down the way. Both are also popular.
engSearchText:
Also, you may enjoy the hands-on workshop and
fortuneteller that are just down the way. Both are
also popular.
jpnChrName: 他にもすぐ下の通りには体験工房や 占い師の方もおり、そちらも人気ですね。
jpnSearchText:
他にもすぐ下の通りには体験工房や
占い師の方もおり、そちらも人気ですね。

engChrName: The inn already informed the Tourism Bureau about your lost child. I've told our staff to contact you if they see her.
engSearchText:
The inn already informed the Tourism Bureau about
your lost child. I've told our staff to contact you if
they see her.
jpnChrName: 観光協会でも迷子の話は旅館から聞いた、 見かけたら連絡するよう協会員に言っておいた。
jpnSearchText:
観光協会でも迷子の話は旅館から聞いた、
見かけたら連絡するよう協会員に言っておいた。

engChrName: We'll check all the places we usually see lost children—the storehouses, the unopened shops, places like that.
engSearchText:
We'll check all the places we usually see lost
children—the storehouses, the unopened shops,
places like that.
jpnChrName: 倉庫とか準備前の屋台とか、子供が 入り込みそうな場所は一通り確認しておく。
jpnSearchText:
倉庫とか準備前の屋台とか、子供が
入り込みそうな場所は一通り確認しておく。

engChrName: I've got to open my shop myself, but I'll keep an eye out as far as I can from here. Just tell me if there's anything else I can do.
engSearchText:
I've got to open my shop myself, but I'll keep an eye
out as far as I can from here. Just tell me if there's
anything else I can do.
jpnChrName: 俺も店を開ける準備はしなきゃならんが できる範囲で手伝おう、何かあれば言ってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
俺も店を開ける準備はしなきゃならんが
できる範囲で手伝おう、何かあれば言ってくれ。

engChrName: Oh, welcome! Though it's a bit late. I will be closing soon, but you caught me just in time.
engSearchText:
Oh, welcome! Though it's a bit late. I will be closing
soon, but you caught me just in time.
jpnChrName: おう、こんな時間によく来てくれたな。 もうじき店仕舞いだが、問題無いぞ。
jpnSearchText:
おう、こんな時間によく来てくれたな。
もうじき店仕舞いだが、問題無いぞ。

engChrName: The Tourism Bureau is proud to offer help to anyone who needs it, even at this late hour.
engSearchText:
The Tourism Bureau is proud to offer help to anyone
who needs it, even at this late hour.
jpnChrName: こんな時間でも、何かを求めてもらえるなら 観光協会冥利に尽きるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
こんな時間でも、何かを求めてもらえるなら
観光協会冥利に尽きるぜ。

engChrName: With that said, I do have some paperwork I need to handle, but visitors always come first. Feel free to ask if you need something.
engSearchText:
With that said, I do have some paperwork I need to
handle, but visitors always come first. Feel free to ask
if you need something.
jpnChrName: ま、観光協会の事務作業も多少やる予定だが お客さん達が一番だ、遠慮なく頼ってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、観光協会の事務作業も多少やる予定だが
お客さん達が一番だ、遠慮なく頼ってくれ。

engChrName: Welcome, visitors. Looking for good souvenirs of your trip to Longlai?
engSearchText:
Welcome, visitors. Looking for good souvenirs of
your trip to Longlai?
jpnChrName: おう、いらっしゃいお客さん。 龍來ならではのお土産をお探しかい？
jpnSearchText:
おう、いらっしゃいお客さん。
龍來ならではのお土産をお探しかい？

engChrName: I'll be glad to help you with that. As it happens, I'm the chief of the Tourism Bureau as well.
engSearchText:
I'll be glad to help you with that. As it happens, I'm
the chief of the Tourism Bureau as well.
jpnChrName: それなら俺に相談してくれ、これでも 観光協会の会長もしてるんでね。
jpnSearchText:
それなら俺に相談してくれ、これでも
観光協会の会長もしてるんでね。

engChrName: I'm sure I can help you figure out what you'd like to get.
engSearchText:
I'm sure I can help you figure out what you'd like
to get.
jpnChrName: 一通りの分野の品なら見繕って あげられると思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
一通りの分野の品なら見繕って
あげられると思うぜ。

engChrName: Longlai's unique selling point is how different it is from most other places influenced by Eastern culture.
engSearchText:
Longlai's unique selling point is how different it is
from most other places influenced by Eastern culture.
jpnChrName: 龍來は東方文化の中でも 珍しい様式が売りだからな。
jpnSearchText:
龍來は東方文化の中でも
珍しい様式が売りだからな。

engChrName: I'm sure you'll find something here that is entirely unique—even compared to, say, Langport.
engSearchText:
I'm sure you'll find something here that is entirely
unique—even compared to, say, Langport.
jpnChrName: 煌都ともまた違った、ここならではの 土産物がきっと見つかるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
煌都ともまた違った、ここならではの
土産物がきっと見つかるはずだ。

engChrName: I'm happy as long as I can help you make a unique, special Longlai memory or two.
engSearchText:
I'm happy as long as I can help you make a unique,
special Longlai memory or two.
jpnChrName: ここだけの良い思い出を作る 手伝いをさせてもらえればと思うよ。
jpnSearchText:
ここだけの良い思い出を作る
手伝いをさせてもらえればと思うよ。

engChrName: I was just about to start morning prep, but the kid who was with you has gone missing?
engSearchText:
I was just about to start morning prep, but the kid
who was with you has gone missing?
jpnChrName: 朝の仕込みをしていたところだったけど…… お客さん達の連れのお子さんが迷子だって？
jpnSearchText:
朝の仕込みをしていたところだったけど……
お客さん達の連れのお子さんが迷子だって？

engChrName: My son seemed pretty worried, too... I'll be glad to offer any help I can.
engSearchText:
My son seemed pretty worried, too... I'll be glad to
offer any help I can.
jpnChrName: 息子も随分心配していたけど……まあ、 うちのお店も力になるつもりよ。
jpnSearchText:
息子も随分心配していたけど……まあ、
うちのお店も力になるつもりよ。

engChrName: After all, what is 'hospitality' if not helping visitors feel at peace?
engSearchText:
After all, what is 'hospitality' if not helping visitors
feel at peace?
jpnChrName: どんな時でもお客さん達に安心して楽しんで もらえるようにしてこそ、おもてなしだからね。
jpnSearchText:
どんな時でもお客さん達に安心して楽しんで
もらえるようにしてこそ、おもてなしだからね。

engChrName: Oh, hello. Welcome, late visitor. If you'd like, I'll be happy to whip up dinner for you.
engSearchText:
Oh, hello. Welcome, late visitor. If you'd like, I'll be
happy to whip up dinner for you.
jpnChrName: あら、遅く来てくれてありがとう。 夕食も張り切って用意するわ。
jpnSearchText:
あら、遅く来てくれてありがとう。
夕食も張り切って用意するわ。

engChrName: Oh, yes—that's my son there. As you can see, he's a healthy eater, especially now that he's in his growth spurt.
engSearchText:
Oh, yes—that's my son there. As you can see, he's a
healthy eater, especially now that he's in his
growth spurt.
jpnChrName: そうそう、あっちにいるのが私の息子なんだけど、 あの通り育ち盛りで良い食べっぷりでね。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、あっちにいるのが私の息子なんだけど、
あの通り育ち盛りで良い食べっぷりでね。

engChrName: He likes to tell me how he can do his best as a guide thanks to my meals.
engSearchText:
He likes to tell me how he can do his best as a guide
thanks to my meals.
jpnChrName: 私の作るまかないでガイドを頑張れるって 言ってくれるのよ。
jpnSearchText:
私の作るまかないでガイドを頑張れるって
言ってくれるのよ。

engChrName: I can't help but feel a little embarrassed and happy at that at the same time. Both as a mother, and as a cook!
engSearchText:
I can't help but feel a little embarrassed and happy at
that at the same time. Both as a mother, and as
a cook!
jpnChrName: 母親としても料理人としても 恥ずかしいほど嬉しい限りよ。
jpnSearchText:
母親としても料理人としても
恥ずかしいほど嬉しい限りよ。

engChrName: Welcome. Would you like to taste the flavor of Longlai and Eastern home cooking? You'll find it much different than the fancy shops!
engSearchText:
Welcome. Would you like to taste the flavor of
Longlai and Eastern home cooking? You'll find it
much different than the fancy shops!
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい、龍來や東方の家庭料理はいかが？ 高級な料理とはまた違った趣があるわよ。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃい、龍來や東方の家庭料理はいかが？
高級な料理とはまた違った趣があるわよ。

engChrName: I used to work with tea, so I've also got a good eye for food that matches tea well!
engSearchText:
I used to work with tea, so I've also got a good eye for
food that matches tea well!
jpnChrName: 昔茶葉を作るのに関わった経験もあるし、 お茶に合う食べ物も紹介できると思うわ。
jpnSearchText:
昔茶葉を作るのに関わった経験もあるし、
お茶に合う食べ物も紹介できると思うわ。

engChrName: I'd be glad to introduce you to the flavors loved by the common folk of the East.
engSearchText:
I'd be glad to introduce you to the flavors loved by the
common folk of the East.
jpnChrName: 東方の庶民の親しんだ味、この機会に 是非とも味わっていって頂戴な。
jpnSearchText:
東方の庶民の親しんだ味、この機会に
是非とも味わっていって頂戴な。

engChrName: Oh, yes—if you see my son outside, he's working with the Tourism Bureau as a guide, so feel free to lean on him a bit.
engSearchText:
Oh, yes—if you see my son outside, he's working with
the Tourism Bureau as a guide, so feel free to lean on
him a bit.
jpnChrName: そうそう、息子も外で観光案内のバイトを しているから、良かったら頼ってあげて頂戴な。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、息子も外で観光案内のバイトを
しているから、良かったら頼ってあげて頂戴な。

engChrName: He's such a smart kid. He's still young, but he'll do a fine job showing you to the sights of Longlai.
engSearchText:
He's such a smart kid. He's still young, but he'll do a
fine job showing you to the sights of Longlai.
jpnChrName: 出来た息子でねぇ、まだ子供だけど しっかり見所を案内してあげられるわよ。
jpnSearchText:
出来た息子でねぇ、まだ子供だけど
しっかり見所を案内してあげられるわよ。

engChrName: Now, should I grab a mantou, or one of those rice-based food items for a quick breakfast?
engSearchText:
Now, should I grab a mantou, or one of those
rice-based food items for a quick breakfast?
jpnChrName: さて、朝ごはんに饅頭かご飯ものでも 買うとしようかな。
jpnSearchText:
さて、朝ごはんに饅頭かご飯ものでも
買うとしようかな。

engChrName: Oh, wait! I'd better go get souvenirs for my co-workers soon...
engSearchText:
Oh, wait! I'd better go get souvenirs for my
co-workers soon...
jpnChrName: あっ、でもそろそろ同僚たちへの土産も 買っておかないとなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
あっ、でもそろそろ同僚たちへの土産も
買っておかないとなぁ……

engChrName: Can't buy anything that won't stay fresh... Wonder if they've got some dried goods? Or maybe even a knickknack or something?
engSearchText:
Can't buy anything that won't stay fresh... Wonder if
they've got some dried goods? Or maybe even a
knickknack or something?
jpnChrName: 日持ちしないのは駄目だし……乾き物は無いかな。 それとも、食べ物以外の小物とかはアリなのかな。
jpnSearchText:
日持ちしないのは駄目だし……乾き物は無いかな。
それとも、食べ物以外の小物とかはアリなのかな。

engChrName: Phew! What a great bath. My shoulders feel way lighter, and I feel so rejuvenated.
engSearchText:
Phew! What a great bath. My shoulders feel way
lighter, and I feel so rejuvenated.
jpnChrName: ふい～良い湯だったなぁ……凝りも解れるし、 日頃の疲れも吹っ飛ぶよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふい～良い湯だったなぁ……凝りも解れるし、
日頃の疲れも吹っ飛ぶよ。

engChrName: I guess you'd expect that they'd feel as good as the Hekizanro Inn's baths, since they're from the same source.
engSearchText:
I guess you'd expect that they'd feel as good as the
Hekizanro Inn's baths, since they're from the
same source.
jpnChrName: 碧山楼と同じ温泉だけあって、泊っている 宿の浴場でも十分すぎる効能だ……
jpnSearchText:
碧山楼と同じ温泉だけあって、泊っている
宿の浴場でも十分すぎる効能だ……

engChrName: Best of all is letting the night air blow across me now that I'm all warmed up...
engSearchText:
Best of all is letting the night air blow across me now
that I'm all warmed up...
jpnChrName: それで、温まった身体をこうやって 夜風に晒すのがまた気持ち良いんだよねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
それで、温まった身体をこうやって
夜風に晒すのがまた気持ち良いんだよねぇ……

engChrName: This homestyle food's so nice! It's not super fancy or anything, but it still tastes fantastic.
engSearchText:
This homestyle food's so nice! It's not super fancy or
anything, but it still tastes fantastic.
jpnChrName: いやぁ、家庭料理も美味しいね。 飾らない感じなのに、素材はちゃんと活きてて……
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、家庭料理も美味しいね。
飾らない感じなのに、素材はちゃんと活きてて……

engChrName: I really am interested in the Hekizanro Inn's big meals, but honestly? I could just eat here the whole trip and be happy.
engSearchText:
I really am interested in the Hekizanro Inn's big
meals, but honestly? I could just eat here the
whole trip and be happy.
jpnChrName: 本当なら碧山楼の食事にも興味あったけど、 ここのご飯でも十分過ぎるほどだよ。
jpnSearchText:
本当なら碧山楼の食事にも興味あったけど、
ここのご飯でも十分過ぎるほどだよ。

engChrName: Also...frankly, with how unique the cultural experience here is, I think staying in some nice, cheap lodging would still make for a great trip.
engSearchText:
Also...frankly, with how unique the cultural
experience here is, I think staying in some nice, cheap
lodging would still make for a great trip.
jpnChrName: それに……これだけ文化が違うと、安宿でも 新鮮な感じは味わえそうだしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
それに……これだけ文化が違うと、安宿でも
新鮮な感じは味わえそうだしねぇ。

engChrName: Well, I'd better figure out what to get my friends as souvenirs.
engSearchText:
Well, I'd better figure out what to get my friends
as souvenirs.
jpnChrName: 私も友達へのお土産、今のうちに 当たりつけておかないとねー。
jpnSearchText:
私も友達へのお土産、今のうちに
当たりつけておかないとねー。

engChrName: The real problem is, those treats I thought would be great won't stay fresh long enough!
engSearchText:
The real problem is, those treats I thought would be
great won't stay fresh long enough!
jpnChrName: でも悩みどころなのは……気に入った お菓子に限って日持ちしないって事！
jpnSearchText:
でも悩みどころなのは……気に入った
お菓子に限って日持ちしないって事！

engChrName: And dried goods are a bit of a snooze. This is for my girl friends, so I want to get 'em something sweet!
engSearchText:
And dried goods are a bit of a snooze. This is for my
girl friends, so I want to get 'em something sweet!
jpnChrName: うーん、乾き物じゃあ何だかつまらないし、 やっぱり女友達には甘い物あげたいんだけどなー。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、乾き物じゃあ何だかつまらないし、
やっぱり女友達には甘い物あげたいんだけどなー。

engChrName: My brother's going on and on about how nice his shoulders feel. For Aidios' sake, he's only twenty! Talk about old-man talk, right?
engSearchText:
My brother's going on and on about how nice his
shoulders feel. For Aidios' sake, he's only twenty!
Talk about old-man talk, right?
jpnChrName: お兄ちゃん、凝りが解れるとか言っちゃって ジジ臭いなぁ～まだ２０代前半だってのに。
jpnSearchText:
お兄ちゃん、凝りが解れるとか言っちゃって
ジジ臭いなぁ～まだ２０代前半だってのに。

engChrName: Well, I mean, I do hope the hot springs have all the effects they claim to, myself.
engSearchText:
Well, I mean, I do hope the hot springs have all the
effects they claim to, myself.
jpnChrName: でもまあ、温泉の効能に期待したいのは 私も同じなんだよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
でもまあ、温泉の効能に期待したいのは
私も同じなんだよねぇ。

engChrName: It's supposed to have an exfoliating effect on the skin... Can't help but hope for that, right?
engSearchText:
It's supposed to have an exfoliating effect on
the skin... Can't help but hope for that, right?
jpnChrName: 何でも、美肌効果もあるって聞くしさ…… そんなの逃す手は無いじゃん？
jpnSearchText:
何でも、美肌効果もあるって聞くしさ……
そんなの逃す手は無いじゃん？

engChrName: My brother and I went to Langport before, actually.
engSearchText: My brother and I went to Langport before, actually.
jpnChrName: 以前、お兄ちゃんと一緒にラングポートも 観光したことはあるんだけどさぁ。
jpnSearchText:
以前、お兄ちゃんと一緒にラングポートも
観光したことはあるんだけどさぁ。

engChrName: I wasn't sure what to expect from Longlai. But honestly, the feel here is more than the gossip could make you hope for.
engSearchText:
I wasn't sure what to expect from Longlai.
But honestly, the feel here is more than the gossip
could make you hope for.
jpnChrName: いざ龍來に来てみると……本当に、 聞いていた以上に雰囲気が違うんだね。
jpnSearchText:
いざ龍來に来てみると……本当に、
聞いていた以上に雰囲気が違うんだね。

engChrName: I'd heard there's a lot of different Eastern cultures, but, like...clearly there's even more to it than I thought!
engSearchText:
I'd heard there's a lot of different Eastern cultures,
but, like...clearly there's even more to it than
I thought!
jpnChrName: 東方文化も色々あるって聞くけど…… 思っていた以上に奥が深いものなのかも……
jpnSearchText:
東方文化も色々あるって聞くけど……
思っていた以上に奥が深いものなのかも……

engChrName: The temple's staff and I will help keep an eye out for your child.
engSearchText:
The temple's staff and I will help keep an eye out for
your child.
jpnChrName: お子様については私どもも引き続き 捜索にご協力いたします。
jpnSearchText:
お子様については私どもも引き続き
捜索にご協力いたします。

engChrName: The Tourism Bureau and the police are also searching. We will keep in touch with them.
engSearchText:
The Tourism Bureau and the police are
also searching. We will keep in touch with them.
jpnChrName: 観光協会や警察も動いておりますし、 そちらとも連絡を取り合うつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
観光協会や警察も動いておりますし、
そちらとも連絡を取り合うつもりです。

engChrName: I have faith that the Heavenly Mother will guide us. I encourage you not to lose hope.
engSearchText:
I have faith that the Heavenly Mother will guide us.
I encourage you not to lose hope.
jpnChrName: 天上聖母が必ずや導いてくださるはずです、 どうか悲観なさらず……
jpnSearchText:
天上聖母が必ずや導いてくださるはずです、
どうか悲観なさらず……

engChrName: ...There are no few people who come from the East bearing great burdens of the soul, seeking solace at our temple.
engSearchText:
...There are no few people who come from the East
bearing great burdens of the soul, seeking solace at
our temple.
jpnChrName: ……彼のように、東方からいらした様々な事情を 抱えている方も当寺院にはいらっしゃいます。
jpnSearchText:
……彼のように、東方からいらした様々な事情を
抱えている方も当寺院にはいらっしゃいます。

engChrName: I do my best to be someone they can talk to, and a connection back to the East for them. I hope to be a source of strength.
engSearchText:
I do my best to be someone they can talk to, and a
connection back to the East for them. I hope to be a
source of strength.
jpnChrName: そうした方々の力になるため、相談に乗る他、 東方との繋ぎも出来る範囲でしております。
jpnSearchText:
そうした方々の力になるため、相談に乗る他、
東方との繋ぎも出来る範囲でしております。

engChrName: For him... Even if he wishes to treasure his ties to the Republic, he should find a chance to go back.
engSearchText:
For him... Even if he wishes to treasure his ties to the
Republic, he should find a chance to go back.
jpnChrName: 彼も……共和国の縁を大切にするとしても、 故郷に戻る機会はあるはずです。
jpnSearchText:
彼も……共和国の縁を大切にするとしても、
故郷に戻る機会はあるはずです。

engChrName: For circumstances like this, we will happily help secure passage back east.
engSearchText:
For circumstances like this, we will happily help
secure passage back east.
jpnChrName: そうした際にも当寺院で、 東方への渡航の手助けをするつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
そうした際にも当寺院で、
東方への渡航の手助けをするつもりです。

engChrName: Welcome. Might you be tourists?
engSearchText: Welcome. Might you be tourists?
jpnChrName: ようこそ、観光の方々ですか？
jpnSearchText: ようこそ、観光の方々ですか？

engChrName: I think you will be shocked at how different both our Longlai Temple and all of Longlai are from other places such as Langport.
engSearchText:
I think you will be shocked at how different both our
Longlai Temple and all of Longlai are from other
places such as Langport.
jpnChrName: 龍來寺院に限らず、龍來には煌都とも違った 様式が多く見られ、驚かれるかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
龍來寺院に限らず、龍來には煌都とも違った
様式が多く見られ、驚かれるかもしれませんね。

engChrName: The culture of Langport inherited more from the coast of the East, through its sea routes. Longlai's cultural heritage comes from the land.
engSearchText:
The culture of Langport inherited more from the
coast of the East, through its sea routes.
Longlai's cultural heritage comes from the land.
jpnChrName: 煌都は海路で渡来した方々の文化が主体ですが、 龍來は内陸部と極東部の文化が色濃いのです。
jpnSearchText:
煌都は海路で渡来した方々の文化が主体ですが、
龍來は内陸部と極東部の文化が色濃いのです。

engChrName: It is because of Longlai's history as a gateway for land routes connecting the many cultures of Zemuria.
engSearchText:
It is because of Longlai's history as a gateway for land
routes connecting the many cultures of Zemuria.
jpnChrName: これは……古くより、陸路での玄関口として多様な 文化圏の方々が来訪していた歴史に起因します。
jpnSearchText:
これは……古くより、陸路での玄関口として多様な
文化圏の方々が来訪していた歴史に起因します。

engChrName: Longlai is known well as a 'tourist spot,' but is as much a gateway eastward now as it has ever been.
engSearchText:
Longlai is known well as a 'tourist spot,' but is as
much a gateway eastward now as it has ever been.
jpnChrName: 龍來は観光地としても知られていますが、 依然東方への玄関口の側面もあります。
jpnSearchText:
龍來は観光地としても知られていますが、
依然東方への玄関口の側面もあります。

engChrName: Well...I say that, but that side of Longlai diminishes as the years turn. Yet there are still travelers from the East who pass through.
engSearchText:
Well...I say that, but that side of Longlai diminishes
as the years turn. Yet there are still travelers from the
East who pass through.
jpnChrName: 年々減少しているとはいえ、東方からの 来訪者がいらっしゃる事もございます。
jpnSearchText:
年々減少しているとはいえ、東方からの
来訪者がいらっしゃる事もございます。

engChrName: I believe it is the mission of our temple to help these visitors from afar, and to help the people of this land understand the East.
engSearchText:
I believe it is the mission of our temple to help these
visitors from afar, and to help the people of this land
understand the East.
jpnChrName: そうした方々の力になる事、東方の今を西方の方に お伝えする事も、当寺院の使命と言えるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
そうした方々の力になる事、東方の今を西方の方に
お伝えする事も、当寺院の使命と言えるでしょう。

engChrName: So...I've been working in the Republic, sending money back to my village in the East.
engSearchText:
So...I've been working in the Republic, sending
money back to my village in the East.
jpnChrName: それで……数年共和国で働いて、 東方の村に仕送りを続けていたのですが……
jpnSearchText:
それで……数年共和国で働いて、
東方の村に仕送りを続けていたのですが……

engChrName: The other day, I...I got a letter informing me my parents passed away. I couldn't be there for their funeral, even...
engSearchText:
The other day, I...I got a letter informing me my
parents passed away. I couldn't be there for their
funeral, even...
jpnChrName: 先日……親が疫病で他界したとの手紙が…… 葬式にも間に合えず……
jpnSearchText:
先日……親が疫病で他界したとの手紙が……
葬式にも間に合えず……

engChrName: I don't have anything anymore. No one to send money to, no family waiting for me to come home... What is even left for me?!
engSearchText:
I don't have anything anymore. No one to send
money to, no family waiting for me to come home...
What is even left for me?!
jpnChrName: 仕送りする相手も、帰りを待ってくれる家族も いなくなって……この先、どうすれば……！
jpnSearchText:
仕送りする相手も、帰りを待ってくれる家族も
いなくなって……この先、どうすれば……！

engChrName: Hmm... Please, look at me. I wish to hear more, but first, I must ask you a simple question.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Please, look at me. I wish to hear more, but
first, I must ask you a simple question.
jpnChrName: ふむ……どうか顔を上げて下さい。 詳しいお話もこれからお聞きしますが……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……どうか顔を上げて下さい。
詳しいお話もこれからお聞きしますが……

engChrName: I want you to think hard, and answer me this: is the mira you've earned at work the only thing you've gained here in Calvard?
engSearchText:
I want you to think hard, and answer me this: is the
mira you've earned at work the only thing you've
gained here in Calvard?
jpnChrName: 果たして、あなたが共和国で得たのは本当に ミラだけだったのか、それを考えませんか？
jpnSearchText:
果たして、あなたが共和国で得たのは本当に
ミラだけだったのか、それを考えませんか？

engChrName: If you believe you've connected to people here... I promise you, you have always been guided by the Heavenly Mother.
engSearchText:
If you believe you've connected to people here...
I promise you, you have always been guided by the
Heavenly Mother.
jpnChrName: もしあなたが、新たな縁を得ていたなら…… 必ずや天上聖母の導きもあるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
もしあなたが、新たな縁を得ていたなら……
必ずや天上聖母の導きもあるでしょう。

engChrName: I-I mean, yeah. I have friends here, I...even have someone I was thinking I might marry.
engSearchText:
I-I mean, yeah. I have friends here, I...even have
someone I was thinking I might marry.
jpnChrName: た、確かに共和国では多くの友人も、 結婚も考えている相手もできましたが……
jpnSearchText:
た、確かに共和国では多くの友人も、
結婚も考えている相手もできましたが……

engChrName: But all of that means abandoning my home!
engSearchText: But all of that means abandoning my home!
jpnChrName: それでも、故郷を捨てるなんて……
jpnSearchText: それでも、故郷を捨てるなんて……

engChrName: You have abandoned no home, child. I believe you should trust in the ties that connect you and move forward, instead.
engSearchText:
You have abandoned no home, child. I believe you
should trust in the ties that connect you and move
forward, instead.
jpnChrName: 故郷を忘れろとは言いません、縁を信じ、 前向きに共に生きましょうという事です。
jpnSearchText:
故郷を忘れろとは言いません、縁を信じ、
前向きに共に生きましょうという事です。

engChrName: It is those same ties that brought you here to our temple, I would say. I will be of whatever aid I can to you.
engSearchText:
It is those same ties that brought you here to our
temple, I would say. I will be of whatever aid I can
to you.
jpnChrName: あなたが当寺院にいらしたのも、いわば縁。 私どもも力になるつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
あなたが当寺院にいらしたのも、いわば縁。
私どもも力になるつもりです。

engChrName: Should you return home, I will be glad to help you, and I'll make arrangements with the temple at your destination.
engSearchText:
Should you return home, I will be glad to help you,
and I'll make arrangements with the temple at
your destination.
jpnChrName: 故郷へ戻る事があれば、我々も手伝いますし、 向こうの寺院とも連絡しますよ。
jpnSearchText:
故郷へ戻る事があれば、我々も手伝いますし、
向こうの寺院とも連絡しますよ。

engChrName: What I want you to understand is that you are not alone.
engSearchText:
What I want you to understand is that you are
not alone.
jpnChrName: 私が伝えたかったのは、 あなたは一人ではないという事です。
jpnSearchText:
私が伝えたかったのは、
あなたは一人ではないという事です。

engChrName: Father... You're right, of course. Maybe I'm just being too pessimistic.
engSearchText:
Father... You're right, of course. Maybe I'm just being
too pessimistic.
jpnChrName: 教区長様……そうでしたね、 私も悲観的過ぎました……
jpnSearchText:
教区長様……そうでしたね、
私も悲観的過ぎました……

engChrName: I still have people who will stand with me, and the guidance of the Heavenly Mother, so I shouldn't be like this.
engSearchText:
I still have people who will stand with me, and the
guidance of the Heavenly Mother, so I shouldn't be
like this.
jpnChrName: 私には力になってくれる方も、 天上聖母様のご加護もあるはずだったのに……
jpnSearchText:
私には力になってくれる方も、
天上聖母様のご加護もあるはずだったのに……

engChrName: I will continue to ask our worshippers about your lost child.
engSearchText:
I will continue to ask our worshippers about your
lost child.
jpnChrName: 参拝者の方や、早朝の準備中の方々にも 引き続きお子さんの事はお聞きします。
jpnSearchText:
参拝者の方や、早朝の準備中の方々にも
引き続きお子さんの事はお聞きします。

engChrName: If the worst has happened, we'll be ready to help however we can. We can provide a great deal of medical aid.
engSearchText:
If the worst has happened, we'll be ready to help
however we can. We can provide a great deal of
medical aid.
jpnChrName: 万が一、事故などに遭っていた時に備え、 寺院でも治療の準備は整えておきますが……
jpnSearchText:
万が一、事故などに遭っていた時に備え、
寺院でも治療の準備は整えておきますが……

engChrName: But we pray she is found safely, above all else. O Heavenly Mother... Please, show your wayward child your blessing...
engSearchText:
But we pray she is found safely, above all else.
O Heavenly Mother... Please, show your wayward
child your blessing...
jpnChrName: 無事に見つかる事が一番です、 天上聖母よ……どうか迷い子にご加護を……
jpnSearchText:
無事に見つかる事が一番です、
天上聖母よ……どうか迷い子にご加護を……

engChrName: Good evening. What brings you here at this late hour? If you need help, we will be happy to do what we can.
engSearchText:
Good evening. What brings you here at this
late hour? If you need help, we will be happy to do
what we can.
jpnChrName: こんばんは、遅い時間ですがご入用ですか？ 困った事があればお力になりましょう。
jpnSearchText:
こんばんは、遅い時間ですがご入用ですか？
困った事があればお力になりましょう。

engChrName: Father Murase often spares an ear for the worries of Eastern travelers like that young man.
engSearchText:
Father Murase often spares an ear for the worries of
Eastern travelers like that young man.
jpnChrName: ……ムラセ教区長は、ああして東方から 来た方のご相談を真摯にうけていらっしゃいます。
jpnSearchText:
……ムラセ教区長は、ああして東方から
来た方のご相談を真摯にうけていらっしゃいます。

engChrName: I was born here in Longlai, but I'd like to be even half the rock of stability Father Murase is for others. That's why I joined the temple.
engSearchText:
I was born here in Longlai, but I'd like to be even half
the rock of stability Father Murase is for others.
That's why I joined the temple.
jpnChrName: 私もこの町に生まれたからには少しでもあのように 力になりたいと思い、聖職者を志したのです。
jpnSearchText:
私もこの町に生まれたからには少しでもあのように
力になりたいと思い、聖職者を志したのです。

engChrName: That's not to say I'm not also proud to help provide for tourists, of course. And to help people understand the culture of the East, too.
engSearchText:
That's not to say I'm not also proud to help provide
for tourists, of course. And to help people understand
the culture of the East, too.
jpnChrName: もっとも観光の方々への対応も、東方への理解を 深めていただけますし、誇らしい限りです。
jpnSearchText:
もっとも観光の方々への対応も、東方への理解を
深めていただけますし、誇らしい限りです。

engChrName: Welcome to Longlai Temple.
engSearchText: Welcome to Longlai Temple.
jpnChrName: 龍來寺院にようこそいらっしゃいました。
jpnSearchText: 龍來寺院にようこそいらっしゃいました。

engChrName: We're proud to help acquaint visitors with the culture, styles, and hospitality of the East.
engSearchText:
We're proud to help acquaint visitors with the culture,
styles, and hospitality of the East.
jpnChrName: 当寺院では東方の文化や様式、もてなしも 参拝者の方々にご紹介していまして。
jpnSearchText:
当寺院では東方の文化や様式、もてなしも
参拝者の方々にご紹介していまして。

engChrName: As it happens, we are preparing to hold an Eastern tea ceremony, if you wish to be present for it.
engSearchText:
As it happens, we are preparing to hold an Eastern
tea ceremony, if you wish to be present for it.
jpnChrName: 今は、東方の茶の湯をご体験いただく 準備が整っております、いかがですか？
jpnSearchText:
今は、東方の茶の湯をご体験いただく
準備が整っております、いかがですか？

engChrName: I don't know yet if I'll be staying here in the Republic or going back to try my best back east, even with my parents gone.
engSearchText:
I don't know yet if I'll be staying here in the Republic
or going back to try my best back east, even with my
parents gone.
jpnChrName: ……今後も共和国で生きていくか、親はいないけど 故郷で頑張るか決めかねるけど……
jpnSearchText:
……今後も共和国で生きていくか、親はいないけど
故郷で頑張るか決めかねるけど……

engChrName: But either way, I have folks who I've forged friendships with here in the Republic.
engSearchText:
But either way, I have folks who I've forged
friendships with here in the Republic.
jpnChrName: 僕には、共和国で作った縁も 助けてくれる人もいる。
jpnSearchText:
僕には、共和国で作った縁も
助けてくれる人もいる。

engChrName: Realizing that makes it a little easier to keep going, rather than just feeling like it's all hopeless.
engSearchText:
Realizing that makes it a little easier to keep going,
rather than just feeling like it's all hopeless.
jpnChrName: それがわかって、先の事で悲観するより、 今を精一杯生きようと思えてきたよ。
jpnSearchText:
それがわかって、先の事で悲観するより、
今を精一杯生きようと思えてきたよ。

engChrName: If I want to move on at all, though... I think I do need to go back home so I can at least say proper goodbyes to my parents.
engSearchText:
If I want to move on at all, though... I think I do need
to go back home so I can at least say proper goodbyes
to my parents.
jpnChrName: まずはそのためにも……一旦故郷に帰って、 親にしっかり別れを告げてくるよ。
jpnSearchText:
まずはそのためにも……一旦故郷に帰って、
親にしっかり別れを告げてくるよ。

engChrName: I guess I thought, until now anyway, that I was living in this foreign land so I could help my family.
engSearchText:
I guess I thought, until now anyway, that I was living
in this foreign land so I could help my family.
jpnChrName: そうか……僕はこれまで、家族を助けるつもりで、 異郷の地で頑張ってきたつもりだけど……
jpnSearchText:
そうか……僕はこれまで、家族を助けるつもりで、
異郷の地で頑張ってきたつもりだけど……

engChrName: But...it's fair for me to ask for help, too, isn't it?
engSearchText: But...it's fair for me to ask for help, too, isn't it?
jpnChrName: 僕も……助けを求めても良いんだね。
jpnSearchText: 僕も……助けを求めても良いんだね。

engChrName: Hah. Somehow I almost lost sight of all the people I've made friends with here, and even of the blessings of our Heavenly Mother.
engSearchText:
Hah. Somehow I almost lost sight of all the people
I've made friends with here, and even of the blessings
of our Heavenly Mother.
jpnChrName: はは……共和国でできた人の繋がりも、 天上聖母様の加護も忘れていたみたいだ……
jpnSearchText:
はは……共和国でできた人の繋がりも、
天上聖母様の加護も忘れていたみたいだ……

engChrName: I guess I was just too desperate.
engSearchText: I guess I was just too desperate.
jpnChrName: きっと、必死になり過ぎていたのかな……
jpnSearchText: きっと、必死になり過ぎていたのかな……

engChrName: All the years I've spent earning and sending back home added up to nothing, huh...?
engSearchText:
All the years I've spent earning and sending back
home added up to nothing, huh...?
jpnChrName: ……何年も出稼ぎをして、東方の故郷に 仕送りをしてきたのに、報われないな……
jpnSearchText:
……何年も出稼ぎをして、東方の故郷に
仕送りをしてきたのに、報われないな……

engChrName: The other day I got a letter saying my parents back in my hometown passed away. I don't have anyone to send money to anymore.
engSearchText:
The other day I got a letter saying my parents back in
my hometown passed away. I don't have anyone to
send money to anymore.
jpnChrName: 先日、故郷の親が疫病で亡くなったって 手紙が……もう、仕送りの相手も……
jpnSearchText:
先日、故郷の親が疫病で亡くなったって
手紙が……もう、仕送りの相手も……

engChrName: So...what do I do now? Why work here in the Republic if there's no one left to benefit?
engSearchText:
So...what do I do now? Why work here in the
Republic if there's no one left to benefit?
jpnChrName: 僕は……どうするべきなのだろう。 共和国で働いても、仕送り先も……
jpnSearchText:
僕は……どうするべきなのだろう。
共和国で働いても、仕送り先も……

engChrName: My hometown's had bad harvests for, I guess, almost a decade. There's nothing to eat other than food they buy from outside.
engSearchText:
My hometown's had bad harvests for, I guess, almost
a decade. There's nothing to eat other than food they
buy from outside.
jpnChrName: 故郷の村は……もう十年以上も不作が続いて…… 他から買わないと……満足に食べられなくて。
jpnSearchText:
故郷の村は……もう十年以上も不作が続いて……
他から買わないと……満足に食べられなくて。

engChrName: That's why I was sending mira. I was sending it so they could live, and now...
engSearchText:
That's why I was sending mira. I was sending it so
they could live, and now...
jpnChrName: だから、そのためのミラを……暮らすための ミラを仕送りしていたのに……
jpnSearchText:
だから、そのためのミラを……暮らすための
ミラを仕送りしていたのに……

engChrName: You might not be able to tell, but Kazan's got a real instinct for this sort of thing.
engSearchText:
You might not be able to tell, but Kazan's got a
real instinct for this sort of thing.
jpnChrName: カザンもあんな調子に見えて、 一応は確かな“勘”を持つ遊撃士。
jpnSearchText:
カザンもあんな調子に見えて、
一応は確かな“勘”を持つ遊撃士。

engChrName: I'm confident we can cross out the waterfall. Which mostly just leaves searching the highway...
engSearchText:
I'm confident we can cross out the waterfall.
Which mostly just leaves searching the highway...
jpnChrName: 瀑布方面の線は潰れたと言えるでしょう。 ならば次は街道を探らせるとして──
jpnSearchText:
瀑布方面の線は潰れたと言えるでしょう。
ならば次は街道を探らせるとして──

engChrName: Arkride, I'm sure you understand the situation here in Longlai.
engSearchText:
Arkride, I'm sure you understand the situation here
in Longlai.
jpnChrName: ……アークライドも龍來の状況には 気づいているでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
……アークライドも龍來の状況には
気づいているでしょう。

engChrName: So you leave this to us and go search.
engSearchText: So you leave this to us and go search.
jpnChrName: なら、こちらは任せてさっさと 自分達なりに探す事です。
jpnSearchText:
なら、こちらは任せてさっさと
自分達なりに探す事です。

engChrName: Well, the newbie was found safe and sound, and on top of that we now understand there's a bit of a background there, so all's well that ends well.
engSearchText:
Well, the newbie was found safe and sound, and on
top of that we now understand there's a bit of a
background there, so all's well that ends well.
jpnChrName: 新米が無事に見つかって、訳アリって事が ハッキリしただけでも僥倖というものです。
jpnSearchText:
新米が無事に見つかって、訳アリって事が
ハッキリしただけでも僥倖というものです。

engChrName: Now it comes down to how well we can help a junior bracer like him develop.
engSearchText:
Now it comes down to how well we can help a junior
bracer like him develop.
jpnChrName: そんな準遊撃士をどう育てるかも 私たちの手腕にかかっています。
jpnSearchText:
そんな準遊撃士をどう育てるかも
私たちの手腕にかかっています。

engChrName: We'll just have to watch over him as he works things out.
engSearchText:
We'll just have to watch over him as he works
things out.
jpnChrName: ま、せいぜい見守ってあげましょうか。
jpnSearchText: ま、せいぜい見守ってあげましょうか。

engChrName: Oh! Hello, Arkride. I'm sorry I didn't notice you.
engSearchText: Oh! Hello, Arkride. I'm sorry I didn't notice you.
jpnChrName: おや、アークライドですか。 気付かなくて悪いですね。
jpnSearchText:
おや、アークライドですか。
気付かなくて悪いですね。

engChrName: As it happens, I had something on my mind... Anyway, it's a guild problem.
engSearchText:
As it happens, I had something on my mind...
Anyway, it's a guild problem.
jpnChrName: 実は少しばかり心配事が起きて…… まあ、これはギルドの問題でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
実は少しばかり心配事が起きて……
まあ、これはギルドの問題でしょう。

engChrName: I'm sure Kazan will resolve things, so there's nothing you need to worry about.
engSearchText:
I'm sure Kazan will resolve things, so there's nothing
you need to worry about.
jpnChrName: さっさとカザンに解決させます、 そっちは気にしなくて結構です。
jpnSearchText:
さっさとカザンに解決させます、
そっちは気にしなくて結構です。

engChrName: Oh, yeah?
engSearchText: Oh, yeah?
jpnChrName: そうか？
jpnSearchText: そうか？

engChrName: (So she says, but now I'm kinda wonderin' what she meant...)
engSearchText:
(So she says, but now I'm kinda wonderin' what
she meant...)
jpnChrName: （とはいえ、   少し気になる話をしてたみてえだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（とはいえ、
少し気になる話をしてたみてえだが……）

engChrName: Goodness, I thought I saw a familiar face. Good to see you, Arkride.
engSearchText:
Goodness, I thought I saw a familiar face. Good to
see you, Arkride.
jpnChrName: あら、どこかで見た顔だと思ったら。 アークライドじゃありませんか。
jpnSearchText:
あら、どこかで見た顔だと思ったら。
アークライドじゃありませんか。

engChrName: I don't suppose you've come back to retake your martial lessons, unofficial student of the Kunlun school?
engSearchText:
I don't suppose you've come back to retake your
martial lessons, unofficial student of the
Kunlun school?
jpnChrName: 崑崙流の裏弟子が、武者修行の やり直しにでも来たのかしらねぇ？
jpnSearchText:
崑崙流の裏弟子が、武者修行の
やり直しにでも来たのかしらねぇ？

engChrName: Come on! I'm here as a tourist. Gimme an itty bitty break.
engSearchText:
Come on! I'm here as a tourist. Gimme an itty
bitty break.
jpnChrName: 今回は観光なんで、 勘弁してくださいよホントに……
jpnSearchText:
今回は観光なんで、
勘弁してくださいよホントに……

engChrName: (This old lady used to be right up there with Master in pilin' up stuff for me to do.)
engSearchText:
(This old lady used to be right up there with Master
in pilin' up stuff for me to do.)
jpnChrName: （この婆さん、あの頃も“師父”と二人で   なんでもかんでも押し付けやがって……）
jpnSearchText:
（この婆さん、あの頃も“師父”と二人で
なんでもかんでも押し付けやがって……）

engChrName: (The memories of this place are ones I'd rather forget...)
engSearchText:
(The memories of this place are ones I'd
rather forget...)
jpnChrName: （ギルドにはいい思い出がねえっつうか……   ……もはや思い出したくもねえが。）
jpnSearchText:
（ギルドにはいい思い出がねえっつうか……
……もはや思い出したくもねえが。）

engChrName: Ah, pardon? I think we're missing a little context, but you're acquainted with Van, yes?
engSearchText:
Ah, pardon? I think we're missing a little context, but
you're acquainted with Van, yes?
jpnChrName: えっと、よく分かりませんけど ヴァンさんのお知り合いだったんですね。
jpnSearchText:
えっと、よく分かりませんけど
ヴァンさんのお知り合いだったんですね。

engChrName: Aha! Somebody Van knows! And wants to avoid, I bet.
engSearchText:
Aha! Somebody Van knows! And wants to avoid,
I bet.
jpnChrName: なるほど、お知り合いだったんですね。 えっとじゃあ……
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、お知り合いだったんですね。
えっとじゃあ……

engChrName: You know the local guild lady? I wonder...
engSearchText: You know the local guild lady? I wonder...
jpnChrName: ハン、ギルドの受付とも顔見知りかよ？ つーことは……
jpnSearchText:
ハン、ギルドの受付とも顔見知りかよ？
つーことは……

engChrName: You are Mr. Arkride's acquaintance, then?
engSearchText: You are Mr. Arkride's acquaintance, then?
jpnChrName: ヴァン様とはお知り合いでしたか。 という事は……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン様とはお知り合いでしたか。
という事は……

engChrName: Hmm? I sense some history here. You two know one another, then.
engSearchText:
Hmm? I sense some history here. You two know one
another, then.
jpnChrName: ふ～ん、よく分からないけど ギルドの受付とも知り合いだったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ふ～ん、よく分からないけど
ギルドの受付とも知り合いだったんだ。

engChrName: It's enough to say she's been the receptionist since way back when.
engSearchText:
It's enough to say she's been the receptionist since
way back when.
jpnChrName: まあ当時からここの受付だったからな。
jpnSearchText: まあ当時からここの受付だったからな。

engChrName: Don't be fooled by her bein' all placid looking. She's got strings to pull you can't even imagine. Stay frosty around her.
engSearchText:
Don't be fooled by her bein' all placid looking.
She's got strings to pull you can't even imagine.
Stay frosty around her.
jpnChrName: 澄ました顔して、各方面に 異常に手回しのいい婆さんだ、油断すんなよ？
jpnSearchText:
澄ました顔して、各方面に
異常に手回しのいい婆さんだ、油断すんなよ？

engChrName: You're making me sound like a criminal boss. Besides, it's not been like that lately.
engSearchText:
You're making me sound like a criminal boss.
Besides, it's not been like that lately.
jpnChrName: 人聞きが悪いですねぇ。 近頃はそれ程じゃありませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
人聞きが悪いですねぇ。
近頃はそれ程じゃありませんよ。

engChrName: It's been a long time since we had any truly outstanding talents. Nowadays we're hard pressed to deal with problems here and out east.
engSearchText:
It's been a long time since we had any truly
outstanding talents. Nowadays we're hard pressed to
deal with problems here and out east.
jpnChrName: ここに優秀な人材が所属していたのも今は昔── 今は東方地域への対応も喫緊の課題ですし。
jpnSearchText:
ここに優秀な人材が所属していたのも今は昔──
今は東方地域への対応も喫緊の課題ですし。

engChrName: There's plenty to reflect on in the Republic itself, but I can't spare the time or people for that.
engSearchText:
There's plenty to reflect on in the Republic itself, but
I can't spare the time or people for that.
jpnChrName: 共和国内も気がかりは多々あれど、 残念ながら手が回っていませんからね。
jpnSearchText:
共和国内も気がかりは多々あれど、
残念ながら手が回っていませんからね。

engChrName: Of course, if you feel like helping out, Arkride, you and your assistants would be more than welcome.
engSearchText:
Of course, if you feel like helping out, Arkride, you
and your assistants would be more than welcome.
jpnChrName: 貴方が手伝いたいというなら 助手たち共々歓迎しますよ、アークライド。
jpnSearchText:
貴方が手伝いたいというなら
助手たち共々歓迎しますよ、アークライド。

engChrName: Uhh, think I'll pass workin' on vacation time.
engSearchText: Uhh, think I'll pass workin' on vacation time.
jpnChrName: 休暇ぐらいゆっくりさせて欲しいんですが……
jpnSearchText: 休暇ぐらいゆっくりさせて欲しいんですが……

engChrName: (In fact, it feels like she's already got a grip on my sitch here. A handful as always.)
engSearchText:
(In fact, it feels like she's already got a grip on my
sitch here. A handful as always.)
jpnChrName: （つーかこっちの事情も薄々掴んでそうだが   ……まったく食えない婆さんだぜ。）
jpnSearchText:
（つーかこっちの事情も薄々掴んでそうだが
……まったく食えない婆さんだぜ。）

engChrName: There's plenty to reflect on in the Republic itself, but I can't spare the time or people for that.
engSearchText:
There's plenty to reflect on in the Republic itself, but
I can't spare the time or people for that.
jpnChrName: 共和国内も気がかりは多々あれど、 残念ながら手が回っていませんからね。
jpnSearchText:
共和国内も気がかりは多々あれど、
残念ながら手が回っていませんからね。

engChrName: Even near Longlai, things have gotten hard. Granted, I don't worry about things that won't affect the citizens.
engSearchText:
Even near Longlai, things have gotten hard.
Granted, I don't worry about things that won't affect
the citizens.
jpnChrName: この龍來の近隣でさえ……まあ民間人に 影響がない件は、捨ておきますけれど。
jpnSearchText:
この龍來の近隣でさえ……まあ民間人に
影響がない件は、捨ておきますけれど。

engChrName: I'll get in touch with Hazel and Zin again, I suppose.
engSearchText: I'll get in touch with Hazel and Zin again, I suppose.
jpnChrName: ヘイゼルさんやジンにも 改めて連絡しておくとして──
jpnSearchText:
ヘイゼルさんやジンにも
改めて連絡しておくとして──

engChrName: Also, I really need to do performance reviews. Kazan's been, well, Kazan, and then there's Gray...
engSearchText:
Also, I really need to do performance reviews.
Kazan's been, well, Kazan, and then there's Gray...
jpnChrName: あとは人事評価もせねばなりませんね。 ……カザンはあの調子ですし、グレイは──
jpnSearchText:
あとは人事評価もせねばなりませんね。
……カザンはあの調子ですし、グレイは──

engChrName: (Hmm... Even at a glance, it's impressive how well she handles things.)
engSearchText:
(Hmm... Even at a glance, it's impressive how well
she handles things.)
jpnChrName: （うーん、少し拝見するだけでも   見事な手際というか……）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、少し拝見するだけでも
見事な手際というか……）

engChrName: (This lady is amazing!)
engSearchText: (This lady is amazing!)
jpnChrName: （このお婆さん……   なんだかすごい手際ですっ！）
jpnSearchText:
（このお婆さん……
なんだかすごい手際ですっ！）

engChrName: (Damn. She goes hard... Actually, she's better at her job than even the Langport crew, I think.)
engSearchText:
(Damn. She goes hard... Actually, she's better at her
job than even the Langport crew, I think.)
jpnChrName: （大した仕事ぶりっつーか……   煌都支部より優秀なんじゃねえか？）
jpnSearchText:
（大した仕事ぶりっつーか……
煌都支部より優秀なんじゃねえか？）

engChrName: (Goodness. She's so dedicated. I cannot help but be impressed.)
engSearchText:
(Goodness. She's so dedicated. I cannot help but
be impressed.)
jpnChrName: （これは……素晴らしい仕事ぶりですね。   思わず感服致しました。）
jpnSearchText:
（これは……素晴らしい仕事ぶりですね。
思わず感服致しました。）

engChrName: (She's incredibly capable. I suppose the guild would have its own old hands.)
engSearchText:
(She's incredibly capable. I suppose the guild would
have its own old hands.)
jpnChrName: （なんだか無茶苦茶仕事ができそうだね。   ギルドの古株……こんな人もいるんだね。）
jpnSearchText:
（なんだか無茶苦茶仕事ができそうだね。
ギルドの古株……こんな人もいるんだね。）

engChrName: (There's not really any big cases out here in Longlai, though.)
engSearchText:
(There's not really any big cases out here in
Longlai, though.)
jpnChrName: （実際、龍來じゃ大きな事件は   ほぼ起きてねえな。）
jpnSearchText:
（実際、龍來じゃ大きな事件は
ほぼ起きてねえな。）

engChrName: (With that said, it is the Doorway to the East. I'm sure it's rough work dealing with things here. She's good.)
engSearchText:
(With that said, it is the Doorway to the East.
I'm sure it's rough work dealing with things here.
She's good.)
jpnChrName: （東方への玄関口だ、対処も   楽じゃねえはずだが──大したもんだぜ。）
jpnSearchText:
（東方への玄関口だ、対処も
楽じゃねえはずだが──大したもんだぜ。）

engChrName: There were no signs of a kid near the waterfall.
engSearchText: There were no signs of a kid near the waterfall.
jpnChrName: 瀑布には子供の気配は無かった。
jpnSearchText: 瀑布には子供の気配は無かった。

engChrName: Considering our trip out to the mountains last night, I hope you trust my instincts on this, yeah?
engSearchText:
Considering our trip out to the mountains last night,
I hope you trust my instincts on this, yeah?
jpnChrName: ま、昨日は一緒に山狩りした仲だ、 俺のカンは信用してくれるよな？
jpnSearchText:
ま、昨日は一緒に山狩りした仲だ、
俺のカンは信用してくれるよな？

engChrName: Either way, I'm going out to check the eastern highway. Don't think she'll be out there, either, but...
engSearchText:
Either way, I'm going out to check the
eastern highway. Don't think she'll be out there,
either, but...
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、東の街道も一応見てくるぜ、 今のところは何も感じねぇが……
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、東の街道も一応見てくるぜ、
今のところは何も感じねぇが……

engChrName: I'll try to find a chance to go out to the area the rookie's covering, too, and help out.
engSearchText:
I'll try to find a chance to go out to the area the
rookie's covering, too, and help out.
jpnChrName: 折を見てあのルーキーが探ってるところにも、 少しは助け舟を出してやるかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
折を見てあのルーキーが探ってるところにも、
少しは助け舟を出してやるかねぇ。

engChrName: All right, then. The kid wasn't by the waterfall, but there's no chance she'd go out to the eastern highway. Right?
engSearchText:
All right, then. The kid wasn't by the waterfall, but
there's no chance she'd go out to the eastern highway.
Right?
jpnChrName: さて、例の子供は瀑布の方にはいなかったが、 流石に東方方面の街道には……行ってねぇよな？
jpnSearchText:
さて、例の子供は瀑布の方にはいなかったが、
流石に東方方面の街道には……行ってねぇよな？

engChrName: Searching on foot from here to the border'll turn our legs to stumps.
engSearchText:
Searching on foot from here to the border'll turn our
legs to stumps.
jpnChrName: 国境門まで虱潰しに探して歩くのは 相当骨が折れそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
国境門まで虱潰しに探して歩くのは
相当骨が折れそうだが……

engChrName: Well, with my trained hunter's senses, it'll be easy enough to tell whether a child passed through.
engSearchText:
Well, with my trained hunter's senses, it'll be easy
enough to tell whether a child passed through.
jpnChrName: ま、俺の狩人の嗅覚にかかりゃ、子供が通ったか 否かくらいはすぐにわかるってモンさ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、俺の狩人の嗅覚にかかりゃ、子供が通ったか
否かくらいはすぐにわかるってモンさ。

engChrName: Don't you worry too much, okay? You've got me and Drusilla, so it'll work out.
engSearchText:
Don't you worry too much, okay? You've got me and
Drusilla, so it'll work out.
jpnChrName: あんたらも心配し過ぎんな。 この俺とドルシラさんがいるんだ、何とかなるさ。
jpnSearchText:
あんたらも心配し過ぎんな。
この俺とドルシラさんがいるんだ、何とかなるさ。

engChrName: Being a bracer is all about teamwork. It's against our principles to go out alone without saying anything.
engSearchText:
Being a bracer is all about teamwork. It's against our
principles to go out alone without saying anything.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士はチームワークだからな。 事情も話さず独断行動はご法度だ。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士はチームワークだからな。
事情も話さず独断行動はご法度だ。

engChrName: So I felt I had to be pretty strict, but I mean, I get it—everyone's got their own things to deal with.
engSearchText:
So I felt I had to be pretty strict, but I mean, I get
it—everyone's got their own things to deal with.
jpnChrName: だからきつい言い方をさせてもらったが…… まあ、誰にでも腹に抱えてるモンはあるよな。
jpnSearchText:
だからきつい言い方をさせてもらったが……
まあ、誰にでも腹に抱えてるモンはあるよな。

engChrName: Anyway, time to go hit the baths and relax.
engSearchText: Anyway, time to go hit the baths and relax.
jpnChrName: とりあえず早く風呂に入って 休んでもらうとするかね。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず早く風呂に入って
休んでもらうとするかね。

engChrName: Ugh. What a mess. Wasn't expecting him to just disappear on me...
engSearchText:
Ugh. What a mess. Wasn't expecting him to just
disappear on me...
jpnChrName: 参っちまったなぁ…… まさかフラッといなくなっちまうとは……
jpnSearchText:
参っちまったなぁ……
まさかフラッといなくなっちまうとは……

engChrName: Wonder if he went out to the waterfall?
engSearchText: Wonder if he went out to the waterfall?
jpnChrName: もしかして瀑布の方に 行っちまったのか……？
jpnSearchText:
もしかして瀑布の方に
行っちまったのか……？

engChrName: Oh, yeah! Job complete! Easy work for someone like me, of course.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah! Job complete! Easy work for someone like
me, of course.
jpnChrName: うっし、一件依頼完了っと！ このカザン様にかかれば楽勝ってな！
jpnSearchText:
うっし、一件依頼完了っと！
このカザン様にかかれば楽勝ってな！

engChrName: After all, with my Matagi training, I'm perfectly accurate. I bet I just radiate that Real Man Aura.
engSearchText:
After all, with my Matagi training, I'm
perfectly accurate. I bet I just radiate that Real
Man Aura.
jpnChrName: なんせ東方の“マタギ”仕込みの銃は百発百中。 でもってデキル男のオーラってもんが──
jpnSearchText:
なんせ東方の“マタギ”仕込みの銃は百発百中。
でもってデキル男のオーラってもんが──

engChrName: Wait! Now's not the time. I don't need Drusilla getting on my case again.
engSearchText:
Wait! Now's not the time. I don't need Drusilla
getting on my case again.
jpnChrName: ……とと、あんま道草食ってっと またドルシラさんに叱られちまうな。
jpnSearchText:
……とと、あんま道草食ってっと
またドルシラさんに叱られちまうな。

engChrName: The newbie's still not up to snuff.
engSearchText: The newbie's still not up to snuff.
jpnChrName: あの新人クンもまだまだ頼りねえし……
jpnSearchText: あの新人クンもまだまだ頼りねえし……

engChrName: Gotta get back and work him hard some more. All part of a day's work as his guild superior!
engSearchText:
Gotta get back and work him hard some more.
All part of a day's work as his guild superior!
jpnChrName: とっとと帰ってシゴいてやるか。 これも先輩の務めってな♪
jpnSearchText:
とっとと帰ってシゴいてやるか。
これも先輩の務めってな♪

engChrName: Hey, you a tourist? You seem pretty capable.
engSearchText: Hey, you a tourist? You seem pretty capable.
jpnChrName: あんたらも観光かい？ ふむ、中々腕も立ちそうだが──
jpnSearchText:
あんたらも観光かい？
ふむ、中々腕も立ちそうだが──

engChrName: Either way, stay off the highway, yeah? There's a nasty critter out there we haven't been able to exterminate yet.
engSearchText:
Either way, stay off the highway, yeah? There's a
nasty critter out there we haven't been able to
exterminate yet.
jpnChrName: ともかく勝手に街道に出たりすんなよ？ まだ退治してないヤツもいたりすっからよ。
jpnSearchText:
ともかく勝手に街道に出たりすんなよ？
まだ退治してないヤツもいたりすっからよ。

engChrName: Oh, man, next I'm gonna have to go deal with the waterfall... What a pain.
engSearchText:
Oh, man, next I'm gonna have to go deal with
the waterfall... What a pain.
jpnChrName: あー、瀑布方面の対応、 今度やんなくちゃなぁ～……メンド。
jpnSearchText:
あー、瀑布方面の対応、
今度やんなくちゃなぁ～……メンド。

engChrName: I saw no signs of Yumé out on the west highway... We've got to find her soon!
engSearchText:
I saw no signs of Yumé out on the west highway...
We've got to find her soon!
jpnChrName: 西の街道にはユメちゃんの姿はありませんでした…… 何とかして見つけてあげないと……！
jpnSearchText:
西の街道にはユメちゃんの姿はありませんでした……
何とかして見つけてあげないと……！

engChrName: I'm so sorry for all the trouble I caused you by going out on my own last night.
engSearchText:
I'm so sorry for all the trouble I caused you by going
out on my own last night.
jpnChrName: 昨晩は僕の勝手な行動でご迷惑をおかけしました。 その分のお詫びも兼ねて──
jpnSearchText:
昨晩は僕の勝手な行動でご迷惑をおかけしました。
その分のお詫びも兼ねて──

engChrName: I hope, by way of apology, you'll accept me doing my absolute best in the search for Yumé—so I can improve as a bracer!
engSearchText:
I hope, by way of apology, you'll accept me doing my
absolute best in the search for Yumé—so I can
improve as a bracer!
jpnChrName: 引き続き捜索に全力を尽くします、 少しでも遊撃士として成長するためにも！
jpnSearchText:
引き続き捜索に全力を尽くします、
少しでも遊撃士として成長するためにも！

engChrName: I saw no signs of Yumé out on the west highway... I hope we can find some sign of her soon.
engSearchText:
I saw no signs of Yumé out on the west highway...
I hope we can find some sign of her soon.
jpnChrName: 西の街道にはユメちゃんの姿はありませんでした…… 何とかして見つけてあげたいのですが。
jpnSearchText:
西の街道にはユメちゃんの姿はありませんでした……
何とかして見つけてあげたいのですが。

engChrName: I've come out here for training, but if I can't do anything at a time like this, what good is all my work on myself?
engSearchText:
I've come out here for training, but if I can't do
anything at a time like this, what good is all my work
on myself?
jpnChrName: 修行で来ている身ですが、こういう時に 役に立てなきゃ何のための修行だって話ですしね。
jpnSearchText:
修行で来ている身ですが、こういう時に
役に立てなきゃ何のための修行だって話ですしね。

engChrName: I will do my absolute best in the search for Yumé, so I can improve as a bracer!
engSearchText:
I will do my absolute best in the search for Yumé, so I
can improve as a bracer!
jpnChrName: 引き続き捜索に全力を尽くします、 少しでも遊撃士として成長するためにも！
jpnSearchText:
引き続き捜索に全力を尽くします、
少しでも遊撃士として成長するためにも！

engChrName: I've got to become stronger as soon as possible...
engSearchText: I've got to become stronger as soon as possible...
jpnChrName: 僕は早く強くならないといけないんです……
jpnSearchText: 僕は早く強くならないといけないんです……

engChrName: But that's no excuse to make trouble for the people around me.
engSearchText:
But that's no excuse to make trouble for the people
around me.
jpnChrName: でも、だからといって皆さんに心配を かけてもいいとは思っていません……
jpnSearchText:
でも、だからといって皆さんに心配を
かけてもいいとは思っていません……

engChrName: I'm so very sorry for everything. I'll ensure that nothing like this happens again.
engSearchText:
I'm so very sorry for everything. I'll ensure that
nothing like this happens again.
jpnChrName: 本当にすみませんでした。 今後このような事がないように気を付けますね。
jpnSearchText:
本当にすみませんでした。
今後このような事がないように気を付けますね。

engChrName: I didn't know what to think about Eastern culture at first, but it's so complex!
engSearchText:
I didn't know what to think about Eastern culture at
first, but it's so complex!
jpnChrName: 東方文化──最初は戸惑いましたけど 本当に奥深いですよね！
jpnSearchText:
東方文化──最初は戸惑いましたけど
本当に奥深いですよね！

engChrName: It's like there's this effort to achieve harmony with nature, you know? And the town's quiet atmosphere feels like an Eastern aesthetic all by itself.
engSearchText:
It's like there's this effort to achieve harmony with
nature, you know? And the town's quiet atmosphere
feels like an Eastern aesthetic all by itself.
jpnChrName: 自然との調和の追求…… 静かな佇まいに美学を感じるというか。
jpnSearchText:
自然との調和の追求……
静かな佇まいに美学を感じるというか。

engChrName: Hmm... The seniors at the guild said something similar, but there really is a lot to learn from encountering foreign cultures.
engSearchText:
Hmm... The seniors at the guild said something
similar, but there really is a lot to learn from
encountering foreign cultures.
jpnChrName: う～ん、先輩たちから聞いていましたが 異文化に触れるのは本当に勉強になります。
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、先輩たちから聞いていましたが
異文化に触れるのは本当に勉強になります。

engChrName: I'll do the best that I can—for the sake of everyone who put so much effort in to help me!
engSearchText:
I'll do the best that I can—for the sake of everyone
who put so much effort in to help me!
jpnChrName: ──僕も精一杯頑張ります。 指導して下さった先輩たちに報いるためにも！
jpnSearchText:
──僕も精一杯頑張ります。
指導して下さった先輩たちに報いるためにも！

engChrName: Come to think of it, I heard this place has attracted warriors for a long time.
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, I heard this place has attracted
warriors for a long time.
jpnChrName: そういえば、この辺りは 古くから武芸者も集まるそうですけど……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、この辺りは
古くから武芸者も集まるそうですけど……

engChrName: The harsh lands, the crisp air... I can see how it would, I guess.
engSearchText:
The harsh lands, the crisp air... I can see how it
would, I guess.
jpnChrName: ……峻厳な地で、気の流れもいいとか…… 確かにそんな感覚がありますよね……
jpnSearchText:
……峻厳な地で、気の流れもいいとか……
確かにそんな感覚がありますよね……

engChrName: Anyway! Gotta put my best foot forward and try to find a way to grow myself here!
engSearchText:
Anyway! Gotta put my best foot forward and try to
find a way to grow myself here!
jpnChrName: ……ともかく頑張らないと！ この地で成長するためにも！
jpnSearchText:
……ともかく頑張らないと！
この地で成長するためにも！

engChrName: I'll be in charge of coordinating our search with the police and the border guard.
engSearchText:
I'll be in charge of coordinating our search with the
police and the border guard.
jpnChrName: 警察や国境門方面との捜索の音頭取りは 私の方でしておこう。
jpnSearchText:
警察や国境門方面との捜索の音頭取りは
私の方でしておこう。

engChrName: Don't worry. I may be retired, but as you might guess, I've kept my contacts.
engSearchText:
Don't worry. I may be retired, but as you might guess,
I've kept my contacts.
jpnChrName: なに、引退した身とは言えそれなりに 顔が利くのはまあ、お察しの通りだからね。
jpnSearchText:
なに、引退した身とは言えそれなりに
顔が利くのはまあ、お察しの通りだからね。

engChrName: Still, though. Longlai isn't like other towns when it comes to getting lost. Be careful.
engSearchText:
Still, though. Longlai isn't like other towns when it
comes to getting lost. Be careful.
jpnChrName: ……ただまあ、龍來の状況が特殊なのも事実だし、 君達もどうか気をつけておいてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
……ただまあ、龍來の状況が特殊なのも事実だし、
君達もどうか気をつけておいてくれ。

engChrName: I'll also join the search once I've gotten in touch with everyone I can.
engSearchText:
I'll also join the search once I've gotten in touch with
everyone I can.
jpnChrName: 僕も各方面との連絡が済み次第 その子の捜索に加わるつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
僕も各方面との連絡が済み次第
その子の捜索に加わるつもりだ。

engChrName: Mr. Rocksmith seems concerned about the situation around Longlai.
engSearchText:
Mr. Rocksmith seems concerned about the situation
around Longlai.
jpnChrName: 閣下は何やら龍來近郊の状況を 憂慮されているようだが……
jpnSearchText:
閣下は何やら龍來近郊の状況を
憂慮されているようだが……

engChrName: Don't you dare let Mr. Rocksmith's goodwill go to waste, spriggan.
engSearchText:
Don't you dare let Mr. Rocksmith's goodwill go to
waste, spriggan.
jpnChrName: ともかく、閣下のご厚意を無駄にしない事だ。 それだけは肝に銘じておけよ、裏解決屋。
jpnSearchText:
ともかく、閣下のご厚意を無駄にしない事だ。
それだけは肝に銘じておけよ、裏解決屋。

engChrName: If she's somewhere in town, she must be hiding somewhere people wouldn't try to look, right?
engSearchText:
If she's somewhere in town, she must be hiding
somewhere people wouldn't try to look, right?
jpnChrName: 街中にいるとしたら、人目の付かない所に 隠れているんでしょうか……
jpnSearchText:
街中にいるとしたら、人目の付かない所に
隠れているんでしょうか……

engChrName: But why, though? She's...definitely not the kind of girl who would hide on a whim for a prank. I'm really worried.
engSearchText:
But why, though? She's...definitely not the kind of
girl who would hide on a whim for a prank. I'm
really worried.
jpnChrName: でも一体どうして……理由もなく姿を 消すような子じゃありませんし、心配ですね……
jpnSearchText:
でも一体どうして……理由もなく姿を
消すような子じゃありませんし、心配ですね……

engChrName: Come to think of it, the inn was providing free tea.
engSearchText: Come to think of it, the inn was providing free tea.
jpnChrName: そういえば旅館のお茶は 無料で出してもらえるそうですよ。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば旅館のお茶は
無料で出してもらえるそうですよ。

engChrName: Perhaps I'll bring some up to share with Judith.
engSearchText: Perhaps I'll bring some up to share with Judith.
jpnChrName: ふふ、後でジュディスさんの所にも 持って行ってあげましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、後でジュディスさんの所にも
持って行ってあげましょうか。

engChrName: Mantou, onigiri, ice cream... There are so many lovely scents in the air!
engSearchText:
Mantou, onigiri, ice cream... There are so many
lovely scents in the air!
jpnChrName: お饅頭に握り飯にアイスに…… ふふ、あちこちから美味しそうな匂いがしますね。
jpnSearchText:
お饅頭に握り飯にアイスに……
ふふ、あちこちから美味しそうな匂いがしますね。

engChrName: I'd like to try them all, but lunch was quite fancy enough already.
engSearchText:
I'd like to try them all, but lunch was quite fancy
enough already.
jpnChrName: 色々と食べてみたいですけど、 ランチも結構豪華でしたし。
jpnSearchText:
色々と食べてみたいですけど、
ランチも結構豪華でしたし。

engChrName: If I eat a lot now, I'll probably regret it at dinner.
engSearchText: If I eat a lot now, I'll probably regret it at dinner.
jpnChrName: あんまり食べると夕食に響くでしょうか。
jpnSearchText: あんまり食べると夕食に響くでしょうか。

engChrName: Finally givin' in to the sweet smell of sweetness, eh?
engSearchText: Finally givin' in to the sweet smell of sweetness, eh?
jpnChrName: はは、お前が食い意地張ってるなんて 珍しいじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
はは、お前が食い意地張ってるなんて
珍しいじゃねえか。

engChrName: Eat as much as you want, I say. Don't let a diet stand between you and discoverin' new things.
engSearchText:
Eat as much as you want, I say. Don't let a diet stand
between you and discoverin' new things.
jpnChrName: 好きなだけ食べりゃいいさ。 ダイエットなんて言ってると勿体ないぜ。
jpnSearchText:
好きなだけ食べりゃいいさ。
ダイエットなんて言ってると勿体ないぜ。

engChrName: True enough... I suppose you're right. I might not have another chance like this anytime soon.
engSearchText:
True enough... I suppose you're right. I might not
have another chance like this anytime soon.
jpnChrName: あはは……そうですね。 滅多にない機会ですから。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……そうですね。
滅多にない機会ですから。

engChrName: The food is good, but I'm also excited for the activities in the area.
engSearchText:
The food is good, but I'm also excited for the
activities in the area.
jpnChrName: ご飯も勿論ですが、 色々なアクティビティも気になりますし。
jpnSearchText:
ご飯も勿論ですが、
色々なアクティビティも気になりますし。

engChrName: I'd love to get the chance to study and experience it all.
engSearchText:
I'd love to get the chance to study and experience
it all.
jpnChrName: 勉強も兼ねて色々と 体験しておきたいと思います。
jpnSearchText:
勉強も兼ねて色々と
体験しておきたいと思います。

engChrName: It's funny, but even just among mantou, there's so many flavors it's hard to decide.
engSearchText:
It's funny, but even just among mantou, there's so
many flavors it's hard to decide.
jpnChrName: お饅頭ひとつとっても 色んな種類があって、迷っちゃいますね……
jpnSearchText:
お饅頭ひとつとっても
色んな種類があって、迷っちゃいますね……

engChrName: I wonder what flavor these black mantou are?
engSearchText: I wonder what flavor these black mantou are?
jpnChrName: ふふ、黒饅頭ってどんな味なんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText: ふふ、黒饅頭ってどんな味なんでしょうか？

engChrName: Hmm... If we were playing hide and seek, Yumé would be extra good at being sneaky...
engSearchText:
Hmm... If we were playing hide and seek, Yumé
would be extra good at being sneaky...
jpnChrName: ふぅ、これがかくれんぼだとしたら ユメちゃんは相当な名人になっちゃいますね……
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ、これがかくれんぼだとしたら
ユメちゃんは相当な名人になっちゃいますね……

engChrName: Not a lot of people saw her, though, so that means she can't have gone far, right?
engSearchText:
Not a lot of people saw her, though, so that means
she can't have gone far, right?
jpnChrName: 目撃情報が少なすぎますし、 あまり移動してないという事でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
目撃情報が少なすぎますし、
あまり移動してないという事でしょうか？

engChrName: It's neat looking all over at souvenirs!
engSearchText: It's neat looking all over at souvenirs!
jpnChrName: えへへ、お土産ってどれだけ 探しても見飽きないですねっ。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、お土産ってどれだけ
探しても見飽きないですねっ。

engChrName: I'm going to look for something cool to send to my family tomorrow!
engSearchText:
I'm going to look for something cool to send to my
family tomorrow!
jpnChrName: 明日も家族のお土産に良さそうな物がないか 探してみたいと思いますっ！
jpnSearchText:
明日も家族のお土産に良さそうな物がないか
探してみたいと思いますっ！

engChrName: I just had a rice dumpling!
engSearchText: I just had a rice dumpling!
jpnChrName: えへへ、丁度今チマキを食べ終わった所でしたっ！
jpnSearchText: えへへ、丁度今チマキを食べ終わった所でしたっ！

engChrName: I had some back at Langport, too, but the flavor and style of the ones here is super different.
engSearchText:
I had some back at Langport, too, but the flavor and
style of the ones here is super different.
jpnChrName: ラングポートでも食べた事がありましたけど、 こちらは作り方も味付けも違くて面白いですっ。
jpnSearchText:
ラングポートでも食べた事がありましたけど、
こちらは作り方も味付けも違くて面白いですっ。

engChrName: It's...weird, I think, that I know enough about Republic food now to talk like a fancy gour-mand!
engSearchText:
It's...weird, I think, that I know enough about
Republic food now to talk like a fancy gour-mand!
jpnChrName: なんて……グルメ家みたいな事が言えるくらい いつの間にか共和国に詳しくなっちゃいました。
jpnSearchText:
なんて……グルメ家みたいな事が言えるくらい
いつの間にか共和国に詳しくなっちゃいました。

engChrName: This is all thanks to getting to hang out with you, Van.
engSearchText:
This is all thanks to getting to hang out with
you, Van.
jpnChrName: それもこれも、皆さんと一緒に色々な所へ 出張に行ったおかげですねっ。
jpnSearchText:
それもこれも、皆さんと一緒に色々な所へ
出張に行ったおかげですねっ。

engChrName: True. Didn't quite mean to take you on the grand tour, but it did end up that way. Like with this trip.
engSearchText:
True. Didn't quite mean to take you on the grand
tour, but it did end up that way. Like with this trip.
jpnChrName: 確かに、図らずも結構な数の街を回ってたからな。 今回の旅行もまた然りか。
jpnSearchText:
確かに、図らずも結構な数の街を回ってたからな。
今回の旅行もまた然りか。

engChrName: For sure! With the Kruga, I would never travel just for a vacation. Anywhere I went was for work.
engSearchText:
For sure! With the Kruga, I would never travel just
for a vacation. Anywhere I went was for work.
jpnChrName: はい、クルガに居たままだったら 任務で訪れる事はあっても旅行じゃなかったですし。
jpnSearchText:
はい、クルガに居たままだったら
任務で訪れる事はあっても旅行じゃなかったですし。

engChrName: So I'll travel and tour all over and go back to tell my family about stuff!
engSearchText:
So I'll travel and tour all over and go back to tell my
family about stuff!
jpnChrName: なので沢山観光をして、 家族や里の皆にも教えてあげちゃいます！
jpnSearchText:
なので沢山観光をして、
家族や里の皆にも教えてあげちゃいます！

engChrName: Heehee! I'll need to get some souvenirs to send to my family.
engSearchText:
Heehee! I'll need to get some souvenirs to send to
my family.
jpnChrName: えへへ、家族へ送るお土産も 探さないといけませんねっ。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、家族へ送るお土産も
探さないといけませんねっ。

engChrName: The souvenir store is real big! I wanna see all the stuff they have!
engSearchText:
The souvenir store is real big! I wanna see all the stuff
they have!
jpnChrName: お土産屋さんも大きいみたいなので どんな物があるのかワクワクしちゃいますっ！
jpnSearchText:
お土産屋さんも大きいみたいなので
どんな物があるのかワクワクしちゃいますっ！

engChrName: Oh, Van!
engSearchText: Oh, Van!
jpnChrName: あっ、ヴァンさん！
jpnSearchText: あっ、ヴァンさん！

engChrName: Hello. Feri and I were showing off our souvenirs to each other.
engSearchText:
Hello. Feri and I were showing off our souvenirs to
each other.
jpnChrName: ふふ、今はフェリちゃんと一緒に お土産の見せあいっこをしていた所なんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、今はフェリちゃんと一緒に
お土産の見せあいっこをしていた所なんですよ。

engChrName: Oh, yeah? What'd you all pick up?
engSearchText: Oh, yeah? What'd you all pick up?
jpnChrName: へえ、どんなモンを買ったんだ？
jpnSearchText: へえ、どんなモンを買ったんだ？

engChrName: I got a picture postcard to send back home to my family!
engSearchText:
I got a picture postcard to send back home to
my family!
jpnChrName: わたしは家族に送る為の 絵葉書を買いましたっ。
jpnSearchText:
わたしは家族に送る為の
絵葉書を買いましたっ。

engChrName: I'll send it along with some mantou and rice crackers!
engSearchText: I'll send it along with some mantou and rice crackers!
jpnChrName: おせんべいやお饅頭も 送ってあげるつもりです！
jpnSearchText:
おせんべいやお饅頭も
送ってあげるつもりです！

engChrName: Hey, bet they'll love that. Those snacks'll also keep on the road pretty good.
engSearchText:
Hey, bet they'll love that. Those snacks'll also keep on
the road pretty good.
jpnChrName: いいんじゃねえか、 どれも日持ちしそうだしな。
jpnSearchText:
いいんじゃねえか、
どれも日持ちしそうだしな。

engChrName: As for myself, I purchased some assorted snacks for a few academy friends, like the ones in the Student Council.
engSearchText:
As for myself, I purchased some assorted snacks for a
few academy friends, like the ones in the
Student Council.
jpnChrName: 私も学校の友達や生徒会の皆の為に、 いくつかお菓子を買ってきました。
jpnSearchText:
私も学校の友達や生徒会の皆の為に、
いくつかお菓子を買ってきました。

engChrName: I also picked up a few things for myself. A cute candle, some tea...
engSearchText:
I also picked up a few things for myself. A cute
candle, some tea...
jpnChrName: あとは自分用に、可愛い形の蝋燭や 茶葉などを少し……
jpnSearchText:
あとは自分用に、可愛い形の蝋燭や
茶葉などを少し……

engChrName: It's only been a day, but it was still quite fulfilling.
engSearchText: It's only been a day, but it was still quite fulfilling.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、１日目なのに かなり満喫してしまいました。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、１日目なのに
かなり満喫してしまいました。

engChrName: For me, too! The hot springs and the meals were super cool!
engSearchText:
For me, too! The hot springs and the meals were
super cool!
jpnChrName: わたしもです、温泉もお食事も 全部最高でしたしねっ！
jpnSearchText:
わたしもです、温泉もお食事も
全部最高でしたしねっ！

engChrName: Good to hear that. (Looks like they're getting a chance to relax.)
engSearchText:
Good to hear that.
(Looks like they're getting a chance to relax.)
jpnChrName: はは、そいつは結構。 （ちゃんと息抜き出来てるみてえだな。）
jpnSearchText:
はは、そいつは結構。
（ちゃんと息抜き出来てるみてえだな。）

engChrName: With how bad this fog is, a sighting from twenty minutes ago feels like it's worth piss.
engSearchText:
With how bad this fog is, a sighting from twenty
minutes ago feels like it's worth piss.
jpnChrName: この霧の濃さだと、２０分前にあったっつう 目撃情報もどこまで信じていいんだかな。
jpnSearchText:
この霧の濃さだと、２０分前にあったっつう
目撃情報もどこまで信じていいんだかな。
