engChrName: Damn it... If we can't find her soon, we're gonna get chewed up and spit out by the old man when we get back.
engSearchText:
Damn it... If we can't find her soon, we're gonna get
chewed up and spit out by the old man when we
get back.
jpnChrName: ったく……早い所見つけてやらねえと 帰った時あのオヤジになんて言われるか分からねえぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……早い所見つけてやらねえと
帰った時あのオヤジになんて言われるか分からねえぞ。

engChrName: Uh? Hey, I was wondering why I didn't see you earlier. The hell are you doing here this late?!
engSearchText:
Uh? Hey, I was wondering why I didn't see
you earlier. The hell are you doing here this late?!
jpnChrName: おいおい、宿で見かけねえと思ったら…… んな所で何やってやがる！？
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、宿で見かけねえと思ったら……
んな所で何やってやがる！？

engChrName: Aww, come on, old fart. Going blind? I'm doing what you do when you go traveling. Drinking, dealing, and buying.
engSearchText:
Aww, come on, old fart. Going blind? I'm doing what
you do when you go traveling. Drinking, dealing,
and buying.
jpnChrName: ハッ、見りゃ分かんだろ？ 旅先でやる事と言えば飲む・打つ・買うってな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、見りゃ分かんだろ？
旅先でやる事と言えば飲む・打つ・買うってな。

engChrName: Now, if this place had a proper pleasure district, we'd really be hopping, you know what I mean?
engSearchText:
Now, if this place had a proper pleasure district, we'd
really be hopping, you know what I mean?
jpnChrName: あとは色街でもありゃあ 完璧だったんだけどよ。
jpnSearchText:
あとは色街でもありゃあ
完璧だったんだけどよ。

engChrName: Keep it in your pants, punk. Don't indulge too much.
engSearchText: Keep it in your pants, punk. Don't indulge too much.
jpnChrName: 完璧じゃねーよ。 満喫しすぎだっつの。
jpnSearchText:
完璧じゃねーよ。
満喫しすぎだっつの。

engChrName: You cut too loose, you'll cause trouble for your folks back home.
engSearchText:
You cut too loose, you'll cause trouble for your folks
back home.
jpnChrName: あんま羽目を外して 地元の皆さんに迷惑かけんじゃねーぞ？
jpnSearchText:
あんま羽目を外して
地元の皆さんに迷惑かけんじゃねーぞ？

engChrName: You think you need to tell me that?
engSearchText: You think you need to tell me that?
jpnChrName: クク、誰に向かって言ってんだ？
jpnSearchText: クク、誰に向かって言ってんだ？

engChrName: If you want, you're welcome to join, yeah? Just another old man for the crowd.
engSearchText:
If you want, you're welcome to join, yeah?
Just another old man for the crowd.
jpnChrName: そっちこそ、混ざりたけりゃ歓迎するぜ？ もう一名オッサン追加ってな。
jpnSearchText:
そっちこそ、混ざりたけりゃ歓迎するぜ？
もう一名オッサン追加ってな。

engChrName: Shame we're only gambling for liquor and snacks, but hey, it's a good enough table.
engSearchText:
Shame we're only gambling for liquor and snacks, but
hey, it's a good enough table.
jpnChrName: クク、賭けてんのが酒やツマミ代ってのは しょぼいが、やっぱ卓を囲むのは悪くねえな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、賭けてんのが酒やツマミ代ってのは
しょぼいが、やっぱ卓を囲むのは悪くねえな。

engChrName: If you're feeling bored, you're welcome to join in. Course, I'll snag every mira you got if you try!
engSearchText:
If you're feeling bored, you're welcome to join in.
Course, I'll snag every mira you got if you try!
jpnChrName: 遊び足りねえならアンタも混ぜてやるぜ？ ミラを毟り取ってやるから覚悟しとけよな。
jpnSearchText:
遊び足りねえならアンタも混ぜてやるぜ？
ミラを毟り取ってやるから覚悟しとけよな。

engChrName: Hey, good timing.
engSearchText: Hey, good timing.
jpnChrName: おっ、丁度いい所に来たじゃねーか。
jpnSearchText: おっ、丁度いい所に来たじゃねーか。

engChrName: Yeah...? Uhh... Wait. What the hell is that huge liquor jug?! Did you literally buy that first thing?
engSearchText:
Yeah...? Uhh... Wait. What the hell is that huge
liquor jug?! Did you literally buy that first thing?
jpnChrName: ああ……って、何だその立派な酒瓶はよ！？ こっちに来て早々買ったのか？
jpnSearchText:
ああ……って、何だその立派な酒瓶はよ！？
こっちに来て早々買ったのか？

engChrName: Hell yeah, I did. Got to talking up the old man who runs the liquor store, and guess what? He sold me the bottle for half off! Man likes me.
engSearchText:
Hell yeah, I did. Got to talking up the old man who
runs the liquor store, and guess what? He sold me the
bottle for half off! Man likes me.
jpnChrName: まあな、酒を売ってる店の爺さんと話が合って 折角だからって半額で売ってくれたんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあな、酒を売ってる店の爺さんと話が合って
折角だからって半額で売ってくれたんだよ。

engChrName: Was gonna settle in a bit. Just me, a drink, and scenery for flavor.
engSearchText:
Was gonna settle in a bit. Just me, a drink, and
scenery for flavor.
jpnChrName: コイツの相手をしつつ、 景色を肴にやるつもりだったんだが。
jpnSearchText:
コイツの相手をしつつ、
景色を肴にやるつもりだったんだが。

engChrName: Wanna join me? Liquor in the day's a real treat.
engSearchText: Wanna join me? Liquor in the day's a real treat.
jpnChrName: アンタもどうだ？ 昼間から飲む酒は美味いぜ？
jpnSearchText:
アンタもどうだ？
昼間から飲む酒は美味いぜ？

engChrName: Why am I not surprised? Anyway, 'preciate it, but I'll pass.
engSearchText:
Why am I not surprised? Anyway, 'preciate it, but
I'll pass.
jpnChrName: ハッ、流石っつうか何つうかだな…… 折角だが遠慮しとくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、流石っつうか何つうかだな……
折角だが遠慮しとくぜ。

engChrName: No way I'm boozin' up before I savor the sweets of Longlai. Wouldn't be able to enjoy the flavor like that, you know?
engSearchText:
No way I'm boozin' up before I savor the sweets
of Longlai. Wouldn't be able to enjoy the flavor like
that, you know?
jpnChrName: 龍來のスイーツを堪能する前に 酔っ払ってちゃ味わえねえからな。
jpnSearchText:
龍來のスイーツを堪能する前に
酔っ払ってちゃ味わえねえからな。

engChrName: Sure, sure. That's what I figured, anyway.
engSearchText: Sure, sure. That's what I figured, anyway.
jpnChrName: へいへい、どうせそんな所だろうと思ったぜ。
jpnSearchText: へいへい、どうせそんな所だろうと思ったぜ。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. I saw some martial arts practitioners on our way here.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. I saw some martial arts practitioners on our
way here.
jpnChrName: そういや、ここに来る途中で 拳法をやってるヤツを見かけたな。
jpnSearchText:
そういや、ここに来る途中で
拳法をやってるヤツを見かけたな。

engChrName: Dunno if they practice some local Longlai school or what, but I figured I'd go join them later.
engSearchText:
Dunno if they practice some local Longlai school or
what, but I figured I'd go join them later.
jpnChrName: 龍來流か何だか知らねえが、どんなもんなのか 後で混ざりに行ってみるか。
jpnSearchText:
龍來流か何だか知らねえが、どんなもんなのか
後で混ざりに行ってみるか。

engChrName: I had the inn give me access to the security cameras that observe the area.
engSearchText:
I had the inn give me access to the security cameras
that observe the area.
jpnChrName: 旅館の方に話を通して、 周囲の防犯カメラにアクセスをしているのですが……
jpnSearchText:
旅館の方に話を通して、
周囲の防犯カメラにアクセスをしているのですが……

engChrName: I'm afraid that while I saw hints of Yumé on the camera, I was unable to find anything in the footage that would help us locate her.
engSearchText:
I'm afraid that while I saw hints of Yumé on the
camera, I was unable to find anything in the footage
that would help us locate her.
jpnChrName: カメラの端に姿を捉えているものもありますが 行方は掴めずにいる状況です。
jpnSearchText:
カメラの端に姿を捉えているものもありますが
行方は掴めずにいる状況です。

engChrName: It is curious how she could evade cameras like that... Either way, I'm focusing on gleaning information from what we know.
engSearchText:
It is curious how she could evade cameras like that...
Either way, I'm focusing on gleaning information
from what we know.
jpnChrName: そんな事があり得るのか疑問ですが…… 今は情報の分析に集中すると致しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
そんな事があり得るのか疑問ですが……
今は情報の分析に集中すると致しましょう。

engChrName: I must admit, I found a surprisingly childlike joy in our touring today.
engSearchText:
I must admit, I found a surprisingly childlike joy in
our touring today.
jpnChrName: ふふ、今日は年甲斐もなく 観光を楽しんでしまいました。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、今日は年甲斐もなく
観光を楽しんでしまいました。

engChrName: Naturally, working with your team at Arkride Solutions is very satisfying work, but still.
engSearchText:
Naturally, working with your team at Arkride
Solutions is very satisfying work, but still.
jpnChrName: 事務所での解決業務も充実していますが……
jpnSearchText: 事務所での解決業務も充実していますが……

engChrName: I believe I shall remember today's events for a long time to come.
engSearchText:
I believe I shall remember today's events for a long
time to come.
jpnChrName: 中でも、今日の出来事は 忘れられない思い出になりそうです。
jpnSearchText:
中でも、今日の出来事は
忘れられない思い出になりそうです。

engChrName: Whoa... Talk about amazing autumn colors.
engSearchText: Whoa... Talk about amazing autumn colors.
jpnChrName: おっと……コイツは綺麗な紅葉だな。
jpnSearchText: おっと……コイツは綺麗な紅葉だな。

engChrName: Hello, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText: Hello, Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ヴァン様も見にいらしたのですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ヴァン様も見にいらしたのですね。

engChrName: I'd only seen photographs before, but it's amazing how lovely it can get, isn't it?
engSearchText:
I'd only seen photographs before, but it's amazing
how lovely it can get, isn't it?
jpnChrName: 写真でしか見た事がありませんでしたが…… これ程美しい色に染まるものなのですね。
jpnSearchText:
写真でしか見た事がありませんでしたが……
これ程美しい色に染まるものなのですね。

engChrName: Supposedly, this very moment, one week before the leaves begin to fall is when they're at their best.
engSearchText:
Supposedly, this very moment, one week before the
leaves begin to fall is when they're at their best.
jpnChrName: 一週間後には葉が落ち始める今が 一番の見頃だとか──
jpnSearchText:
一週間後には葉が落ち始める今が
一番の見頃だとか──

engChrName: Perhaps I'll pick one to bring back with me as a souvenir.
engSearchText:
Perhaps I'll pick one to bring back with me as
a souvenir.
jpnChrName: 折角ですし、思い出に葉を拾って 持ち帰らせて頂きましょう。
jpnSearchText:
折角ですし、思い出に葉を拾って
持ち帰らせて頂きましょう。

engChrName: That sounds like you. A good idea, too.
engSearchText: That sounds like you. A good idea, too.
jpnChrName: はは、お前さんらしいな。 いいと思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、お前さんらしいな。
いいと思うぜ。

engChrName: Longlai is blessed with natural wonders in abundance. It is a deeply elegant, aesthetically pleasing city.
engSearchText:
Longlai is blessed with natural wonders in abundance.
It is a deeply elegant, aesthetically pleasing city.
jpnChrName: 龍來は本当に自然が豊かですね…… それに風情に溢れていて美しい街です。
jpnSearchText:
龍來は本当に自然が豊かですね……
それに風情に溢れていて美しい街です。

engChrName: I'll go view the river next, I think. I suspect the light reflecting off the clear water will be quite the sight.
engSearchText:
I'll go view the river next, I think. I suspect the light
reflecting off the clear water will be quite the sight.
jpnChrName: 次は川の方を見に行くと致しましょう。 透き通った水が光を反射して美しいそうですよ。
jpnSearchText:
次は川の方を見に行くと致しましょう。
透き通った水が光を反射して美しいそうですよ。

engChrName: Oh, my. What brings you back?
engSearchText: Oh, my. What brings you back?
jpnChrName: うふふ、どないしたん？
jpnSearchText: うふふ、どないしたん？

engChrName: Could it be the evening breeze lured you back to spend some time with me?
engSearchText:
Could it be the evening breeze lured you back to
spend some time with me?
jpnChrName: 夜風に当たっとったら うちの話し相手、しとうなった？
jpnSearchText:
夜風に当たっとったら
うちの話し相手、しとうなった？

engChrName: Nah. I've got stuff to do, sorry. (Doesn't seem like she's trying to dig into me too much. Yet...)
engSearchText:
Nah. I've got stuff to do, sorry.
(Doesn't seem like she's trying to dig into me
too much. Yet...)
jpnChrName: いや……一応俺も用があるんだ、悪いな。 （これといって探りを入れてくる気配も無えが……）
jpnSearchText:
いや……一応俺も用があるんだ、悪いな。
（これといって探りを入れてくる気配も無えが……）

engChrName: (No telling when this fox is going to turn back into a beast. I'm better off just puttin' her out of my mind.)
engSearchText:
(No telling when this fox is going to turn back into
a beast. I'm better off just puttin' her out of
my mind.)
jpnChrName: （その辺も含めて“化かされ”ねえとも限らねえ。   気にし過ぎないでおくか。）
jpnSearchText:
（その辺も含めて“化かされ”ねえとも限らねえ。
気にし過ぎないでおくか。）

engChrName: No need to concern yourself, I assure you.
engSearchText: No need to concern yourself, I assure you.
jpnChrName: うふふ、そない気ぃはる事あらへんよ？
jpnSearchText: うふふ、そない気ぃはる事あらへんよ？

engChrName: Enjoy the moment, here and now, with the moon and the evening breeze.
engSearchText:
Enjoy the moment, here and now, with the moon and
the evening breeze.
jpnChrName: このお月はんと夜風、 今はたんと楽しまんとなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
このお月はんと夜風、
今はたんと楽しまんとなぁ。

engChrName: At the very least, learning she likely didn't head to the waterfall or highway was worthwhile.
engSearchText:
At the very least, learning she likely didn't head to the
waterfall or highway was worthwhile.
jpnChrName: ひとまず、街道や瀑布方面には行ってないって事が 分かっただけでも収穫はあったかな。
jpnSearchText:
ひとまず、街道や瀑布方面には行ってないって事が
分かっただけでも収穫はあったかな。

engChrName: But that just returns us to our question of where she DID go...
engSearchText:
But that just returns us to our question of where she
DID go...
jpnChrName: でも、そうなると一体どこに……
jpnSearchText: でも、そうなると一体どこに……

engChrName: V-Van!
engSearchText: V-Van!
jpnChrName: ヴァ、ヴァンさん……！
jpnSearchText: ヴァ、ヴァンさん……！

engChrName: Hey there, rosy cheeks. Must've gotten nice and warm in the baths, eh?
engSearchText:
Hey there, rosy cheeks. Must've gotten nice and
warm in the baths, eh?
jpnChrName: よう、その火照りっぷりを見るに しっかり温まって来たみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
よう、その火照りっぷりを見るに
しっかり温まって来たみてえだな。

engChrName: If you want some advice, the best time to go in alone is the early morning. Gettin' in the first bath after it's been cleaned is great.
engSearchText:
If you want some advice, the best time to go in alone
is the early morning. Gettin' in the first bath after it's
been cleaned is great.
jpnChrName: ついでに、一人で入るなら朝も最高だぞ。 清掃が終わった後の一番風呂は気持ちいいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ついでに、一人で入るなら朝も最高だぞ。
清掃が終わった後の一番風呂は気持ちいいぜ。

engChrName: If you get up early, think about it.
engSearchText: If you get up early, think about it.
jpnChrName: 明日早起きしたら行ってみるといい。
jpnSearchText: 明日早起きしたら行ってみるといい。

engChrName: Haha... How can I not trust the expert on baths?
engSearchText: Haha... How can I not trust the expert on baths?
jpnChrName: あはは……相変わらずの風呂好きだよね。
jpnSearchText: あはは……相変わらずの風呂好きだよね。

engChrName: And, well, these baths are pretty great. I'll take it under consideration.
engSearchText:
And, well, these baths are pretty great. I'll take it
under consideration.
jpnChrName: うん、いい湯だったし検討してみるよ。
jpnSearchText: うん、いい湯だったし検討してみるよ。

engChrName: For now, I'm plenty warm, so I'd like a drink. Do they have anything nonalcoholic?
engSearchText:
For now, I'm plenty warm, so I'd like a drink.
Do they have anything nonalcoholic?
jpnChrName: ふぅ……とりあえず、暑いから何か飲もうかな。 お酒以外の飲み物も置いてあるよね？
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……とりあえず、暑いから何か飲もうかな。
お酒以外の飲み物も置いてあるよね？

engChrName: (Well...now what? I guess the best time to try would be right after dinner, so...)
engSearchText:
(Well...now what? I guess the best time to try would
be right after dinner, so...)
jpnChrName: （……さてと、どうしようかな。   やっぱり夕食直後が狙い目みたいだし……）
jpnSearchText:
（……さてと、どうしようかな。
やっぱり夕食直後が狙い目みたいだし……）

engChrName: Hey, what're you up to? Especially lookin' like you're thinking so hard, you'll fold over.
engSearchText:
Hey, what're you up to? Especially lookin' like you're
thinking so hard, you'll fold over.
jpnChrName: よ、こんな所でどうしたんだ？ 難しい顔で考えこんじまってよ。
jpnSearchText:
よ、こんな所でどうしたんだ？
難しい顔で考えこんじまってよ。

engChrName: Oh, no, I wasn't... Really, it was nothing.
engSearchText: Oh, no, I wasn't... Really, it was nothing.
jpnChrName: いや、そういうわけじゃ…… ホントに何でもないから。
jpnSearchText:
いや、そういうわけじゃ……
ホントに何でもないから。

engChrName: I have to say, Judith is very...how to put this... She's considerate? Like...a bit of a softie?
engSearchText:
I have to say, Judith is very...how to put this...
She's considerate? Like...a bit of a softie?
jpnChrName: それにしても、ジュディスさんって 何だかんだで情に脆いというか、面倒見がいいよね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、ジュディスさんって
何だかんだで情に脆いというか、面倒見がいいよね。

engChrName: I do feel bad for pushing Yumé off onto her, though, so I'll go check on them in a little bit.
engSearchText:
I do feel bad for pushing Yumé off onto her, though,
so I'll go check on them in a little bit.
jpnChrName: 任せてばかりも申し訳ない気がするし、 後で様子を見に行ってみようかな。
jpnSearchText:
任せてばかりも申し訳ない気がするし、
後で様子を見に行ってみようかな。

engChrName: It's almost unbelievable Judith's been at her, uh, hobby, for eight years now.
engSearchText:
It's almost unbelievable Judith's been at her, uh,
hobby, for eight years now.
jpnChrName: ジュディスさん、あっちの方（グリムキャッツ）の活動も まさか８年前からやってたなんて驚きだったな。
jpnSearchText:
ジュディスさん、あっちの方（グリムキャッツ）の活動も
まさか８年前からやってたなんて驚きだったな。

engChrName: I guess you can't judge a book by her cover...
engSearchText: I guess you can't judge a book by her cover...
jpnChrName: 人は見かけによらないというか何と言うか……
jpnSearchText: 人は見かけによらないというか何と言うか……

engChrName: (...What?)
engSearchText: (...What?)

engChrName: I'm not exactly sure why there's such a strong sulfurous scent here. Is it because we're close to the spring's source?
engSearchText:
I'm not exactly sure why there's such a strong
sulfurous scent here. Is it because we're close to the
spring's source?
jpnChrName: すぐそこに源泉があるせいか、 ここら辺は特に硫黄の匂いが強いね。
jpnSearchText:
すぐそこに源泉があるせいか、
ここら辺は特に硫黄の匂いが強いね。

engChrName: It's odd. I'm used to the scent from catching the smell of hydrogen sulfide from the labs, but it evokes a very different feeling here.
engSearchText:
It's odd. I'm used to the scent from catching the smell
of hydrogen sulfide from the labs, but it evokes a very
different feeling here.
jpnChrName: 大学の実験室で偶に嗅ぐ硫化水素の匂いと 変わらないのに、なんだか風情を感じるな。
jpnSearchText:
大学の実験室で偶に嗅ぐ硫化水素の匂いと
変わらないのに、なんだか風情を感じるな。

engChrName: Strange for me to say, since I barely know Longlai. Maybe I'm just excited to be here.
engSearchText:
Strange for me to say, since I barely know Longlai.
Maybe I'm just excited to be here.
jpnChrName: ふふ、龍來に詳しい訳でもないのにね。 僕も浮かれてるって事なのかも。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、龍來に詳しい訳でもないのにね。
僕も浮かれてるって事なのかも。

engChrName: Hey, it'd be a pretty crappy trip if you weren't excited to be goin' on it. You got a chance to relax, so take it.
engSearchText:
Hey, it'd be a pretty crappy trip if you weren't excited
to be goin' on it. You got a chance to relax, so take it.
jpnChrName: ハッ、旅行なんだから浮かれてなんぼだろ。 息抜き出来る時はちゃんと息抜きしとけよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、旅行なんだから浮かれてなんぼだろ。
息抜き出来る時はちゃんと息抜きしとけよ。

engChrName: Naturally. Goodness knows when I'll be here next.
engSearchText: Naturally. Goodness knows when I'll be here next.
jpnChrName: うん、勿論。 滅多に来れる場所じゃないからね。
jpnSearchText:
うん、勿論。
滅多に来れる場所じゃないからね。

engChrName: I never thought much about going on a vacation, but so far it's proving more fun than I'd thought it'd be.
engSearchText:
I never thought much about going on a vacation, but
so far it's proving more fun than I'd thought it'd be.
jpnChrName: 旅行ってあんまり興味なかったけど、 思ったより楽しいものだね。
jpnSearchText:
旅行ってあんまり興味なかったけど、
思ったより楽しいものだね。

engChrName: I hope I can bring the professor, Essy, and Yang on a vacation sometime.
engSearchText:
I hope I can bring the professor, Essy, and Yang on a
vacation sometime.
jpnChrName: いつか博士とエレ姉とヤン兄と一緒に 旅行に来れたらいいのになぁ……
jpnSearchText:
いつか博士とエレ姉とヤン兄と一緒に
旅行に来れたらいいのになぁ……

engChrName: Long-range scan found no traces of Yumé.
engSearchText: Long-range scan found no traces of Yumé.
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯノ広域サーチデモ ユメ、見ツカラナイ……
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯノ広域サーチデモ
ユメ、見ツカラナイ……

engChrName: No precedent for this failure exists. FIO suggests an update to related functionality may be required when the cause is determined.
engSearchText:
No precedent for this failure exists. FIO suggests an
update to related functionality may be required when
the cause is determined.
jpnChrName: 特殊ナ事例トシテ、原因ヲ解明次第 ＦＩＯノ機能ヲアップデートスル必要アリ？
jpnSearchText:
特殊ナ事例トシテ、原因ヲ解明次第
ＦＩＯノ機能ヲアップデートスル必要アリ？

engChrName: Unrelated notice... Mild humidity increase. Predicted possibility of an effect on tomorrow's weather.
engSearchText:
Unrelated notice... Mild humidity increase.
Predicted possibility of an effect on
tomorrow's weather.
jpnChrName: チナミニ……ヤヤ湿度ガ上昇。 明日ノ天気ニ影響ヲ及ボス可能性アリ。
jpnSearchText:
チナミニ……ヤヤ湿度ガ上昇。
明日ノ天気ニ影響ヲ及ボス可能性アリ。

engChrName: Scent of cooked rice grains detected.
engSearchText: Scent of cooked rice grains detected.
jpnChrName: 調理サレタ米穀ノ匂イヲ検知。
jpnSearchText: 調理サレタ米穀ノ匂イヲ検知。

engChrName: Adding supplementary information based on Feri's input... Scent is defined as 'super mega delicious.'
engSearchText:
Adding supplementary information based on
Feri's input... Scent is defined as 'super
mega delicious.'
jpnChrName: フェリニヨル評価ヲ追加情報トシテ登録…… コレガ“オイシイ”匂イ。
jpnSearchText:
フェリニヨル評価ヲ追加情報トシテ登録……
コレガ“オイシイ”匂イ。

engChrName: Wow... Guess this thing really is learning. In a couple different ways.
engSearchText:
Wow... Guess this thing really is learning. In a couple
different ways.
jpnChrName: おお……こいつも色んな意味で 順調に成長してやがるみてえだな……
jpnSearchText:
おお……こいつも色んな意味で
順調に成長してやがるみてえだな……

engChrName: Hey there. What're you two doing here?
engSearchText: Hey there. What're you two doing here?
jpnChrName: おっ、リゼットとＦＩＯはここにいたのか。
jpnSearchText: おっ、リゼットとＦＩＯはここにいたのか。

engChrName: I asked FIO to share today's visual recordings with me, actually.
engSearchText:
I asked FIO to share today's visual recordings with
me, actually.
jpnChrName: ええ、ＦＩＯ様から本日の 記録映像を共有して頂いていたのですが……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ＦＩＯ様から本日の
記録映像を共有して頂いていたのですが……

engChrName: While I was dealing with that, I looked up and realized how lovely the stars were. Perhaps it's because Longlai has fewer lights.
engSearchText:
While I was dealing with that, I looked up and
realized how lovely the stars were. Perhaps it's
because Longlai has fewer lights.
jpnChrName: ふと見上げると、星空がよく見えるもので。 ふふ、街灯りが少ないせいでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ふと見上げると、星空がよく見えるもので。
ふふ、街灯りが少ないせいでしょうか。

engChrName: FIO has also captured an image of this night sky.
engSearchText: FIO has also captured an image of this night sky.
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯモ内蔵カメラデ景色ヲ撮影シタ。
jpnSearchText: ＦＩＯモ内蔵カメラデ景色ヲ撮影シタ。

engChrName: It will be shared with Quatre later.
engSearchText: It will be shared with Quatre later.
jpnChrName: 後デカトルニ見セル。
jpnSearchText: 後デカトルニ見セル。

engChrName: Hah. Glad to hear you two are having a nice evening.
engSearchText: Hah. Glad to hear you two are having a nice evening.
jpnChrName: はは、二人とも満喫してるって訳か。
jpnSearchText: はは、二人とも満喫してるって訳か。

engChrName: No kiddin', though. With tonight's skies, the stars are clear as gems.
engSearchText:
No kiddin', though. With tonight's skies, the stars are
clear as gems.
jpnChrName: 確かに……今日はよく晴れてたせいか、 星がよく見えるな。
jpnSearchText:
確かに……今日はよく晴れてたせいか、
星がよく見えるな。

engChrName: Guess I'll take a moment to enjoy them, myself.
engSearchText: Guess I'll take a moment to enjoy them, myself.
jpnChrName: 俺も少し眺めてから行かせてもらおうかね。
jpnSearchText: 俺も少し眺めてから行かせてもらおうかね。

engChrName: GRR... WOOF.
engSearchText: GRR... WOOF.
jpnChrName: ＧＲＲ……ＢＯＷ．
jpnSearchText: ＧＲＲ……ＢＯＷ．

engChrName: XEROS is also doing an analysis of record data to try to find traces of Yumé.
engSearchText:
XEROS is also doing an analysis of record data to try
to find traces of Yumé.
jpnChrName: ＸＥＲＯＳの方でも、記録映像を分析して あの子の形跡が無いかサーチしてるんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
ＸＥＲＯＳの方でも、記録映像を分析して
あの子の形跡が無いかサーチしてるんだけど。

engChrName: The most bizarre thing is we haven't turned up anything on any search mode. That would be unbelievable...under normal circumstances.
engSearchText:
The most bizarre thing is we haven't turned up
anything on any search mode. That would be
unbelievable...under normal circumstances.
jpnChrName: 不思議な事に全くサーチに引っかからないんだよね。 普通ならありえないんだけどな……
jpnSearchText:
不思議な事に全くサーチに引っかからないんだよね。
普通ならありえないんだけどな……

engChrName: I see.
engSearchText: I see.
jpnChrName: そうか……
jpnSearchText: そうか……

engChrName: ...GRR.
engSearchText: ...GRR.
jpnSearchText: …………ＧＲＲＲＲ…………

engChrName: Oh, hey! Napping here, buddy? Bet you'd give the other guests a real shock if they saw you.
engSearchText:
Oh, hey! Napping here, buddy? Bet you'd give the
other guests a real shock if they saw you.
jpnChrName: おっと、ここで寝てんのか…… 他の客が見たら驚くだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
おっと、ここで寝てんのか……
他の客が見たら驚くだろうな。

engChrName: WOOF!
engSearchText: WOOF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ！　ＢＯＷ！
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ！　ＢＯＷ！

engChrName: She sure sleeps easy, huh? That's a sign of someone who'll be a big deal in the future, mark my words.
engSearchText:
She sure sleeps easy, huh? That's a sign of someone
who'll be a big deal in the future, mark my words.
jpnChrName: しかし寝付きがいいわね～、この子。 ふふ、将来大物になりそうじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
しかし寝付きがいいわね～、この子。
ふふ、将来大物になりそうじゃない。

engChrName: Also, you changed your clothes! You going outside?
engSearchText: Also, you changed your clothes! You going outside?
jpnChrName: ──そういえば着替えてるけど、 これから外に出かけるつもりなわけ？
jpnSearchText:
──そういえば着替えてるけど、
これから外に出かけるつもりなわけ？

engChrName: Ah, yeah. Got a little work, and also some side business. Keep an eye on Yumé for me, would you?
engSearchText:
Ah, yeah. Got a little work, and also some
side business. Keep an eye on Yumé for me,
would you?
jpnChrName: ああ、仕事がてら野暮用でな。 ユメのことはよろしく頼んだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、仕事がてら野暮用でな。
ユメのことはよろしく頼んだぜ。

engChrName: Oh? Well, that's a little unfortunate, but I won't dig into it. Yet.
engSearchText:
Oh? Well, that's a little unfortunate, but I won't dig
into it. Yet.
jpnChrName: ふぅん、少しいかがわしそうだけど 追求しないであげるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅん、少しいかがわしそうだけど
追求しないであげるわ。

engChrName: Just be sure not to get back too late. You wouldn't want to worry your poor assistants.
engSearchText:
Just be sure not to get back too late. You wouldn't
want to worry your poor assistants.
jpnChrName: 助手さんたちを心配させないよう、 あまり遅くならずに帰ってくるのね。
jpnSearchText:
助手さんたちを心配させないよう、
あまり遅くならずに帰ってくるのね。

engChrName: Mmnn... I'm not shleepy... I wanna stay awake...
engSearchText: Mmnn... I'm not shleepy... I wanna stay awake...
jpnChrName: ムニャムニャ…… ユメまだねむくないよ…………
jpnSearchText:
ムニャムニャ……
ユメまだねむくないよ…………

engChrName: We're here to have fun...
engSearchText: We're here to have fun...
jpnChrName: せっかくみんなとリョコーに来たのに……
jpnSearchText: せっかくみんなとリョコーに来たのに……

engChrName: Aww! I wanna go on your picnic, too! But okay, I'll be good and stay here!
engSearchText:
Aww! I wanna go on your picnic, too! But okay, I'll
be good and stay here!
jpnChrName: むー、ピクニックなら行きたいけど しょーがないから、ユメおルスバンしてるね！
jpnSearchText:
むー、ピクニックなら行きたいけど
しょーがないから、ユメおルスバンしてるね！

engChrName: If you find something fun, tell me about it, 'kay?
engSearchText: If you find something fun, tell me about it, 'kay?
jpnChrName: ヴァンたち、おもしろいもの 見つけたらおしえてね～！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたち、おもしろいもの
見つけたらおしえてね～！

engChrName: Wow! Longlai's houses are so different, it's all so neat!
engSearchText:
Wow! Longlai's houses are so different, it's all
so neat!
jpnChrName: ロンライって、お家のまわりと ぜんぜんちがっておもしろいね～！
jpnSearchText:
ロンライって、お家のまわりと
ぜんぜんちがっておもしろいね～！

engChrName: Are you having fun, too, Van?
engSearchText: Are you having fun, too, Van?
jpnChrName: ヴァンもちゃんと楽しんでる～？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンもちゃんと楽しんでる～？

engChrName: You bet. Never been here as a tourist before, after all.
engSearchText: You bet. Never been here as a tourist before, after all.
jpnChrName: ああ、観光気分で来るのはこれが初めてだしな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、観光気分で来るのはこれが初めてだしな。

engChrName: With our crew of lovable dinguses around, it feels extra special.
engSearchText:
With our crew of lovable dinguses around, it feels
extra special.
jpnChrName: 騒がしい奴らが一緒だからか 色々と新鮮に感じるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
騒がしい奴らが一緒だからか
色々と新鮮に感じるぜ。

engChrName: Yay! That's good. You've been so busy with work, after all!
engSearchText:
Yay! That's good. You've been so busy with work,
after all!
jpnChrName: えへへ、それならよかったぁ！ さいきんお仕事いそがしそうだったからね～！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、それならよかったぁ！
さいきんお仕事いそがしそうだったからね～！

engChrName: Heh. Guess I've still gotta long way to go if I'm worryin' you, Yumes. Thanks.
engSearchText:
Heh. Guess I've still gotta long way to go if I'm
worryin' you, Yumes. Thanks.
jpnChrName: ハッ、ユメ坊に気を遣われちまうようじゃ 俺もまだまだだな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、ユメ坊に気を遣われちまうようじゃ
俺もまだまだだな。

engChrName: Hey! I wanna go find some things to give to mommy and grandpa when I get home!
engSearchText:
Hey! I wanna go find some things to give to mommy
and grandpa when I get home!
jpnChrName: あのね、ママとおじーちゃんに おみやげもかってかえるんだ！
jpnSearchText:
あのね、ママとおじーちゃんに
おみやげもかってかえるんだ！

engChrName: Will you help me find something later, Van?
engSearchText: Will you help me find something later, Van?
jpnChrName: あとでヴァンもさがすのてつだって～？
jpnSearchText: あとでヴァンもさがすのてつだって～？

engChrName: Sure. I'd be glad to.
engSearchText: Sure. I'd be glad to.
jpnChrName: ああ、付き合ってやるよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、付き合ってやるよ。

engChrName: November 14th, 12:32PM
engSearchText: November 14th, 12:32PM

engChrName: We're heeere!
engSearchText: We're heeere!
jpnChrName: とうちゃーく！
jpnSearchText: とうちゃーく！

engChrName: So this is Longlai...
engSearchText: So this is Longlai...
jpnChrName: ここが龍來（ロンライ）かぁ……
jpnSearchText: ここが龍來（ロンライ）かぁ……

engChrName: Wow! I've never seen anything like this.
engSearchText: Wow! I've never seen anything like this.
jpnChrName: わああ……！ 不思議な光景ですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
わああ……！
不思議な光景ですねぇ。

engChrName: It's got a whole different kinda Eastern vibe compared to Langport.
engSearchText:
It's got a whole different kinda Eastern vibe
compared to Langport.
jpnChrName: ハン、東方風だが 煌都とはゼンゼン違うな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、東方風だが
煌都とはゼンゼン違うな。

engChrName: It's like an idyllic town nestled in the mountains.
engSearchText: It's like an idyllic town nestled in the mountains.
jpnChrName: まさに深山幽谷…… 趣のある場所ですね。
jpnSearchText:
まさに深山幽谷……
趣のある場所ですね。

engChrName: That white smoke is steam from the springs, I assume? It certainly has a distinctive smell to it.
engSearchText:
That white smoke is steam from the springs,
I assume? It certainly has a distinctive smell to it.
jpnChrName: 白いのは湯気、ですよね？ そういえば匂いも……
jpnSearchText:
白いのは湯気、ですよね？
そういえば匂いも……

engChrName: Yeah, that's the smell of sulfur. It's a big part of being near a spring.
engSearchText:
Yeah, that's the smell of sulfur. It's a big part of being
near a spring.
jpnChrName: 硫黄の匂いってヤツだ。 温泉地ならではの醍醐味だな。
jpnSearchText:
硫黄の匂いってヤツだ。
温泉地ならではの醍醐味だな。

engChrName: Our lodgings are down to the right across the river. Let's go drop our stuff off before we do anything else.
engSearchText:
Our lodgings are down to the right across the river.
Let's go drop our stuff off before we do anything else.
jpnChrName: 宿は右手を降りて川を渡った所だ。 とりあえず荷物を預けに行くぞ。
jpnSearchText:
宿は右手を降りて川を渡った所だ。
とりあえず荷物を預けに行くぞ。

engChrName: There's so much stuff I've never seen before here! It's so awesome!
engSearchText:
There's so much stuff I've never seen before here!
It's so awesome!
jpnChrName: みたことないものばっかりで ワクワクするー！
jpnSearchText:
みたことないものばっかりで
ワクワクするー！

engChrName: Everything smells so good, too!
engSearchText: Everything smells so good, too!
jpnChrName: うんっ、それにこの匂い……！
jpnSearchText: うんっ、それにこの匂い……！

engChrName: There's grilled skewers and mochi, and...what are those things with leaves wrapped around them?
engSearchText:
There's grilled skewers and mochi, and...what are
those things with leaves wrapped around them?
jpnChrName: 串焼きにお餅に──あの葉っぱで 巻いてるのはなんでしょう！？
jpnSearchText:
串焼きにお餅に──あの葉っぱで
巻いてるのはなんでしょう！？

engChrName: Damn, starved much? Those're called zongzi.
engSearchText: Damn, starved much? Those're called zongzi.
jpnChrName: 欠食児童かよ…… あれは餅米を使った粽（ちまき）だな。
jpnSearchText:
欠食児童かよ……
あれは餅米を使った粽（ちまき）だな。

engChrName: ...Actually, I'm starting to feel hungry, myself.
engSearchText: ...Actually, I'm starting to feel hungry, myself.
jpnChrName: しかし腹が減ってきやがったな。
jpnSearchText: しかし腹が減ってきやがったな。

engChrName: Same here. I know we had a little bit to eat at that pit stop, but I could use a real meal.
engSearchText:
Same here. I know we had a little bit to eat at that pit
stop, but I could use a real meal.
jpnChrName: うん、サービスエリアで 軽食をつまんだきりだったしね。
jpnSearchText:
うん、サービスエリアで
軽食をつまんだきりだったしね。

engChrName: Hmm... Lunch is going to be waiting for us at our lodgings, though, isn't it?
engSearchText:
Hmm... Lunch is going to be waiting for us at our
lodgings, though, isn't it?
jpnChrName: えっと、宿の方で昼食を 用意してくださるんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
えっと、宿の方で昼食を
用意してくださるんですよね？

engChrName: Yes. That should have some of the local cuisine, too.
engSearchText: Yes. That should have some of the local cuisine, too.
jpnChrName: ええ、郷土料理を 出していただけるそうです。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、郷土料理を
出していただけるそうです。

engChrName: (...No need to rush, I guess.)
engSearchText: (...No need to rush, I guess.)
jpnChrName: （……ま、急ぐことはねぇか。）
jpnSearchText: （……ま、急ぐことはねぇか。）

engChrName: Oh! What are THOSE?!
engSearchText: Oh! What are THOSE?!
jpnChrName: ……！ あれはなんでしょう！？
jpnSearchText:
……！
あれはなんでしょう！？

engChrName: They're so hot! And they're super black, too!
engSearchText: They're so hot! And they're super black, too!
jpnChrName: わああっ……！ まっくろでほかほかだ～！？
jpnSearchText:
わああっ……！
まっくろでほかほかだ～！？

engChrName: I dunno what they are, either. Maybe some kind of mantou?
engSearchText:
I dunno what they are, either. Maybe some kind
of mantou?
jpnChrName: こいつは饅頭（マントウ）か……？ 俺だって見たこともねえぞ。
jpnSearchText:
こいつは饅頭（マントウ）か……？
俺だって見たこともねえぞ。

engChrName: They smell so sweet and fragrant—and Yumé's right about that color. That lustrous black really makes them stand out.
engSearchText:
They smell so sweet and fragrant—and Yumé's right
about that color. That lustrous black really makes
them stand out.
jpnChrName: つやつやで…… 甘くて香ばしい匂いがしますね。
jpnSearchText:
つやつやで……
甘くて香ばしい匂いがしますね。

engChrName: Heh. I see I've got your interest! These here are—
engSearchText: Heh. I see I've got your interest! These here are—
jpnChrName: フフン、気になるかい？ 何を隠そう、コイツは──
jpnSearchText:
フフン、気になるかい？
何を隠そう、コイツは──

engChrName: —hot spring mantou made using bamboo charcoal.
engSearchText: —hot spring mantou made using bamboo charcoal.
jpnChrName: 竹炭を練り込んだ温泉饅頭だな。
jpnSearchText: 竹炭を練り込んだ温泉饅頭だな。

engChrName: They've got black sesame jam inside and're as tasty as they look, but they fill you up fast. You won't have any room for lunch if you have one now.
engSearchText:
They've got black sesame jam inside and're as tasty as
they look, but they fill you up fast. You won't have
any room for lunch if you have one now.
jpnChrName: 中も黒ゴマ餡で超絶美味いが ランチもあるし我慢しとけ。
jpnSearchText:
中も黒ゴマ餡で超絶美味いが
ランチもあるし我慢しとけ。

engChrName: How 'bout I buy some for everyone later?
engSearchText: How 'bout I buy some for everyone later?
jpnChrName: 後で奢ってやるからよ。
jpnSearchText: 後で奢ってやるからよ。

engChrName: Mmgh... They look so good...
engSearchText: Mmgh... They look so good...
jpnChrName: ううっ、美味しそう……
jpnSearchText: ううっ、美味しそう……

engChrName: I guess we gotta wait if lunch is soon...but we have to come back here later!
engSearchText:
I guess we gotta wait if lunch is soon...but we have to
come back here later!
jpnChrName: ゴハンがあるんだっけー、 それじゃあ後でトツゲキだぁ！
jpnSearchText:
ゴハンがあるんだっけー、
それじゃあ後でトツゲキだぁ！

engChrName: Well! You certainly know your stuff, young man. I'll be waiting!
engSearchText:
Well! You certainly know your stuff, young man.
I'll be waiting!
jpnChrName: お兄さん詳しいねぇ。 ぜひ後で寄ってくれよな！
jpnSearchText:
お兄さん詳しいねぇ。
ぜひ後で寄ってくれよな！

engChrName: Longlai's known far and wide for its tea leaves, too!
engSearchText: Longlai's known far and wide for its tea leaves, too!
jpnChrName: ──そっちもいいけど 龍來といえば茶葉でも有名！
jpnSearchText:
──そっちもいいけど
龍來といえば茶葉でも有名！

engChrName: How about trying some of our confections made from them? Our matcha ice cream has been a hot seller lately!
engSearchText:
How about trying some of our confections made
from them? Our matcha ice cream has been a hot
seller lately!
jpnChrName: お茶を使ったお菓子とかどう？ 最近だと抹茶アイスなんかも人気よ！
jpnSearchText:
お茶を使ったお菓子とかどう？
最近だと抹茶アイスなんかも人気よ！

engChrName: Wait! MATCHA ice cream?! That's a thing now?
engSearchText: Wait! MATCHA ice cream?! That's a thing now?
jpnChrName: ま、抹茶アイス……！ そんなモンまで出たのかよ！？
jpnSearchText:
ま、抹茶アイス……！
そんなモンまで出たのかよ！？

engChrName: How do you make somethin' so bitter taste like...? Ugh. Now I gotta try it...
engSearchText:
How do you make somethin' so bitter taste like...?
Ugh. Now I gotta try it...
jpnChrName: むむ、あの苦みをどうやって…… ……グッ、少しくらいなら味見を……
jpnSearchText:
むむ、あの苦みをどうやって……
……グッ、少しくらいなら味見を……

engChrName: Can we?!
engSearchText: Can we?!
jpnChrName: いいんですかっ！？
jpnSearchText: いいんですかっ！？

engChrName: ...What happened to lunch?
engSearchText: ...What happened to lunch?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、 さっきランチがあるって……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん、
さっきランチがあるって……

engChrName: I've never seen someone lose all brain function when it comes to sweets the way he does.
engSearchText:
I've never seen someone lose all brain function when
it comes to sweets the way he does.
jpnChrName: ホント甘い物好きなんだねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ホント甘い物好きなんだねぇ。

engChrName: And with saunas and cars, too. Dude's just insufferable.
engSearchText:
And with saunas and cars, too. Dude's
just insufferable.
jpnChrName: それとクルマとサウナには ウザいくらいにうるせぇぞ。
jpnSearchText:
それとクルマとサウナには
ウザいくらいにうるせぇぞ。

engChrName: If we have to wait, you have to wait!
engSearchText: If we have to wait, you have to wait!
jpnChrName: ヴァン、ガマンしなさいー。
jpnSearchText: ヴァン、ガマンしなさいー。

engChrName: We'll already be coming back here after lunch for the mantou, yes?
engSearchText:
We'll already be coming back here after lunch for the
mantou, yes?
jpnChrName: ランチをいただいた後に 改めて伺いましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ランチをいただいた後に
改めて伺いましょうか。

engChrName: Oooh!
engSearchText: Oooh!
jpnChrName: ほえ～……
jpnSearchText: ほえ～……

engChrName: Th-This place looks so fancy...
engSearchText: Th-This place looks so fancy...
jpnChrName: な、なんか豪華そうだね。
jpnSearchText: な、なんか豪華そうだね。

engChrName: Yeah, this is pretty top class.
engSearchText: Yeah, this is pretty top class.
jpnChrName: ハン…… 煌都風じゃねえが良さそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……
煌都風じゃねえが良さそうだな。

engChrName: Indeed. It has a quiet elegance and beauty to it.
engSearchText: Indeed. It has a quiet elegance and beauty to it.
jpnChrName: ふふ、侘び寂びの幽玄と 凜とした佇まいを感じます。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、侘び寂びの幽玄と
凜とした佇まいを感じます。

engChrName: I can't imagine how expensive it is to normally stay here... We're staying for free, right?
engSearchText:
I can't imagine how expensive it is to normally
stay here... We're staying for free, right?
jpnChrName: す、凄くお高いんじゃ…… ってタダなんでしたっけ。
jpnSearchText:
す、凄くお高いんじゃ……
ってタダなんでしたっけ。

engChrName: I almost feel guilty about that now...
engSearchText: I almost feel guilty about that now...
jpnChrName: うーん、なんだか 申し訳なくなっちゃいますね。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、なんだか
申し訳なくなっちゃいますね。

engChrName: Welcome. You must be Mr. Arkride and his party?
engSearchText: Welcome. You must be Mr. Arkride and his party?
jpnChrName: ようこそおいで下さいました。 アークライド様でいらっしゃいますか？
jpnSearchText:
ようこそおいで下さいました。
アークライド様でいらっしゃいますか？

engChrName: Yeah, that's right. Six adults and a child.
engSearchText: Yeah, that's right. Six adults and a child.
jpnChrName: ああ、６名プラス１名、 連絡した通りだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、６名プラス１名、
連絡した通りだ。

engChrName: We have been expecting you. Welcome to the Hekizanro Inn.
engSearchText:
We have been expecting you. Welcome to the
Hekizanro Inn.
jpnChrName: 承っております。 ようこそ、《碧山楼》へ。
jpnSearchText:
承っております。
ようこそ、《碧山楼》へ。

engChrName: We will be happy to carry your belongings to your rooms. You can have your lunch as soon as you wish after that.
engSearchText:
We will be happy to carry your belongings to
your rooms. You can have your lunch as soon as you
wish after that.
jpnChrName: お部屋まで荷物をお運び致します。 ご昼食はその後、すぐにでも。
jpnSearchText:
お部屋まで荷物をお運び致します。
ご昼食はその後、すぐにでも。

engChrName: R-Really?!
engSearchText: R-Really?!
jpnChrName: え、え、いいんですか？
jpnSearchText: え、え、いいんですか？

engChrName: Nice. Thanks, guys.
engSearchText: Nice. Thanks, guys.
jpnChrName: おーゴクロウゴクロウ。
jpnSearchText: おーゴクロウゴクロウ。

engChrName: Someone wasted no time making himself at home...
engSearchText: Someone wasted no time making himself at home...
jpnChrName: 速攻で馴染んでんじゃねえよ。
jpnSearchText: 速攻で馴染んでんじゃねえよ。

engChrName: Ahaha...
engSearchText: Ahaha...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: Whoa! This room is so nice!
engSearchText: Whoa! This room is so nice!
jpnChrName: わぁ……！ 素敵なお部屋ですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
わぁ……！
素敵なお部屋ですねぇ。

engChrName: Not so much as a spot of dust in sight, and the furnishings are rather extravagant as well.
engSearchText:
Not so much as a spot of dust in sight, and the
furnishings are rather extravagant as well.
jpnChrName: 調度品に清掃も完璧…… 流石のホスピタリティですね。
jpnSearchText:
調度品に清掃も完璧……
流石のホスピタリティですね。

engChrName: Can we share a bed, Agnès? Please?!
engSearchText: Can we share a bed, Agnès? Please?!
jpnChrName: ねーね、アニエスちゃん、 いっしょに寝てもいーい！？
jpnSearchText:
ねーね、アニエスちゃん、
いっしょに寝てもいーい！？

engChrName: Feri and Risette can sleep in our bed, too!
engSearchText: Feri and Risette can sleep in our bed, too!
jpnChrName: あ、フェリちゃんに リゼットちゃんともー！
jpnSearchText:
あ、フェリちゃんに
リゼットちゃんともー！

engChrName: Heehee. The beds do look wide enough, so I don't see the harm in that.
engSearchText:
Heehee. The beds do look wide enough, so I don't
see the harm in that.
jpnChrName: ええ、広いベッドですし、 いいですよ、ユメちゃん。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、広いベッドですし、
いいですよ、ユメちゃん。

engChrName: Maybe we could have a special samue party instead of a pajama party for the occasion, too?
engSearchText:
Maybe we could have a special samue party instead of
a pajama party for the occasion, too?
jpnChrName: 折角ですからパジャマパーティならぬ、 浴衣パーティとかしちゃいましょうか？
jpnSearchText:
折角ですからパジャマパーティならぬ、
浴衣パーティとかしちゃいましょうか？

engChrName: I don't know what that is, but I'm down!
engSearchText: I don't know what that is, but I'm down!
jpnChrName: 浴衣パーティ…… よく分かりませんけど賛成ですっ。
jpnSearchText:
浴衣パーティ……
よく分かりませんけど賛成ですっ。

engChrName: Heehee. I would be happy to join in.
engSearchText: Heehee. I would be happy to join in.
jpnChrName: ふふ、折角の機会ですし お付き合いさせていただきますね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、折角の機会ですし
お付き合いさせていただきますね。

engChrName: Uhh... So I'm with you two?
engSearchText: Uhh... So I'm with you two?
jpnChrName: え、ちょっと待って。 僕もヴァンさんたちと一緒なの？
jpnSearchText:
え、ちょっと待って。
僕もヴァンさんたちと一緒なの？

engChrName: What'd you expect? You the kinda guy who can only sleep when he's by himself?
engSearchText:
What'd you expect? You the kinda guy who can only
sleep when he's by himself?
jpnChrName: そりゃそうだが──もしかして 一人じゃないと寝られないタイプか？
jpnSearchText:
そりゃそうだが──もしかして
一人じゃないと寝られないタイプか？

engChrName: N-No, that's not it... (I should've seen this coming, honestly.)
engSearchText:
N-No, that's not it...
(I should've seen this coming, honestly.)
jpnChrName: そ、そうじゃないけど…… （……そっか、考えてみれば当然か。）
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうじゃないけど……
（……そっか、考えてみれば当然か。）

engChrName: Aww. Did wittle Quattie wanna be with the girls?
engSearchText: Aww. Did wittle Quattie wanna be with the girls?
jpnChrName: おやおや～、カトルきゅんは 小娘どもと一緒の方がいいってか？
jpnSearchText:
おやおや～、カトルきゅんは
小娘どもと一緒の方がいいってか？

engChrName: Always gotta watch out for the quiet ones, 'cause there's a hungry wolf somewhere under there, huh?
engSearchText:
Always gotta watch out for the quiet ones, 'cause
there's a hungry wolf somewhere under there, huh?
jpnChrName: いや～、ムッツリと見せかけて 肉食系だったとは驚きじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
いや～、ムッツリと見せかけて
肉食系だったとは驚きじゃねえか。

engChrName: D-Don't call me 'wittle Quattie' ever again! And I'm not a wolf!
engSearchText:
D-Don't call me 'wittle Quattie' ever again! And I'm
not a wolf!
jpnChrName: カ、カトルきゅん言うな！ あとムッツリでも肉食系でもないから！
jpnSearchText:
カ、カトルきゅん言うな！
あとムッツリでも肉食系でもないから！

engChrName: *sigh* ...Whatever. I'm fine with this arrangement.
engSearchText: *sigh* ...Whatever. I'm fine with this arrangement.
jpnChrName: ………はあ、 もう相部屋でいいけどさ。
jpnSearchText:
………はあ、
もう相部屋でいいけどさ。

engChrName: I'll try not to snore. Anyway, who's up for lunch?
engSearchText: I'll try not to snore. Anyway, who's up for lunch?
jpnChrName: 精々イビキには気をつけるぜ。 ──そんじゃあ、昼メシにすっか。
jpnSearchText:
精々イビキには気をつけるぜ。
──そんじゃあ、昼メシにすっか。

engChrName: Oh, man... I don't think my taste buds have EVER been this happy.
engSearchText:
Oh, man... I don't think my taste buds have EVER
been this happy.
jpnChrName: なんだこりゃ…… ………美味すぎんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
なんだこりゃ……
………美味すぎんだろ。

engChrName: My mouth is bursting with flavor!
engSearchText: My mouth is bursting with flavor!
jpnChrName: な、なんかじゅわーっと、 口の中に美味しさが溢れてっ……！
jpnSearchText:
な、なんかじゅわーっと、
口の中に美味しさが溢れてっ……！

engChrName: It's called 'mitao menji.' It's a local dish here in Longlai.
engSearchText:
It's called 'mitao menji.' It's a local dish here
in Longlai.
jpnChrName: 《蜜桃燜鶏（ミータオメンジー）》…… 龍來の郷土料理だそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
《蜜桃燜鶏（ミータオメンジー）》……
龍來の郷土料理だそうですね。

engChrName: The chicken is soaked in peach alcohol before being stir-fried and served in a garlic and soy sauce. Whoever thought of this is a genius!
engSearchText:
The chicken is soaked in peach alcohol before being
stir-fried and served in a garlic and soy sauce.
Whoever thought of this is a genius!
jpnChrName: 水蜜桃のお酒に漬け込んだ鶏肉を炒めて ニンニク醤油ダレで食べさせるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
水蜜桃のお酒に漬け込んだ鶏肉を炒めて
ニンニク醤油ダレで食べさせるなんて……

engChrName: The chicken's so tender, and it's got that sweet peach quality to it you can't resist.
engSearchText:
The chicken's so tender, and it's got that sweet peach
quality to it you can't resist.
jpnChrName: 柔らかい鶏肉と桃の風味……
jpnSearchText: 柔らかい鶏肉と桃の風味……

engChrName: The flavor's distinctive enough while still being subtle. I'd call it a perfect blend of sweetness, fragrance, and juiciness.
engSearchText:
The flavor's distinctive enough while still
being subtle. I'd call it a perfect blend of sweetness,
fragrance, and juiciness.
jpnChrName: 味付けは濃厚ながらさっぱりしていて 甘みと旨みと香ばしさが味わえる……
jpnSearchText:
味付けは濃厚ながらさっぱりしていて
甘みと旨みと香ばしさが味わえる……

engChrName: The chef here must be a real pro.
engSearchText: The chef here must be a real pro.
jpnChrName: ま、厨師長（ちゅうしちょう）の腕あってだろうな。
jpnSearchText: ま、厨師長（ちゅうしちょう）の腕あってだろうな。

engChrName: The zongzi is sooo good!
engSearchText: The zongzi is sooo good!
jpnChrName: このチマキ、おいしー！
jpnSearchText: このチマキ、おいしー！

engChrName: Careful—it's also getting all over you.
engSearchText: Careful—it's also getting all over you.
jpnChrName: ああ、こぼしてるよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、こぼしてるよ。

engChrName: That was AMAZING!
engSearchText: That was AMAZING!
jpnChrName: んー、おいしかったー！
jpnSearchText: んー、おいしかったー！

engChrName: Yeah. My mouth is in heaven right now!
engSearchText: Yeah. My mouth is in heaven right now!
jpnChrName: うんうんっ！ はあ、口の中が幸せです～……
jpnSearchText:
うんうんっ！
はあ、口の中が幸せです～……

engChrName: And it sounds like whatever they have in store for dinner tonight is going to be even better.
engSearchText:
And it sounds like whatever they have in store for
dinner tonight is going to be even better.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、この分だと 夜はもっと凄そうだね？
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、この分だと
夜はもっと凄そうだね？

engChrName: It's going to be a traditional Eastern kaiseki meal served in courses.
engSearchText:
It's going to be a traditional Eastern kaiseki meal
served in courses.
jpnChrName: 夕食は郷土料理ではなく、 東方懐石になるようですね。
jpnSearchText:
夕食は郷土料理ではなく、
東方懐石になるようですね。

engChrName: ...'Kaiseki'?
engSearchText: ...'Kaiseki'?
jpnChrName: カイセキ……？
jpnSearchText: カイセキ……？

engChrName: What's that?
engSearchText: What's that?
jpnChrName: なにそれー？
jpnSearchText: なにそれー？

engChrName: It's kinda one of those pretentious meals that're all about presentation—though in this case, I'm sure the Eastern cuisine's as good as it looks.
engSearchText:
It's kinda one of those pretentious meals that're all
about presentation—though in this case, I'm sure the
Eastern cuisine's as good as it looks.
jpnChrName: ま、ちょいと気取った感じだな。 ここのは文句ナシに美味いだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ちょいと気取った感じだな。
ここのは文句ナシに美味いだろうが。

engChrName: It's more of a Far Eastern thing than what I'm used to.
engSearchText: It's more of a Far Eastern thing than what I'm used to.
jpnChrName: ああ、東方は東方でも 極東あたりのスタイルらしいな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、東方は東方でも
極東あたりのスタイルらしいな。

engChrName: Something I've noticed, by the way, but how do you know so much about everything here, Van?
engSearchText:
Something I've noticed, by the way, but how do you
know so much about everything here, Van?
jpnChrName: しかしヴァン── イチイチ詳しすぎるじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
しかしヴァン──
イチイチ詳しすぎるじゃねえか？

engChrName: Hmm?
engSearchText: Hmm?

engChrName: I was wondering the same thing, actually. This isn't the first time you've showed us around somewhere...
engSearchText:
I was wondering the same thing, actually. This isn't
the first time you've showed us around somewhere...
jpnChrName: 確かに、これまでも色々な街を 案内してもらっていますけど。
jpnSearchText:
確かに、これまでも色々な街を
案内してもらっていますけど。

engChrName: ...but it feels like you know this place far too well to have just come here for work.
engSearchText:
...but it feels like you know this place far too well to
have just come here for work.
jpnChrName: 仕事で来たことがある以上に 馴染んでいるような気が……
jpnSearchText:
仕事で来たことがある以上に
馴染んでいるような気が……

engChrName: Heh. I was hopin' you wouldn't pick up on that.
engSearchText: Heh. I was hopin' you wouldn't pick up on that.
jpnChrName: あー……
jpnSearchText: あー……

engChrName: I lived here a few years back.
engSearchText: I lived here a few years back.
jpnChrName: 前に、この町で少しばかり 暮らしていたことがあってな。
jpnSearchText:
前に、この町で少しばかり
暮らしていたことがあってな。

engChrName: Really?
engSearchText: Really?
jpnChrName: へえ……そうなんだ？
jpnSearchText: へえ……そうなんだ？

engChrName: When was that?
engSearchText: When was that?
jpnChrName: えと、いつ頃なんですか？
jpnSearchText: えと、いつ頃なんですか？

engChrName: When I was nineteen, for about half a year.
engSearchText: When I was nineteen, for about half a year.
jpnChrName: １９の時に半年くらいだ。
jpnSearchText: １９の時に半年くらいだ。

engChrName: It was more for training than for fun, though.
engSearchText: It was more for training than for fun, though.
jpnChrName: ま、遊びっていうより 修行みたいなモンだったが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、遊びっていうより
修行みたいなモンだったが。

engChrName: That explains it, then.
engSearchText: That explains it, then.
jpnChrName: そうだったんですね……
jpnSearchText: そうだったんですね……

engChrName: (I suppose that must have been a while after he separated from Elaine and Mr. Kincaid?)
engSearchText:
(I suppose that must have been a while after he
separated from Elaine and Mr. Kincaid?)
jpnChrName: （……エレインさんたちと離れて   しばらくしてからでしょうか……？）
jpnSearchText:
（……エレインさんたちと離れて
しばらくしてからでしょうか……？）

engChrName: So back when you were my age, huh? Hard to believe your memory's still sharp enough to remember what happened over a decade ago.
engSearchText:
So back when you were my age, huh? Hard to believe
your memory's still sharp enough to remember what
happened over a decade ago.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、俺と同じくらいの時か。 すると１０年くらい前みてぇだな。
jpnSearchText:
ヘッ、俺と同じくらいの時か。
すると１０年くらい前みてぇだな。

engChrName: It was only five years ago, damn it!
engSearchText: It was only five years ago, damn it!
jpnChrName: ５年前だ、５年前！ 俺はまだ２４だっつーの！
jpnSearchText:
５年前だ、５年前！
俺はまだ２４だっつーの！

engChrName: ...But yeah, I should be able to play tour guide for you guys just fine.
engSearchText:
...But yeah, I should be able to play tour guide for you
guys just fine.
jpnChrName: ──そんなわけで少しなら 町も案内してやれると思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
──そんなわけで少しなら
町も案内してやれると思うぜ。

engChrName: Anyway, like I said earlier, we're gonna split up for two hours.
engSearchText:
Anyway, like I said earlier, we're gonna split up for
two hours.
jpnChrName: 話した通り２時間ほど自由行動だ。
jpnSearchText: 話した通り２時間ほど自由行動だ。

engChrName: Go ahead and sightsee, go for a stroll, grab something else to eat... The guidebook we got from the inn should help you around.
engSearchText:
Go ahead and sightsee, go for a stroll, grab something
else to eat... The guidebook we got from the inn
should help you around.
jpnChrName: 観光に散策に買い食い──宿に貰った ガイドがあれば面倒はねぇだろ。
jpnSearchText:
観光に散策に買い食い──宿に貰った
ガイドがあれば面倒はねぇだろ。

engChrName: Try and avoid goin' around alone, though—especially you, Yumes. You always gotta be with someone.
engSearchText:
Try and avoid goin' around alone, though—especially
you, Yumes. You always gotta be with someone.
jpnChrName: なるべく２人以上で回るといい。 ──当然ユメ坊は一人は禁止だからな。
jpnSearchText:
なるべく２人以上で回るといい。
──当然ユメ坊は一人は禁止だからな。

engChrName: Aye, aye, sir!
engSearchText: Aye, aye, sir!
jpnChrName: らじゃー！
jpnSearchText: らじゃー！

engChrName: If there's anything you would like to see, I would be happy to accompany you.
engSearchText:
If there's anything you would like to see, I would be
happy to accompany you.
jpnChrName: 気になるところがあれば 一緒に行きましょうか、ユメ様。
jpnSearchText:
気になるところがあれば
一緒に行きましょうか、ユメ様。

engChrName: There's so much I want to check out, I don't know where to start... What did you have in mind, Agnès?
engSearchText:
There's so much I want to check out, I don't know
where to start... What did you have in mind, Agnès?
jpnChrName: えと、どれも気になるし…… アニエスさんは何処に行きますっ？
jpnSearchText:
えと、どれも気になるし……
アニエスさんは何処に行きますっ？

engChrName: Hmm... I know I want to see the temple, but I'm not sure whether or not to go there first.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I know I want to see the temple, but I'm not
sure whether or not to go there first.
jpnChrName: うーん、そうですねぇ。 東方寺院もよさそうですし……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、そうですねぇ。
東方寺院もよさそうですし……

engChrName: Drink, play, and buy is my gameplan! There's gotta be a spot for mahjong here, right?
engSearchText:
Drink, play, and buy is my gameplan! There's gotta
be a spot for mahjong here, right?
jpnChrName: まずは飲む打つ買うだな！ 龍雀（ロンジャン）の賭場とかねぇのかよ。
jpnSearchText:
まずは飲む打つ買うだな！
龍雀（ロンジャン）の賭場とかねぇのかよ。

engChrName: Even if there is, it's not going to be in any tour guide...
engSearchText:
Even if there is, it's not going to be in any
tour guide...
jpnChrName: あったとしても町案内には 載ってないんじゃないかなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
あったとしても町案内には
載ってないんじゃないかなぁ……

engChrName: (I guess I should help 'em around some before they get themselves in trouble.)
engSearchText:
(I guess I should help 'em around some before they
get themselves in trouble.)
jpnChrName: （ま、仕方ねぇから   昼間はこいつらの面倒を見るか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、仕方ねぇから
昼間はこいつらの面倒を見るか。）

engChrName: Select two additional members to accompany Van. They can be swapped out later using the computer in the room.
engSearchText:
Select two additional members to accompany Van.
They can be swapped out later using the computer in
the room.
jpnChrName: 同行メンバーを２名選んでください。 ※宿の部屋に置いてある端末から、いつでも変更可能です。
jpnSearchText:
同行メンバーを２名選んでください。
※宿の部屋に置いてある端末から、いつでも変更可能です。

engChrName: I wonder if word got out around the town that we're here.
engSearchText:
I wonder if word got out around the town that
we're here.
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンさんが来たという 情報が広まったんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
……ヴァンさんが来たという
情報が広まったんでしょうか？

engChrName: Or maybe one of the three people who sent us the tickets arranged for this?
engSearchText:
Or maybe one of the three people who sent us the
tickets arranged for this?
jpnChrName: もしくはチケットを贈った ３人の誰かが段取ったってか？
jpnSearchText:
もしくはチケットを贈った
３人の誰かが段取ったってか？

engChrName: Someone famous from Heiyue, Elsaim's crown prince, and Professor Hamilton, right?
engSearchText:
Someone famous from Heiyue, Elsaim's crown
prince, and Professor Hamilton, right?
jpnChrName: 黒月の偉い人に、エルザイムの公太子に ハミルトン博士だっけ……
jpnSearchText:
黒月の偉い人に、エルザイムの公太子に
ハミルトン博士だっけ……

engChrName: At the very least, I can't imagine Professor Hamilton would do this without saying something.
engSearchText:
At the very least, I can't imagine Professor Hamilton
would do this without saying something.
jpnChrName: 少なくとも博士は黙って そんなことはしないと思うけど。
jpnSearchText:
少なくとも博士は黙って
そんなことはしないと思うけど。

engChrName: The other two don't seem like people who would take such a roundabout approach, either.
engSearchText:
The other two don't seem like people who would take
such a roundabout approach, either.
jpnChrName: 他のお二人にしてもこのような 迂遠な事はなされない印象ですね。
jpnSearchText:
他のお二人にしてもこのような
迂遠な事はなされない印象ですね。

engChrName: What're you talking about? Work?
engSearchText: What're you talking about? Work?
jpnChrName: ？？？ なになに、おシゴトのハナシ～？
jpnSearchText:
？？？
なになに、おシゴトのハナシ～？

engChrName: Sorry for excluding you, Yumé. What does the note say?
engSearchText:
Sorry for excluding you, Yumé. What does the
note say?
jpnChrName: ごめんね、ユメちゃん。 ──それでメモにはなんと？
jpnSearchText:
ごめんね、ユメちゃん。
──それでメモにはなんと？

engChrName: Sounds like one of the residents has got a problem they need help with.
engSearchText:
Sounds like one of the residents has got a problem
they need help with.
jpnChrName: ああ、どうやら龍來の住民で ちょいと困ってるみてぇだな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、どうやら龍來の住民で
ちょいと困ってるみてぇだな。

engChrName: They say it's not somethin' they can ask the guild or the police about, either.
engSearchText:
They say it's not somethin' they can ask the guild or
the police about, either.
jpnChrName: 交番にもギルドにも 相談しにくい“人助け”らしいが。
jpnSearchText:
交番にもギルドにも
相談しにくい“人助け”らしいが。

engChrName: Well, good thing we're here to help, then.
engSearchText: Well, good thing we're here to help, then.
jpnChrName: 一応、条件には 合っているみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
一応、条件には
合っているみたいですね。

engChrName: They wanna meet under the maple tree in front of the Hekizanro Inn of all places, too.
engSearchText:
They wanna meet under the maple tree in front of the
Hekizanro Inn of all places, too.
jpnChrName: しかも《碧山楼》前にある紅葉（もみじ）を 待ち合わせに指定してやがる。
jpnSearchText:
しかも《碧山楼》前にある紅葉（もみじ）を
待ち合わせに指定してやがる。

engChrName: ...So they're the people he mentioned.
engSearchText: ...So they're the people he mentioned.
jpnChrName: ……あれが閣下の仰っていた連中か。
jpnSearchText: ……あれが閣下の仰っていた連中か。

engChrName: My sister's brought them up, too, but I'm not sure they're worth trusting.
engSearchText:
My sister's brought them up, too, but I'm not sure
they're worth trusting.
jpnChrName: 姉さんからも聞いているが 本当に頼りになるのか……？
jpnSearchText:
姉さんからも聞いているが
本当に頼りになるのか……？
……………………………

engChrName: Guess I'll sit back and see what they're about for now.
engSearchText:
Guess I'll sit back and see what they're about
for now.
jpnChrName: まずはお手並み拝見と行こうか。
jpnSearchText: まずはお手並み拝見と行こうか。

engChrName: And if they come up short, well—out the door they go.
engSearchText:
And if they come up short, well—out the door
they go.
jpnChrName: 場合によったら“お引き取り”を 願う可能性もありそうだからな。
jpnSearchText:
場合によったら“お引き取り”を
願う可能性もありそうだからな。

engChrName: Oh! Hello there...
engSearchText: Oh! Hello there...
jpnChrName: あっ、アンタたち……
jpnSearchText: あっ、アンタたち……

engChrName: Senri!
engSearchText: Senri!
jpnChrName: あ、センリだー！
jpnSearchText: あ、センリだー！

engChrName: Man, you're just a bundle of energy, huh?
engSearchText: Man, you're just a bundle of energy, huh?
jpnChrName: ほんと元気なチビだなぁ。 子供連れだからまさかと思ったけど。
jpnSearchText:
ほんと元気なチビだなぁ。
子供連れだからまさかと思ったけど。

engChrName: I can't tell since you've got her with you, but did you come because of my note?
engSearchText:
I can't tell since you've got her with you, but did you
come because of my note?
jpnChrName: “メモ”を見て来てくれたのか？
jpnSearchText: “メモ”を見て来てくれたのか？

engChrName: Huh? You're so little!
engSearchText: Huh? You're so little!
jpnChrName: あれー、コドモがいる？
jpnSearchText: あれー、コドモがいる？

engChrName: Y-You're even littler than I am! Umm... I really didn't think you'd have a child with you...
engSearchText:
Y-You're even littler than I am! Umm... I really didn't
think you'd have a child with you...
jpnChrName: じ、自分の方がコドモだろ？ ……って子供連れは流石に……
jpnSearchText:
じ、自分の方がコドモだろ？
……って子供連れは流石に……

engChrName: So did you come because of my note?
engSearchText: So did you come because of my note?
jpnChrName: その…… “メモ”を見て来てくれたのか？
jpnSearchText:
その……
“メモ”を見て来てくれたのか？

engChrName: This, right? Yeah.
engSearchText: This, right? Yeah.
jpnChrName: ああ、コイツだろ？
jpnSearchText: ああ、コイツだろ？

engChrName: What a relief! There was a rumor about you guys making the rounds yesterday, but I wasn't sure whether to believe it or not.
engSearchText:
What a relief! There was a rumor about you guys
making the rounds yesterday, but I wasn't sure
whether to believe it or not.
jpnChrName: よかった……昨日あたりから 変な噂が流れてたんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
よかった……昨日あたりから
変な噂が流れてたんだけど。

engChrName: So you're the spriggan from the capital, right?
engSearchText: So you're the spriggan from the capital, right?
jpnChrName: やっぱりアンタらが首都から来た 《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》ってヤツなんだな？
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりアンタらが首都から来た
《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》ってヤツなんだな？

engChrName: That's me... What's this about a rumor, though?
engSearchText: That's me... What's this about a rumor, though?
jpnChrName: 否定はしねぇが…… ちなみに、その噂ってのはなんだ？
jpnSearchText:
否定はしねぇが……
ちなみに、その噂ってのはなんだ？

engChrName: I dunno where it came from, but I heard it through the tourism bureau, the guys at the station, and around the stalls.
engSearchText:
I dunno where it came from, but I heard it through
the tourism bureau, the guys at the station, and
around the stalls.
jpnChrName: ああ、観光協会や駅員、 屋台あたりで流れてたんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、観光協会や駅員、
屋台あたりで流れてたんだけど。

engChrName: Word was that some people who help with things the police and guild won't touch were going to be staying here.
engSearchText:
Word was that some people who help with things the
police and guild won't touch were going to be
staying here.
jpnChrName: 交番にもギルドにも相談できない依頼を 引き受けてくれる連中が滞在するって。
jpnSearchText:
交番にもギルドにも相談できない依頼を
引き受けてくれる連中が滞在するって。

engChrName: I don't think anyone else actually believed it, though.
engSearchText: I don't think anyone else actually believed it, though.
jpnChrName: 眉唾な話だったから大人たちは 誰も信じていない感じだったけど。
jpnSearchText:
眉唾な話だったから大人たちは
誰も信じていない感じだったけど。

engChrName: Can't say I blame them.
engSearchText: Can't say I blame them.
jpnChrName: ま、そりゃそうだろ。
jpnSearchText: ま、そりゃそうだろ。

engChrName: I wonder where it originated from... It couldn't have come from the guild.
engSearchText:
I wonder where it originated from... It couldn't have
come from the guild.
jpnChrName: ……誰の情報でしょうか？ ギルドでもなさそうですし。
jpnSearchText:
……誰の情報でしょうか？
ギルドでもなさそうですし。

engChrName: So why did you believe it?
engSearchText: So why did you believe it?
jpnChrName: でも貴方は、その噂を信じて こうして頼ってくれたんですね？
jpnSearchText:
でも貴方は、その噂を信じて
こうして頼ってくれたんですね？

engChrName: I don't know if I'd call it believing as much as I was just out of other options.
engSearchText:
I don't know if I'd call it believing as much as I was
just out of other options.
jpnChrName: うん……ダメ元だけど。
jpnSearchText: うん……ダメ元だけど。

engChrName: Can I tell you more about what I want help with, then?
engSearchText:
Can I tell you more about what I want help
with, then?
jpnChrName: ──とりあえず話、 聞いてくんないかな？
jpnSearchText:
──とりあえず話、
聞いてくんないかな？

engChrName: Sure. I can't promise we can help, but we're happy to hear you out.
engSearchText:
Sure. I can't promise we can help, but we're happy to
hear you out.
jpnChrName: いいぜ、受けるかどうかまでは 約束できねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
いいぜ、受けるかどうかまでは
約束できねぇが。

engChrName: So one of the visitors to the springs went to a waterfall that's meant to be closed off, huh?
engSearchText:
So one of the visitors to the springs went to a
waterfall that's meant to be closed off, huh?
jpnChrName: ……湯治客が一人、 通行止めの“滝”に行ったのか。
jpnSearchText:
……湯治客が一人、
通行止めの“滝”に行ったのか。

engChrName: Yeah. She came to Longlai three days ago.
engSearchText: Yeah. She came to Longlai three days ago.
jpnChrName: うん……３日前から 龍來に滞在しているヒトでさ。
jpnSearchText:
うん……３日前から
龍來に滞在しているヒトでさ。

engChrName: She asked if I knew anywhere that was good for 'forgetting your worldly woes.'
engSearchText:
She asked if I knew anywhere that was good for
'forgetting your worldly woes.'
jpnChrName: “浮世を忘れられる景色のいい場所”を 探してるなんて言ってて……
jpnSearchText:
“浮世を忘れられる景色のいい場所”を
探してるなんて言ってて……

engChrName: Without really thinking, I mentioned the Longlai Pubu.
engSearchText:
Without really thinking, I mentioned the
Longlai Pubu.
jpnChrName: オレ、『なら龍來（ロンライ）瀑布（ばくふ）かなぁ』なんて つい言っちゃったんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
オレ、『なら龍來（ロンライ）瀑布（ばくふ）かなぁ』なんて
つい言っちゃったんだよ。

engChrName: What does 'pubu' mean?
engSearchText: What does 'pubu' mean?
jpnChrName: 龍來瀑布（ばくふ）……
jpnSearchText: 龍來瀑布（ばくふ）……

engChrName: It means 'waterfall.' So 'Longlai Falls,' pretty much.
engSearchText: It means 'waterfall.' So 'Longlai Falls,' pretty much.
jpnChrName: 瀑布ってのは東方の言葉で “滝”の別名だな。
jpnSearchText:
瀑布ってのは東方の言葉で
“滝”の別名だな。

engChrName: That some kinda tourist destination, then?
engSearchText: That some kinda tourist destination, then?
jpnChrName: 観光名所かなんかかよ？
jpnSearchText: 観光名所かなんかかよ？

engChrName: Yeah. It's a real sight to see, too, with a huge white waterfall raining down from far above you.
engSearchText:
Yeah. It's a real sight to see, too, with a huge white
waterfall raining down from far above you.
jpnChrName: うん、白い滝が高い所から落ちる、 結構見応えがある名所だよ。
jpnSearchText:
うん、白い滝が高い所から落ちる、
結構見応えがある名所だよ。

engChrName: Plenty of people come here to see it, so there are usually tours around the spot.
engSearchText:
Plenty of people come here to see it, so there are
usually tours around the spot.
jpnChrName: もちろん人気で、ツアーなんかも 普段だったら組まれてるんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
もちろん人気で、ツアーなんかも
普段だったら組まれてるんだけど……

engChrName: But four days ago, a big tree fell across the path to the falls.
engSearchText:
But four days ago, a big tree fell across the path to
the falls.
jpnChrName: ４日前に、瀑布への道が 大きな倒木で塞がれちゃってさ。
jpnSearchText:
４日前に、瀑布への道が
大きな倒木で塞がれちゃってさ。

engChrName: We're getting someone to remove it right now, but until then, it's stuck there.
engSearchText:
We're getting someone to remove it right now, but
until then, it's stuck there.
jpnChrName: 今、業者を手配してる最中なんだ。
jpnSearchText: 今、業者を手配してる最中なんだ。

engChrName: I see... Do you have any idea why she might've gone over to the falls anyway?
engSearchText:
I see... Do you have any idea why she might've gone
over to the falls anyway?
jpnChrName: 成程……でもどうしてその客が そちらへ行ったって思うんだい？
jpnSearchText:
成程……でもどうしてその客が
そちらへ行ったって思うんだい？

engChrName: I really don't. I mentioned the tree and that there were monsters in the area, but she just shrugged it off.
engSearchText:
I really don't. I mentioned the tree and that there
were monsters in the area, but she just shrugged it off.
jpnChrName: えっと、倒木に塞がれてる話と 魔獣も出るって話はしたんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
えっと、倒木に塞がれてる話と
魔獣も出るって話はしたんだけど……

engChrName: She just mumbled something to herself about them not being a big deal.
engSearchText:
She just mumbled something to herself about them
not being a big deal.
jpnChrName: 『そのくらいなら……』とか 呟いてるのが聞こえちゃったんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
『そのくらいなら……』とか
呟いてるのが聞こえちゃったんだよね。

engChrName: Usually bracers join the tours to keep people safe. You're not supposed to go on your own.
engSearchText:
Usually bracers join the tours to keep people safe.
You're not supposed to go on your own.
jpnChrName: ──道が通ってツアーが復活すれば 遊撃士なんかも護衛に出てくれるし……
jpnSearchText:
──道が通ってツアーが復活すれば
遊撃士なんかも護衛に出てくれるし……

engChrName: I tried to make it clear to her that she really shouldn't go near it, and she SAID she wouldn't, but...
engSearchText:
I tried to make it clear to her that she really shouldn't
go near it, and she SAID she wouldn't, but...
jpnChrName: 絶対に一人で行っちゃダメだって しつこく念を押したんだけどさ……
jpnSearchText:
絶対に一人で行っちゃダメだって
しつこく念を押したんだけどさ……

engChrName: But you think she was plannin' to the whole time and just wanted you off her case?
engSearchText:
But you think she was plannin' to the whole time and
just wanted you off her case?
jpnChrName: 口では頷きながらも自信満々で いかにも行きそうな感じだったわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
口では頷きながらも自信満々で
いかにも行きそうな感じだったわけだ。

engChrName: Basically, yeah.
engSearchText: Basically, yeah.
jpnChrName: そーいうこと。
jpnSearchText: そーいうこと。

engChrName: I haven't seen her anywhere around town today, even though she's supposed to still be here.
engSearchText:
I haven't seen her anywhere around town today, even
though she's supposed to still be here.
jpnChrName: ……まだ龍來にいるはずなのに 朝から町の中で姿が見えないしさ。
jpnSearchText:
……まだ龍來にいるはずなのに
朝から町の中で姿が見えないしさ。

engChrName: Still, everything you've said so far makes this sound like the perfect job for us in particular.
engSearchText:
Still, everything you've said so far makes this sound
like the perfect job for us in particular.
jpnChrName: ですが話がそれだけであれば 警察やギルドに相談されていた筈……
jpnSearchText:
ですが話がそれだけであれば
警察やギルドに相談されていた筈……

engChrName: Did you have any specific reason for not bringing it to the police or guild?
engSearchText:
Did you have any specific reason for not bringing it to
the police or guild?
jpnChrName: 出来ない理由があったのですね？
jpnSearchText: 出来ない理由があったのですね？

engChrName: Well...see, she's staying at the Hekizanro Inn like you guys.
engSearchText:
Well...see, she's staying at the Hekizanro Inn
like you guys.
jpnChrName: う、うん……《碧山楼》に 泊まっている女のヒトなんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
う、うん……《碧山楼》に
泊まっている女のヒトなんだけど。

engChrName: But it seems like she doesn't want anyone to know she's here—or even who she is.
engSearchText:
But it seems like she doesn't want anyone to know
she's here—or even who she is.
jpnChrName: “お忍び”っていうの？ なんかそれのために来たらしくて。
jpnSearchText:
“お忍び”っていうの？
なんかそれのために来たらしくて。

engChrName: Still, I worked out her identity pretty fast, but then she asked me to keep it secret.
engSearchText:
Still, I worked out her identity pretty fast, but then
she asked me to keep it secret.
jpnChrName: オレが正体に気付いたら “黙ってて”なんて頼まれちゃって……
jpnSearchText:
オレが正体に気付いたら
“黙ってて”なんて頼まれちゃって……

engChrName: So because of that, I don't really want to make a big scene out of this. I think asking them would do the opposite.
engSearchText:
So because of that, I don't really want to make a big
scene out of this. I think asking them would do
the opposite.
jpnChrName: あんまり大事にしたくないみたいだし 交番とかに相談するのも気が引けてさ。
jpnSearchText:
あんまり大事にしたくないみたいだし
交番とかに相談するのも気が引けてさ。

engChrName: ...Hmm?
engSearchText: ...Hmm?
jpnChrName: ？　あれ……
jpnSearchText: ？　あれ……

engChrName: Th-This all sounds strangely familiar...
engSearchText: Th-This all sounds strangely familiar...
jpnChrName: そ、それって……
jpnSearchText: そ、それって……

engChrName: Yeah...
engSearchText: Yeah...
jpnChrName: ……なんか聞いたことが あるようなシチュエーションだね。
jpnSearchText:
……なんか聞いたことが
あるようなシチュエーションだね。

engChrName: Heh. Now that's a funny coincidence.
engSearchText: Heh. Now that's a funny coincidence.
jpnChrName: ったく、どんな偶然だっつーの。
jpnSearchText: ったく、どんな偶然だっつーの。

engChrName: Okay, got it. So you just want us to go find her and bring her back, right?
engSearchText:
Okay, got it. So you just want us to go find her and
bring her back, right?
jpnChrName: ──話は分かった。 要はその客を連れ戻せって事か。
jpnSearchText:
──話は分かった。
要はその客を連れ戻せって事か。

engChrName: You got enough to pay us, by the way? The guild might work for free sometimes, but we don't.
engSearchText:
You got enough to pay us, by the way? The guild
might work for free sometimes, but we don't.
jpnChrName: で、依頼料はどうする？ ギルドと違ってタダじゃねえぞ？
jpnSearchText:
で、依頼料はどうする？
ギルドと違ってタダじゃねえぞ？

engChrName: O-Of course! She gave me a good amount when I showed her around on her first day here, so I can definitely pay you.
engSearchText:
O-Of course! She gave me a good amount when I
showed her around on her first day here, so I can
definitely pay you.
jpnChrName: ひ、必要だったらちゃんと払うよ！ 初日その人を案内して結構貰ったし。
jpnSearchText:
ひ、必要だったらちゃんと払うよ！
初日その人を案内して結構貰ったし。

engChrName: Erm... You charge a thousand mira an hour, right?
engSearchText: Erm... You charge a thousand mira an hour, right?
jpnChrName: えっと、一時間千ミラだっけ？
jpnSearchText: えっと、一時間千ミラだっけ？

engChrName: ...How did even our hourly rate get out? But yeah— that and any necessary expenses.
engSearchText:
...How did even our hourly rate get out? But yeah—
that and any necessary expenses.
jpnChrName: 基本料まで流れてんのか…… それに諸々足されはするがな。
jpnSearchText:
基本料まで流れてんのか……
それに諸々足されはするがな。

engChrName: That said, this job's about bringing someone home safe, so assumin' she's still alive, you could always ask her to pony up.
engSearchText:
That said, this job's about bringing someone home
safe, so assumin' she's still alive, you could always ask
her to pony up.
jpnChrName: ま、今回については対象者の安全だし、 生きてりゃ本人に請求できんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、今回については対象者の安全だし、
生きてりゃ本人に請求できんだろ。

engChrName: It might not be who we think it is, but we'll soon find out either way.
engSearchText:
It might not be who we think it is, but we'll soon find
out either way.
jpnChrName: クク、まあ人違いかもしれねぇが、 とっとと行ってみるか。
jpnSearchText:
クク、まあ人違いかもしれねぇが、
とっとと行ってみるか。

engChrName: I'm so glad you're willing to help! The exit that leads to the falls is over there.
engSearchText:
I'm so glad you're willing to help! The exit that leads
to the falls is over there.
jpnChrName: よかった……瀑布への道は そこを出た先にあるからさ！
jpnSearchText:
よかった……瀑布への道は
そこを出た先にあるからさ！

engChrName: Just follow the path and you'll eventually get there. I can't see you getting lost, but do you want me to come with you just in case?
engSearchText:
Just follow the path and you'll eventually get there.
I can't see you getting lost, but do you want me to
come with you just in case?
jpnChrName: 真っ直ぐだから迷わないと思うけど 何だったらオレも案内するかい？
jpnSearchText:
真っ直ぐだから迷わないと思うけど
何だったらオレも案内するかい？

engChrName: Nah, I'm sure we'll be fine. Stay here where it's safe.
engSearchText: Nah, I'm sure we'll be fine. Stay here where it's safe.
jpnChrName: ううん、大丈夫。 あなたはここで待ってて。
jpnSearchText:
ううん、大丈夫。
あなたはここで待ってて。

engChrName: That goes for Yumé, too, of course.
engSearchText: That goes for Yumé, too, of course.
jpnChrName: 当然、ユメちゃんもですね。
jpnSearchText: 当然、ユメちゃんもですね。

engChrName: Huh? Are you going somewhere?
engSearchText: Huh? Are you going somewhere?
jpnChrName: んー？ ヴァンたちどこか行くのー？
jpnSearchText:
んー？
ヴァンたちどこか行くのー？

engChrName: Just on a dangerous picnic. Stay here with him, okay?
engSearchText: Just on a dangerous picnic. Stay here with him, okay?
jpnChrName: ちょいと危険なピクニックにな。 このボウズと留守番しててくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ちょいと危険なピクニックにな。
このボウズと留守番しててくれ。

engChrName: And I think someone else should stay here so you can contact us if anything happens.
engSearchText:
And I think someone else should stay here so you can
contact us if anything happens.
jpnChrName: それと、誰か一人は連絡役として 待機してもらうか。
jpnSearchText:
それと、誰か一人は連絡役として
待機してもらうか。

engChrName: Perhaps myself, Ms. Claudel, or Mr. Salision would be an appropriate choice, then.
engSearchText:
Perhaps myself, Ms. Claudel, or Mr. Salision would
be an appropriate choice, then.
jpnChrName: でしたらわたくしかアニエス様、 カトル様の一人が残るべきかと。
jpnSearchText:
でしたらわたくしかアニエス様、
カトル様の一人が残るべきかと。

engChrName: We can work on gathering information from the orbal network while we're here.
engSearchText:
We can work on gathering information from the
orbal network while we're here.
jpnChrName: 導力ネット経由の情報収集も 同時並行で進められそうですので。
jpnSearchText:
導力ネット経由の情報収集も
同時並行で進められそうですので。

engChrName: That's true. We could also see if the police and guild know anything that could help us.
engSearchText:
That's true. We could also see if the police and guild
know anything that could help us.
jpnChrName: そうですね、警察やギルド方面に 問い合わせてもいいかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、警察やギルド方面に
問い合わせてもいいかもしれません。

engChrName: That all sounds good to me.
engSearchText: That all sounds good to me.
jpnChrName: うん、ここを中継地にすれば 捜索班にも連絡できそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
うん、ここを中継地にすれば
捜索班にも連絡できそうだ。

engChrName: I've got FIO and XEROS, too, though, so I think I could be a big help in the search if need be.
engSearchText:
I've got FIO and XEROS, too, though, so I think I
could be a big help in the search if need be.
jpnChrName: ま、ＦＩＯたちは連れてきたから 僕を捜索で頼ってくれてもいいけど。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ＦＩＯたちは連れてきたから
僕を捜索で頼ってくれてもいいけど。

engChrName: Then we should head out as soon as we're ready!
engSearchText: Then we should head out as soon as we're ready!
jpnChrName: では、準備ができしだい、 こちらから山道に出ましょう！
jpnSearchText:
では、準備ができしだい、
こちらから山道に出ましょう！

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: おーっ！
jpnSearchText: おーっ！

engChrName: You're staying here!
engSearchText: You're staying here!
jpnChrName: オメーはお留守番だっての。
jpnSearchText: オメーはお留守番だっての。

engChrName: All of Arkride Solutions' members assembled once more.
engSearchText:
All of Arkride Solutions' members assembled
once more.
jpnChrName: 事務所のメンバーが全員合流しました。
jpnSearchText: <C1>事務所のメンバーが全員合流しました。

engChrName: Choose either Agnès, Risette, or Quatre to leave behind in Longlai before stepping out onto the mountain path.
engSearchText:
Choose either Agnès, Risette, or Quatre to leave
behind in Longlai before stepping out onto the
mountain path.
jpnChrName: 山道に出る際、アニエスかリゼットかカトルの 誰か一名を待機役として選ぶことになります。
jpnSearchText:
山道に出る際、アニエスかリゼットかカトルの
誰か一名を待機役として選ぶことになります。

engChrName: Choose who to leave behind in Longlai.
engSearchText: Choose who to leave behind in Longlai.
jpnChrName: 郷で待機するメンバーを選んでください。
jpnSearchText: <C1>郷で待機するメンバーを選んでください。

engChrName: Oh! You're back!
engSearchText: Oh! You're back!
jpnChrName: あ、もどってきた！
jpnSearchText: あ、もどってきた！

engChrName: Welcome back, everyone.
engSearchText: Welcome back, everyone.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、お疲れ様でした。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、お疲れ様でした。

engChrName: ...Is it just me, or did Judith's face look a bit red?
engSearchText: ...Is it just me, or did Judith's face look a bit red?
jpnChrName: なんだかジュディスさんの顔が 少し赤かったみたいですけど……？
jpnSearchText:
なんだかジュディスさんの顔が
少し赤かったみたいですけど……？

engChrName: Welcome back, everyone.
engSearchText: Welcome back, everyone.
jpnChrName: ふふ、お疲れ様でした。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、お疲れ様でした。

engChrName: I suspect something unexpected happened, but I'm glad to see you well all the same.
engSearchText:
I suspect something unexpected happened, but I'm
glad to see you well all the same.
jpnChrName: 何やらハプニングがあったようですが どなたもご無事で何よりでした。
jpnSearchText:
何やらハプニングがあったようですが
どなたもご無事で何よりでした。

engChrName: Welcome back, everyone. So it really was the Judith Lanster, huh?
engSearchText:
Welcome back, everyone. So it really was the Judith
Lanster, huh?
jpnChrName: みんな、お疲れさま。 本当にジュディス・ランスターとはね。
jpnSearchText:
みんな、お疲れさま。
本当にジュディス・ランスターとはね。

engChrName: I've never seen her in person, but...is it just me, or did she look kind of mad? Or maybe embarrassed?
engSearchText:
I've never seen her in person, but...is it just me, or
did she look kind of mad? Or maybe embarrassed?
jpnChrName: 初めて生で見たけど…… ちょっと怒って──いや照れてた？
jpnSearchText:
初めて生で見たけど……
ちょっと怒って──いや照れてた？

engChrName: *sigh* It's a long story.
engSearchText: *sigh* It's a long story.
jpnChrName: ふう…… その、色々ありまして。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……
その、色々ありまして。

engChrName: It's rather a long story...
engSearchText: It's rather a long story...
jpnChrName: ええ、少しばかり ハプニングがありまして。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、少しばかり
ハプニングがありまして。

engChrName: The long and short of it is, Van ended up seeing—
engSearchText: The long and short of it is, Van ended up seeing—
jpnChrName: 実は、不幸な偶然で ヴァンさんが彼女の──
jpnSearchText:
実は、不幸な偶然で
ヴァンさんが彼女の──

engChrName: To put it simply, Mr. Arkride ended up seeing Ms. Lanster—
engSearchText:
To put it simply, Mr. Arkride ended up seeing Ms.
Lanster—
jpnChrName: 実は、不幸な偶然により ヴァン様がジュディス様の──
jpnSearchText:
実は、不幸な偶然により
ヴァン様がジュディス様の──

engChrName: Can we please drop this and move on?!
engSearchText: Can we please drop this and move on?!
jpnChrName: だああっ！ 蒸し返すんじゃねえっつの！
jpnSearchText:
だああっ！
蒸し返すんじゃねえっつの！

engChrName: Ahaha...
engSearchText: Ahaha...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: ...Hmm?
engSearchText: ...Hmm?
jpnChrName: んー……？
jpnSearchText: んー……？

engChrName: Aww, come on. Don't be mad just 'cause she put the smackdown on you.
engSearchText:
Aww, come on. Don't be mad just 'cause she put the
smackdown on you.
jpnChrName: クク、天罰覿面（てきめん）だなァ。
jpnSearchText: クク、天罰覿面（てきめん）だなァ。

engChrName: I'm just glad you were able to bring her back safe and sound.
engSearchText:
I'm just glad you were able to bring her back safe
and sound.
jpnChrName: はは、よく分かんないけど 無事見つけてくれて良かったよ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、よく分かんないけど
無事見つけてくれて良かったよ。

engChrName: I didn't realize you knew her personally, though.
engSearchText: I didn't realize you knew her personally, though.
jpnChrName: というかアンタら、ジュディスさんと 前から知り合いだったんだな？
jpnSearchText:
というかアンタら、ジュディスさんと
前から知り合いだったんだな？

engChrName: I guess there was no reason for me to keep her identity a secret after all, huh?
engSearchText:
I guess there was no reason for me to keep her
identity a secret after all, huh?
jpnChrName: 一応、素性を伏せようとしたけど 取り越し苦労だったみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
一応、素性を伏せようとしたけど
取り越し苦労だったみたいだね。

engChrName: Sure, but you still did the right thing. When you're dealin' with customers, trust is everything.
engSearchText:
Sure, but you still did the right thing. When you're
dealin' with customers, trust is everything.
jpnChrName: ま、いい配慮じゃねえか？ 客商売は信用が第一ってな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、いい配慮じゃねえか？
客商売は信用が第一ってな。

engChrName: She footed the bill, by the way. You don't need to pay us a single mira.
engSearchText:
She footed the bill, by the way. You don't need to pay
us a single mira.
jpnChrName: 本人から依頼料も受け取ったし、 お前さんからはいらないぜ。
jpnSearchText:
本人から依頼料も受け取ったし、
お前さんからはいらないぜ。

engChrName: Oh, thank you! I'll be going, then.
engSearchText: Oh, thank you! I'll be going, then.
jpnChrName: 謝々（シェイシェイ）！ そんじゃあ俺、もう行くから！
jpnSearchText:
謝々（シェイシェイ）！
そんじゃあ俺、もう行くから！

engChrName: If you ever need anything else while you're in town, just let me know!
engSearchText:
If you ever need anything else while you're in town,
just let me know!
jpnChrName: なにか困ったことがあったら 手伝うから、いつでも言ってよ！
jpnSearchText:
なにか困ったことがあったら
手伝うから、いつでも言ってよ！

engChrName: Bye, Senri! Let's play together again sometime!
engSearchText: Bye, Senri! Let's play together again sometime!
jpnChrName: ばいばーい、センリ！ またあそぼーねー！
jpnSearchText:
ばいばーい、センリ！
またあそぼーねー！

engChrName: Haha. I'd like that, too!
engSearchText: Haha. I'd like that, too!
jpnChrName: ははっ、いいぜ！
jpnSearchText: ははっ、いいぜ！

engChrName: I see the two of them became fast friends.
engSearchText: I see the two of them became fast friends.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ユメちゃんと 仲良くしてくれたみたいですね？
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ユメちゃんと
仲良くしてくれたみたいですね？

engChrName: I see the two of them became fast friends.
engSearchText: I see the two of them became fast friends.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ユメ様と仲良く してくださったみたいですね？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ユメ様と仲良く
してくださったみたいですね？

engChrName: They did. He taught her a lot of songs and games that are popular here in Longlai.
engSearchText:
They did. He taught her a lot of songs and games
that are popular here in Longlai.
jpnChrName: ええ、龍來に伝わる 歌や遊びなんかも教えてくれて。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、龍來に伝わる
歌や遊びなんかも教えてくれて。

engChrName: They did. He taught her a lot of songs and games that are popular here in Longlai.
engSearchText:
They did. He taught her a lot of songs and games
that are popular here in Longlai.
jpnChrName: ええ、龍來に伝わる 歌や遊びなども教えてくださって。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、龍來に伝わる
歌や遊びなども教えてくださって。

engChrName: They did. He taught her a lot of songs and games that are popular here in Longlai.
engSearchText:
They did. He taught her a lot of songs and games
that are popular here in Longlai.
jpnChrName: うん、龍來に伝わる 歌や遊びなども教えてくれてね。
jpnSearchText:
うん、龍來に伝わる
歌や遊びなども教えてくれてね。

engChrName: Glad to hear it. Man, though, is it ever getting late.
engSearchText: Glad to hear it. Man, though, is it ever getting late.
jpnChrName: そりゃ良かったな。 ──しかしそろそろ夕方か。
jpnSearchText:
そりゃ良かったな。
──しかしそろそろ夕方か。

engChrName: I dunno about you guys, but I'm feelin' kinda bushed. Think we could head back to the inn and rest?
engSearchText:
I dunno about you guys, but I'm feelin' kinda bushed.
Think we could head back to the inn and rest?
jpnChrName: それなりに疲れたし、 今日はもう宿に戻って寛ぐか。
jpnSearchText:
それなりに疲れたし、
今日はもう宿に戻って寛ぐか。

engChrName: But I still wanna plaaay!
engSearchText: But I still wanna plaaay!
jpnChrName: えー、ユメまだ あそびたりなーい！
jpnSearchText:
えー、ユメまだ
あそびたりなーい！

engChrName: There are lots of fun things to do at the inn, too, you know.
engSearchText:
There are lots of fun things to do at the inn, too,
you know.
jpnChrName: あ、でもユメちゃん。 宿の中も色々面白そうだよ？
jpnSearchText:
あ、でもユメちゃん。
宿の中も色々面白そうだよ？

engChrName: It has a big outdoor spring you might like!
engSearchText: It has a big outdoor spring you might like!
jpnChrName: ふふ、それに宿には 露天風呂もあるんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それに宿には
露天風呂もあるんですよね？

engChrName: What a nice idea it would be for us all to go in for a soak before dinner.
engSearchText:
What a nice idea it would be for us all to go in for a
soak before dinner.
jpnChrName: ええ、お食事の前に 汗を流しても良さそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、お食事の前に
汗を流しても良さそうですね。

engChrName: Hmm... Okay!
engSearchText: Hmm... Okay!
jpnChrName: うーん……じゃあいいよ！
jpnSearchText: うーん……じゃあいいよ！

engChrName: You guys DO look tired, so let Yumé give you some TLC!
engSearchText:
You guys DO look tired, so let Yumé give you
some TLC!
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちつかれてそーだし、 ユメがねぎらってあげる！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちつかれてそーだし、
ユメがねぎらってあげる！

engChrName: Heh. Thanks, kiddo.
engSearchText: Heh. Thanks, kiddo.
jpnChrName: ハハ、そりゃあんがとな。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、そりゃあんがとな。
