engChrName: I'm surprised she's heard that expression before.
engSearchText: I'm surprised she's heard that expression before.
jpnChrName: 難しい言葉を知ってるなぁ。
jpnSearchText: 難しい言葉を知ってるなぁ。

engChrName: Guess that stubborn old man's rubbing off on her.
engSearchText: Guess that stubborn old man's rubbing off on her.
jpnChrName: あー、あの頑固ジジイの 影響じゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
あー、あの頑固ジジイの
影響じゃねえのか？

engChrName: The group made their way back to the inn, where they relaxed in their rooms and indulged in its facilities to unwind.
engSearchText:
The group made their way back to the inn, where
they relaxed in their rooms and indulged in its
facilities to unwind.
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンたちは宿に戻って それぞれの部屋や施設で寛ぎながら……
jpnSearchText:
その後、ヴァンたちは宿に戻って
それぞれの部屋や施設で寛ぎながら……

engChrName: They also took the time to report the cryptid-like beast's defeat to the guild while also letting Nina and Bermotti know that Judith had been found.
engSearchText:
They also took the time to report the cryptid-like
beast's defeat to the guild while also letting Nina and
Bermotti know that Judith had been found.
jpnChrName: ギルドに手配魔獣らしき幻獣を倒したことや、 首都のニナ、そしてベルモッティたちに ジュディスが見つかったことを連絡するのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドに手配魔獣らしき幻獣を倒したことや、
首都のニナ、そしてベルモッティたちに
ジュディスが見つかったことを連絡するのだった。

engChrName: Dinner was reserved for 6:30PM.
engSearchText: Dinner was reserved for 6:30PM.
jpnChrName: なお、夕食の時間は６時半で頼み……
jpnSearchText: <C1>なお、夕食の時間は６時半で頼み……

engChrName: Before that, however, they decided to do a little something else to make the most of their trip to Longlai...
engSearchText:
Before that, however, they decided to do a little
something else to make the most of their trip
to Longlai...
jpnChrName: その前に折角だからと ヴァンたちが改めて向かったのは──
jpnSearchText:
その前に折角だからと
ヴァンたちが改めて向かったのは──

engChrName: Ahh... Heehee.
engSearchText: Ahh... Heehee.
jpnSearchText:
は～っ……
………ふふっ………

engChrName: Enough with the seduction act.
engSearchText: Enough with the seduction act.
jpnChrName: って科（しな）を作ってんじゃねえよ。
jpnSearchText: って科（しな）を作ってんじゃねえよ。

engChrName: Heh. I can't let my act get rusty while I'm not on stage, y'know?
engSearchText:
Heh. I can't let my act get rusty while I'm not on
stage, y'know?
jpnChrName: クク、東方華劇きっての 人気女形も張ってるんでなァ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、東方華劇きっての
人気女形も張ってるんでなァ。

engChrName: But damn, if this water doesn't feel good. There's springs over in Langport, but this is next level.
engSearchText:
But damn, if this water doesn't feel good.
There's springs over in Langport, but this is
next level.
jpnChrName: しかし良い湯だぜ。 煌都方面にも温泉はあるが……
jpnSearchText:
しかし良い湯だぜ。
煌都方面にも温泉はあるが……

engChrName: What, is the kid not coming in? Feels like a waste to come all this way and not use the outdoor spring.
engSearchText:
What, is the kid not coming in? Feels like a waste to
come all this way and not use the outdoor spring.
jpnChrName: そういや、あの小僧はどうした？ 折角の露天なのに入らねぇのかよ。
jpnSearchText:
そういや、あの小僧はどうした？
折角の露天なのに入らねぇのかよ。

engChrName: Yeah... I did invite him, but he said he was too tired and was just gonna settle with a shower.
engSearchText:
Yeah... I did invite him, but he said he was too tired
and was just gonna settle with a shower.
jpnChrName: あー……誘いはしたんだが、 疲れたからシャワーで十分だとさ。
jpnSearchText:
あー……誘いはしたんだが、
疲れたからシャワーで十分だとさ。

engChrName: Weird. Didn't seem like he was afraid of showing off that skinny-ass body or whatever.
engSearchText:
Weird. Didn't seem like he was afraid of showing
off that skinny-ass body or whatever.
jpnChrName: ハン？　あのヒョロい身体を見せるのが 恥ずかしいワケでもなさそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
ハン？　あのヒョロい身体を見せるのが
恥ずかしいワケでもなさそうだが……

engChrName: There's plenty of cultures out there that don't do public bathing. Could just be that.
engSearchText:
There's plenty of cultures out there that don't do
public bathing. Could just be that.
jpnChrName: まあ、公衆浴場の習慣が そもそもない文化だってあるからな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、公衆浴場の習慣が
そもそもない文化だってあるからな。

engChrName: But you're right that it's a waste not to come in. I'll see if he wants me to reserve the place for him later.
engSearchText:
But you're right that it's a waste not to come in.
I'll see if he wants me to reserve the place for
him later.
jpnChrName: しかしシャワーだけじゃ勿体ねぇし、 後で貸し切りでも勧めとくか。
jpnSearchText:
しかしシャワーだけじゃ勿体ねぇし、
後で貸し切りでも勧めとくか。

engChrName: Like some overprotective parent... Well, that kiddo might not be here to give you some 'TLC,' but I am.
engSearchText:
Like some overprotective parent... Well, that kiddo
might not be here to give you some 'TLC,' but I am.
jpnChrName: 過保護だねぇ……チビじゃねえが、 オレ様も労ってやろうか？
jpnSearchText:
過保護だねぇ……チビじゃねえが、
オレ様も労ってやろうか？

engChrName: How about it? This do it for you? Old farts like you love these kinds of poses, right?
engSearchText:
How about it? This do it for you? Old farts like you
love these kinds of poses, right?
jpnChrName: ほーら、こんなのとかどうだ？ オッサンが好きそうなポーズってな。
jpnSearchText:
ほーら、こんなのとかどうだ？
オッサンが好きそうなポーズってな。

engChrName: Oh, knock it off! Just 'cause you were born with looks and talent doesn't make it okay to abuse 'em.
engSearchText:
Oh, knock it off! Just 'cause you were born with looks
and talent doesn't make it okay to abuse 'em.
jpnChrName: だからやめろっつの！ ツラと才能を無駄遣いしやがって。
jpnSearchText:
だからやめろっつの！
ツラと才能を無駄遣いしやがって。

engChrName: Hahaha! ...Made you hard?
engSearchText: Hahaha! ...Made you hard?
jpnChrName: クハハ。 ……勃たせちまったかよ？
jpnSearchText:
クハハ。
……勃たせちまったかよ？

engChrName: I'm limp as a damn noodle!
engSearchText: I'm limp as a damn noodle!
jpnChrName: 勃つかあああっ！！
jpnSearchText: 勃つかあああっ！！

engChrName: ...? What are they even talking about over there?
engSearchText: ...? What are they even talking about over there?
jpnChrName: ……？ 立つってなんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
……？
立つってなんでしょう？

engChrName: Ahaha... Wh-Who knows...?
engSearchText: Ahaha... Wh-Who knows...?
jpnChrName: あはは……な、なんでしょうね～。
jpnSearchText: あはは……な、なんでしょうね～。

engChrName: (I can't believe those two—though I'm sure it was Aaron who was the one who started it.)
engSearchText:
(I can't believe those two—though I'm sure it was
Aaron who was the one who started it.)
jpnChrName: （……もうヴァンさんたちったら……   まあアーロンさんが原因でしょうけど。）
jpnSearchText:
（……もうヴァンさんたちったら……
まあアーロンさんが原因でしょうけど。）

engChrName: Your hair is so smooth, Risette! Can I wash it for you?
engSearchText:
Your hair is so smooth, Risette! Can I wash it
for you?
jpnChrName: リゼットちゃんカミさらさら～！ ユメがあらってもいいー？
jpnSearchText:
リゼットちゃんカミさらさら～！
ユメがあらってもいいー？

engChrName: I would be delighted if you did.
engSearchText: I would be delighted if you did.
jpnChrName: ええ、お願いしますユメ様。
jpnSearchText: ええ、お願いしますユメ様。

engChrName: Heehee. Yumé really does have a way of becoming fast friends with anyone.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Yumé really does have a way of becoming
fast friends with anyone.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ほんとユメちゃんは 誰とでも仲良くなれる子ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ほんとユメちゃんは
誰とでも仲良くなれる子ですね。

engChrName: I think of her as my little sister at this point. She reminds me of my younger siblings back home.
engSearchText:
I think of her as my little sister at this point.
She reminds me of my younger siblings back home.
jpnChrName: はい、わたしも妹みたいで…… 里の妹や弟を思い出しちゃいます。
jpnSearchText:
はい、わたしも妹みたいで……
里の妹や弟を思い出しちゃいます。

engChrName: I almost forgot you're an older sister. It doesn't feel quite right to me somehow.
engSearchText:
I almost forgot you're an older sister. It doesn't feel
quite right to me somehow.
jpnChrName: フェリちゃんもお姉さんなんですよね。 妹さんでもありますけど……
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃんもお姉さんなんですよね。
妹さんでもありますけど……

engChrName: Ahaha... Maybe for you, but for me, Kasim doesn't come home very often.
engSearchText:
Ahaha... Maybe for you, but for me, Kasim doesn't
come home very often.
jpnChrName: あはは、知っての通りお兄ちゃんは ずっと里に帰ってなくて……
jpnSearchText:
あはは、知っての通りお兄ちゃんは
ずっと里に帰ってなくて……

engChrName: So I actually feel way more like an older sister than a younger one.
engSearchText:
So I actually feel way more like an older sister than a
younger one.
jpnChrName: 妹としてよりは姉としての方が 自分としては実感ありますねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
妹としてよりは姉としての方が
自分としては実感ありますねぇ。

engChrName: I-I see... (You'll probably always be the latter to me, sorry.)
engSearchText:
I-I see...
(You'll probably always be the latter to me, sorry.)
jpnChrName: そ、そうですか…… （むしろ妹以外の何者でもない気が。）
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうですか……
（むしろ妹以外の何者でもない気が。）

engChrName: ...Mm, you're definitely the older sister type, though.
engSearchText: ...Mm, you're definitely the older sister type, though.
jpnChrName: ……うん、でもアニエスさんは やっぱりお姉ちゃんって感じです。
jpnSearchText:
……うん、でもアニエスさんは
やっぱりお姉ちゃんって感じです。

engChrName: Your hair's so long, and your skin's smooth like porcelain. You're so...curvy, too.
engSearchText:
Your hair's so long, and your skin's smooth
like porcelain. You're so...curvy, too.
jpnChrName: 綺麗な金髪で、肌も真っ白で…… ……その、すたいるもバツグンですし。
jpnSearchText:
綺麗な金髪で、肌も真っ白で……
……その、すたいるもバツグンですし。

engChrName: Ahaha... Well, I like the way your hair is fluffy like kitten's fur.
engSearchText:
Ahaha... Well, I like the way your hair is fluffy like
kitten's fur.
jpnChrName: あはは……フェリちゃんこそ 髪が猫みたいにふわふわで綺麗ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……フェリちゃんこそ
髪が猫みたいにふわふわで綺麗ですよ。

engChrName: And your skin's so lustrous with such a beautiful tone... Heehee. It's silky to the touch—I love it.
engSearchText:
And your skin's so lustrous with such a
beautiful tone... Heehee. It's silky to the touch—I
love it.
jpnChrName: 肌もミルクコーヒーみたいに艶やかで…… ふふっ、すべすべモチモチで素敵です。
jpnSearchText:
肌もミルクコーヒーみたいに艶やかで……
ふふっ、すべすべモチモチで素敵です。

engChrName: Y-You really think so? I'm covered in scars, though...
engSearchText: Y-You really think so? I'm covered in scars, though...
jpnChrName: そ、そうでしょうか…… でもその、腕とか結構キズもありますし。
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうでしょうか……
でもその、腕とか結構キズもありますし。

engChrName: Maybe so, but you got those protecting people like us and loved ones back home, didn't you?
engSearchText:
Maybe so, but you got those protecting people like us
and loved ones back home, didn't you?
jpnChrName: 故郷の人や、ヴァンさんや私たちを 守るために付いたんですよね……？
jpnSearchText:
故郷の人や、ヴァンさんや私たちを
守るために付いたんですよね……？

engChrName: I really don't want you to get hurt, of course.
engSearchText: I really don't want you to get hurt, of course.
jpnChrName: あまり無茶はして欲しくありませんけど……
jpnSearchText: あまり無茶はして欲しくありませんけど……

engChrName: But I see those scars more as proof of the sacrifices you've made for others, and so they make me all the more proud of you.
engSearchText:
But I see those scars more as proof of the sacrifices
you've made for others, and so they make me all the
more proud of you.
jpnChrName: フェリちゃんが頑張った証だと思うと 愛おしくて、誇らしくなっちゃいます。
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃんが頑張った証だと思うと
愛おしくて、誇らしくなっちゃいます。

engChrName: Aww, thank you... Heehee.
engSearchText: Aww, thank you... Heehee.
jpnChrName: アニエスさん……えへへ……
jpnSearchText: アニエスさん……えへへ……

engChrName: By the way, this might be out of nowhere, but...
engSearchText: By the way, this might be out of nowhere, but...
jpnChrName: あ、そういえば…… ちょっと疑問だったんですけど。
jpnSearchText:
あ、そういえば……
ちょっと疑問だったんですけど。

engChrName: ...what kind of person do you think Van's 'type' is?
engSearchText: ...what kind of person do you think Van's 'type' is?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんってどういうヒトが “たいぷ”なんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんってどういうヒトが
“たいぷ”なんでしょう？

engChrName: Pardon?
engSearchText: Pardon?
jpnChrName: え。
jpnSearchText: え。

engChrName: A long time ago, I remember asking Aida how people usually behave when staying over somewhere...
engSearchText:
A long time ago, I remember asking Aida how people
usually behave when staying over somewhere...
jpnChrName: えと、むかしアイーダさんに お泊まりとかする時の作法を聞いて……
jpnSearchText:
えと、むかしアイーダさんに
お泊まりとかする時の作法を聞いて……

engChrName: ...and she said they usually talk about romance and stuff—like who the people close to them might be in love with.
engSearchText:
...and she said they usually talk about romance and
stuff—like who the people close to them might be in
love with.
jpnChrName: “コイバナ”って言うんでしたっけ？ 親しいヒトが誰が好きかとか話すっていう。
jpnSearchText:
“コイバナ”って言うんでしたっけ？
親しいヒトが誰が好きかとか話すっていう。

engChrName: Ahaha... (Aida really didn't beat around the bush, huh?)
engSearchText:
Ahaha...
(Aida really didn't beat around the bush, huh?)
jpnChrName: あはは…… （アイーダさんもピンポイントですね。）
jpnSearchText:
あはは……
（アイーダさんもピンポイントですね。）

engChrName: Hmm... I'm sure potential partners for him would need to be over a certain age.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I'm sure potential partners for him would
need to be over a certain age.
jpnChrName: ……うーん…… 何だか一定年齢以上な気がしますね。
jpnSearchText:
……うーん……
何だか一定年齢以上な気がしますね。

engChrName: So not us. He sees us more as children.
engSearchText: So not us. He sees us more as children.
jpnChrName: その、私たちに対しては どうも保護者目線な感じというか。
jpnSearchText:
その、私たちに対しては
どうも保護者目線な感じというか。

engChrName: Heehee. He's so nice, though, isn't he?
engSearchText: Heehee. He's so nice, though, isn't he?
jpnChrName: えへへ、やっぱり 優しいですよね、ヴァンさん。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、やっぱり
優しいですよね、ヴァンさん。

engChrName: He makes it look like he's not paying that much attention to us, but it feels like he always is.
engSearchText:
He makes it look like he's not paying that much
attention to us, but it feels like he always is.
jpnChrName: 見ていないようでちゃんと 見てくれているような気がします。
jpnSearchText:
見ていないようでちゃんと
見てくれているような気がします。

engChrName: Yes, I would have to agree.
engSearchText: Yes, I would have to agree.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、そうですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、そうですね。

engChrName: But for an example...he isn't the same with us as he is with Risette and Judith.
engSearchText:
But for an example...he isn't the same with us as he is
with Risette and Judith.
jpnChrName: ……でもリゼットさんや 今日のジュディスさん……
jpnSearchText:
……でもリゼットさんや
今日のジュディスさん……

engChrName: Elaine, too... It's always like he acts with a lot less restraint towards them.
engSearchText:
Elaine, too... It's always like he acts with a lot less
restraint towards them.
jpnChrName: それこそエレインさん相手には あまり遠慮していないような……
jpnSearchText:
それこそエレインさん相手には
あまり遠慮していないような……

engChrName: Now that you mention it...
engSearchText: Now that you mention it...
jpnChrName: ！　言われてみれば……
jpnSearchText: ！　言われてみれば……

engChrName: But man, I've seen them all in the sauna before, but you sure got hella scars, huh?
engSearchText:
But man, I've seen them all in the sauna before, but
you sure got hella scars, huh?
jpnChrName: しっかしサウナとかでも思ったが かなりの数の傷痕がありやがるな。
jpnSearchText:
しっかしサウナとかでも思ったが
かなりの数の傷痕がありやがるな。

engChrName: Bet they come with a ton of shady stories to tell.
engSearchText: Bet they come with a ton of shady stories to tell.
jpnChrName: ５年前に修行してたことといい、 胡散くせえネタがありそうじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
５年前に修行してたことといい、
胡散くせえネタがありそうじゃねえか？

engChrName: Not gonna deny it. That's just how it is when you're in this business.
engSearchText:
Not gonna deny it. That's just how it is when you're
in this business.
jpnChrName: ハン……否定はしねぇけどな。 こんな稼業をやってるワケだし。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……否定はしねぇけどな。
こんな稼業をやってるワケだし。

engChrName: I'll bet. Especially when you've got connections with PMCs, the society, Heiyue, and a bunch of other dicey groups.
engSearchText:
I'll bet. Especially when you've got connections with
PMCs, the society, Heiyue, and a bunch of other
dicey groups.
jpnChrName: 怪しげなＰＭＣに《結社》、 黒月やそれ以外の連中とのコネ……
jpnSearchText:
怪しげなＰＭＣに《結社》、
黒月やそれ以外の連中とのコネ……

engChrName: Sounds like you backed up the Mirage side during the war a couple years ago, too.
engSearchText:
Sounds like you backed up the Mirage side during the
war a couple years ago, too.
jpnChrName: かと思えば２年前の戦役の裏じゃ、 “陽炎”側に協力してたんだって？
jpnSearchText:
かと思えば２年前の戦役の裏じゃ、
“陽炎”側に協力してたんだって？

engChrName: Then your ex is an A-rank bracer, and you've got a partner in crime in the CID. A 'ton' might even be selling it short.
engSearchText:
Then your ex is an A-rank bracer, and you've got a
partner in crime in the CID. A 'ton' might even be
selling it short.
jpnChrName: おまけにＡ級遊撃士の元カノに ＣＩＤの悪友までいやがるとはねぇ～。
jpnSearchText:
おまけにＡ級遊撃士の元カノに
ＣＩＤの悪友までいやがるとはねぇ～。

engChrName: Keep it up with the wild guesses. (Too sharp for his own good.)
engSearchText:
Keep it up with the wild guesses.
(Too sharp for his own good.)
jpnChrName: チッ、決めつけるんじゃねえよ。 （しかしホント鋭いな、コイツ……）
jpnSearchText:
チッ、決めつけるんじゃねえよ。
（しかしホント鋭いな、コイツ……）

engChrName: So you went to high school with those two, right?
engSearchText: So you went to high school with those two, right?
jpnChrName: ──で、あの二人とは “高校”も同じだったわけだ？
jpnSearchText:
──で、あの二人とは
“高校”も同じだったわけだ？

engChrName: ...Gimme a break here. Your intuition is somethin' else, you brat.
engSearchText:
...Gimme a break here. Your intuition is somethin'
else, you brat.
jpnChrName: ………ったく。 つくづく勘の良いガキだな。
jpnSearchText:
………ったく。
つくづく勘の良いガキだな。

engChrName: Doesn't need to be 'something else' in this case. The small fry might not've noticed, but Miss Perfect sure has.
engSearchText:
Doesn't need to be 'something else' in this case.
The small fry might not've noticed, but Miss Perfect
sure has.
jpnChrName: 言っとくがお子ちゃま（フェリ）はともかく、 小娘（アニエス）もとっくに気付いてるからな？
jpnSearchText:
言っとくがお子ちゃま（フェリ）はともかく、
小娘（アニエス）もとっくに気付いてるからな？

engChrName: You're just so easy to read. It's like you're not even trying to hide this stuff.
engSearchText:
You're just so easy to read. It's like you're not even
trying to hide this stuff.
jpnChrName: 分かりやすすぎんだよ、てめぇ。 隠す気ねえだろってくらいにな。
jpnSearchText:
分かりやすすぎんだよ、てめぇ。
隠す気ねえだろってくらいにな。

engChrName: Cuttin' right to the chase, huh? I mean, you're right—it's not like I'm goin' outta my way to hide it, but...
engSearchText:
Cuttin' right to the chase, huh? I mean, you're
right—it's not like I'm goin' outta my way to hide
it, but...
jpnChrName: ったく、ズケズケと…… 別に隠しちゃいねえけどよ。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、ズケズケと……
別に隠しちゃいねえけどよ。

engChrName: You just never volunteer it, either. Same difference.
engSearchText: You just never volunteer it, either. Same difference.
jpnChrName: 隠しちゃいないが 黙って守ろうとはするわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
隠しちゃいないが
黙って守ろうとはするわけだ。

engChrName: Almost bizarre how you hold your cards close to your chest while using your whole spriggan deal to meddle in others' affairs.
engSearchText:
Almost bizarre how you hold your cards close to your
chest while using your whole spriggan deal to meddle
in others' affairs.
jpnChrName: あのグレンデルの時と同じ、 てめえの流儀とやら──
jpnSearchText:
あのグレンデルの時と同じ、
てめえの流儀とやら──

engChrName: How you always dive headfirst to protect us from danger, whatever the cost to yourself—like you aren't worth a damn.
engSearchText:
How you always dive headfirst to protect us from
danger, whatever the cost to yourself—like you aren't
worth a damn.
jpnChrName: 毎度のように危険な目に遭いながら 自分を顧みず、俺たちを守るお節介を。
jpnSearchText:
毎度のように危険な目に遭いながら
自分を顧みず、俺たちを守るお節介を。

engChrName: Puttin' it like that's a little...
engSearchText: Puttin' it like that's a little...
jpnSearchText: <………それは……………

engChrName: You try to disguise it. You get real pushy when it comes to mira and make a show of boiling everything down to debts paid or owed.
engSearchText:
You try to disguise it. You get real pushy when it
comes to mira and make a show of boiling everything
down to debts paid or owed.
jpnChrName: てめぇはミラにうるせぇし、 貸し借りにもっとうるせえのは知ってる。
jpnSearchText:
てめぇはミラにうるせぇし、
貸し借りにもっとうるせえのは知ってる。

engChrName: But it's all talk, isn't it? At least when it comes to us, you're all give and no take.
engSearchText:
But it's all talk, isn't it? At least when it comes to us,
you're all give and no take.
jpnChrName: ──だが口ばっかりだよなァ？ 少なくとも俺たちには与えてばかりだ。
jpnSearchText:
──だが口ばっかりだよなァ？
少なくとも俺たちには与えてばかりだ。

engChrName: And I hate how you're making me leave my debt to you forever unpaid.
engSearchText:
And I hate how you're making me leave my debt to
you forever unpaid.
jpnChrName: そして、作った借りをそのままにしとくのが 何よりも落ち着かない──
jpnSearchText:
そして、作った借りをそのままにしとくのが
何よりも落ち着かない──

engChrName: I get it, though. You're scared, aren't you?
engSearchText: I get it, though. You're scared, aren't you?
jpnChrName: いや…… ───そうか、怖がってんのか？
jpnSearchText:
いや……
───そうか、怖がってんのか？

engChrName: ...Heh.
engSearchText: ...Heh.
jpnSearchText: …………ハッ………………

engChrName: We all owe you in some way or another.
engSearchText: We all owe you in some way or another.
jpnChrName: ……確かに俺たちはてめぇに助けられた。
jpnSearchText: ……確かに俺たちはてめぇに助けられた。

engChrName: It's part of why I came all the way over to the capital to help out.
engSearchText:
It's part of why I came all the way over to the capital
to help out.
jpnChrName: 借りがあるから首都くんだりに 押しかけて手伝ってるっつーのもある。
jpnSearchText:
借りがあるから首都くんだりに
押しかけて手伝ってるっつーのもある。

engChrName: Not a big part, though. Half for sightseeing, half for revenge, and, like, one percent repaying you.
engSearchText:
Not a big part, though. Half for sightseeing, half for
revenge, and, like, one percent repaying you.
jpnChrName: ま、俺にとっちゃ見物半分、復讐半分、 てめぇに返すのは１パーくらいだがな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、俺にとっちゃ見物半分、復讐半分、
てめぇに返すのは１パーくらいだがな。

engChrName: Oh, no doubt.
engSearchText: Oh, no doubt.
jpnChrName: あー、そうだろうよ。
jpnSearchText: あー、そうだろうよ。

engChrName: But that's not true for the others.
engSearchText: But that's not true for the others.
jpnChrName: だが小娘にしてもお子ちゃまにしても、 メイドに小僧にしても……
jpnSearchText:
だが小娘にしてもお子ちゃまにしても、
メイドに小僧にしても……

engChrName: They're here because they're grateful to you.
engSearchText: They're here because they're grateful to you.
jpnChrName: 結構な割合がてめぇへの恩、いや──
jpnSearchText: 結構な割合がてめぇへの恩、いや──

engChrName: Well, they're grateful and they worry about leaving you alone 'cause you're a danger to yourself.
engSearchText:
Well, they're grateful and they worry about leaving
you alone 'cause you're a danger to yourself.
jpnChrName: 感謝しつつも、その危なっかしさを 放っておけないからってのも大きいだろ。
jpnSearchText:
感謝しつつも、その危なっかしさを
放っておけないからってのも大きいだろ。
……！

engChrName: We're closer than you think, and not just in age. Maybe think about how liked you actually are next time you wanna pull the sacrificial lone wolf act.
engSearchText:
We're closer than you think, and not just in age.
Maybe think about how liked you actually are next
time you wanna pull the sacrificial lone wolf act.
jpnChrName: １０や２０も離れてるんじゃねえんだ。 あんまり舐めんじゃねえって話だ。
jpnSearchText:
１０や２０も離れてるんじゃねえんだ。
あんまり舐めんじゃねえって話だ。

engChrName: Not that I care what happens to you, just to be clear.
engSearchText: Not that I care what happens to you, just to be clear.
jpnChrName: ──ま、てめぇがどうなろうと 俺は知ったこっちゃねえけどな。
jpnSearchText:
──ま、てめぇがどうなろうと
俺は知ったこっちゃねえけどな。

engChrName: Haha...
engSearchText: Haha...
jpnSearchText: ……ははっ………

engChrName: Oh, get outta here with that shit!
engSearchText: Oh, get outta here with that shit!
jpnChrName: って、ウゼーんだよっ！？
jpnSearchText: って、ウゼーんだよっ！？

engChrName: Haha... Couldn't help myself. Not often you're this sincere.
engSearchText:
Haha... Couldn't help myself. Not often you're
this sincere.
jpnChrName: クク…… 珍しく殊勝なことを言うからな。
jpnSearchText:
クク……
珍しく殊勝なことを言うからな。

engChrName: Though if I've got a little hellion like you worried about me, then I got a long ways to go as a man.
engSearchText:
Though if I've got a little hellion like you worried
about me, then I got a long ways to go as a man.
jpnChrName: ──ま、お前みたいな悪ガキに 心配されるようじゃまだまだだ。
jpnSearchText:
──ま、お前みたいな悪ガキに
心配されるようじゃまだまだだ。

engChrName: Just have to take it one day at a time.
engSearchText: Just have to take it one day at a time.
jpnChrName: 精進あるのみってな。
jpnSearchText: 精進あるのみってな。

engChrName: Heh. Careful you don't overdo it, grandpa.
engSearchText: Heh. Careful you don't overdo it, grandpa.
jpnChrName: ハッ、ジジイが……
jpnSearchText: ハッ、ジジイが……

engChrName: Anyway, enough serious talk!
engSearchText: Anyway, enough serious talk!
jpnChrName: 辛気くせぇ話はここまでだ！
jpnSearchText: 辛気くせぇ話はここまでだ！

engChrName: We're in a hot springs resort! You gotta tell me all the good night spots.
engSearchText:
We're in a hot springs resort! You gotta tell me all the
good night spots.
jpnChrName: それより折角の温泉地なんだし 定番の夜遊びスポットを教えろや。
jpnSearchText:
それより折角の温泉地なんだし
定番の夜遊びスポットを教えろや。

engChrName: Like where you can get down and dirty in the bath with some hot older girls.
engSearchText:
Like where you can get down and dirty in the bath
with some hot older girls.
jpnChrName: イカス姉ちゃん達と組んずほぐれつ 混浴できる店とかあんじゃねーのか？
jpnSearchText:
イカス姉ちゃん達と組んずほぐれつ
混浴できる店とかあんじゃねーのか？

engChrName: Nowhere, that's where!
engSearchText: Nowhere, that's where!
jpnChrName: あるわけねーだろっ！
jpnSearchText: あるわけねーだろっ！

engChrName: 'Get down and dirty'...?
engSearchText: 'Get down and dirty'...?
jpnChrName: くんずほぐれつ……？
jpnSearchText: くんずほぐれつ……？

engChrName: A-Ahaha... Goodness, I wonder what that could mean? (He really can't help himself, can he?)
engSearchText:
A-Ahaha... Goodness, I wonder what that
could mean?
(He really can't help himself, can he?)
jpnChrName: あ、あはは……なんでしょうねぇ？ （もう、ほんとにアーロンさんったら。）
jpnSearchText:
あ、あはは……なんでしょうねぇ？
（もう、ほんとにアーロンさんったら。）

engChrName: Whoa! Everything's all white!
engSearchText: Whoa! Everything's all white!
jpnChrName: うわぁあ、まっしろだねー！
jpnSearchText: うわぁあ、まっしろだねー！

engChrName: ...Sorry for leaving her with you all this time, Risette.
engSearchText: ...Sorry for leaving her with you all this time, Risette.
jpnChrName: あ……す、すみません。 ユメちゃんをお任せしちゃって。
jpnSearchText:
あ……す、すみません。
ユメちゃんをお任せしちゃって。

engChrName: Not at all. We've had a lovely time together.
engSearchText: Not at all. We've had a lovely time together.
jpnChrName: ふふ、とんでもない。 これも折角の機会ですし。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、とんでもない。
これも折角の機会ですし。

engChrName: Heehee. Leave the washing to me whenever you're ready!
engSearchText:
Heehee. Leave the washing to me whenever
you're ready!
jpnChrName: えへへ、あとでアニエスちゃんと フェリちゃんも洗ってあげるねー。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、あとでアニエスちゃんと
フェリちゃんも洗ってあげるねー。

engChrName: I want to help wash the boys, too. Can I?
engSearchText: I want to help wash the boys, too. Can I?
jpnChrName: そういえばヴァンたちも あらってあげたいんだけどー。
jpnSearchText:
そういえばヴァンたちも
あらってあげたいんだけどー。

engChrName: I...suppose it might be fine if it's just you?
engSearchText: I...suppose it might be fine if it's just you?
jpnChrName: う、うーん…… ユメちゃんだけなら大丈夫かな？
jpnSearchText:
う、うーん……
ユメちゃんだけなら大丈夫かな？

engChrName: Heehee. We'll have to get their and the owner's okay later.
engSearchText:
Heehee. We'll have to get their and the owner's
okay later.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、後でヴァンさんと 宿の人に相談してみましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、後でヴァンさんと
宿の人に相談してみましょうか。

engChrName: Ahaha! Splaaash!
engSearchText: Ahaha! Splaaash!
jpnChrName: きゃはは……ざぶーん！
jpnSearchText: きゃはは……ざぶーん！

engChrName: ...Hmm? Is something wrong?
engSearchText: ...Hmm? Is something wrong?
jpnChrName: ……？ どうかいたしましたか？
jpnSearchText:
……？
どうかいたしましたか？

engChrName: N-Not at all! I'm sorry.
engSearchText: N-Not at all! I'm sorry.
jpnChrName: いえっ、すみません！
jpnSearchText: いえっ、すみません！

engChrName: We just couldn't help looking at you.
engSearchText: We just couldn't help looking at you.
jpnChrName: えへへ…… なんだか見とれちゃいまして。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……
なんだか見とれちゃいまして。

engChrName: Hmm? Oh, were you concerned with how my artificial body is faring?
engSearchText:
Hmm? Oh, were you concerned with how my
artificial body is faring?
jpnChrName: ？　ああ……ひょっとして 擬体の調子が気になられるとか？
jpnSearchText:
？　ああ……ひょっとして
擬体の調子が気になられるとか？

engChrName: Oh, it's not that...
engSearchText: Oh, it's not that...
jpnChrName: あ、いえ……
jpnSearchText: あ、いえ……

engChrName: Umm... If anything, it's the opposite. I forgot it's artificial.
engSearchText:
Umm... If anything, it's the opposite. I forgot
it's artificial.
jpnChrName: ……その、逆に完全に 忘れちゃってました……
jpnSearchText:
……その、逆に完全に
忘れちゃってました……

engChrName: Heehee. That's quite the compliment.
engSearchText: Heehee. That's quite the compliment.
jpnChrName: ふふっ…… それは何だか嬉しいですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……
それは何だか嬉しいですね。

engChrName: I'm not going out of my way to hide anything, so you can look all you like if the sight doesn't displease you.
engSearchText:
I'm not going out of my way to hide anything, so you
can look all you like if the sight doesn't displease you.
jpnChrName: 特に隠しているわけではないので、 ご不快でなければご覧ください。
jpnSearchText:
特に隠しているわけではないので、
ご不快でなければご覧ください。

engChrName: You have to squint to notice anything different at all...
engSearchText:
You have to squint to notice anything different
at all...
jpnChrName: ほとんど目立ちませんけど……
jpnSearchText: ほとんど目立ちませんけど……

engChrName: Oh, I see it now.
engSearchText: Oh, I see it now.
jpnChrName: こちらの部分が……
jpnSearchText: こちらの部分が……

engChrName: This is the joint between two of my artificial parts.
engSearchText: This is the joint between two of my artificial parts.
jpnChrName: ええ、擬体パーツの境目となります。
jpnSearchText: ええ、擬体パーツの境目となります。

engChrName: All it takes is to wear something over it, and nary a person is likely to notice.
engSearchText:
All it takes is to wear something over it, and nary
a person is likely to notice.
jpnChrName: 服を着てしまえば他の方に ほぼ気付かれることはありませんね。
jpnSearchText:
服を着てしまえば他の方に
ほぼ気付かれることはありませんね。

engChrName: Still, while I may sound like an expert, I've only had this body for a year.
engSearchText:
Still, while I may sound like an expert, I've only had
this body for a year.
jpnChrName: ……と言っても、私がこの身体を 手に入れてから一年くらいですが。
jpnSearchText:
……と言っても、私がこの身体を
手に入れてから一年くらいですが。

engChrName: I...see.
engSearchText: I...see.
jpnChrName: そう、なんですか……
jpnSearchText: そう、なんですか……

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...
jpnSearchText: ………えと…………

engChrName: I'm sorry. I didn't mean to sound like I was holding knowledge over you.
engSearchText:
I'm sorry. I didn't mean to sound like I was holding
knowledge over you.
jpnChrName: すみません、思わせぶりな事ばかり。
jpnSearchText: すみません、思わせぶりな事ばかり。

engChrName: It's a rather complex story, and much of it is confidential. I wish I could tell you, if I'm being truthful.
engSearchText:
It's a rather complex story, and much of it
is confidential. I wish I could tell you, if I'm
being truthful.
jpnChrName: 少々複雑で──守秘義務もあるので お話しできないのがもどかしいです。
jpnSearchText:
少々複雑で──守秘義務もあるので
お話しできないのがもどかしいです。

engChrName: No! You don't need to apologize!
engSearchText: No! You don't need to apologize!
jpnChrName: いいえっ、とんでもないです！
jpnSearchText: いいえっ、とんでもないです！

engChrName: You've gone out of your way to do what you can for us in spite of your limitations. If anything, you've been doing more than you should.
engSearchText:
You've gone out of your way to do what you can for
us in spite of your limitations. If anything, you've
been doing more than you should.
jpnChrName: いつも色んな制限の中で最大限── いえ、それ以上に良くしてくださって……
jpnSearchText:
いつも色んな制限の中で最大限──
いえ、それ以上に良くしてくださって……

engChrName: It makes me, umm... Well, I can't help but compare myself to you and feel a little inadequate.
engSearchText:
It makes me, umm... Well, I can't help but compare
myself to you and feel a little inadequate.
jpnChrName: その……正直ちょっと 敵わないなって思っちゃいます。
jpnSearchText:
その……正直ちょっと
敵わないなって思っちゃいます。

engChrName: ...You, Agnès?
engSearchText: ...You, Agnès?
jpnChrName: アニエスさん……？
jpnSearchText: アニエスさん……？

engChrName: Heehee. You see, I have numerous skills and knowledge because I was intended to be that way.
engSearchText:
Heehee. You see, I have numerous skills and
knowledge because I was intended to be that way.
jpnChrName: ふふ、わたくしが様々なスキルや 知識を持っているのは当然です。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、わたくしが様々なスキルや
知識を持っているのは当然です。

engChrName: My skills have been refined—and my body modified—to best serve my purpose.
engSearchText:
My skills have been refined—and my body
modified—to best serve my purpose.
jpnChrName: この身体も含め、目的に適うよう調整し、 積み上げてきたものですから。
jpnSearchText:
この身体も含め、目的に適うよう調整し、
積み上げてきたものですから。

engChrName: However, the both of you also have roles that only you can fulfill.
engSearchText:
However, the both of you also have roles that only
you can fulfill.
jpnChrName: ですがアニエス様にフェリ様も それぞれにしかない役割をお持ちです。
jpnSearchText:
ですがアニエス様にフェリ様も
それぞれにしかない役割をお持ちです。

engChrName: Roles that I suspect are much more important to Arkride Solutions than my own.
engSearchText:
Roles that I suspect are much more important to
Arkride Solutions than my own.
jpnChrName: 多分、アークライド解決事務所にとって 出向のわたくしなどより大きな役割が。
jpnSearchText:
多分、アークライド解決事務所にとって
出向のわたくしなどより大きな役割が。

engChrName: You really think so...?
engSearchText: You really think so...?
jpnChrName: そう、でしょうか……
jpnSearchText: そう、でしょうか……

engChrName: I don't know... That's kind of hard to imagine.
engSearchText: I don't know... That's kind of hard to imagine.
jpnChrName: ……えと、 実感は湧きませんけど……
jpnSearchText:
……えと、
実感は湧きませんけど……

engChrName: Don't worry about it too much for now—just try to take it to heart as wisdom from your elders.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about it too much for now—just try to
take it to heart as wisdom from your elders.
jpnChrName: ふふ、年長者の言葉と思って 今は胸に仕舞っておいていただければ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、年長者の言葉と思って
今は胸に仕舞っておいていただければ。

engChrName: To add, while my body might differ from that of an ordinary human's, I am still twenty years old as I once told you all.
engSearchText:
To add, while my body might differ from that of an
ordinary human's, I am still twenty years old as I once
told you all.
jpnChrName: ──そうそう、こんな身体ですが、 年齢はお伝えした通り二十歳です。
jpnSearchText:
──そうそう、こんな身体ですが、
年齢はお伝えした通り二十歳です。

engChrName: I'm not an enchantress who is much older than she appears or anything to that effect.
engSearchText:
I'm not an enchantress who is much older than she
appears or anything to that effect.
jpnChrName: 魔女のように齢を重ねておりませんので、 それだけは誤解なきよう。
jpnSearchText:
魔女のように齢を重ねておりませんので、
それだけは誤解なきよう。

engChrName: Ahaha... Understood.
engSearchText: Ahaha... Understood.
jpnChrName: あはは……はいっ。
jpnSearchText: あはは……はいっ。

engChrName: Heehee. Good to know, Risette. (We're so close in age, and yet she's so much wiser than me...)
engSearchText:
Heehee. Good to know, Risette.
(We're so close in age, and yet she's so much wiser
than me...)
jpnChrName: ふふ、分かりました。 （敵わないな、本当に……）
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、分かりました。
（敵わないな、本当に……）

engChrName: What's an enchantress?
engSearchText: What's an enchantress?
jpnChrName: マジョってなにー？
jpnSearchText: マジョってなにー？

engChrName: Oh! Yumé!
engSearchText: Oh! Yumé!
jpnChrName: わわっ、ユメちゃん。
jpnSearchText: わわっ、ユメちゃん。

engChrName: Are you all talking about work? I wanna help you all when I'm big, too!
engSearchText:
Are you all talking about work? I wanna help you
all when I'm big, too!
jpnChrName: ヴァンのジムショのハナシー？ ユメも大きくなったらお手伝いするー！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンのジムショのハナシー？
ユメも大きくなったらお手伝いするー！

engChrName: Grandpa said I couldn't, but I'm not gonna listen to him!
engSearchText:
Grandpa said I couldn't, but I'm not gonna listen
to him!
jpnChrName: おじーちゃんにいったらハンタイしたけど しらないモンねー。
jpnSearchText:
おじーちゃんにいったらハンタイしたけど
しらないモンねー。

engChrName: I'm sure hearing that would make him a bit sad...
engSearchText: I'm sure hearing that would make him a bit sad...
jpnChrName: それはビクトル様が 少々お可哀想ですけど……
jpnSearchText:
それはビクトル様が
少々お可哀想ですけど……

engChrName: I know I'd be happy to have you on the team, though.
engSearchText: I know I'd be happy to have you on the team, though.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、でも確かに ユメちゃんなら百人力ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、でも確かに
ユメちゃんなら百人力ですね。

engChrName: Oh, for sure!
engSearchText: Oh, for sure!
jpnChrName: うんうん、間違いないですよっ。
jpnSearchText: うんうん、間違いないですよっ。

engChrName: Sure is noisy over there. But I guess that's what happens when three quarters of the group're kids.
engSearchText:
Sure is noisy over there. But I guess that's what
happens when three quarters of the group're kids.
jpnChrName: ったく姦しいな…… さすがガキ率７５パーだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ったく姦しいな……
さすがガキ率７５パーだぜ。

engChrName: They're just in what I call the hot springs vacation spirit. Think it's probably time we got out anyways.
engSearchText:
They're just in what I call the hot springs
vacation spirit. Think it's probably time we got
out anyways.
jpnChrName: ま、温泉旅行ならではだろ。 ──そろそろ時間だし上がるか。
jpnSearchText:
ま、温泉旅行ならではだろ。
──そろそろ時間だし上がるか。

engChrName: *sigh* Getting in the bath with everyone does seem like it would help me get to know them all better...
engSearchText:
*sigh* Getting in the bath with everyone does seem
like it would help me get to know them all better...
jpnChrName: 風呂か……確かにコミュニケーションの 円滑化には効果がありそうだけど。
jpnSearchText:
風呂か……確かにコミュニケーションの
円滑化には効果がありそうだけど。

engChrName: But...
engSearchText: But...
jpnChrName: でも……
jpnSearchText: でも……

engChrName: (I doubt they'd work out the truth that easily, but I couldn't be as comfortable as I can with Gran and the others back home...)
engSearchText:
(I doubt they'd work out the truth that easily, but I
couldn't be as comfortable as I can with Gran and the
others back home...)
jpnChrName: （……そう簡単にはバレないと思うけど   博士たち相手のようにはいかないや……）
jpnSearchText:
（……そう簡単にはバレないと思うけど
博士たち相手のようにはいかないや……）

engChrName: (Still, it would be a waste just to have a shower, so maybe I'll sneak in later once everyone's done.)
engSearchText:
(Still, it would be a waste just to have a shower,
so maybe I'll sneak in later once everyone's done.)
jpnChrName: （まあ、シャワーだけってのも寂しいし、   食後にこっそり一人で入ろうかな……？）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ、シャワーだけってのも寂しいし、
食後にこっそり一人で入ろうかな……？）

engChrName: November 14th, 6:30PM
engSearchText: November 14th, 6:30PM

engChrName: Is this where we get to eat?
engSearchText: Is this where we get to eat?
jpnChrName: ここがゴハンのばしょー？
jpnSearchText: ここがゴハンのばしょー？

engChrName: *whistle* Now this is fancy.
engSearchText: *whistle* Now this is fancy.
jpnChrName: ヒュウ、小洒落てんな。
jpnSearchText: ヒュウ、小洒落てんな。

engChrName: It's so grown up...
engSearchText: It's so grown up...
jpnChrName: お、大人な感じです……
jpnSearchText: お、大人な感じです……

engChrName: It really is a lovely room. Oh, but...
engSearchText: It really is a lovely room. Oh, but...
jpnChrName: ふふっ、素敵ですね。 あ、でも……
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、素敵ですね。
あ、でも……

engChrName: There's other customers here, so we probably shouldn't be eatin' here when we've got a kid with us.
engSearchText:
There's other customers here, so we probably
shouldn't be eatin' here when we've got a kid with us.
jpnChrName: いい部屋だが他の客もいるし、 子供連れじゃ申し訳ねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
いい部屋だが他の客もいるし、
子供連れじゃ申し訳ねぇな。

engChrName: Maybe we should eat in the lounge where we had lunch instead?
engSearchText:
Maybe we should eat in the lounge where we had
lunch instead?
jpnChrName: 昼間のラウンジでもいいから そっちにしてくれるか？
jpnSearchText:
昼間のラウンジでもいいから
そっちにしてくれるか？

engChrName: Hmm?
engSearchText: Hmm?
jpnChrName: んー？
jpnSearchText: んー？

engChrName: There's no need for concern. This room has been well soundproofed.
engSearchText:
There's no need for concern. This room has been
well soundproofed.
jpnChrName: いえ、どうかお気になさらず。 防音もしっかりしていますし。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、どうかお気になさらず。
防音もしっかりしていますし。

engChrName: She isn't going to be a bother to anyone.
engSearchText: She isn't going to be a bother to anyone.
jpnChrName: 多少お子さんがはしゃがれても 大丈夫ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
多少お子さんがはしゃがれても
大丈夫ですよ。

engChrName: Well, if you're sure...
engSearchText: Well, if you're sure...
jpnChrName: そうなんですか……
jpnSearchText: そうなんですか……

engChrName: In that case, I think it would be rude to turn them down.
engSearchText:
In that case, I think it would be rude to turn
them down.
jpnChrName: でしたらお言葉に甘えた方が 宜しいかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
でしたらお言葉に甘えた方が
宜しいかもしれませんね。

engChrName: All the other customers do seem to have their own rooms—
engSearchText:
All the other customers do seem to have their own
rooms—
jpnChrName: うん、確かに他のお客さんも それぞれ個室みたいだし──
jpnSearchText:
うん、確かに他のお客さんも
それぞれ個室みたいだし──

engChrName: We've prepared the same room you used last night.
engSearchText: We've prepared the same room you used last night.
jpnChrName: ──それでは昨晩と同じく、 こちらをお使いください。
jpnSearchText:
──それでは昨晩と同じく、
こちらをお使いください。

engChrName: Thanks! Yesterday's food was really good, so I can't wait for... Oh.
engSearchText:
Thanks! Yesterday's food was really good, so I can't
wait for... Oh.
jpnChrName: ありがとう、昨日も美味しかったし 今日も楽しみに──あ。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとう、昨日も美味しかったし
今日も楽しみに──あ。

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...
jpnChrName: あー……
jpnSearchText: あー……

engChrName: It's the lady from earlier!
engSearchText: It's the lady from earlier!
jpnChrName: あ、さっきのおねーちゃん？
jpnSearchText: あ、さっきのおねーちゃん？

engChrName: G-Good evening, Judith...
engSearchText: G-Good evening, Judith...
jpnChrName: こ、こんばんは、ジュディスさん。
jpnSearchText: こ、こんばんは、ジュディスさん。

engChrName: Almost forgot you were staying in the same place as us.
engSearchText:
Almost forgot you were staying in the same place
as us.
jpnChrName: そういや同じ宿に 泊まってるっつー話だったな。
jpnSearchText:
そういや同じ宿に
泊まってるっつー話だったな。

engChrName: O-Oh, right. You did say that you were here for a few days on vacation...
engSearchText:
O-Oh, right. You did say that you were here for a few
days on vacation...
jpnChrName: な、なるほど、慰安旅行に 来ているって言ってたわね……
jpnSearchText:
な、なるほど、慰安旅行に
来ているって言ってたわね……

engChrName: W-Well, I'll just be going, then— WAIT! I need food!
engSearchText:
W-Well, I'll just be going, then—
WAIT! I need food!
jpnChrName: そ、それじゃああたしはこっちに…… ──って落ち着けるかっ！
jpnSearchText:
そ、それじゃああたしはこっちに……
──って落ち着けるかっ！

engChrName: Ahem. I'm really sorry to ask, but could I have my meal in my room?
engSearchText:
Ahem. I'm really sorry to ask, but could I have my
meal in my room?
jpnChrName: コホン、その、申し訳ないけれど “部屋食”をお願いできないかしら？
jpnSearchText:
コホン、その、申し訳ないけれど
“部屋食”をお願いできないかしら？

engChrName: I'd be happy to pay you extra for the trouble.
engSearchText: I'd be happy to pay you extra for the trouble.
jpnChrName: もちろん別料金はお払いするわ。
jpnSearchText: もちろん別料金はお払いするわ。

engChrName: O-Oh... If that's what you would prefer, then we'd be happy to accommodate you. There's no need to pay extra, however.
engSearchText:
O-Oh... If that's what you would prefer, then we'd be
happy to accommodate you. There's no need to pay
extra, however.
jpnChrName: ええと……はい、承知しました。 別料金なども結構ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ええと……はい、承知しました。
別料金なども結構ですよ。

engChrName: We'll see to getting your room ready—
engSearchText: We'll see to getting your room ready—
jpnChrName: それではお部屋の方に準備を──
jpnSearchText: それではお部屋の方に準備を──

engChrName: Are you one of Van's friends, too?
engSearchText: Are you one of Van's friends, too?
jpnChrName: ねえねえ、このおねーちゃんも ヴァンたちのお友だちー？
jpnSearchText:
ねえねえ、このおねーちゃんも
ヴァンたちのお友だちー？

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?
jpnChrName: へ。
jpnSearchText: へ。

engChrName: What are you doing, Yumé?
engSearchText: What are you doing, Yumé?
jpnChrName: ユ、ユメちゃん？
jpnSearchText: ユ、ユメちゃん？

engChrName: When did you get there?
engSearchText: When did you get there?
jpnChrName: いつのまに……
jpnSearchText: いつのまに……

engChrName: What's your name? You're so pretty!
engSearchText: What's your name? You're so pretty!
jpnChrName: おねーちゃんキレイだねー、 おナマエなんてゆうのー？
jpnSearchText:
おねーちゃんキレイだねー、
おナマエなんてゆうのー？

engChrName: I'm Yumé! I'm going to be a cute waitress at Montmart one day!
engSearchText:
I'm Yumé! I'm going to be a cute waitress at
Montmart one day!
jpnChrName: あたしユメ！　モンマルトの “じき”カンバンムスメだよー！
jpnSearchText:
あたしユメ！　モンマルトの
“じき”カンバンムスメだよー！

engChrName: R-Really? Isn't that something? (A liiittle help here?)
engSearchText:
R-Really? Isn't that something?
(A liiittle help here?)
jpnChrName: そ、そう、それは凄いわねぇ…… （……ってちょっと。）
jpnSearchText:
そ、そう、それは凄いわねぇ……
（……ってちょっと。）

engChrName: Erm... Yumes, she's not—
engSearchText: Erm... Yumes, she's not—
jpnChrName: あーユメ坊、そのお姉ちゃんは……
jpnSearchText: あーユメ坊、そのお姉ちゃんは……

engChrName: Hmm?
engSearchText: Hmm?

engChrName: Erk...
engSearchText: Erk...
jpnChrName: うっ……
jpnSearchText: うっ……

engChrName: M-My name's Judith. I-It's nice to meet you, Yumé.
engSearchText: M-My name's Judith. I-It's nice to meet you, Yumé.
jpnChrName: ──ジュ、ジュディスよ。 よろしくね～、ユメちゃん。
jpnSearchText:
──ジュ、ジュディスよ。
よろしくね～、ユメちゃん。

engChrName: You, too!
engSearchText: You, too!
jpnChrName: うんー！ よろしく、ジュディスー！
jpnSearchText:
うんー！
よろしく、ジュディスー！

engChrName: Come have your dinner with us! Eating by yourself is so lonely.
engSearchText:
Come have your dinner with us! Eating by yourself is
so lonely.
jpnChrName: ひとりだけはサビしーし、 いっしょに食べよーよ！
jpnSearchText:
ひとりだけはサビしーし、
いっしょに食べよーよ！

engChrName: It'll be way more fun together!
engSearchText: It'll be way more fun together!
jpnChrName: イッパイの方がおいしーし、たのしーよ！
jpnSearchText: イッパイの方がおいしーし、たのしーよ！

engChrName: Uh, hold on!
engSearchText: Uh, hold on!
jpnChrName: えええええっ！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>えええええっ！？

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...
jpnChrName: え、えっと……
jpnSearchText: え、えっと……

engChrName: Umm... What would you like to do?
engSearchText: Umm... What would you like to do?
jpnChrName: どう、なさいますか……？
jpnSearchText: どう、なさいますか……？

engChrName: Well, we DO know her—so I guess it's up to our friend over there.
engSearchText:
Well, we DO know her—so I guess it's up to our
friend over there.
jpnChrName: ま、知り合いなのは確かだし、 そちらのレディ次第じゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
ま、知り合いなのは確かだし、
そちらのレディ次第じゃないか？

engChrName: The menu changes daily here, so we'd both be getting the same options regardless, right?
engSearchText:
The menu changes daily here, so we'd both be getting
the same options regardless, right?
jpnChrName: ここは日替わりだった筈だし どちらもメニューは同じなんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
ここは日替わりだった筈だし
どちらもメニューは同じなんだろ？

engChrName: Yes, that's correct.
engSearchText: Yes, that's correct.
jpnChrName: ええ、それはもう。
jpnSearchText: ええ、それはもう。

engChrName: We can accommodate either decision. Just let us know what you would prefer.
engSearchText:
We can accommodate either decision. Just let us
know what you would prefer.
jpnChrName: お子様用のお料理も含めて 如何ようにも対応できますよ。
jpnSearchText:
お子様用のお料理も含めて
如何ようにも対応できますよ。

engChrName: L-Listen, Yumé...
engSearchText: L-Listen, Yumé...
jpnChrName: あ、あのねユメちゃん……
jpnSearchText: あ、あのねユメちゃん……

engChrName: ...You aren't gonna come join us?
engSearchText: ...You aren't gonna come join us?
jpnChrName: ？　いっしょに食べないのー……？
jpnSearchText: ？　いっしょに食べないのー……？

engChrName: Erk...
engSearchText: Erk...
jpnChrName: ううっ……
jpnSearchText: ううっ……

engChrName: (...And Yumé wins this round.)
engSearchText: (...And Yumé wins this round.)
jpnChrName: （……落ちたね。）
jpnSearchText: （……落ちたね。）

engChrName: (Didn't stand a chance.)
engSearchText: (Didn't stand a chance.)
jpnChrName: （落ちやがったなァ。）
jpnSearchText: （落ちやがったなァ。）

engChrName: (I don't think any of us would.)
engSearchText: (I don't think any of us would.)
jpnChrName: （まあ、無理もないかと。）
jpnSearchText: （まあ、無理もないかと。）

engChrName: Augh! Fine!
engSearchText: Augh! Fine!
jpnChrName: ええい、仕方ないでしょ！
jpnSearchText: ええい、仕方ないでしょ！

engChrName: Bring my food in here, please! I accept my fate!
engSearchText: Bring my food in here, please! I accept my fate!
jpnChrName: ──こうなったら毒を喰らわばよっ！ あたしの料理もこっちに運んでちょうだい！
jpnSearchText:
──こうなったら毒を喰らわばよっ！
あたしの料理もこっちに運んでちょうだい！

engChrName: Yaaay!
engSearchText: Yaaay!
jpnChrName: わーいっ！
jpnSearchText: わーいっ！

engChrName: Heehee. We're happy for you, Yumé.
engSearchText: Heehee. We're happy for you, Yumé.
jpnChrName: えへへ…… よかったねユメちゃんっ。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……
よかったねユメちゃんっ。

engChrName: Ahaha... I hope this isn't too much trouble.
engSearchText: Ahaha... I hope this isn't too much trouble.
jpnChrName: あはは…… よろしくお願いできますか？
jpnSearchText:
あはは……
よろしくお願いできますか？

engChrName: Not at all.
engSearchText: Not at all.
jpnChrName: ええ、それはもちろん。
jpnSearchText: ええ、それはもちろん。

engChrName: We'll get everything ready at once.
engSearchText: We'll get everything ready at once.
jpnChrName: それでは椅子などの ご用意をいたしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
それでは椅子などの
ご用意をいたしましょう。

engChrName: *munch* This tastes so goooood!
engSearchText: *munch* This tastes so goooood!
jpnChrName: もぐもぐ……おいしー！
jpnSearchText: もぐもぐ……おいしー！

engChrName: Careful, or you're going to get it all over you again.
engSearchText: Careful, or you're going to get it all over you again.
jpnChrName: ああ、またこぼしてるよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、またこぼしてるよ。

engChrName: I never would've thought you were the infamous Grimcat causing trouble in the capital.
engSearchText:
I never would've thought you were the infamous
Grimcat causing trouble in the capital.
jpnChrName: ──しかしまさか首都を騒がす 《怪盗グリムキャッツ》の正体がねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
──しかしまさか首都を騒がす
《怪盗グリムキャッツ》の正体がねぇ。

engChrName: Even after seeing you in that outfit, I'm still having a hard time believing it.
engSearchText:
Even after seeing you in that outfit, I'm still having a
hard time believing it.
jpnChrName: この目で見ちゃった今も まだ信じられないんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
この目で見ちゃった今も
まだ信じられないんだけど……

engChrName: I wasn't there to see you in that outfit, so I'm still having a hard time believing it.
engSearchText:
I wasn't there to see you in that outfit, so I'm still
having a hard time believing it.
jpnChrName: この目で見られなかったから まだ信じられないんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
この目で見られなかったから
まだ信じられないんだけど……

engChrName: Ahaha. I don't blame you.
engSearchText: Ahaha. I don't blame you.
jpnChrName: あはは、そうですよねぇ。
jpnSearchText: あはは、そうですよねぇ。

engChrName: Like I said, though, your secret's safe with us. Don't stress.
engSearchText:
Like I said, though, your secret's safe with us.
Don't stress.
jpnChrName: ま、言ったように俺たちから バラすことはねぇから安心しな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、言ったように俺たちから
バラすことはねぇから安心しな。

engChrName: Thank you again for saving us back at Al-Jumeirah, by the way.
engSearchText:
Thank you again for saving us back at Al-Jumeirah,
by the way.
jpnChrName: それと、改めてアルジュメイラホテルで 助けていただいてありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
それと、改めてアルジュメイラホテルで
助けていただいてありがとうございます。

engChrName: D-Don't mention it. You were only there because of a job from me and Nina. It was the least I could do.
engSearchText:
D-Don't mention it. You were only there because of
a job from me and Nina. It was the least I could do.
jpnChrName: ふ、ふん……そもそもの依頼が あたし達からだったし当然でしょ。
jpnSearchText:
ふ、ふん……そもそもの依頼が
あたし達からだったし当然でしょ。

engChrName: I think I can trust that you won't tell anyone, though. Especially since you seem to have your own stuff you want to keep quiet.
engSearchText:
I think I can trust that you won't tell anyone, though.
Especially since you seem to have your own stuff you
want to keep quiet.
jpnChrName: ──そちらも事情がありそうだし バラさないってのは一旦信用するわ。
jpnSearchText:
──そちらも事情がありそうだし
バラさないってのは一旦信用するわ。

engChrName: Still, if it gets out, it gets out. I'm even prepared to abandon my career as an actress if that happens.
engSearchText:
Still, if it gets out, it gets out. I'm even prepared to
abandon my career as an actress if that happens.
jpnChrName: ま、バレたらバレたで何時でも 表から身を引く覚悟はできてるけどね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、バレたらバレたで何時でも
表から身を引く覚悟はできてるけどね。

engChrName: Y-You are?
engSearchText: Y-You are?
jpnChrName: そ、そうなんですか？
jpnSearchText: そ、そうなんですか？

engChrName: Heh. I guess if you didn't have that much resolve, you wouldn't target bigwig politicians and the like in the first place.
engSearchText:
Heh. I guess if you didn't have that much resolve, you
wouldn't target bigwig politicians and the like in the
first place.
jpnChrName: ハン……ま、そうじゃねえと 大物政治家なんかは狙えねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……ま、そうじゃねえと
大物政治家なんかは狙えねぇか。

engChrName: How many other people know your identity other than us?
engSearchText:
How many other people know your identity other
than us?
jpnChrName: 察するにこの事をご存じなのは わたくしたち以外には……？
jpnSearchText:
察するにこの事をご存じなのは
わたくしたち以外には……？

engChrName: A handful, but they're all people who have different sides of their own.
engSearchText:
A handful, but they're all people who have different
sides of their own.
jpnChrName: 何人かいるけど、全員裏の世界に 関わりがあるような面子ばかりね。
jpnSearchText:
何人かいるけど、全員裏の世界に
関わりがあるような面子ばかりね。

engChrName: I've somehow managed to keep the whole film industry in the dark, though.
engSearchText:
I've somehow managed to keep the whole film
industry in the dark, though.
jpnChrName: 逆にニナとか映画関係者には 何とか隠しおおせているけど……
jpnSearchText:
逆にニナとか映画関係者には
何とか隠しおおせているけど……

engChrName: ...Seriously, please don't tell anyone. I'll even pay you hush money if I have to.
engSearchText:
...Seriously, please don't tell anyone. I'll even pay you
hush money if I have to.
jpnChrName: ………ホント頼むわよ？ 何だったら口止め料も払うから。
jpnSearchText:
………ホント頼むわよ？
何だったら口止め料も払うから。

engChrName: Nah, your hush money's no good here. Happy to pick up more work from you, though.
engSearchText:
Nah, your hush money's no good here. Happy to pick
up more work from you, though.
jpnChrName: いらねぇっつの。 依頼なら受け付けてやるがな。
jpnSearchText:
いらねぇっつの。
依頼なら受け付けてやるがな。

engChrName: But y'know, it's been eight years now since all the phantom thief hubbub started...
engSearchText:
But y'know, it's been eight years now since all the
phantom thief hubbub started...
jpnChrName: しかし怪盗ってのが話題になってから ８年くらいは経っている筈だが……
jpnSearchText:
しかし怪盗ってのが話題になってから
８年くらいは経っている筈だが……

engChrName: So what, you've been living a double life like this since you were a kid?
engSearchText:
So what, you've been living a double life like this
since you were a kid?
jpnChrName: ずっと二足のわらじを履いてるのかよ？
jpnSearchText: ずっと二足のわらじを履いてるのかよ？

engChrName: Yeah. I started out both as a thief and an actress at the same time, when I was fourteen.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I started out both as a thief and an actress at
the same time, when I was fourteen.
jpnChrName: ええ、どっちも １４歳がデビューだったわね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、どっちも
１４歳がデビューだったわね。

engChrName: I can't say it's been easy, but I had rivals in both fields who spurred me on.
engSearchText:
I can't say it's been easy, but I had rivals in both fields
who spurred me on.
jpnChrName: メチャクチャ大変だったけど それぞれ“ライバル”とかもいて……
jpnSearchText:
メチャクチャ大変だったけど
それぞれ“ライバル”とかもいて……

engChrName: Mom and Grammy were against my decision, but back when they had the mantle—
engSearchText:
Mom and Grammy were against my decision, but
back when they had the mantle—
jpnChrName: ママとお祖母ちゃんには反対されたけど 自分たちだって現役の頃は──
jpnSearchText:
ママとお祖母ちゃんには反対されたけど
自分たちだって現役の頃は──

engChrName: You just can't stop putting your foot in your mouth, can you?
engSearchText:
You just can't stop putting your foot in your mouth,
can you?
jpnChrName: クク、自爆しすぎだろ。
jpnSearchText: クク、自爆しすぎだろ。

engChrName: Ahaha... I can't help but be curious about your family and rivals, though.
engSearchText:
Ahaha... I can't help but be curious about your family
and rivals, though.
jpnChrName: あはは……ライバルとか ご家族の話は気になりますけど。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……ライバルとか
ご家族の話は気になりますけど。

engChrName: It's impolite to pry too much, however.
engSearchText: It's impolite to pry too much, however.
jpnChrName: あまり突っ込んだ話は 伺わない方がよさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
あまり突っ込んだ話は
伺わない方がよさそうですね。

engChrName: Still, hearing that reminds me of some things I've read in the past.
engSearchText:
Still, hearing that reminds me of some things I've
read in the past.
jpnChrName: ……成程、昔の記録でも 名前を見かけた気がするけど。
jpnSearchText:
……成程、昔の記録でも
名前を見かけた気がするけど。

engChrName: So you're not the first Grimcat, then? There were a couple more before you?
engSearchText:
So you're not the first Grimcat, then? There were a
couple more before you?
jpnChrName: どうやら《グリムキャッツ》ってのは 先代と、先々代もいるらしいな？
jpnSearchText:
どうやら《グリムキャッツ》ってのは
先代と、先々代もいるらしいな？

engChrName: So much for not prying! I REALLY hope I can trust you guys on the secret thing!
engSearchText:
So much for not prying! I REALLY hope I can trust
you guys on the secret thing!
jpnChrName: って突っ込んでるじゃないの！ ──ねえ、ほんと頼むわよっ！？
jpnSearchText:
って突っ込んでるじゃないの！
──ねえ、ほんと頼むわよっ！？

engChrName: You can, you can. We got you.
engSearchText: You can, you can. We got you.
jpnChrName: あー、分かってるって。
jpnSearchText: あー、分かってるって。

engChrName: It was the Grimcat in you that put you on Maxim's trail, then?
engSearchText:
It was the Grimcat in you that put you on Maxim's
trail, then?
jpnChrName: しかしやっぱりマクシムの件は “そっち”絡みで疑ってたわけだな？
jpnSearchText:
しかしやっぱりマクシムの件は
“そっち”絡みで疑ってたわけだな？

engChrName: Yeah. I suspected he had something to do with Almata.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I suspected he had something to do
with Almata.
jpnChrName: うん……例のマフィア、 《アルマータ》絡みでね。
jpnSearchText:
うん……例のマフィア、
《アルマータ》絡みでね。

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?

engChrName: How come?
engSearchText: How come?
jpnChrName: それってどういう……？
jpnSearchText: それってどういう……？

engChrName: It's not just politics and entertainment that they have influence in, but sports, too.
engSearchText:
It's not just politics and entertainment that they have
influence in, but sports, too.
jpnChrName: ……政財界や芸能界もそうだけど スポーツ界にも連中の影響があってね。
jpnSearchText:
……政財界や芸能界もそうだけど
スポーツ界にも連中の影響があってね。

engChrName: There's all kinds of shady rumors floating around about them even now, from them supplying illegal donations to stories of human trafficking.
engSearchText:
There's all kinds of shady rumors floating around
about them even now, from them supplying illegal
donations to stories of human trafficking.
jpnChrName: 例のシーシャの他にも、闇献金やら 人身売買やらの黒い噂が流れてるのよ。
jpnSearchText:
例のシーシャの他にも、闇献金やら
人身売買やらの黒い噂が流れてるのよ。

engChrName: Then I started hearing stories of Maxim traveling around from place to place.
engSearchText:
Then I started hearing stories of Maxim traveling
around from place to place.
jpnChrName: そんな中、あのＺ１チャンピオンが 定期的に各地に行ってる噂を聞いて……
jpnSearchText:
そんな中、あのＺ１チャンピオンが
定期的に各地に行ってる噂を聞いて……

engChrName: It made me start to wonder if that was because he was doing something on behalf of the mafia.
engSearchText:
It made me start to wonder if that was because he was
doing something on behalf of the mafia.
jpnChrName: マフィアどもとつるんで何かやってると 当たりを付けて探ろうとしたんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
マフィアどもとつるんで何かやってると
当たりを付けて探ろうとしたんだけど……

engChrName: ...You're really sure it isn't, right?
engSearchText: ...You're really sure it isn't, right?
jpnChrName: ………ホント関係ないのよね？
jpnSearchText: ………ホント関係ないのよね？

engChrName: Like I said, I can tell you that's NOT why he's travelin' around.
engSearchText:
Like I said, I can tell you that's NOT why he's
travelin' around.
jpnChrName: ああ、少なくとも “各地”については言った通りだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、少なくとも
“各地”については言った通りだぜ。

engChrName: But we can't tell you his actual reasons, since that's private.
engSearchText:
But we can't tell you his actual reasons, since
that's private.
jpnChrName: その、極めてプライベートかつ繊細な、 家庭の事情といいますか……
jpnSearchText:
その、極めてプライベートかつ繊細な、
家庭の事情といいますか……

engChrName: True—though he made his mess, so now he's got to clean it up.
engSearchText:
True—though he made his mess, so now he's got to
clean it up.
jpnChrName: まあ自業自得ですし、マクシムさんの がんばりしだいですけど。
jpnSearchText:
まあ自業自得ですし、マクシムさんの
がんばりしだいですけど。

engChrName: You don't ease up when it comes to him, do you?
engSearchText: You don't ease up when it comes to him, do you?
jpnChrName: 君、けっこう彼に当たり強いよね？
jpnSearchText: 君、けっこう彼に当たり強いよね？

engChrName: He got up to some other dumb stuff in Langport, too, but nothing that would cause harm.
engSearchText:
He got up to some other dumb stuff in Langport, too,
but nothing that would cause harm.
jpnChrName: ま、煌都でも人捜し以外は バカやってただけみてぇだしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、煌都でも人捜し以外は
バカやってただけみてぇだしな。

engChrName: Marduk's assessment of his potential involvement with Almata was negative as well.
engSearchText:
Marduk's assessment of his potential involvement
with Almata was negative as well.
jpnChrName: マルドゥックでのスクリーニングでも 《Ａ》の関係者判定は“陰性（マイナス）”でしたね。
jpnSearchText:
マルドゥックでのスクリーニングでも
《Ａ》の関係者判定は“陰性（マイナス）”でしたね。

engChrName: Your guys really do look into everyone and everything, huh?
engSearchText:
Your guys really do look into everyone and
everything, huh?
jpnChrName: そんな事まで調べてんのかよ……
jpnSearchText: そんな事まで調べてんのかよ……

engChrName: *sigh* I can't believe I screwed up so bad. Things haven't been great lately, so I was just desperate to turn them around...
engSearchText:
*sigh* I can't believe I screwed up so bad.
Things haven't been great lately, so I was just
desperate to turn them around...
jpnChrName: はあああっ……やっちゃったなぁ。 最近スランプ気味だからムキになって。
jpnSearchText:
はあああっ……やっちゃったなぁ。
最近スランプ気味だからムキになって。

engChrName: Nina won the Lionne d'Or instead of me, another rival of mine's been doing super good lately...
engSearchText:
Nina won the Lionne d'Or instead of me, another
rival of mine's been doing super good lately...
jpnChrName: ニナには最優秀賞取られちゃうし…… ……“彼女”も充実してるみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
ニナには最優秀賞取られちゃうし……
……“彼女”も充実してるみたいだし。

engChrName: I've been trying my hardest, too, but Mom and Grammy just...
engSearchText:
I've been trying my hardest, too, but Mom and
Grammy just...
jpnChrName: あたしだって頑張ってるのに…… ……それなのにママもお祖母ちゃんも……
jpnSearchText:
あたしだって頑張ってるのに……
……それなのにママもお祖母ちゃんも……

engChrName: O-Oh, but I loved Golden Blood, too, though!
engSearchText: O-Oh, but I loved Golden Blood, too, though!
jpnChrName: そ、その、『ゴールデンブラッド』、 とっても素敵だったと思います……！
jpnSearchText:
そ、その、『ゴールデンブラッド』、
とっても素敵だったと思います……！

engChrName: It was a little bit...raunchy, but the action scenes were so cool!
engSearchText:
It was a little bit...raunchy, but the action scenes were
so cool!
jpnChrName: えと、ちょっとエッチでしたけど アクションとかカッコイイですよねっ。
jpnSearchText:
えと、ちょっとエッチでしたけど
アクションとかカッコイイですよねっ。

engChrName: Y-You really think so? But I'm not the one who made it raunchy, just to be clear!
engSearchText:
Y-You really think so? But I'm not the one who made
it raunchy, just to be clear!
jpnChrName: そ、そう……？ ──ってあたしはエッチじゃないっ！！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そう……？
──ってあたしはエッチじゃないっ！！

engChrName: That's all the director being a filthy pervert! He has to go for the same sexed-up angles every single time!
engSearchText:
That's all the director being a filthy pervert! He has to
go for the same sexed-up angles every single time!
jpnChrName: あれは監督のスケベ根性のせいよ！ ゴッチめぇ～、毎度毎度あんなアングルを！
jpnSearchText:
あれは監督のスケベ根性のせいよ！
ゴッチめぇ～、毎度毎度あんなアングルを！

engChrName: I'd believe that more if I hadn't seen what you wear as Grimcat...
engSearchText:
I'd believe that more if I hadn't seen what you wear
as Grimcat...
jpnChrName: うーん、“裏”がアレなら 好きでやってるようにしか……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、“裏”がアレなら
好きでやってるようにしか……

engChrName: Hell, speaking of, you should try getting him to make a film about Grimcat.
engSearchText:
Hell, speaking of, you should try getting him to make
a film about Grimcat.
jpnChrName: いっそグリムキャッツの映画化とか あのオヤジに撮ってもらったらどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
いっそグリムキャッツの映画化とか
あのオヤジに撮ってもらったらどうだ？

engChrName: There's a role you were born for.
engSearchText: There's a role you were born for.
jpnChrName: ハマリ役、間違いナシだろーぜ。
jpnSearchText: ハマリ役、間違いナシだろーぜ。

engChrName: Oh, now THAT I'd pay good money to see.
engSearchText: Oh, now THAT I'd pay good money to see.
jpnChrName: おお……！ そいつは結構見てみてぇな。
jpnSearchText:
おお……！
そいつは結構見てみてぇな。

engChrName: I suspect a lot of people would.
engSearchText: I suspect a lot of people would.
jpnChrName: 何気に相当ヒットしそうですね。
jpnSearchText: 何気に相当ヒットしそうですね。

engChrName: Hmm... Now that you mention it, he'd probably be able to get some hot shots out of that catsuit...
engSearchText:
Hmm... Now that you mention it, he'd probably be
able to get some hot shots out of that catsuit...
jpnChrName: うーん、確かにあの監督なら キャットスーツの魅力を最大限に……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、確かにあの監督なら
キャットスーツの魅力を最大限に……

engChrName: No! HELL no! Never mention that idea around him ever, or he'd for sure do it!
engSearchText:
No! HELL no! Never mention that idea
around him ever, or he'd for sure do it!
jpnChrName: ──って冗談じゃないわ！ マジで実現したらどうすんのっ！？
jpnSearchText:
──って冗談じゃないわ！
マジで実現したらどうすんのっ！？

engChrName: What's a Grimcat? Is it a kitty? I'd watch that!
engSearchText: What's a Grimcat? Is it a kitty? I'd watch that!
jpnChrName: ぐりむきゃっつのエイガー？ ユメもみたーい！！
jpnSearchText:
ぐりむきゃっつのエイガー？
ユメもみたーい！！

engChrName: Mmm... I'm not full yet...
engSearchText: Mmm... I'm not full yet...
jpnChrName: むにゃむにゃ…… ……まだユメたべられるよー……
jpnSearchText:
むにゃむにゃ……
……まだユメたべられるよー……

engChrName: Ahaha. Looks like all that running around today finally caught up to her, huh?
engSearchText:
Ahaha. Looks like all that running around today
finally caught up to her, huh?
jpnChrName: あはは、さすがに 眠くなっちゃったかな？
jpnSearchText:
あはは、さすがに
眠くなっちゃったかな？

engChrName: She's got a bright future up ahead, this one.
engSearchText: She's got a bright future up ahead, this one.
jpnChrName: クク、なかなか 大物になりそうじゃねーか。
jpnSearchText:
クク、なかなか
大物になりそうじゃねーか。

engChrName: We're sorry for all the trouble she ended up causing you, Judith.
engSearchText:
We're sorry for all the trouble she ended up causing
you, Judith.
jpnChrName: すみません、ジュディスさん。 なんだか色々と……
jpnSearchText:
すみません、ジュディスさん。
なんだか色々と……

engChrName: Oh, it's fine. Don't worry about it.
engSearchText: Oh, it's fine. Don't worry about it.
jpnChrName: あー、いいわよ。 そっとしておきなさい。
jpnSearchText:
あー、いいわよ。
そっとしておきなさい。

engChrName: Don't think she'll be letting go anytime soon. You want me to look after her for a while?
engSearchText:
Don't think she'll be letting go anytime soon.
You want me to look after her for a while?
jpnChrName: ……なんかガッチリ掴んでるし しばらく面倒見ておきましょうか？
jpnSearchText:
……なんかガッチリ掴んでるし
しばらく面倒見ておきましょうか？

engChrName: It's been a long day for me, too. We can both have ourselves a nice nap.
engSearchText:
It's been a long day for me, too. We can both have
ourselves a nice nap.
jpnChrName: あたしも色々あって疲れちゃったし、 自分の部屋でこの子と一眠りするわ。
jpnSearchText:
あたしも色々あって疲れちゃったし、
自分の部屋でこの子と一眠りするわ。

engChrName: A-Are you sure?
engSearchText: A-Are you sure?
jpnChrName: い、いいんですか？
jpnSearchText: い、いいんですか？

engChrName: If you really don't mind, that'd be great.
engSearchText: If you really don't mind, that'd be great.
jpnChrName: 悪ぃな、折角だし頼めるか？
jpnSearchText: 悪ぃな、折角だし頼めるか？

engChrName: Thank you. I doubt she'll sleep for more than an hour or two.
engSearchText:
Thank you. I doubt she'll sleep for more than an hour
or two.
jpnChrName: 助かります……１、２時間したら 目を覚ますと思いますから。
jpnSearchText:
助かります……１、２時間したら
目を覚ますと思いますから。

engChrName: If she causes you any fuss or if you need anything, please let us know.
engSearchText:
If she causes you any fuss or if you need anything,
please let us know.
jpnChrName: ご不便がございましたら 何なりとお申し付けください。
jpnSearchText:
ご不便がございましたら
何なりとお申し付けください。

engChrName: Sure. Can I have your number, then?
engSearchText: Sure. Can I have your number, then?
jpnChrName: ええ、それじゃあ番号を──
jpnSearchText: ええ、それじゃあ番号を──

engChrName: (It's not even 10PM yet, so this might be a good time to head out.)
engSearchText:
(It's not even 10PM yet, so this might be a good time
to head out.)
jpnChrName: （まだ９時過ぎ……   ちょうどいいタイミングかもな。）
jpnSearchText:
（まだ９時過ぎ……
ちょうどいいタイミングかもな。）

engChrName: (Nothin' smells off, but it might be worth walking around for a bit just in case.)
engSearchText:
(Nothin' smells off, but it might be worth walking
around for a bit just in case.)
jpnChrName: （……特に匂いはしないが   念のため回ってから行ってみるか。）
jpnSearchText:
（……特に匂いはしないが
念のため回ってから行ってみるか。）

engChrName: (I don't want my assistants pickin' up on anything, so I think I'll leave them be.)
engSearchText:
(I don't want my assistants pickin' up on anything, so
I think I'll leave them be.)
jpnChrName: （……助手どもにはあんまり   突っ込まれないようにしたいが──）
jpnSearchText:
（……助手どもにはあんまり
突っ込まれないようにしたいが──）

engChrName: (I should at least go thank Judith personally and apologize before I head out, though.)
engSearchText:
(I should at least go thank Judith personally and
apologize before I head out, though.)
jpnChrName: （せめてジュディスにくらいは   礼と詫びを言ってから出かけるかね。）
jpnSearchText:
（せめてジュディスにくらいは
礼と詫びを言ってから出かけるかね。）

engChrName: (Looks like someone does live here now after all. Makes sense. It has been five years.)
engSearchText:
(Looks like someone does live here now after all.
Makes sense. It has been five years.)
jpnChrName: （……やっぱり人が住んでるか。   あれから５年だし当然だろうが。）
jpnSearchText:
（……やっぱり人が住んでるか。
あれから５年だし当然だろうが。）

engChrName: (I wonder if it's someone connected to Taito or Master? Could be just a total stranger, though.)
engSearchText:
(I wonder if it's someone connected to Taito
or Master? Could be just a total stranger, though.)
jpnChrName: （“泰斗”か師父（せんせい）の関係者、   いや、それとは別の……？）
jpnSearchText:
（“泰斗”か師父（せんせい）の関係者、
いや、それとは別の……？）

engChrName: (Oh, wait. I still haven't talked to Judith.)
engSearchText: (Oh, wait. I still haven't talked to Judith.)
jpnChrName: （……そういや、まだジュディスに   詫びを入れてなかったな。）
jpnSearchText:
（……そういや、まだジュディスに
詫びを入れてなかったな。）

engChrName: (I should get around to that first before I go knockin' on this door.)
engSearchText:
(I should get around to that first before I go knockin'
on this door.)
jpnChrName: （もう少し夜回りをしてから訪ねる事にするか。）
jpnSearchText: （もう少し夜回りをしてから訪ねる事にするか。）

engChrName: (Maybe this is a good time to stop walkin' around and give this door a knock?)
engSearchText:
(Maybe this is a good time to stop walkin' around and
give this door a knock?)
jpnChrName: （──まあいい、夜回りは   このくらいにして訪ねてみるか？）
jpnSearchText:
（──まあいい、夜回りは
このくらいにして訪ねてみるか？）

engChrName: (Oh, wait. I still haven't talked to Judith.)
engSearchText: (Oh, wait. I still haven't talked to Judith.)
jpnChrName: （……そういや、まだジュディスに   詫びを入れてなかったな。）
jpnSearchText:
（……そういや、まだジュディスに
詫びを入れてなかったな。）

engChrName: (I should get around to that first.)
engSearchText: (I should get around to that first.)
jpnChrName: （もう少し夜回りをしてから訪ねる事にするか。）
jpnSearchText: （もう少し夜回りをしてから訪ねる事にするか。）

engChrName: Who could have business here this late at night...?
engSearchText: Who could have business here this late at night...?
jpnChrName: 誰だ……こんな時間に。
jpnSearchText: 誰だ……こんな時間に。

engChrName: I can't believe you actually came...
engSearchText: I can't believe you actually came...
jpnChrName: まったく……本当に来るとはな。
jpnSearchText: まったく……本当に来るとはな。

engChrName: Hey. Nice night, huh?
engSearchText: Hey. Nice night, huh?
jpnChrName: よう、良い夜だな。
jpnSearchText: よう、良い夜だな。

engChrName: I don't think I've met you before, but I'm thinkin' you're responsible for spreadin' word about my work around?
engSearchText:
I don't think I've met you before, but I'm thinkin'
you're responsible for spreadin' word about my
work around?
jpnChrName: ──初めましてのようだが、 お前さんが４ｓｐｇを広めたヤツか。
jpnSearchText:
──初めましてのようだが、
お前さんが４ｓｐｇを広めたヤツか。

engChrName: Well, less you and more the guy who lives here.
engSearchText: Well, less you and more the guy who lives here.
jpnChrName: いや……正確には そちらに住んでいる“御仁”だな？
jpnSearchText:
いや……正確には
そちらに住んでいる“御仁”だな？

engChrName: H-How do you...? Ugh. You're with them, aren't you?!
engSearchText:
H-How do you...? Ugh. You're with them,
aren't you?!
jpnChrName: ど、どうしてそれを…… クッ、やっぱりそっちの人間か……！
jpnSearchText:
ど、どうしてそれを……
クッ、やっぱりそっちの人間か……！

engChrName: (Damn. He a new guy? Though his reaction definitely says—)
engSearchText:
(Damn. He a new guy? Though his reaction
definitely says—)
jpnChrName: （おいおい、新人（ノービス）か？   しかしこの反応はやっぱり……）
jpnSearchText:
（おいおい、新人（ノービス）か？
しかしこの反応はやっぱり……）

engChrName: You got me all wrong. My way ain't black, white, or even gray.
engSearchText:
You got me all wrong. My way ain't black, white, or
even gray.
jpnChrName: ──勘違いすんな。 黒でも白でも、灰色ですらねぇよ。
jpnSearchText:
──勘違いすんな。
黒でも白でも、灰色ですらねぇよ。

engChrName: I'm not here to interfere in whatever you're doing. I was just hopin' to pay my resp—
engSearchText:
I'm not here to interfere in whatever you're doing.
I was just hopin' to pay my resp—
jpnChrName: お前さんたちの思惑とはともかく、 出来ればそちらの敷地にある──
jpnSearchText:
お前さんたちの思惑とはともかく、
出来ればそちらの敷地にある──

engChrName: Umm... What are you doing, Van?
engSearchText: Umm... What are you doing, Van?
jpnChrName: えっと、ヴァンさん……？
jpnSearchText: えっと、ヴァンさん……？

engChrName: ...Oh. You followed me, huh?
engSearchText: ...Oh. You followed me, huh?
jpnChrName: あー……付いてきちまったか。
jpnSearchText: あー……付いてきちまったか。

engChrName: We happened to notice you looking over this way earlier today.
engSearchText:
We happened to notice you looking over this way
earlier today.
jpnChrName: えと……昼間ヴァンさんが こちらを気にしている風だったので。
jpnSearchText:
えと……昼間ヴァンさんが
こちらを気にしている風だったので。

engChrName: You mentioned how you lived in Longlai five years ago, so we thought this might be where.
engSearchText:
You mentioned how you lived in Longlai five years
ago, so we thought this might be where.
jpnChrName: ５年前に暮らしてたみたいだし、 ゆかりがある場所なのかと思ってさ。
jpnSearchText:
５年前に暮らしてたみたいだし、
ゆかりがある場所なのかと思ってさ。

engChrName: That, or maybe you'd taken a page out of that dumb racecar driver's book and this was your local girl's place.
engSearchText:
That, or maybe you'd taken a page out of that dumb
racecar driver's book and this was your local
girl's place.
jpnChrName: それとも残念レーサーじゃねえが 現地の愛人宅とかじゃねえよなァ？
jpnSearchText:
それとも残念レーサーじゃねえが
現地の愛人宅とかじゃねえよなァ？

engChrName: Hell no! Damn brat...
engSearchText: Hell no! Damn brat...
jpnChrName: ねえっつの！ このガキャあ……
jpnSearchText:
ねえっつの！
このガキャあ……

engChrName: Mr. Arkride does not strike me as the proper age for multiple mistresses and the like.
engSearchText:
Mr. Arkride does not strike me as the proper age for
multiple mistresses and the like.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ヴァン様のお歳で 愛人というのも不自然でしょうし。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ヴァン様のお歳で
愛人というのも不自然でしょうし。

engChrName: And he's not filthy rich like Maxim, either.
engSearchText: And he's not filthy rich like Maxim, either.
jpnChrName: あと、マクシムさんみたいに 大金持ちでもなさそうだからねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
あと、マクシムさんみたいに
大金持ちでもなさそうだからねぇ。

engChrName: SO SORRY about that!
engSearchText: SO SORRY about that!
jpnChrName: 悪かったな！
jpnSearchText: 悪かったな！

engChrName: What's even happening here...? Is this some act to get me to let my guard down?
engSearchText:
What's even happening here...? Is this some act to get
me to let my guard down?
jpnChrName: なにをふざけて…… ハッ、これも何かの偽装工作っ？
jpnSearchText:
なにをふざけて……
ハッ、これも何かの偽装工作っ？

engChrName: Well, no matter how outnumbered I am, you won't get the better of me!
engSearchText:
Well, no matter how outnumbered I am, you won't
get the better of me!
jpnChrName: いくら数で来ようと自分が──！
jpnSearchText: いくら数で来ようと自分が──！

engChrName: Who's this stuck-up bozo?
engSearchText: Who's this stuck-up bozo?
jpnChrName: なんだぁ、このトッポイのは？
jpnSearchText: なんだぁ、このトッポイのは？

engChrName: W-We're really sorry about bothering you so late at night.
engSearchText:
W-We're really sorry about bothering you so late
at night.
jpnChrName: す、すみません。 夜分に押しかけたりして。
jpnSearchText:
す、すみません。
夜分に押しかけたりして。

engChrName: We won't disturb you any longer—
engSearchText: We won't disturb you any longer—
jpnChrName: ですがご安心を。 わたくし達はこのあたりで──
jpnSearchText:
ですがご安心を。
わたくし達はこのあたりで──

engChrName: Oh, on the contrary. By all means, come in.
engSearchText: Oh, on the contrary. By all means, come in.
jpnChrName: いやいや、折角だから みんな上がってくれたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
いやいや、折角だから
みんな上がってくれたまえ。

engChrName: Wha...?
engSearchText: Wha...?

engChrName: ...Hmm?
engSearchText: ...Hmm?
jpnChrName: あん……？
jpnSearchText: あん……？

engChrName: You gotta be kiddin' me...
engSearchText: You gotta be kiddin' me...
jpnChrName: ……おいおい。
jpnSearchText: ……おいおい。

engChrName: P-Please stay inside, sir!
engSearchText: P-Please stay inside, sir!
jpnChrName: か、閣下、お下がりを！
jpnSearchText: か、閣下、お下がりを！

engChrName: No need to be so on guard around them, Cody. They're acquaintances of your sister's, as you very well know.
engSearchText:
No need to be so on guard around them, Cody.
They're acquaintances of your sister's, as you very
well know.
jpnChrName: 大丈夫だ、コーディ君。 君のお姉さんとも面識がある。
jpnSearchText:
大丈夫だ、コーディ君。
君のお姉さんとも面識がある。

engChrName: They're also highly regarded by Prince Sherid, Fan, and Professor Hamilton.
engSearchText:
They're also highly regarded by Prince Sherid, Fan,
and Professor Hamilton.
jpnChrName: シェリド殿下にファン大人（ターレン）、 ハミルトン博士からの信用も篤い──
jpnSearchText:
シェリド殿下にファン大人（ターレン）、
ハミルトン博士からの信用も篤い──

engChrName: I think we can at least afford to trust them as much as the guild does, hmm?
engSearchText:
I think we can at least afford to trust them as much as
the guild does, hmm?
jpnChrName: 少なくともギルドに準じるくらいには 信用も信頼もできるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
少なくともギルドに準じるくらいには
信用も信頼もできるだろう。

engChrName: I-I suppose so...
engSearchText: I-I suppose so...
jpnChrName: ぐっ、それは……
jpnSearchText: ぐっ、それは……

engChrName: Umm... So, who's he? Why are you all acting weird?
engSearchText: Umm... So, who's he? Why are you all acting weird?
jpnChrName: えと、結局そちらの方は…… ──って、みなさん……？
jpnSearchText:
えと、結局そちらの方は……
──って、みなさん……？

engChrName: It's understandable that you wouldn't know, Ms. Al-Fayed.
engSearchText:
It's understandable that you wouldn't know,
Ms. Al-Fayed.
jpnChrName: ……フェリ様が ご存じないのも無理はないかと。
jpnSearchText:
……フェリ様が
ご存じないのも無理はないかと。

engChrName: Yeah—but damn, this is some turn of events.
engSearchText: Yeah—but damn, this is some turn of events.
jpnChrName: ああ── 流石に予想外過ぎるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──
流石に予想外過ぎるでしょう。

engChrName: Until two years ago, you were the most famous man in the whole Republic. What're you doing in a place like this?
engSearchText:
Until two years ago, you were the most famous man
in the whole Republic. What're you doing in a place
like this?
jpnChrName: ２年前まで共和国で一番の有名人が こんな場所にいらっしゃるとはね。
jpnSearchText:
２年前まで共和国で一番の有名人が
こんな場所にいらっしゃるとはね。

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?
jpnChrName: え。
jpnSearchText: え。

engChrName: Haha! A love of surprises seems to be part of the job description, looking back through the ages.
engSearchText:
Haha! A love of surprises seems to be part of the job
description, looking back through the ages.
jpnChrName: ハッハッハッ、サプライズ好きは 歴代共通しておるようだからなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッハッハッ、サプライズ好きは
歴代共通しておるようだからなぁ。

engChrName: The current occupier of my old job is no exception.
engSearchText: The current occupier of my old job is no exception.
jpnChrName: もちろん“当代”も含めてね。
jpnSearchText: もちろん“当代”も含めてね。

engChrName: Still, if not everyone is aware of who I am, then I'd best get to introducing myself.
engSearchText:
Still, if not everyone is aware of who I am, then I'd
best get to introducing myself.
jpnChrName: ともあれ、知らない子もいるなら 改めて自己紹介しておこうかな。
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ、知らない子もいるなら
改めて自己紹介しておこうかな。

engChrName: My name is Samuel Rocksmith. I am the previous president of the Republic.
engSearchText:
My name is Samuel Rocksmith. I am the previous
president of the Republic.
jpnChrName: サミュエル・ロックスミス── 前カルバード共和国大統領を務めた者だ。
jpnSearchText:
サミュエル・ロックスミス──
前カルバード共和国大統領を務めた者だ。

engChrName: It's a pleasure to meet you all, Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText: It's a pleasure to meet you all, Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: お初にお目にかかるよ、 アークライド解決事務所の諸君。
jpnSearchText:
お初にお目にかかるよ、
アークライド解決事務所の諸君。

engChrName: Ryuga Rouran of the Taito school.
engSearchText: Ryuga Rouran of the Taito school.
jpnChrName: ──泰斗流宗家、リュウガ・ロウラン殿。
jpnSearchText: ──泰斗流宗家、リュウガ・ロウラン殿。

engChrName: I haven't been able to visit in five years, and heck, we never even met, but your student told me to give you his regards.
engSearchText:
I haven't been able to visit in five years, and heck, we
never even met, but your student told me to give you
his regards.
jpnChrName: ５年ぶりか……面識はなかったが あんたの弟子に宜しく頼まれたんでな。
jpnSearchText:
５年ぶりか……面識はなかったが
あんたの弟子に宜しく頼まれたんでな。

engChrName: Is Taito another style of Eastern fistfighting?
engSearchText: Is Taito another style of Eastern fistfighting?
jpnChrName: 《泰斗流》…… 東方拳法の一つでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
《泰斗流》……
東方拳法の一つでしょうか？

engChrName: Yeah. It's not as big as the Gekka school, but a whole lot of skilled warriors use it.
engSearchText:
Yeah. It's not as big as the Gekka school, but a whole
lot of skilled warriors use it.
jpnChrName: 月華ほどメジャーじゃねえが 実力者が多いことで知られてるな。
jpnSearchText:
月華ほどメジャーじゃねえが
実力者が多いことで知られてるな。

engChrName: The Immovable's part of it, and the Direwolf's techniques are based off it, too.
engSearchText:
The Immovable's part of it, and the Direwolf's
techniques are based off it, too.
jpnChrName: あの不動に──《痩せ狼》の技の ベースにもなってるっつー話だったか。
jpnSearchText:
あの不動に──《痩せ狼》の技の
ベースにもなってるっつー話だったか。

engChrName: I'm no expert in these matters, but that makes it sound quite incredible to me.
engSearchText:
I'm no expert in these matters, but that makes it
sound quite incredible to me.
jpnChrName: なんだか分からないけど 凄そうな流派みたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
なんだか分からないけど
凄そうな流派みたいだね。

engChrName: For sure. Unfortunately, when the head of the school died over ten years ago, his students dispersed all over the place.
engSearchText:
For sure. Unfortunately, when the head of the school
died over ten years ago, his students dispersed all over
the place.
jpnChrName: ああ、十年以上前に宗家が亡くなって 弟子たちは散り散りになったそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、十年以上前に宗家が亡くなって
弟子たちは散り散りになったそうだが。

engChrName: Since my own master was a friend of his, he looked after his dojo after that.
engSearchText:
Since my own master was a friend of his, he looked
after his dojo after that.
jpnChrName: ──その道場跡を、彼と懇意だった 俺の師父（せんせい）がしばらく借り受けてな。
jpnSearchText:
──その道場跡を、彼と懇意だった
俺の師父（せんせい）がしばらく借り受けてな。

engChrName: That's how I ended up staying here for about half a year.
engSearchText:
That's how I ended up staying here for about half
a year.
jpnChrName: その縁で半年ほど厄介になってたわけだ。
jpnSearchText: その縁で半年ほど厄介になってたわけだ。

engChrName: Now I see.
engSearchText: Now I see.
jpnChrName: そうだったんですか……
jpnSearchText: そうだったんですか……

engChrName: But the martial art that you know now isn't Taito, is it?
engSearchText:
But the martial art that you know now isn't Taito,
is it?
jpnChrName: でも、ヴァンさんが教わったのは その《泰斗流》ではないんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
でも、ヴァンさんが教わったのは
その《泰斗流》ではないんですよね？

engChrName: Indeed. Nor is it the Gekka school—I believe it was called the Kunlun school?
engSearchText:
Indeed. Nor is it the Gekka school—I believe it was
called the Kunlun school?
jpnChrName: “月華”でも“泰斗”でもない、 《崑崙流》と呼ばれる流派でしたか。
jpnSearchText:
“月華”でも“泰斗”でもない、
《崑崙流》と呼ばれる流派でしたか。

engChrName: Yeah. It's a school that draws inspiration from both the East and West.
engSearchText:
Yeah. It's a school that draws inspiration from both
the East and West.
jpnChrName: ああ、東方と中東の 双方にルーツを持つ流派でな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、東方と中東の
双方にルーツを持つ流派でな。

engChrName: My master was Western, but he decided to train in that school, and then he passed it on to me.
engSearchText:
My master was Western, but he decided to train in
that school, and then he passed it on to me.
jpnChrName: 師父は西方系だが何故か修めてて、 それを一通り叩き込まれたわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
師父は西方系だが何故か修めてて、
それを一通り叩き込まれたわけだ。

engChrName: Fate sure is a funny thing.
engSearchText: Fate sure is a funny thing.
jpnChrName: まったく妙な縁もあったもんだぜ。
jpnSearchText: まったく妙な縁もあったもんだぜ。

engChrName: It feels like fate brought us here, too.
engSearchText: It feels like fate brought us here, too.
jpnChrName: ……わたしたちがお参りしたのも ちょっと縁を感じます。
jpnSearchText:
……わたしたちがお参りしたのも
ちょっと縁を感じます。

engChrName: Still, does the fact that you're talking about your master in the past tense mean...?
engSearchText:
Still, does the fact that you're talking about your
master in the past tense mean...?
jpnChrName: そうだね──でも過去形ってことは ヴァンさんの先生っていうのは……？
jpnSearchText:
そうだね──でも過去形ってことは
ヴァンさんの先生っていうのは……？

engChrName: Yeah. He died three years ago.
engSearchText: Yeah. He died three years ago.
jpnChrName: ３年くらい前に亡くなった。
jpnSearchText: ３年くらい前に亡くなった。

engChrName: He might've been like a father figure to me, but he had a boatload of other students—and not all of 'em in martial arts.
engSearchText:
He might've been like a father figure to me, but he
had a boatload of other students—and not all of 'em
in martial arts.
jpnChrName: ……武術以外にも 各地に弟子が大勢いた人でな。
jpnSearchText:
……武術以外にも
各地に弟子が大勢いた人でな。

engChrName: Heard he died protectin' one of his more respectable ones.
engSearchText:
Heard he died protectin' one of his more
respectable ones.
jpnChrName: 俺とは違う真っ当な弟子を庇って 逝っちまったらしい。
jpnSearchText:
俺とは違う真っ当な弟子を庇って
逝っちまったらしい。

engChrName: I wish I'd been able to be with him when the time came, but I guess the least I can do is make an offering for him here.
engSearchText:
I wish I'd been able to be with him when the time
came, but I guess the least I can do is make an
offering for him here.
