jpnChrName: 死に目に遭えなかったのは心残りだが…… ま、ついでに添えさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
死に目に遭えなかったのは心残りだが……
ま、ついでに添えさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: Well...I guess we can join you.
engSearchText: Well...I guess we can join you.
jpnChrName: ハン…… 面倒だが追加で添えてやるか。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……
面倒だが追加で添えてやるか。

engChrName: (So he is the Roaring Lion's unofficial student.)
engSearchText: (So he is the Roaring Lion's unofficial student.)
jpnChrName: （……なるほど、   あれが獅子殿の“裏弟子”か。）
jpnSearchText:
（……なるほど、
あれが獅子殿の“裏弟子”か。）

engChrName: (The spriggan who serves as a bridge between light and darkness...)
engSearchText:
(The spriggan who serves as a bridge between light
and darkness...)
jpnChrName: （そして光と影の繋ぎ手たる   《裏解決屋》という役割──）
jpnSearchText:
（そして光と影の繋ぎ手たる
《裏解決屋》という役割──）

engChrName: (What a fascinating young man. I'm interested in everyone with him, too—including her, naturally.)
engSearchText:
(What a fascinating young man. I'm interested in
everyone with him, too—including her, naturally.)
jpnChrName: （やはり興味深い青年だ。   ……“彼女”を含めた他の面々も。）
jpnSearchText:
（やはり興味深い青年だ。
……“彼女”を含めた他の面々も。）

engChrName: So you knew my master and Master Ryuga, Mr. President?
engSearchText:
So you knew my master and Master Ryuga,
Mr. President?
jpnChrName: ──それじゃあ閣下も、自分の師や リュウガ師をご存じだったんですか。
jpnSearchText:
──それじゃあ閣下も、自分の師や
リュウガ師をご存じだったんですか。

engChrName: I most certainly did. I met them both in my younger years.
engSearchText:
I most certainly did. I met them both in my
younger years.
jpnChrName: うむ、若かりし頃に それぞれ知り合う機会があってね。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、若かりし頃に
それぞれ知り合う機会があってね。

engChrName: Though I regret to say the opportunity to see them was rare after I took up office twelve years ago.
engSearchText:
Though I regret to say the opportunity to see them
was rare after I took up office twelve years ago.
jpnChrName: １２年前に大統領になってからは 滅多に会う機会も減ってしまったが……
jpnSearchText:
１２年前に大統領になってからは
滅多に会う機会も減ってしまったが……

engChrName: Still, your master and I did come together to mourn Master Ryuga's passing.
engSearchText:
Still, your master and I did come together to mourn
Master Ryuga's passing.
jpnChrName: リュウガ殿が亡くなった折には 共に献杯させてもらったものだ。
jpnSearchText:
リュウガ殿が亡くなった折には
共に献杯させてもらったものだ。

engChrName: That makes sense.
engSearchText: That makes sense.
jpnChrName: なるほど、それで……
jpnSearchText: なるほど、それで……

engChrName: So, what was your sorta-pops' name?
engSearchText: So, what was your sorta-pops' name?
jpnChrName: ──で、その師父ってのは 結局なんつー名前なんだよ？
jpnSearchText:
──で、その師父ってのは
結局なんつー名前なんだよ？

engChrName: A-Aaron...
engSearchText: A-Aaron...
jpnChrName: ア、アーロンさん……
jpnSearchText: ア、アーロンさん……

engChrName: Talk about being oblivious...
engSearchText: Talk about being oblivious...
jpnChrName: さすが空気を読まないなぁ。
jpnSearchText: さすが空気を読まないなぁ。

engChrName: Hmm... I'm not sure if I am at liberty to tell you that...
engSearchText:
Hmm... I'm not sure if I am at liberty to tell
you that...
jpnChrName: ふむ、なかなか特別な立場に ある方だったからなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、なかなか特別な立場に
ある方だったからなぁ。

engChrName: His name was Gunther Barkhorn. He was a traveling priest for the Septian Church.
engSearchText:
His name was Gunther Barkhorn. He was a traveling
priest for the Septian Church.
jpnChrName: ──グンター・バルクホルン。 七耀教会の巡回神父だった人でな。
jpnSearchText:
──グンター・バルクホルン。
七耀教会の巡回神父だった人でな。

engChrName: Wait, what?
engSearchText: Wait, what?
jpnChrName: はあっ……！？
jpnSearchText: はあっ……！？

engChrName: So he went around doing work for the church?
engSearchText: So he went around doing work for the church?
jpnChrName: 巡回神父……巡回司祭と 同じような役職でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
巡回神父……巡回司祭と
同じような役職でしょうか？

engChrName: Far and wide, yes. That being his profession is a surprise, though.
engSearchText:
Far and wide, yes. That being his profession is a
surprise, though.
jpnChrName: ええ、そうですね。 そんな方がヴァンさんの……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、そうですね。
そんな方がヴァンさんの……

engChrName: It certainly is.
engSearchText: It certainly is.
jpnChrName: こう言ってはなんですが 少々予想の斜め上でしたね。
jpnSearchText:
こう言ってはなんですが
少々予想の斜め上でしたね。

engChrName: So how did a priest become a master of martial arts in the first place?
engSearchText:
So how did a priest become a master of martial arts in
the first place?
jpnChrName: って、教会の神父がどうして そんな拳法を修めてるのさ？
jpnSearchText:
って、教会の神父がどうして
そんな拳法を修めてるのさ？

engChrName: Well...he wasn't your ordinary priest, to put it mildly. I was more an unofficial student of his, but he had a whole lotta crazy official ones, too.
engSearchText:
Well...he wasn't your ordinary priest, to put it mildly.
I was more an unofficial student of his, but he had a
whole lotta crazy official ones, too.
jpnChrName: ま、色々規格外の人だったからな。 表の弟子も凄ぇのがワンサカいたし。
jpnSearchText:
ま、色々規格外の人だったからな。
表の弟子も凄ぇのがワンサカいたし。

engChrName: Compared to them, I was a total failure— and honestly? Way more trouble than I was worth.
engSearchText:
Compared to them, I was a total failure—
and honestly? Way more trouble than I was worth.
jpnChrName: 俺は“裏”でしかも落ちこぼれ…… 随分手間を掛けさせちまったもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
俺は“裏”でしかも落ちこぼれ……
随分手間を掛けさせちまったもんだ。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: He sounds like he was a wonderful master and father.
engSearchText: He sounds like he was a wonderful master and father.
jpnChrName: ……いい先生だったんですね、本当に。
jpnSearchText: ……いい先生だったんですね、本当に。

engChrName: That is how I came to be in charge of this residence.
engSearchText: That is how I came to be in charge of this residence.
jpnChrName: ともあれ──そのような縁で こちらを引き受けることになってな。
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ──そのような縁で
こちらを引き受けることになってな。

engChrName: I've been living in seclusion here ever since conceding two years ago.
engSearchText:
I've been living in seclusion here ever since conceding
two years ago.
jpnChrName: ２年前、大統領職を退いた後、 庵（いおり）として隠居させてもらっているのさ。
jpnSearchText:
２年前、大統領職を退いた後、
庵（いおり）として隠居させてもらっているのさ。

engChrName: I visit the capital on occasion, but I spend most of my time here living a simple life, enjoying the springs whenever it suits me.
engSearchText:
I visit the capital on occasion, but I spend most of my
time here living a simple life, enjoying the springs
whenever it suits me.
jpnChrName: たまに首都に赴くこともあるが、 基本はこちらで晴耕雨読に温泉三昧だ。
jpnSearchText:
たまに首都に赴くこともあるが、
基本はこちらで晴耕雨読に温泉三昧だ。

engChrName: What I would give to have a life like that...
engSearchText: What I would give to have a life like that...
jpnChrName: そりゃまた羨ましい生活ですね。 ……いや、割とマジで。
jpnSearchText:
そりゃまた羨ましい生活ですね。
……いや、割とマジで。

engChrName: Hahaha. Perhaps in forty years or so, you can.
engSearchText: Hahaha. Perhaps in forty years or so, you can.
jpnChrName: ハッハッハッ。 まあ君には４０年ほど早いだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ハッハッハッ。
まあ君には４０年ほど早いだろう。

engChrName: Speaking of youth, I ought to introduce my friend here.
engSearchText:
Speaking of youth, I ought to introduce my
friend here.
jpnChrName: ──そうそう、そちらの彼も 改めて紹介しておこうか。
jpnSearchText:
──そうそう、そちらの彼も
改めて紹介しておこうか。

engChrName: Wha—?!
engSearchText: Wha—?!
jpnChrName: うぇっ……！？
jpnSearchText: うぇっ……！？

engChrName: This is Warrant Officer Cody McMillan. He's affiliated with Hercules, and a member of the secret service.
engSearchText:
This is Warrant Officer Cody McMillan.
He's affiliated with Hercules, and a member of the
secret service.
jpnChrName: コーディ・マクミラン准尉──ＣＩＤの 《ハーキュリーズ》に所属するＳＳ（シークレットサービス）だ。
jpnSearchText:
コーディ・マクミラン准尉──ＣＩＤの
《ハーキュリーズ》に所属するＳＳ（シークレットサービス）だ。

engChrName: He is the younger brother of Second Lieutenant Kaela McMillan, whom I believe you met in Basel.
engSearchText:
He is the younger brother of Second Lieutenant
Kaela McMillan, whom I believe you met in Basel.
jpnChrName: 君たちがバーゼルで世話をした カエラ・マクミラン少尉の弟でもあるな。
jpnSearchText:
君たちがバーゼルで世話をした
カエラ・マクミラン少尉の弟でもあるな。

engChrName: Oh, I can see it now.
engSearchText: Oh, I can see it now.
jpnChrName: そうだったんですか……
jpnSearchText: そうだったんですか……

engChrName: You're right. They do look somewhat alike.
engSearchText: You're right. They do look somewhat alike.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤのお姉さんか。 確かにちょっと似てるかも？
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤのお姉さんか。
確かにちょっと似てるかも？

engChrName: Two siblings in the CID, huh? So is René your—
engSearchText: Two siblings in the CID, huh? So is René your—
jpnChrName: 姉弟揃ってＣＩＤとはな。 ──ってことはルネの？
jpnSearchText:
姉弟揃ってＣＩＤとはな。
──ってことはルネの？

engChrName: Hmph. He's not my direct superior, if that's what you're thinking. Even if he has helped me in my work.
engSearchText:
Hmph. He's not my direct superior, if that's what
you're thinking. Even if he has helped me in
my work.
jpnChrName: フン、世話にはなっているが 別に直属の上官じゃない。
jpnSearchText:
フン、世話にはなっているが
別に直属の上官じゃない。

engChrName: While my sister and I at least have some things in common with Chief Rouran, we don't see eye to eye with your friend on very fundamental issues.
engSearchText:
While my sister and I at least have some things in
common with Chief Rouran, we don't see eye to eye
with your friend on very fundamental issues.
jpnChrName: ……ロウラン室長はともかく 俺や姉さんとはスタンスが違うしな。
jpnSearchText:
……ロウラン室長はともかく
俺や姉さんとはスタンスが違うしな。

engChrName: ...Ah. I get'cha.
engSearchText: ...Ah. I get'cha.
jpnChrName: あー……何となく分かったぜ。
jpnSearchText: あー……何となく分かったぜ。

engChrName: Hmm? What are you talking about?
engSearchText: Hmm? What are you talking about?
jpnChrName: ……？　それって？
jpnSearchText: ……？　それって？

engChrName: Did we just wander into some kinda internal dispute in the CID?
engSearchText:
Did we just wander into some kinda internal dispute
in the CID?
jpnChrName: 察するにＣＩＤの派閥ってか？
jpnSearchText: 察するにＣＩＤの派閥ってか？

engChrName: Haha. Not quite. I was well acquainted with Cody and Kaela's father.
engSearchText:
Haha. Not quite. I was well acquainted with Cody
and Kaela's father.
jpnChrName: ハハ、それとはまた違うかな。 彼やカエラ君の父上とは親交があってね。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、それとはまた違うかな。
彼やカエラ君の父上とは親交があってね。

engChrName: It was a true shame that he lost his life fighting against the Empire, but that was what led Cody to agree to work under me.
engSearchText:
It was a true shame that he lost his life fighting
against the Empire, but that was what led Cody to
agree to work under me.
jpnChrName: 帝国との紛争で亡くなったが…… その縁で護衛役まで買ってくれているんだ。
jpnSearchText:
帝国との紛争で亡くなったが……
その縁で護衛役まで買ってくれているんだ。

engChrName: M-My father has nothing to do with my motivations, Mr. President! I serve you because I believe this country needs you!
engSearchText:
M-My father has nothing to do with my motivations,
Mr. President! I serve you because I believe this
country needs you!
jpnChrName: ち、父のことは関係ありません！ 閣下がカルバードに必要な方だからです！
jpnSearchText:
ち、父のことは関係ありません！
閣下がカルバードに必要な方だからです！

engChrName: You are a far better leader than that cowardly, shortsighted swindler who—
engSearchText:
You are a far better leader than that cowardly,
shortsighted swindler who—
jpnChrName: 卑劣なやり方で閣下を陥れた、 強引で後先を考えない現職よりも──
jpnSearchText:
卑劣なやり方で閣下を陥れた、
強引で後先を考えない現職よりも──

engChrName: Cody!
engSearchText: Cody!
jpnChrName: コーディ君！
jpnSearchText: <S5>コーディ君！

engChrName: I-I'm so sorry, sir! I shouldn't have overstepped my bounds.
engSearchText:
I-I'm so sorry, sir! I shouldn't have overstepped
my bounds.
jpnChrName: も、申し訳ありません！ 派遣された身で分も弁えぬ事を……
jpnSearchText:
も、申し訳ありません！
派遣された身で分も弁えぬ事を……

engChrName: I understand your intention, and I'm happy that you think so highly of me, but you never know who could be listening.
engSearchText:
I understand your intention, and I'm happy that you
think so highly of me, but you never know who could
be listening.
jpnChrName: いやいや、君の好意は嬉しいが どこに目と耳があるか分からない。
jpnSearchText:
いやいや、君の好意は嬉しいが
どこに目と耳があるか分からない。

engChrName: Besides, the result of the election two years ago was entirely legitimate. I can't approve of any distortion of the truth.
engSearchText:
Besides, the result of the election two years ago was
entirely legitimate. I can't approve of any distortion of
the truth.
jpnChrName: それに２年前の選挙結果は正当なものだ。 事実をねじ曲げるのはよくない。
jpnSearchText:
それに２年前の選挙結果は正当なものだ。
事実をねじ曲げるのはよくない。

engChrName: Yes, but... I'm sorry.
engSearchText: Yes, but... I'm sorry.
jpnChrName: それは…………はい。
jpnSearchText: それは…………はい。

engChrName: Well, I'm not gonna wade into that dispute...but I can see you're still a well-connected man, Mr. President.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm not gonna wade into that dispute...but I
can see you're still a well-connected man,
Mr. President.
jpnChrName: ま、そのあたりはともかく…… いまだ相当な人脈がおありのようだ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そのあたりはともかく……
いまだ相当な人脈がおありのようだ。

engChrName: Especially since you were able to arrange this trip for us while spreading word of our 4SPGs.
engSearchText:
Especially since you were able to arrange this trip for
us while spreading word of our 4SPGs.
jpnChrName: 今回の当事務所の慰安旅行── ４ｓｐｇ込みで段取られた事も含めてね。
jpnSearchText:
今回の当事務所の慰安旅行──
４ｓｐｇ込みで段取られた事も含めてね。

engChrName: I guess he did mention Crown Prince Sherid's name earlier...
engSearchText:
I guess he did mention Crown Prince Sherid's
name earlier...
jpnChrName: そ、そういえば シェリド殿下の名前を……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そういえば
シェリド殿下の名前を……

engChrName: Yeah, and Fan's.
engSearchText: Yeah, and Fan's.
jpnChrName: 大人（ターレン）の名前とかも しれっと出してやがったな。
jpnSearchText:
大人（ターレン）の名前とかも
しれっと出してやがったな。

engChrName: And the professor's... Hold on. Then the other person who invited us here was...
engSearchText:
And the professor's... Hold on. Then the other
person who invited us here was...
jpnChrName: 博士のことも……それじゃあ、 彼らと共同招待したというのが？
jpnSearchText:
博士のことも……それじゃあ、
彼らと共同招待したというのが？

engChrName: Mm-hmm. I'm calling on behalf of Elsaim's Crown Prince Sherid, the Basel Institute of Science's Professor Hamilton...
engSearchText:
Mm-hmm. I'm calling on behalf of Elsaim's Crown
Prince Sherid, the Basel Institute of Science's
Professor Hamilton...
jpnChrName: ええ、エルザイムのシェリド公太子殿下に バーゼル理科大学のハミルトン博士──
jpnSearchText:
ええ、エルザイムのシェリド公太子殿下に
バーゼル理科大学のハミルトン博士──

engChrName: ...the Kowloon Group's Fan Lu, and one other individual—whose name I will not disclose—to extend you an invitation.
engSearchText:
...the Kowloon Group's Fan Lu, and one other
individual—whose name I will not disclose—to extend
you an invitation.
jpnChrName: そして九龍グループのファン・ルウと、 “ある人”の共同招待という形になるわね。
jpnSearchText:
そして九龍グループのファン・ルウと、
“ある人”の共同招待という形になるわね。

engChrName: I would be that individual, yes.
engSearchText: I would be that individual, yes.
jpnChrName: うむうむ、私というわけだな。
jpnSearchText: うむうむ、私というわけだな。

engChrName: I have been acquainted with Grand Prince Salman and Professor Hamilton since my days in office.
engSearchText:
I have been acquainted with Grand Prince Salman
and Professor Hamilton since my days in office.
jpnChrName: ──エルザイムのサルマン公王陛下に ハミルトン博士とは現職からの付き合いでね。
jpnSearchText:
──エルザイムのサルマン公王陛下に
ハミルトン博士とは現職からの付き合いでね。

engChrName: I also became acquainted with Elder Gien of Heiyue during those years... However, he is a rather frightening fellow.
engSearchText:
I also became acquainted with Elder Gien of Heiyue
during those years... However, he is a rather
frightening fellow.
jpnChrName: 黒月のギエン殿とも付き合いはあったが……
jpnSearchText: 黒月のギエン殿とも付き合いはあったが……

engChrName: As such, I opted to consult with his son, Fan, on this occasion.
engSearchText:
As such, I opted to consult with his son, Fan, on
this occasion.
jpnChrName: あちらは私も少々おっかないので 今回は息子のファン殿と相談することにした。
jpnSearchText:
あちらは私も少々おっかないので
今回は息子のファン殿と相談することにした。

engChrName: I see...
engSearchText: I see...
jpnChrName: そうだったんですか……
jpnSearchText: そうだったんですか……

engChrName: Heh. I totally feel you there.
engSearchText: Heh. I totally feel you there.
jpnChrName: クク、まあ気持ちは分かるけどな。
jpnSearchText: クク、まあ気持ちは分かるけどな。

engChrName: Okay, I think we get how we came to be here now. Still got a big question, though.
engSearchText:
Okay, I think we get how we came to be here now.
Still got a big question, though.
jpnChrName: なるほど、 “経緯”は分かったが疑問もある。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、
“経緯”は分かったが疑問もある。

engChrName: Why would a former president want to speak with a shady spriggan like me, and why go so far to do it?
engSearchText:
Why would a former president want to speak with a
shady spriggan like me, and why go so far to do it?
jpnChrName: どうしてわざわざ元大統領閣下が “裏”の解決屋風情を招待したか──
jpnSearchText:
どうしてわざわざ元大統領閣下が
“裏”の解決屋風情を招待したか──

engChrName: I can't picture you wanting to hire us for anything, considering your position.
engSearchText:
I can't picture you wanting to hire us for anything,
considering your position.
jpnChrName: 閣下のお立場を考えると 依頼ってわけでもないんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
閣下のお立場を考えると
依頼ってわけでもないんでしょう？

engChrName: That's a fair point...
engSearchText: That's a fair point...

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...

engChrName: It wouldn't be a very wise decision politically, true.
engSearchText: It wouldn't be a very wise decision politically, true.
jpnChrName: ……確かに、 政治的な状況を考えると。
jpnSearchText:
……確かに、
政治的な状況を考えると。

engChrName: Yeah. The current ruling party would absolutely take advantage of it if they found out. It would pose too great a risk.
engSearchText:
Yeah. The current ruling party would absolutely take
advantage of it if they found out. It would pose too
great a risk.
jpnChrName: 現与党に突っ込まれそうな リスクは犯したりしないか……
jpnSearchText:
現与党に突っ込まれそうな
リスクは犯したりしないか……

engChrName: Y-You think he hasn't thought of that?!
engSearchText: Y-You think he hasn't thought of that?!
jpnChrName: こ、こら、失礼だぞお前たち！
jpnSearchText: こ、こら、失礼だぞお前たち！

engChrName: Hahaha. You are absolutely right—I didn't bring you here to hire you for anything.
engSearchText:
Hahaha. You are absolutely right—I didn't bring
you here to hire you for anything.
jpnChrName: ハッハッハッ、お察しの通り 依頼をするつもりなどはないさ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッハッハッ、お察しの通り
依頼をするつもりなどはないさ。

engChrName: That said, I'm well aware of the good work you've been doing all over the country.
engSearchText:
That said, I'm well aware of the good work you've
been doing all over the country.
jpnChrName: ただ、クレイユ村にラングポート、 サルバッドにバーゼル……
jpnSearchText:
ただ、クレイユ村にラングポート、
サルバッドにバーゼル……

engChrName: Whether it was in Creil, Langport, Tharbad, or Basel.
engSearchText:
Whether it was in Creil, Langport, Tharbad,
or Basel.
jpnChrName: 君たちが尽力してくれたという 各地の事件は私も注目していてね。
jpnSearchText:
君たちが尽力してくれたという
各地の事件は私も注目していてね。

engChrName: As you know, all of those surface incidents were caused by Almata...
engSearchText:
As you know, all of those surface incidents were
caused by Almata...
jpnChrName: どれも《アルマータ》なる 新興マフィアが企てたそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
どれも《アルマータ》なる
新興マフィアが企てたそうだが……

engChrName: ...but I believe there are deeper issues they share at their core.
engSearchText:
...but I believe there are deeper issues they share
at their core.
jpnChrName: ──それとは別に共通する “ある背景”があると思うのだよ。
jpnSearchText:
──それとは別に共通する
“ある背景”があると思うのだよ。

engChrName: It's been two years since the war ended.
engSearchText: It's been two years since the war ended.
jpnChrName: あの終戦から２年余り──
jpnSearchText: あの終戦から２年余り──

engChrName: The unprecedented prosperity our country has been blessed with has pushed the problems we have always had into the background.
engSearchText:
The unprecedented prosperity our country has been
blessed with has pushed the problems we have always
had into the background.
jpnChrName: 賠償金がもたらした未曾有の好景気によって “かつての問題”が見えなくされたカルバード。
jpnSearchText:
賠償金がもたらした未曾有の好景気によって
“かつての問題”が見えなくされたカルバード。

engChrName: However, they never went away, and their effects are starting to be felt once more.
engSearchText:
However, they never went away, and their effects are
starting to be felt once more.
jpnChrName: その“歪み”が再び顕在化している意味でね。
jpnSearchText: その“歪み”が再び顕在化している意味でね。

engChrName: ...Well, the mafia's always gonna be a problem.
engSearchText: ...Well, the mafia's always gonna be a problem.
jpnChrName: ………ハッ。 マフィアはマフィアだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
………ハッ。
マフィアはマフィアだろうが……

engChrName: And it's true that Professor Callaghan's descent didn't start with them...
engSearchText:
And it's true that Professor Callaghan's descent didn't
start with them...
jpnChrName: 確かに……キャラハン教授が あそこまで歪んでしまったのは……
jpnSearchText:
確かに……キャラハン教授が
あそこまで歪んでしまったのは……

engChrName: Jaeger corps all over have been getting a lot busier lately...
engSearchText:
Jaeger corps all over have been getting a lot
busier lately...
jpnChrName: ……そ、そういえば戦士団も 前よりずっと忙しくなってて……
jpnSearchText:
……そ、そういえば戦士団も
前よりずっと忙しくなってて……

engChrName: As has Marduk.
engSearchText: As has Marduk.
jpnChrName: ……マルドゥック社も 言うに及ばず、でしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
……マルドゥック社も
言うに及ばず、でしょうか。

engChrName: Perhaps you're right that these deeper issues are beginning to rear their ugly heads.
engSearchText:
Perhaps you're right that these deeper issues are
beginning to rear their ugly heads.
jpnChrName: ……“背景”…… 確かに閣下の仰る通りかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
……“背景”……
確かに閣下の仰る通りかもしれません。

engChrName: And the one who's guided us to this point is...
engSearchText: And the one who's guided us to this point is...
jpnChrName: そして、それを導いたのは──……
jpnSearchText: そして、それを導いたのは──……

engChrName: (...Why does she look so gloomy?)
engSearchText: (...Why does she look so gloomy?)
jpnChrName: （アニエスさん……？）
jpnSearchText: （アニエスさん……？）

engChrName: (...Hmph.)
engSearchText: (...Hmph.)

engChrName: Either way, the boost the reparations provided to various fields is close to comin' to an end.
engSearchText:
Either way, the boost the reparations provided to
various fields is close to comin' to an end.
jpnChrName: ──いずれにせよ賠償金による 各分野での“ブースト”はここまで……
jpnSearchText:
──いずれにせよ賠償金による
各分野での“ブースト”はここまで……

engChrName: Calvard's real strength is about to be tested.
engSearchText: Calvard's real strength is about to be tested.
jpnChrName: この先はカルバードの 地力ってヤツが試されるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
この先はカルバードの
地力ってヤツが試されるはずだ。

engChrName: I can't imagine our president hasn't seen this comin', either.
engSearchText:
I can't imagine our president hasn't seen this
comin', either.
jpnChrName: あの大統領がその状況を 想定してないとも思えねぇが……
jpnSearchText:
あの大統領がその状況を
想定してないとも思えねぇが……

engChrName: The monumental change we've seen ain't gonna come without aftershocks. You can count on that.
engSearchText:
The monumental change we've seen ain't gonna come
without aftershocks. You can count on that.
jpnChrName: 間違いなく“揺れ戻し”は来るだろう。
jpnSearchText: 間違いなく“揺れ戻し”は来るだろう。

engChrName: To be sure. They're likely to extend beyond the economy and into the field of technology, too.
engSearchText:
To be sure. They're likely to extend beyond the
economy and into the field of technology, too.
jpnChrName: うん……経済面だけじゃなく、 技術面なんかもそうかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
うん……経済面だけじゃなく、
技術面なんかもそうかもしれない。

engChrName: All those dipshits whining about 'the immigrants' are gonna come crawling out the woodwork like rats again, huh?
engSearchText:
All those dipshits whining about 'the immigrants' are
gonna come crawling out the woodwork like rats
again, huh?
jpnChrName: クク、それと今は鳴りを潜めている 移民排斥の馬鹿共が活気づく可能性か。
jpnSearchText:
クク、それと今は鳴りを潜めている
移民排斥の馬鹿共が活気づく可能性か。

engChrName: The same people whose racially motivated acts of terrorism led to the economic crisis a few years ago.
engSearchText:
The same people whose racially motivated acts of
terrorism led to the economic crisis a few years ago.
jpnChrName: ……数年前、カルバードに経済恐慌を もたらしたという民族テロ活動でしたね。
jpnSearchText:
……数年前、カルバードに経済恐慌を
もたらしたという民族テロ活動でしたね。

engChrName: That's all worrying to hear...
engSearchText: That's all worrying to hear...
jpnChrName: ……っ……… ちょっとイメージできた気がします。
jpnSearchText:
……っ………
ちょっとイメージできた気がします。

engChrName: Worrying, yes, but all of that was also what led me to want to meet with you.
engSearchText:
Worrying, yes, but all of that was also what led me to
want to meet with you.
jpnChrName: フフ──だからこそ一度、 君たちに会ってみたいと思ったのだよ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ──だからこそ一度、
君たちに会ってみたいと思ったのだよ。

engChrName: We live in highly turbulent times, with countless forces of light and darkness at work in this young Republic.
engSearchText:
We live in highly turbulent times, with countless
forces of light and darkness at work in this
young Republic.
jpnChrName: この混迷の時代、様々な光と影が 入り交じったカルバードにおいて──
jpnSearchText:
この混迷の時代、様々な光と影が
入り交じったカルバードにおいて──

engChrName: But we have you: a group like no other. Not heroes of justice like the guild, nor the CID who maintains balance on the government's behalf.
engSearchText:
But we have you: a group like no other. Not heroes of
justice like the guild, nor the CID who maintains
balance on the government's behalf.
jpnChrName: 正義の味方である遊撃士でもなく、 国家権力のバランサーたるＣＩＤでもなく。
jpnSearchText:
正義の味方である遊撃士でもなく、
国家権力のバランサーたるＣＩＤでもなく。

engChrName: You work alongside groups on both sides of the moral spectrum, while having your own distinct style all the same.
engSearchText:
You work alongside groups on both sides of the moral
spectrum, while having your own distinct style all
the same.
jpnChrName: 《裏解決屋》という、光と影双方に 向き合う君たちならではの“流儀”。
jpnSearchText:
《裏解決屋》という、光と影双方に
向き合う君たちならではの“流儀”。

engChrName: And I can only hope that you will be a powerful force in carving a future for our country.
engSearchText:
And I can only hope that you will be a powerful force
in carving a future for our country.
jpnChrName: ──それが何らかの“きっかけ”と なってくれないかという期待も込めてね。
jpnSearchText:
──それが何らかの“きっかけ”と
なってくれないかという期待も込めてね。

engChrName: Heh. You're even craftier than I'd heard.
engSearchText: Heh. You're even craftier than I'd heard.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… 噂以上の狸ジジイぶりじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
噂以上の狸ジジイぶりじゃねえか。

engChrName: Though it is motivating to have all of that said about you.
engSearchText:
Though it is motivating to have all of that said
about you.
jpnChrName: ……でもそう言われると ちょっとその気にはなってくるかな。
jpnSearchText:
……でもそう言われると
ちょっとその気にはなってくるかな。

engChrName: I don't know how much I'll be able to help, but I'm here for whatever you need!
engSearchText:
I don't know how much I'll be able to help, but I'm
here for whatever you need!
jpnChrName: はいっ、戦士としてどこまで 力になれるか分かりませんけど……！
jpnSearchText:
はいっ、戦士としてどこまで
力になれるか分かりませんけど……！

engChrName: As someone who lives and works in this country, I want it to be a peaceful and prosperous one.
engSearchText:
As someone who lives and works in this country, I
want it to be a peaceful and prosperous one.
jpnChrName: わたくしも──現地ＳＣとして この国で働かせて頂いている身ですし。
jpnSearchText:
わたくしも──現地ＳＣとして
この国で働かせて頂いている身ですし。

engChrName: Everyone...
engSearchText: Everyone...
jpnSearchText: ……皆さん…………

engChrName: Heh. Can't help but feel like you're thinkin' a little TOO highly of us.
engSearchText:
Heh. Can't help but feel like you're thinkin' a little
TOO highly of us.
jpnChrName: ハハ……流石に 買いかぶりすぎだと思いますが。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ……流石に
買いかぶりすぎだと思いますが。

engChrName: But this is one connection I'd wager is well worth having, even if it might bite us back one day.
engSearchText:
But this is one connection I'd wager is well worth
having, even if it might bite us back one day.
jpnChrName: ──利用されるリスクを踏まえても 作っておいて損はないツテなのは確かだ。
jpnSearchText:
──利用されるリスクを踏まえても
作っておいて損はないツテなのは確かだ。

engChrName: I'm glad you feel that way. I can see I was right to invite you here after all.
engSearchText:
I'm glad you feel that way. I can see I was right to
invite you here after all.
jpnChrName: フフ、そう思ってくれるのなら 招待した甲斐があったというものだよ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、そう思ってくれるのなら
招待した甲斐があったというものだよ。

engChrName: I hope we can have a long and fruitful relationship, Mr. President.
engSearchText:
I hope we can have a long and fruitful relationship,
Mr. President.
jpnChrName: 今後とも宜しく、ロックスミス閣下。
jpnSearchText: 今後とも宜しく、ロックスミス閣下。

engChrName: We're more than happy to take on jobs for you, providin' you bring 'em in through the back door.
engSearchText:
We're more than happy to take on jobs for you,
providin' you bring 'em in through the back door.
jpnChrName: ──ちなみに迂回ルートだったら “相談”には乗れるかもしれませんよ？
jpnSearchText:
──ちなみに迂回ルートだったら
“相談”には乗れるかもしれませんよ？

engChrName: And so long as the pay and profile fit our standards, of course.
engSearchText:
And so long as the pay and profile fit our standards,
of course.
jpnChrName: もちろんミラの額と、 こちらの流儀に合うか次第ですがね。
jpnSearchText:
もちろんミラの額と、
こちらの流儀に合うか次第ですがね。

engChrName: Hahaha! I am delighted to hear that.
engSearchText: Hahaha! I am delighted to hear that.
jpnChrName: ハッハッハッ、何よりの言葉だ。
jpnSearchText: ハッハッハッ、何よりの言葉だ。

engChrName: May this partnership serve us well, Van Arkride.
engSearchText:
May this partnership serve us well,
Van Arkride.
jpnChrName: よろしく頼むよ── ヴァン・アークライド所長。
jpnSearchText:
よろしく頼むよ──
ヴァン・アークライド所長。

engChrName: November 14th, 11:02PM
engSearchText: November 14th, 11:02PM

engChrName: Okay, yeah, he was about as sharp as you'd expect a former president to be.
engSearchText:
Okay, yeah, he was about as sharp as you'd expect a
former president to be.
jpnChrName: 流石にやり手のジジイだったな。
jpnSearchText: 流石にやり手のジジイだったな。

engChrName: Easy to see how he could keep up with Heiyue's elders when negotiating as president.
engSearchText:
Easy to see how he could keep up with Heiyue's
elders when negotiating as president.
jpnChrName: なんやかんやギエンの爺様たちと 現職時代に交渉してただけはあるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
なんやかんやギエンの爺様たちと
現職時代に交渉してただけはあるぜ。

engChrName: Indeed. I believe the two sides worked together to stop terrorists at the trade conference four years ago.
engSearchText:
Indeed. I believe the two sides worked together to
stop terrorists at the trade conference four years ago.
jpnChrName: ４年前の通商会議で協力して 民族テロを封じ込められたそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
４年前の通商会議で協力して
民族テロを封じ込められたそうですね。

engChrName: The current president is a formidable figure in his own right, but the former president has clearly lost none of his skill.
engSearchText:
The current president is a formidable figure in his
own right, but the former president has clearly lost
none of his skill.
jpnChrName: 現大統領も底知れない方ですが 未だ衰えずといったところでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
現大統領も底知れない方ですが
未だ衰えずといったところでしょうか。

engChrName: I got the impression he's still working with the current opposition party, too.
engSearchText:
I got the impression he's still working with the
current opposition party, too.
jpnChrName: ああ、あの調子だと現野党── 《共和党》とも合わせて動いてんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あの調子だと現野党──
《共和党》とも合わせて動いてんだろ。

engChrName: Not that it seemed like he had any interest in draggin' us into any political squabbling.
engSearchText:
Not that it seemed like he had any interest in draggin'
us into any political squabbling.
jpnChrName: ま、そのあたりの政治的な動きに こちらを巻き込むわけじゃなさそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そのあたりの政治的な動きに
こちらを巻き込むわけじゃなさそうだが。

engChrName: I agree. I believe he came to us purely as an individual thinking of Calvard's future.
engSearchText:
I agree. I believe he came to us purely as an individual
thinking of Calvard's future.
jpnChrName: はい、あくまでカルバードの将来を思って 声を掛けてくださっただけだと思います。
jpnSearchText:
はい、あくまでカルバードの将来を思って
声を掛けてくださっただけだと思います。

engChrName: ...I'm really glad I got to talk to him. I feel like I learned so much from the experience.
engSearchText:
...I'm really glad I got to talk to him. I feel like I
learned so much from the experience.
jpnChrName: ……本当に、色々勉強になりました。
jpnSearchText: ……本当に、色々勉強になりました。

engChrName: He also spoke to you in private after we were all done, didn't he?
engSearchText:
He also spoke to you in private after we were all done,
didn't he?
jpnChrName: そういえばアニエスさん、帰り際に あの人に呼び止められていなかった？
jpnSearchText:
そういえばアニエスさん、帰り際に
あの人に呼び止められていなかった？

engChrName: Oh, I noticed that, too.
engSearchText: Oh, I noticed that, too.
jpnChrName: あ、そういえば。
jpnSearchText: あ、そういえば。

engChrName: Ahaha... He did, but we didn't discuss anything of real importance.
engSearchText:
Ahaha... He did, but we didn't discuss anything of
real importance.
jpnChrName: あはは…… 大した話ではなかったんですけど。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……
大した話ではなかったんですけど。

engChrName: I have to admit, I was surprised to learn about you working for Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText:
I have to admit, I was surprised to learn about you
working for Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: ──それにしても驚いたよ。
jpnSearchText: ──それにしても驚いたよ。

engChrName: I can't imagine Roy is none the wiser of that fact, either.
engSearchText:
I can't imagine Roy is none the wiser of that
fact, either.
jpnChrName: 君がそのような“バイト”をしている事、 ロイ君も当然気付いているんだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
君がそのような“バイト”をしている事、
ロイ君も当然気付いているんだろうな。

engChrName: You know my dad?
engSearchText: You know my dad?
jpnChrName: 父のことをご存じなんですか！？
jpnSearchText: 父のことをご存じなんですか！？

engChrName: W-Well, I mean, you know him in a professional capacity, obviously, but you make it sound like you're more personally acquainted.
engSearchText:
W-Well, I mean, you know him in a professional
capacity, obviously, but you make it sound like you're
more personally acquainted.
jpnChrName: い、いえ、当然、 面識はおありでしょうけど……
jpnSearchText:
い、いえ、当然、
面識はおありでしょうけど……

engChrName: Haha. I suppose it makes sense that you wouldn't know this...
engSearchText:
Haha. I suppose it makes sense that you wouldn't
know this...
jpnChrName: フフ、君は知らないかもしれないが……
jpnSearchText: フフ、君は知らないかもしれないが……

engChrName: ...but before establishing the Patriot League as a party, Roy was part of the Republican Party just like me.
engSearchText:
...but before establishing the Patriot League as a
party, Roy was part of the Republican Party just
like me.
jpnChrName: 《愛国同盟》を立ち上げる前のロイ君は 現野党の《共和党》に所属していてね。
jpnSearchText:
《愛国同盟》を立ち上げる前のロイ君は
現野党の《共和党》に所属していてね。

engChrName: The two of us were on very friendly terms indeed when he first delved into politics after leaving the armed forces.
engSearchText:
The two of us were on very friendly terms indeed
when he first delved into politics after leaving the
armed forces.
jpnChrName: 退役したばかりの若手議員の頃など 相当、親しくさせてもらっていたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
退役したばかりの若手議員の頃など
相当、親しくさせてもらっていたんだ。

engChrName: I also knew your mother. I even remember meeting you when you were still a baby.
engSearchText:
I also knew your mother. I even remember meeting
you when you were still a baby.
jpnChrName: 君のお母上のこともよく知っている。 ──実は赤ん坊だった君にも会っていてね。
jpnSearchText:
君のお母上のこともよく知っている。
──実は赤ん坊だった君にも会っていてね。

engChrName: I had no idea...
engSearchText: I had no idea...
jpnChrName: そう、だったんですか……
jpnSearchText: そう、だったんですか……

engChrName: ...I'm not ignorant about what happened in the election two years ago.
engSearchText:
...I'm not ignorant about what happened in the
election two years ago.
jpnChrName: ……２年前の選挙については 私も色々と知りました。
jpnSearchText:
……２年前の選挙については
私も色々と知りました。

engChrName: So much scheming went on behind the scenes to remove you from office.
engSearchText:
So much scheming went on behind the scenes to
remove you from office.
jpnChrName: 現職だった閣下を追い落とすため、 どれだけの謀略が仕掛けられたのか……
jpnSearchText:
現職だった閣下を追い落とすため、
どれだけの謀略が仕掛けられたのか……

engChrName: And the man responsible for it all was—
engSearchText: And the man responsible for it all was—
jpnChrName: ……そして、それを仕組んだのが全て──
jpnSearchText: ……そして、それを仕組んだのが全て──

engChrName: That's just how the world of politics is, young lady.
engSearchText: That's just how the world of politics is, young lady.
jpnChrName: いや、それが政治というものだ。
jpnSearchText: いや、それが政治というものだ。

engChrName: The 23rd president of the Calvard Republic that came of it has brought us unprecedented prosperity.
engSearchText:
The 23rd president of the Calvard Republic that
came of it has brought us unprecedented prosperity.
jpnChrName: そうして誕生した第２３代大統領は 未曾有の好景気を共和国にもたらし……
jpnSearchText:
そうして誕生した第２３代大統領は
未曾有の好景気を共和国にもたらし……

engChrName: He is also standing tall as a force to be reckoned with—for better or for worse—in the current world in which we live.
engSearchText:
He is also standing tall as a force to be reckoned
with—for better or for worse—in the current world in
which we live.
jpnChrName: 良い意味でも悪い意味でも “今の世界”のイニシアチブを握っている。
jpnSearchText:
良い意味でも悪い意味でも
“今の世界”のイニシアチブを握っている。

engChrName: Besides, nothing in politics is inherently good or evil in the present. Morality is solely for history to judge.
engSearchText:
Besides, nothing in politics is inherently good or evil
in the present. Morality is solely for history to judge.
jpnChrName: そして政治に本来、善も悪もない── 是非を問えるのは“歴史”だけだろう。
jpnSearchText:
そして政治に本来、善も悪もない──
是非を問えるのは“歴史”だけだろう。

engChrName: All we politicians must do is ensure that our fair republic is deemed right.
engSearchText:
All we politicians must do is ensure that our fair
republic is deemed right.
jpnChrName: その意味で、私も含めた政治家は 踏ん張ってでも果たさなくてはならない。
jpnSearchText:
その意味で、私も含めた政治家は
踏ん張ってでも果たさなくてはならない。

engChrName: Be that through leading it to greatness—or offering an alternative should our leaders lose their way.
engSearchText:
Be that through leading it to greatness—or offering
an alternative should our leaders lose their way.
jpnChrName: 今のカルバードが“歴史”に選ばれるか、 それとも何らかの修正が余儀なくされるのか。
jpnSearchText:
今のカルバードが“歴史”に選ばれるか、
それとも何らかの修正が余儀なくされるのか。

engChrName: Such is the life of ones in our position.
engSearchText: Such is the life of ones in our position.
jpnChrName: ──真に意義のある 政治的代替（オルタナティブ）としての役目をね。
jpnSearchText:
──真に意義のある
政治的代替（オルタナティブ）としての役目をね。

engChrName: Mr. President...
engSearchText: Mr. President...

engChrName: All that said, you just leave the burden of politics to us adults for now.
engSearchText:
All that said, you just leave the burden of politics to
us adults for now.
jpnChrName: フフ、だから政治のことは 今は我々大人に任せておきたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、だから政治のことは
今は我々大人に任せておきたまえ。

engChrName: I would rather you keep your focus on what you want to achieve.
engSearchText:
I would rather you keep your focus on what you want
to achieve.
jpnChrName: 君自身がまず、成し遂げたいと 思えることを果たすためにもね。
jpnSearchText:
君自身がまず、成し遂げたいと
思えることを果たすためにもね。

engChrName: Then I will. Thank you, Mr. President!
engSearchText: Then I will. Thank you, Mr. President!
jpnChrName: はい──ありがとうございます、 ロックスミス閣下……！
jpnSearchText:
はい──ありがとうございます、
ロックスミス閣下……！

engChrName: (She looks like she's had a big weight lifted off her shoulders...)
engSearchText:
(She looks like she's had a big weight lifted off
her shoulders...)
jpnChrName: ……？（なんだか 肩の荷が下りたような……？）
jpnSearchText:
……？（なんだか
肩の荷が下りたような……？）

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.

engChrName: Oh! There you guys are!
engSearchText: Oh! There you guys are!
jpnChrName: あ、かえってきた！
jpnSearchText: あ、かえってきた！

engChrName: You're up again, huh?
engSearchText: You're up again, huh?
jpnChrName: おっ、起きたかチビ。
jpnSearchText: おっ、起きたかチビ。

engChrName: Did you come to collect us?
engSearchText: Did you come to collect us?
jpnChrName: ひょっとしてわたくしたちを 迎えに行かれる所でしたか？
jpnSearchText:
ひょっとしてわたくしたちを
迎えに行かれる所でしたか？

engChrName: Yep!
engSearchText: Yep!
jpnChrName: うん、そー！
jpnSearchText: うん、そー！

engChrName: I-I'm very sorry that we took so long.
engSearchText: I-I'm very sorry that we took so long.
jpnChrName: す、すみません。 帰ってくるのが遅くなって……
jpnSearchText:
す、すみません。
帰ってくるのが遅くなって……

engChrName: *yawn* Don't worry about it. We had a good nap between us.
engSearchText:
*yawn* Don't worry about it. We had a good nap
between us.
jpnChrName: ふわあっ…… ぐっすり寝てたし別にいいけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふわあっ……
ぐっすり寝てたし別にいいけど。

engChrName: You had to be up early today, too, didn't you? You should probably hit the hay yourselves.
engSearchText:
You had to be up early today, too, didn't you?
You should probably hit the hay yourselves.
jpnChrName: ま、アンタたちも朝早かったのなら そろそろ寝た方がいいんじゃないの？
jpnSearchText:
ま、アンタたちも朝早かったのなら
そろそろ寝た方がいいんじゃないの？

engChrName: Can't argue with you there. You guys good to head back to our rooms, then?
engSearchText:
Can't argue with you there. You guys good to head
back to our rooms, then?
jpnChrName: ごもっともだ── そんじゃあ部屋に戻るかね。
jpnSearchText:
ごもっともだ──
そんじゃあ部屋に戻るかね。

engChrName: I know I am. I might pass out as soon as I hit the bed.
engSearchText: I know I am. I might pass out as soon as I hit the bed.
jpnChrName: うん……さすがに 眠くなってきちゃったかも。
jpnSearchText:
うん……さすがに
眠くなってきちゃったかも。

engChrName: Now I get to sleep with Agnès and Feri!
engSearchText: Now I get to sleep with Agnès and Feri!
jpnChrName: アニエスちゃん、フェリちゃんも いっしょにねよ～！
jpnSearchText:
アニエスちゃん、フェリちゃんも
いっしょにねよ～！

engChrName: That's right—we did say we were going to do that.
engSearchText: That's right—we did say we were going to do that.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、約束でしたね。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、約束でしたね。

engChrName: We won't all fit in the bed at once, though, so we'll have to take turns.
engSearchText:
We won't all fit in the bed at once, though, so we'll
have to take turns.
jpnChrName: えへへ、それじゃあ かわりばんこに寝ましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、それじゃあ
かわりばんこに寝ましょうか。

engChrName: Mommy...
engSearchText: Mommy...
jpnSearchText: ……ママ………

engChrName: November 15th, 1208, 7:15AM
engSearchText: November 15th, 1208, 7:15AM

engChrName: Whoa... I wonder why it's so thick.
engSearchText: Whoa... I wonder why it's so thick.
jpnChrName: うわ～、これって……
jpnSearchText: うわ～、これって……

engChrName: ...Great. Fog.
engSearchText: ...Great. Fog.

engChrName: (Oh, right. There was fog out in Langport when his friends were...)
engSearchText:
(Oh, right. There was fog out in Langport when his
friends were...)
jpnChrName: （……そうか。   煌都の時にダチが……）
jpnSearchText:
（……そうか。
煌都の時にダチが……）

engChrName: I can't find her anywhere...
engSearchText: I can't find her anywhere...
jpnChrName: ……ダメです…… どこにもいませんっ……
jpnSearchText:
……ダメです……
どこにもいませんっ……

engChrName: Maybe she's gone into the boys' room?
engSearchText: Maybe she's gone into the boys' room?
jpnChrName: ……ひょっとしたら ヴァンさんたちの部屋かも……
jpnSearchText:
……ひょっとしたら
ヴァンさんたちの部屋かも……

engChrName: Hmm?
engSearchText: Hmm?
jpnChrName: ああん……？
jpnSearchText: ああん……？

engChrName: What's that all about?
engSearchText: What's that all about?
jpnChrName: ……アニエスさんたち？
jpnSearchText: ……アニエスさんたち？

engChrName: What's up?
engSearchText: What's up?
jpnChrName: なんだ、どうした？
jpnSearchText: なんだ、どうした？
あ……

engChrName: I don't see her...
engSearchText: I don't see her...
jpnChrName: 居ません、よね……
jpnSearchText: 居ません、よね……

engChrName: We heard what's going on. She hasn't been in our room, either.
engSearchText:
We heard what's going on. She hasn't been in our
room, either.
jpnChrName: ──話は聞いたわ。 あたしの部屋にも来てないわよ。
jpnSearchText:
──話は聞いたわ。
あたしの部屋にも来てないわよ。

engChrName: Nor is she anywhere in the communal area.
engSearchText: Nor is she anywhere in the communal area.
jpnChrName: 共有スペースなどにも いらっしゃらないようです。
jpnSearchText:
共有スペースなどにも
いらっしゃらないようです。

engChrName: Who isn't? What's going on?
engSearchText: Who isn't? What's going on?
jpnChrName: え、なに、どうしたのさ？
jpnSearchText: え、なに、どうしたのさ？

engChrName: What's all the noise first thing in the morning? ...Wait. Where's the kid?
engSearchText:
What's all the noise first thing in the morning?
...Wait. Where's the kid?
jpnChrName: 朝っぱらから姦（かしま）しいな。 ……って、チビはどうした？
jpnSearchText:
朝っぱらから姦（かしま）しいな。
……って、チビはどうした？

engChrName: I'll check just in case: Yumé hasn't been in your room, has she?
engSearchText:
I'll check just in case: Yumé hasn't been in your room,
has she?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、そちらの部屋に ユメちゃんが来てませんでしたかっ？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん、そちらの部屋に
ユメちゃんが来てませんでしたかっ？

engChrName: Sh-She was supposed to be sleeping with us, but when we woke up, she was nowhere to be found!
engSearchText:
Sh-She was supposed to be sleeping with us, but
when we woke up, she was nowhere to be found!
jpnChrName: い、一緒に寝てたのに──朝起きたら 部屋からいなくなってたんですっ……！
jpnSearchText:
い、一緒に寝てたのに──朝起きたら
部屋からいなくなってたんですっ……！

engChrName: They checked with the inn's staff just in case, but they were told that Yumé hadn't been sighted anywhere on the premises.
engSearchText:
They checked with the inn's staff just in case, but
they were told that Yumé hadn't been sighted
anywhere on the premises.
jpnChrName: その後──宿のスタッフにも確認したが ユメの姿は敷地内には全く見当たらず……
jpnSearchText:
その後──宿のスタッフにも確認したが
ユメの姿は敷地内には全く見当たらず……

engChrName: After learning this, they decided to split up and search the town.
engSearchText:
After learning this, they decided to split up and
search the town.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは手分けして 霧の龍來の町へ捜しに出ることにした。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは手分けして
霧の龍來の町へ捜しに出ることにした。

engChrName: We're gonna head out now, but I want you to stand by at the inn in case anyone tries to get in contact.
engSearchText:
We're gonna head out now, but I want you to stand
by at the inn in case anyone tries to get in contact.
jpnChrName: ──それじゃあ お前さんは宿で待機しててくれ。
jpnSearchText:
──それじゃあ
お前さんは宿で待機しててくれ。

engChrName: If you learn anything from the police or the guild, call us right away and let us know.
engSearchText:
If you learn anything from the police or the guild, call
us right away and let us know.
jpnChrName: 警察やギルド方面から何かあったら 全員への連絡を頼む。
jpnSearchText:
警察やギルド方面から何かあったら
全員への連絡を頼む。

engChrName: Understood. I'll see if I can find anything on the orbal network while I wait.
engSearchText:
Understood. I'll see if I can find anything on the orbal
network while I wait.
jpnChrName: かしこまりました。 ネット方面も当たっておきますので。
jpnSearchText:
かしこまりました。
ネット方面も当たっておきますので。

engChrName: Please, do all that you can to bring her back safely.
engSearchText: Please, do all that you can to bring her back safely.
jpnChrName: ヴァン様、ジュディス様も どうかユメ様をよろしくお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン様、ジュディス様も
どうかユメ様をよろしくお願いします。

engChrName: We will.
engSearchText: We will.
jpnChrName: ええ、頼まれたわ。
jpnSearchText: ええ、頼まれたわ。

engChrName: *sigh* She's one little troublemaker, isn't she?
engSearchText: *sigh* She's one little troublemaker, isn't she?
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… 人騒がせなおチビちゃんね。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
人騒がせなおチビちゃんね。

engChrName: Maybe she just had so much energy she decided to work it all off? ...Doubtful. She seems too well behaved for that.
engSearchText:
Maybe she just had so much energy she decided to
work it all off? ...Doubtful. She seems too well
behaved for that.
jpnChrName: あれだけ元気があれば遊びに出て…… って、そんな勝手をする子でもないか。
jpnSearchText:
あれだけ元気があれば遊びに出て……
って、そんな勝手をする子でもないか。

engChrName: Yeah. Her mom's brought her up right.
engSearchText: Yeah. Her mom's brought her up right.
jpnChrName: ああ……そのあたりは 母親の教育がいいみたいだからな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……そのあたりは
母親の教育がいいみたいだからな。

engChrName: I'm sorry for draggin' you into our problems again. We're kinda ruining your vacation, aren't we?
engSearchText:
I'm sorry for draggin' you into our problems again.
We're kinda ruining your vacation, aren't we?
jpnChrName: しかし、昨日に引き続き悪いな？ 折角のお忍び旅行だっつーのに。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、昨日に引き続き悪いな？
折角のお忍び旅行だっつーのに。

engChrName: Not at all. We spent a lot of time together yesterday, so I'm as worried about her as you are at this point.
engSearchText:
Not at all. We spent a lot of time together yesterday,
so I'm as worried about her as you are at this point.
jpnChrName: あー、だからいいって。 こっちもあの子と仲良くなったし。
jpnSearchText:
あー、だからいいって。
こっちもあの子と仲良くなったし。

engChrName: Thankfully, I don't think it'll take us that long to find her with this many people.
engSearchText:
Thankfully, I don't think it'll take us that long to find
her with this many people.
jpnChrName: ま、人手も結構あるし 手分けすればすぐに見つかるでしょ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、人手も結構あるし
手分けすればすぐに見つかるでしょ。

engChrName: Those two robots—FIO and XEROS, was it?— seem like they'll be a big help in the search.
engSearchText:
Those two robots—FIO and XEROS, was it?—
seem like they'll be a big help in the search.
jpnChrName: ＦＩＯとＸＥＲＯＳだっけ？ あの子たちも頼りになりそうじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
ＦＩＯとＸＥＲＯＳだっけ？
あの子たちも頼りになりそうじゃない。

engChrName: Yeah. The sensors those things have got are somethin' else—if she's in town, they'll find her.
engSearchText:
Yeah. The sensors those things have got are
somethin' else—if she's in town, they'll find her.
jpnChrName: ああ、センサーも優秀だから 町の何処かにいるなら見つかる筈だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、センサーも優秀だから
町の何処かにいるなら見つかる筈だ。

engChrName: In the meantime, we're gonna go around askin' people if they've seen her just in case and see if we can find her that way.
engSearchText:
In the meantime, we're gonna go around askin'
people if they've seen her just in case and see if we
can find her that way.
jpnChrName: 念のため俺たちは聞き込み中心で ぐるっと回ってみるとして──
jpnSearchText:
念のため俺たちは聞き込み中心で
ぐるっと回ってみるとして──

engChrName: Hmm? Do you have some useful app on your Xipha that'll help find her?
engSearchText:
Hmm? Do you have some useful app on your Xipha
that'll help find her?
jpnChrName: ザイファ？ 何か便利な捜索アプリがあるとか？
jpnSearchText:
ザイファ？
何か便利な捜索アプリがあるとか？

engChrName: Nah. It's just that something's up with the holo I use.
engSearchText: Nah. It's just that something's up with the holo I use.
jpnChrName: いや──俺がメインで使っていた、 ちょいと特殊なホロウ（ＡＩ）なんだが……
jpnSearchText:
いや──俺がメインで使っていた、
ちょいと特殊なホロウ（ＡＩ）なんだが……

engChrName: She just stopped respondin' to me this morning. Can't even get her to appear now.
engSearchText:
She just stopped respondin' to me this morning.
Can't even get her to appear now.
jpnChrName: 今朝になって反応しなくなってやがる。
jpnSearchText: 今朝になって反応しなくなってやがる。

engChrName: That's weird...
engSearchText: That's weird...
jpnChrName: え、それって……
jpnSearchText: え、それって……

engChrName: Something might've happened overnight.
engSearchText: Something might've happened overnight.
jpnChrName: ……ひょっとしたら“夜中”に 何かあった可能性もゼロじゃねえ。
jpnSearchText:
……ひょっとしたら“夜中”に
何かあった可能性もゼロじゃねえ。

engChrName: Anyway, let's get to work.
engSearchText: Anyway, let's get to work.
jpnChrName: とりあえず聞き込みをしてみるぞ。
jpnSearchText: とりあえず聞き込みをしてみるぞ。

engChrName: O-Okay, got it. Oh, wait—I need to put these on first.
engSearchText:
O-Okay, got it. Oh, wait—I need to put these
on first.
jpnChrName: よ、よく分からないけど了解。 ──おっと、これを付けないと。
jpnSearchText:
よ、よく分からないけど了解。
──おっと、これを付けないと。

engChrName: Judith joined the party.
engSearchText: Judith joined the party.
jpnChrName: ジュディスがパーティーに加わった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ジュディスがパーティーに加わった。

engChrName: Van's holo core was changed from Mare to another holo core.
engSearchText:
Van's holo core was changed from Mare to another
holo core.
jpnChrName: ヴァンのホロウコアが「メア」から 別のホロウコアに変更されました。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンのホロウコアが「メア」から
別のホロウコアに変更されました。

engChrName: You can change your holo core by pressing  in the Orbment menu.
engSearchText:
You can change your holo core by pressing in the
Orbment menu.
jpnChrName: メインメニューのオーブメント画面から ボタンでホロウコアの変更ができます。
jpnSearchText:
メインメニューのオーブメント画面から
ボタンでホロウコアの変更ができます。

engChrName: After returning to Longlai, they contacted everyone who had been helping with the search to let them know Yumé was all right.
engSearchText:
After returning to Longlai, they contacted everyone
who had been helping with the search to let them
know Yumé was all right.
jpnChrName: その後、龍來に戻ったヴァンたちは 各方面に連絡してからランチを楽しみ──
jpnSearchText:
その後、龍來に戻ったヴァンたちは
各方面に連絡してからランチを楽しみ──

engChrName: After they had lunch together, they were then able to enjoy the remainder of their day in peace, enjoying the springs, massages, and more.
engSearchText:
After they had lunch together, they were then able to
enjoy the remainder of their day in peace, enjoying
the springs, massages, and more.
jpnChrName: 温泉に入ったり、マッサージを受けたりなど、 のんびりした休暇を楽しむのだった。
jpnSearchText:
温泉に入ったり、マッサージを受けたりなど、
のんびりした休暇を楽しむのだった。

engChrName: That night, they were all invited by the former president to his residence...
engSearchText:
That night, they were all invited by the former
president to his residence...
jpnChrName: そして夜はロックスミス元大統領に ジュディス共々、旧泰斗流道場に招かれ──
jpnSearchText:
そして夜はロックスミス元大統領に
ジュディス共々、旧泰斗流道場に招かれ──

engChrName: ...and there, they enjoyed the finest in Far Eastern cuisine, crafted by none other than the head chef of the Hekizanro Inn.
engSearchText:
...and there, they enjoyed the finest in Far Eastern
cuisine, crafted by none other than the head chef of
the Hekizanro Inn.
jpnChrName: 碧山楼の厨師長が出張する形で振舞われた 珍しい“極東料理”に舌鼓を打つのだった。
jpnSearchText:
碧山楼の厨師長が出張する形で振舞われた
珍しい“極東料理”に舌鼓を打つのだった。

engChrName: Before they knew it, the second day of their stay in Longlai had come to an end.
engSearchText:
Before they knew it, the second day of their stay in
Longlai had come to an end.
jpnChrName: ──こうして龍來旅行の２日目は あっという間に過ぎていった。
jpnSearchText:
──こうして龍來旅行の２日目は
あっという間に過ぎていった。

engChrName: November 16th, 1208, 10:00AM
engSearchText: November 16th, 1208, 10:00AM

engChrName: The next morning, they enjoyed a relaxed breakfast before packing their belongings.
engSearchText:
The next morning, they enjoyed a relaxed breakfast
before packing their belongings.
jpnChrName: 翌日、ゆったりと朝食をとった後、 荷造りを終えたヴァンたちは──
jpnSearchText:
翌日、ゆったりと朝食をとった後、
荷造りを終えたヴァンたちは──

engChrName: Many of those they met during their stay came to the truck to bid them farewell. They then departed Longlai, wishing they could stay a little longer.
engSearchText:
Many of those they met during their stay came to the
truck to bid them farewell. They then departed
Longlai, wishing they could stay a little longer.
jpnChrName: 宿のスタッフやガイドの少年、 元大統領に見送られ、名残を惜しみながら 龍來の町を後にするのだった。
jpnSearchText:
宿のスタッフやガイドの少年、
元大統領に見送られ、名残を惜しみながら
龍來の町を後にするのだった。

engChrName: Much like she had done on her way there, Judith planned to call a long-distance cab to take her back to Edith...
engSearchText:
Much like she had done on her way there, Judith
planned to call a long-distance cab to take her back
to Edith...
jpnChrName: ──なお、ジュディスは当初、 行きと同じく長距離ハイヤーを呼んで 首都まで帰ろうとしていたが……
jpnSearchText:
──なお、ジュディスは当初、
行きと同じく長距離ハイヤーを呼んで
首都まで帰ろうとしていたが……

engChrName: However, upon Van's group's suggestion (and Yumé's insistence) that she join them, she eventually gave in and agreed to do so.
engSearchText:
However, upon Van's group's suggestion (and Yumé's
insistence) that she join them, she eventually gave in
and agreed to do so.
jpnChrName: アニエスたちの勧めや、ユメたっての希望で ピックアップトラックに同乗することになった。
jpnSearchText:
アニエスたちの勧めや、ユメたっての希望で
ピックアップトラックに同乗することになった。

engChrName: She insisted that she would repay them for that 'debt' at some point in her usual stubborn way...
engSearchText:
She insisted that she would repay them for that 'debt'
at some point in her usual stubborn way...
jpnChrName: なお『この借りは返させてもらうからっ！』 というジュディスの主張については──
jpnSearchText:
なお『この借りは返させてもらうからっ！』
というジュディスの主張については──

engChrName: But it goes without saying that they were having none of it—not after all she had done for them in the previous day.
engSearchText:
But it goes without saying that they were having none
of it—not after all she had done for them in the
previous day.
jpnChrName: 前日の捜索などで散々世話になったこともあり、 全会一致で却下されたのは言うまでもない。
jpnSearchText:
前日の捜索などで散々世話になったこともあり、
全会一致で却下されたのは言うまでもない。

engChrName: (Wow. It's still in a lot better shape than I'd expected...)
engSearchText:
(Wow. It's still in a lot better shape than
I'd expected...)
jpnChrName: （意外と綺麗に残ってるな……）
jpnSearchText: （意外と綺麗に残ってるな……）

engChrName: Van? What's on your mind?
engSearchText: Van? What's on your mind?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、どうかしましたか？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、どうかしましたか？

engChrName: Van? What is it?
engSearchText: Van? What is it?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、どうしたんですか？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、どうしたんですか？

engChrName: Hey, why'd you stop suddenly?
engSearchText: Hey, why'd you stop suddenly?
jpnChrName: どうしたんだ、立ち止まって？
jpnSearchText: どうしたんだ、立ち止まって？

engChrName: Mr. Arkride, is something amiss?
engSearchText: Mr. Arkride, is something amiss?
jpnChrName: ヴァン様、どうかしましたか？
jpnSearchText: ヴァン様、どうかしましたか？

engChrName: What's going on, Van?
engSearchText: What's going on, Van?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、どうしたの？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、どうしたの？

engChrName: Is there something on your mind?
engSearchText: Is there something on your mind?
jpnChrName: 何か気になるものでも？
jpnSearchText: 何か気になるものでも？

engChrName: Something eating you?
engSearchText: Something eating you?
jpnChrName: 何か気になるものでもあんのかよ？
jpnSearchText: 何か気になるものでもあんのかよ？

engChrName: Did something occur to you?
engSearchText: Did something occur to you?
jpnChrName: 何か気になるものでもあるの？
jpnSearchText: 何か気になるものでもあるの？

engChrName: What's over there?
engSearchText: What's over there?
jpnChrName: 向こうに何かあるのー？
jpnSearchText: 向こうに何かあるのー？

engChrName: Oh, nah. It's nothin'.
engSearchText: Oh, nah. It's nothin'.
jpnChrName: いや、なんでもねぇよ。
jpnSearchText: いや、なんでもねぇよ。

engChrName: (No reason to bring a bunch of people over. I'll go there later on my own.)
engSearchText:
(No reason to bring a bunch of people over. I'll go
there later on my own.)
jpnChrName: （ぞろぞろ引き連れていく場所でもねぇ。   行くのは一人の時にするか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ぞろぞろ引き連れていく場所でもねぇ。
行くのは一人の時にするか。）

engChrName: Zzz... Zzz... Mmnn...
engSearchText: Zzz... Zzz... Mmnn...
jpnChrName: すーっ、すーっ、ムニャムニャ……
jpnSearchText: すーっ、すーっ、ムニャムニャ……

engChrName: Haha! She's such a darling. You said she's the granddaughter of your office's landlord?
engSearchText:
Haha! She's such a darling. You said she's the
granddaughter of your office's landlord?
jpnChrName: ふふっ……可愛いわね。 事務所の大家さんの孫娘だっけ？
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……可愛いわね。
事務所の大家さんの孫娘だっけ？

engChrName: Yeah. They run a pretty popular bistro, actually.
engSearchText: Yeah. They run a pretty popular bistro, actually.
jpnChrName: ああ、割と評判のいい ビストロなんかをやっててな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、割と評判のいい
ビストロなんかをやっててな。

engChrName: My office is on the second floor, and all my part-timers are rentin' rooms on the third...
engSearchText:
My office is on the second floor, and all my
part-timers are rentin' rooms on the third...
jpnChrName: ２階を事務所に、他の助手どもは ３階の部屋を借りてる状況だ。
jpnSearchText:
２階を事務所に、他の助手どもは
３階の部屋を借りてる状況だ。

engChrName: Aha! So your whole crew is beholden to a single lord of landing!
engSearchText:
Aha! So your whole crew is beholden to a single lord
of landing!
jpnChrName: へえ、事務所ぐるみで お世話になってるわけね。
jpnSearchText:
へえ、事務所ぐるみで
お世話になってるわけね。

engChrName: That seems nice, in a way. You never have to worry about where to get a bite, right?
engSearchText:
That seems nice, in a way. You never have to worry
about where to get a bite, right?
jpnChrName: それじゃあ毎日の食事とかも 困らないんじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ毎日の食事とかも
困らないんじゃない？

engChrName: True enough. The guy's list of complaints never ends, but he knows how to keep the food nutritious.
engSearchText:
True enough. The guy's list of complaints never ends,
but he knows how to keep the food nutritious.
jpnChrName: まあな──口うるさいマスターだが 栄養バランスも考えてくれている。
jpnSearchText:
まあな──口うるさいマスターだが
栄養バランスも考えてくれている。

engChrName: Which pays for me, at this point. Half my crew are kids who're still growin'.
engSearchText:
Which pays for me, at this point. Half my crew are
kids who're still growin'.
jpnChrName: 育ち盛りが多いから助かってるぜ。
jpnSearchText: 育ち盛りが多いから助かってるぜ。

engChrName: Agh... Now I'm actually feeling kinda jealous.
engSearchText: Agh... Now I'm actually feeling kinda jealous.
jpnChrName: むむ、ちょっと羨ましいわね。
jpnSearchText: むむ、ちょっと羨ましいわね。

engChrName: I wish I could live a nice, balanced life like that.
engSearchText:
I wish I could live a nice, balanced life
like that.
jpnChrName: あたしもバランスのいい、規則正しい 食生活を心がけてはいるけど……
jpnSearchText:
あたしもバランスのいい、規則正しい
食生活を心がけてはいるけど……

engChrName: My meals and schedule keep getting messed up, what with industry dinners and invites from sponsors and whatnot.
engSearchText:
My meals and schedule keep getting messed up, what
with industry dinners and invites from sponsors
and whatnot.
jpnChrName: どうしても会食とかスポンサーの 招待とかで偏りがちになっちゃって。
jpnSearchText:
どうしても会食とかスポンサーの
招待とかで偏りがちになっちゃって。

engChrName: I guess that's one advantage to my side business. It's a decent way to spend some calories!
engSearchText:
I guess that's one advantage to my side business. It's a
decent way to spend some calories!
jpnChrName: まあ、余計なカロリーなんかは “あの活動”で消費できてるけどね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、余計なカロリーなんかは
“あの活動”で消費できてるけどね。

engChrName: Don't tell me your phantom thief thing is just a fancy way to lose weight.
engSearchText:
Don't tell me your phantom thief thing is just a fancy
way to lose weight.
jpnChrName: ………まさかダイエット目当てで 怪盗やってるとか言わねえよな？
jpnSearchText:
………まさかダイエット目当てで
怪盗やってるとか言わねえよな？

engChrName: O-Of course not! That's ridiculous! It's just a plus, that's all!
engSearchText:
O-Of course not! That's ridiculous! It's just a plus,
that's all!
jpnChrName: そ、そんなわけないでしょ！ あくまで結果的によ、結果的に！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんなわけないでしょ！
あくまで結果的によ、結果的に！

engChrName: Besides, I think I look just fine, thank you! Not like YOU had any complaints when you saw—
engSearchText:
Besides, I think I look just fine, thank you! Not like
YOU had any complaints when you saw—
jpnChrName: プロポーションには自信があるんだから！ アンタだって昼間見た──
jpnSearchText:
プロポーションには自信があるんだから！
アンタだって昼間見た──

engChrName: ...MRRGH!
engSearchText: ...MRRGH!

engChrName: Yeah, uhh, about that. I'm real, real...real sorry. I wasn't bein' the most considerate about it.
engSearchText:
Yeah, uhh, about that. I'm real, real...real sorry.
I wasn't bein' the most considerate about it.
jpnChrName: その、改めてになるが悪かった。 どうも雑というか無神経でな。
jpnSearchText:
その、改めてになるが悪かった。
どうも雑というか無神経でな。

engChrName: I'll do whatever you'd like to apologize.
engSearchText: I'll do whatever you'd like to apologize.
jpnChrName: 気の済むまで謝らせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: 気の済むまで謝らせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Ugh. It's fine. Not like I haven't put that much up on the big screen before, anyway.
engSearchText:
Ugh. It's fine. Not like I haven't put that much up on
the big screen before, anyway.
jpnChrName: はあ……もういいわよ。 映画でもあのくらいはたまにあるし。
jpnSearchText:
はあ……もういいわよ。
映画でもあのくらいはたまにあるし。

engChrName: Compared to some of the sex scenes and stuff in the R-17 versions of some of Gotti's movies, a quick semi-nude barely registers.
engSearchText:
Compared to some of the sex scenes and stuff in the
R-17 versions of some of Gotti's movies, a quick
semi-nude barely registers.
jpnChrName: Ｒ１７の濡れ場に比べれば セミヌードくらいどうって事ないわ。
jpnSearchText:
Ｒ１７の濡れ場に比べれば
セミヌードくらいどうって事ないわ。

engChrName: Damn, though, you really are a pro. Not gonna say no to sketchy stuff like that?
engSearchText:
Damn, though, you really are a pro. Not gonna say no
to sketchy stuff like that?
jpnChrName: さすがプロの女優ってところか。 際どいシーンもＮＧにしてねぇみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
さすがプロの女優ってところか。
際どいシーンもＮＧにしてねぇみたいだし。

engChrName: I'd figure your agency would shoot stuff like that down in a heartbeat.
engSearchText:
I'd figure your agency would shoot stuff like that
down in a heartbeat.
jpnChrName: 普通なら事務所が止めそうなもんだが。
jpnSearchText: 普通なら事務所が止めそうなもんだが。

engChrName: They don't like it, but I usually convince them to give it the green light. It can be a part of making a movie that much better.
engSearchText:
They don't like it, but I usually convince them to give
it the green light. It can be a part of making a
movie that much better.
jpnChrName: いい顔はしないけど説得してるわ。 作品の完成度を上げる方が大事だし。
jpnSearchText:
いい顔はしないけど説得してるわ。
作品の完成度を上げる方が大事だし。

engChrName: Now, my mom's the one who really gets on my case about it. I'm SO tired of hearing that I shouldn't be 'loose,' that I need to save myself fo—
engSearchText:
Now, my mom's the one who really gets on my case
about it. I'm SO tired of hearing that I shouldn't be
'loose,' that I need to save myself fo—
jpnChrName: むしろママたちの方がうるさいんだけど。 安売りしないで婿捜しの武器にしろとか──
jpnSearchText:
むしろママたちの方がうるさいんだけど。
安売りしないで婿捜しの武器にしろとか──

engChrName: —ffffowhy am I telling you these things?!
engSearchText: —ffffowhy am I telling you these things?!
jpnChrName: って何を言わせるのよ！？
jpnSearchText: って何を言わせるのよ！？

engChrName: You say that, but you're the one who keeps walkin' into it. Still... It's not bad, havin' family that cares at least, right?
engSearchText:
You say that, but you're the one who keeps walkin'
into it. Still... It's not bad, havin' family that cares at
least, right?
jpnChrName: さっきから自爆ばっかじゃねえか。 ……ま、家族仲良くて結構なこった。
jpnSearchText:
さっきから自爆ばっかじゃねえか。
……ま、家族仲良くて結構なこった。

engChrName: Your grandma was a former chanson singer, yeah? And your mom was big on the stage, right?
engSearchText:
Your grandma was a former chanson singer, yeah?
And your mom was big on the stage, right?
jpnChrName: たしか祖母さんは元シャンソン歌手、 お袋さんは元舞台女優だったか？
jpnSearchText:
たしか祖母さんは元シャンソン歌手、
お袋さんは元舞台女優だったか？

engChrName: I'm...surprised you know them. I mean, they're not a secret, but that was a while back.
engSearchText:
I'm...surprised you know them. I mean, they're not a
secret, but that was a while back.
jpnChrName: ……よく知ってるわね。 まあ、別に隠してはいないけど。
jpnSearchText:
……よく知ってるわね。
まあ、別に隠してはいないけど。

engChrName: Well, they both left a big mark on the world. I still see some of your mom's posters on the walls in some bars.
engSearchText:
Well, they both left a big mark on the world. I still
see some of your mom's posters on the walls in
some bars.
jpnChrName: どちらも一世を風靡してたみたいだからな。 お袋さんのポスターはたまに酒場で見かけるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
どちらも一世を風靡してたみたいだからな。
お袋さんのポスターはたまに酒場で見かけるぜ。

engChrName: As for your grandma, I've heard her on records before. Three generations of artistic talent, huh?
engSearchText:
As for your grandma, I've heard her on
records before. Three generations of artistic
talent, huh?
jpnChrName: 祖母さんの歌もレコードで聞いたことがあるし、 ３代揃っての芸能一家じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
祖母さんの歌もレコードで聞いたことがあるし、
３代揃っての芸能一家じゃねえか。

engChrName: Yes, well! We're blessed, it's true.
engSearchText: Yes, well! We're blessed, it's true.
jpnChrName: フ、フフン……まあそれ程でもあるけどね！
jpnSearchText: フ、フフン……まあそれ程でもあるけどね！

engChrName: I'm still nowhere near the phantom thief Mom was, but I think I'm at least living up to her legacy as an actress—
engSearchText:
I'm still nowhere near the phantom thief Mom was,
but I think I'm at least living up to her legacy as an
actress—
jpnChrName: 怪盗としてはママたちに及ばないけど 女優としてなら２人に迫るくらいには──
jpnSearchText:
怪盗としてはママたちに及ばないけど
女優としてなら２人に迫るくらいには──

engChrName: Agh! And here I go again! I swear, I can't let my guard down around you for a second!
engSearchText:
Agh! And here I go again! I swear, I can't let my
guard down around you for a second!
jpnChrName: だ、だから企業秘密なんだってば！ まったく油断も隙もないんだから……！
jpnSearchText:
だ、だから企業秘密なんだってば！
まったく油断も隙もないんだから……！

engChrName: At this point, I'm contractually obligated to point out you keep walkin' into these yourself...
engSearchText:
At this point, I'm contractually obligated to point out
you keep walkin' into these yourself...
jpnChrName: いや、一から十まで自爆だろうが……
jpnSearchText: いや、一から十まで自爆だろうが……

engChrName: Mmnn... I'm gonna be a movie star, too...
engSearchText: Mmnn... I'm gonna be a movie star, too...
jpnChrName: ムニャムニャ…… ………ユメもエーガにでる～………
jpnSearchText:
ムニャムニャ……
………ユメもエーガにでる～………

engChrName: (Well, I took a dip before dinner, but it's great to be able to go in multiple times a day...)
engSearchText:
(Well, I took a dip before dinner, but it's great to be
able to go in multiple times a day...)
jpnChrName: （夕食前に入ったが   日に数度入るのはザラだからな……）
jpnSearchText:
（夕食前に入ったが
日に数度入るのはザラだからな……）

engChrName: (Should I take another quick dip to help digest dinner?)
engSearchText:
(Should I take another quick dip to help
digest dinner?)
jpnChrName: （腹ごなしも兼ねて   軽く一風呂浴びてから出かけるか？）
jpnSearchText:
（腹ごなしも兼ねて
軽く一風呂浴びてから出かけるか？）

engChrName: Phew...
engSearchText: Phew...
jpnChrName: ふう……
jpnSearchText: ふう……

engChrName: (Five years since then, huh?)
engSearchText: (Five years since then, huh?)
jpnChrName: （……あれから５年、か。）
jpnSearchText: （……あれから５年、か。）

engChrName: (Never imagined this'd be how I'd end up back here.)
engSearchText: (Never imagined this'd be how I'd end up back here.)
jpnChrName: （まさかこんな形でこの町に   戻ってくるとは思わなかったが。）
jpnSearchText:
（まさかこんな形でこの町に
戻ってくるとは思わなかったが。）

engChrName: (Come to think of it, we made a promise to go on a hot springs trip way back when, huh?)
engSearchText:
(Come to think of it, we made a promise to go on a
hot springs trip way back when, huh?)
jpnChrName: （……そういやアイツらとも昔、   温泉旅行とかに行く約束をしてたか。）
jpnSearchText:
（……そういやアイツらとも昔、
温泉旅行とかに行く約束をしてたか。）

engChrName: (It was, what, gonna be to celebrate René's graduation? Then I ruined the whole thing.)
engSearchText:
(It was, what, gonna be to celebrate René's
graduation? Then I ruined the whole thing.)
jpnChrName: （ルネの卒業記念にでも、だったか？   ……結局、俺が反故にしちまったが。）
jpnSearchText:
（ルネの卒業記念にでも、だったか？
……結局、俺が反故にしちまったが。）

engChrName: (...Whatever. No turning back the clock now.)
engSearchText: (...Whatever. No turning back the clock now.)
jpnChrName: （……ま、今更か。   時計の針は戻ったりはしねぇ。）
jpnSearchText:
（……ま、今更か。
時計の針は戻ったりはしねぇ。）

engChrName: (I already made my choice. I've thrown away my days with them.)
engSearchText:
(I already made my choice. I've thrown away my days
with them.)
jpnChrName: （俺は選んだんだ──   あいつらとの日々を捨てて……）
jpnSearchText:
（俺は選んだんだ──
あいつらとの日々を捨てて……）

engChrName: ...Okay. Looks like no one's around. I knew the best time to shoot for would be right after dinner.
engSearchText:
...Okay. Looks like no one's around. I knew the best
time to shoot for would be right after dinner.
jpnChrName: ……うん、いないよね。 夕食後を狙って正解だったかな？
jpnSearchText:
……うん、いないよね。
夕食後を狙って正解だったかな？

engChrName: I'll really be in for it if Aaron finds me, so I'll make this a short dip.
engSearchText:
I'll really be in for it if Aaron finds me, so I'll make
this a short dip.
jpnChrName: アーロンさんとかに見つかりたくないし、 さっと入ってすぐに出よっと。
jpnSearchText:
アーロンさんとかに見つかりたくないし、
さっと入ってすぐに出よっと。

engChrName: I did only just take a shower... Hopefully a quick wash is good enough before going in.
engSearchText:
I did only just take a shower... Hopefully a quick wash
is good enough before going in.
jpnChrName: さっきシャワーも浴びたし、 えっと、掛け湯をするくらいで……
jpnSearchText:
さっきシャワーも浴びたし、
えっと、掛け湯をするくらいで……

engChrName: Haha. I can barely see a thing. There's so much steam.
engSearchText:
Haha. I can barely see a thing. There's so
much steam.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ホントに真っ白なんだ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ホントに真っ白なんだ。

engChrName: It really is curious how the oxidation of sulfur can come out so thick.
engSearchText:
It really is curious how the oxidation of sulfur can
come out so thick.
jpnChrName: 硫黄成分が酸化したからみたいだけど トロっとしてるし不思議だよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
硫黄成分が酸化したからみたいだけど
トロっとしてるし不思議だよねぇ。

engChrName: As I recall, it has a positive effect on the skin and soothes chronic pain. Maybe I should convince Gran and Essy to come!
engSearchText:
As I recall, it has a positive effect on the skin and
soothes chronic pain. Maybe I should convince Gran
and Essy to come!
jpnChrName: 肌とか神経痛にもいいらしいから こんどグランマやエレ姉たちにも──
jpnSearchText:
肌とか神経痛にもいいらしいから
こんどグランマやエレ姉たちにも──

engChrName: Man, you sure know your stuff, huh?
engSearchText: Man, you sure know your stuff, huh?
jpnChrName: へえ、詳しいじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText: へえ、詳しいじゃねえか？

engChrName: ...H-Huh? WHAT?! V-VAN?!
engSearchText: ...H-Huh? WHAT?! V-VAN?!
jpnChrName: ちょ、ええ！？ ──ヴァ、ヴァンさん！？
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、ええ！？
──ヴァ、ヴァンさん！？

engChrName: Oh, yeah. Sorry—I've been in for a while now. Real nice bath, huh?
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. Sorry—I've been in for a while now.
Real nice bath, huh?
jpnChrName: おう、お先に失礼してるぜ。 しかしすげえ湯気だよな。
jpnSearchText:
おう、お先に失礼してるぜ。
しかしすげえ湯気だよな。

engChrName: Sorry I didn't say anything earlier. I was kinda lost in thought.
engSearchText:
Sorry I didn't say anything earlier. I was kinda lost
in thought.
jpnChrName: 悪いな、ちょっと考え事をしてて 声を掛けるのが遅れちまった。
jpnSearchText:
悪いな、ちょっと考え事をしてて
声を掛けるのが遅れちまった。

engChrName: You wanted to have the place to yourself, yeah? I'm all warmed up, so I'll leave it to you.
engSearchText:
You wanted to have the place to yourself, yeah?
I'm all warmed up, so I'll leave it to you.
jpnChrName: 一人で入りたかったんだろう？ 軽く温まったし、そろそろ出るぜ。
jpnSearchText:
一人で入りたかったんだろう？
軽く温まったし、そろそろ出るぜ。

engChrName: Uhh, Van! I can see everything!
engSearchText: Uhh, Van! I can see everything!
jpnChrName: って、ヴァンさん！ 見えてる、見えてるってば！
jpnSearchText:
って、ヴァンさん！
見えてる、見えてるってば！

engChrName: Huh? What're you talking about? I got a towel around my waist.
engSearchText:
Huh? What're you talking about? I got a towel
around my waist.
jpnChrName: ？？　ちゃんと 湯着は履いてるだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
？？　ちゃんと
湯着は履いてるだろうが。

engChrName: B-But your upper body... You're naked! Your incredible muscles and such are...visible!
engSearchText:
B-But your upper body... You're naked!
Your incredible muscles and such are...visible!
jpnChrName: じょ、上半身が裸じゃないか！？ ゴツゴツして筋肉も凄いし…………
jpnSearchText:
じょ、上半身が裸じゃないか！？
ゴツゴツして筋肉も凄いし…………

engChrName: Agh! Forget that! I didn't say anything!
engSearchText: Agh! Forget that! I didn't say anything!
jpnChrName: ～～っ～～、ナシ！　今のはナシ！
jpnSearchText: ～～っ～～、ナシ！　今のはナシ！

engChrName: Hah! C'mon, I'm not that great compared to folks who really make a habit of flexin' their muscles.
engSearchText:
Hah! C'mon, I'm not that great compared to folks
who really make a habit of flexin' their muscles.
jpnChrName: はは、鍛えてるヤツに比べりゃ そこそこってくらいだろうけどな。
jpnSearchText:
はは、鍛えてるヤツに比べりゃ
そこそこってくらいだろうけどな。

engChrName: Anyway, you wanted the place, so I'm good leavin' you to it. You should have around half an hour before anyone else comes in, I think.
engSearchText:
Anyway, you wanted the place, so I'm good leavin'
you to it. You should have around half an hour before
anyone else comes in, I think.
jpnChrName: 折角だし貸切り札を出しといてやるよ。 ３０分くらいなら大丈夫なはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
折角だし貸切り札を出しといてやるよ。
３０分くらいなら大丈夫なはずだ。

engChrName: Don't stay in for too long right after eatin', though, okay? Also, remember to hydrate once you're done.
engSearchText:
Don't stay in for too long right after eatin',
though, okay? Also, remember to hydrate once
you're done.
jpnChrName: ただ、食後に長湯はすんなよ？ 湯上がりの水分補給も忘れずにな。
jpnSearchText:
ただ、食後に長湯はすんなよ？
湯上がりの水分補給も忘れずにな。

engChrName: Th-That...was a shock.
engSearchText: Th-That...was a shock.

engChrName: (I suppose I was at fault. I should have made sure no one was here first.)
engSearchText:
(I suppose I was at fault. I should have made sure no
one was here first.)
jpnChrName: （いや、ちゃんと確認して   入らなかった僕も悪いけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（いや、ちゃんと確認して
入らなかった僕も悪いけど……）

engChrName: (He...didn't notice, did he?)
engSearchText: (He...didn't notice, did he?)

engChrName: (No. He couldn't have. There shouldn't be that much to see in just the builds of our bodies.)
engSearchText:
(No. He couldn't have. There shouldn't be that much
to see in just the builds of our bodies.)
jpnChrName: （……あり得ないか。   体型上の違和感まではない筈。）
jpnSearchText:
（……あり得ないか。
体型上の違和感まではない筈。）

engChrName: (I think the heat's getting to me. Once I wash myself, I'll head out.)
engSearchText:
(I think the heat's getting to me. Once I wash myself,
I'll head out.)
jpnChrName: （なんだかのぼせてきたし、   身体を洗ったらすぐに出よう。）
jpnSearchText:
（なんだかのぼせてきたし、
身体を洗ったらすぐに出よう。）

engChrName: (Atta boy. Looks like he's makin' sure to hydrate after his bath.)
engSearchText:
(Atta boy. Looks like he's makin' sure to hydrate after
his bath.)
jpnChrName: （湯上がりの水分補給か。   忘れてないようで結構、結構。）
jpnSearchText:
（湯上がりの水分補給か。
忘れてないようで結構、結構。）

engChrName: (Huh? Was that a westerner in a kimono?)
engSearchText: (Huh? Was that a westerner in a kimono?)
jpnChrName: （……？　着物を着た西方人？）
jpnSearchText: （……？　着物を着た西方人？）

engChrName: (Probably just a tourist or someone renting one...)
engSearchText: (Probably just a tourist or someone renting one...)
jpnChrName: （観光客かなんかが   レンタルしてんのかもしれねぇが……）
jpnSearchText:
（観光客かなんかが
レンタルしてんのかもしれねぇが……）

engChrName: (Hmm... Well, at least they're not a ghost.)
engSearchText: (Hmm... Well, at least they're not a ghost.)
jpnChrName: （……ハン………   幽霊って訳でもなさそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（……ハン………
幽霊って訳でもなさそうだな。）

engChrName: (Now the question is—do I pursue, or do I just pretend I saw nothin'?)
engSearchText:
(Now the question is—do I pursue, or do I just
pretend I saw nothin'?)
jpnChrName: （さて──あえて踏み込むか   それともスルーしちまうかだが。）
jpnSearchText:
（さて──あえて踏み込むか
それともスルーしちまうかだが。）

engChrName: Ahh... What a lovely breeze.
engSearchText: Ahh... What a lovely breeze.
jpnChrName: ん～っ……ええ風やねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ん～っ……ええ風やねぇ。

engChrName: I had merely hoped for a light break, but I feel almost spoiled with how pleasant this has been.
engSearchText:
I had merely hoped for a light break, but I feel almost
spoiled with how pleasant this has been.
jpnChrName: ちょっとした息抜きのつもりやったけど 思った以上に愉しめそうやわぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっとした息抜きのつもりやったけど
思った以上に愉しめそうやわぁ。

engChrName: (Her voice is pretty familiar...)
engSearchText: (Her voice is pretty familiar...)
jpnChrName: （……この口調、どこかで──……）
jpnSearchText: （……この口調、どこかで──……）

engChrName: Out for a little stroll, handsome? You strike me as a tourist. From the capital, perhaps?
engSearchText:
Out for a little stroll, handsome? You strike me as
a tourist. From the capital, perhaps?
jpnChrName: ふふ、お兄はんもそぞろ歩き？ 首都あたりからの観光みたいやけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、お兄はんもそぞろ歩き？
首都あたりからの観光みたいやけど。

engChrName: ...Yeah. Just here to kick back a little.
engSearchText: ...Yeah. Just here to kick back a little.
jpnChrName: ……ああ。 慰安旅行の一環みたいなモンでな。
jpnSearchText:
……ああ。
慰安旅行の一環みたいなモンでな。

engChrName: How about you? Relaxin' solo? Can't imagine someone like you'd be out here alone.
engSearchText:
How about you? Relaxin' solo? Can't imagine
someone like you'd be out here alone.
jpnChrName: そちらは優雅な一人旅って所かい？ いかにも連れがいそうにも見えるが。
jpnSearchText:
そちらは優雅な一人旅って所かい？
いかにも連れがいそうにも見えるが。

engChrName: Oh, quite sadly, it's just me, myself, and I this time.
engSearchText: Oh, quite sadly, it's just me, myself, and I this time.
jpnChrName: ふふ、残念ながら今回はウチ一人でなぁ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、残念ながら今回はウチ一人でなぁ。

engChrName: I must admit to being a touch lonely without my oh-so naughty superior and rambunctious coworker.
engSearchText:
I must admit to being a touch lonely without my
oh-so naughty superior and rambunctious coworker.
jpnChrName: 悪ノリしすぎる上司やら、はっちゃけすぎる 同僚なんかもおらへんから少し寂しいんよ。
jpnSearchText:
悪ノリしすぎる上司やら、はっちゃけすぎる
同僚なんかもおらへんから少し寂しいんよ。

engChrName: I have an idea... Won't you be my arm candy instead?
engSearchText: I have an idea... Won't you be my arm candy instead?
jpnChrName: ──代わりにお兄はんが付き合うてくれる？
jpnSearchText: ──代わりにお兄はんが付き合うてくれる？

engChrName: ...That's a very appealing invitation, but I'm afraid I've got some business to attend to.
engSearchText:
...That's a very appealing invitation, but I'm afraid
I've got some business to attend to.
jpnChrName: ……魅力的なお誘いだが ちょいとばかり野暮用があってな。
jpnSearchText:
……魅力的なお誘いだが
ちょいとばかり野暮用があってな。

engChrName: 'Sides, the kids in my crew would never let me hear the end of it if they found us. Think I could take a rain check?
engSearchText:
'Sides, the kids in my crew would never let me hear
the end of it if they found us. Think I could take a
rain check?
jpnChrName: ウチの若いのに見つかったら騒がれそうだし またの機会にでもお願いするぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ウチの若いのに見つかったら騒がれそうだし
またの機会にでもお願いするぜ。

engChrName: Goodness me. My hopes have been dashed.
engSearchText: Goodness me. My hopes have been dashed.
jpnChrName: あら、フラれてしもた。
jpnSearchText: あら、フラれてしもた。

engChrName: Well, then, have a delightful night—and may you not end up a plaything for anything too nasty.
engSearchText:
Well, then, have a delightful night—and may you not
end up a plaything for anything too nasty.
jpnChrName: ほんなら、ええ夜を── あまり悪いモンに誑かされんようになぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ほんなら、ええ夜を──
あまり悪いモンに誑かされんようになぁ。

engChrName: (The fact that I can't remember makes this all the more strange, but this is definitely not a situation to poke my nose into.)
engSearchText:
(The fact that I can't remember makes this all the
more strange, but this is definitely not a situation to
poke my nose into.)
jpnChrName: （……思い出せないことも含めて気になるが、 下手につつかない方がよさそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（……思い出せないことも含めて気になるが、
下手につつかない方がよさそうだな。）

engChrName: (A liminal city between East and West, the Kunlun and the Tianshan mountains... Think I'll just say I met a fox playin' at being human here.)
engSearchText:
(A liminal city between East and West, the Kunlun
and the Tianshan mountains... Think I'll just say I
met a fox playin' at being human here.)
jpnChrName: （東と西、天山と崑崙が交わる境界の郷……   人里に化けて出た狐くらいに思っておくか。）
jpnSearchText:
（東と西、天山と崑崙が交わる境界の郷……
人里に化けて出た狐くらいに思っておくか。）

engChrName: (Mmm. With that said, this fox definitely has all nine tails.)
engSearchText:
(Mmm. With that said, this fox definitely has all
nine tails.)
jpnChrName: （っ……狐は狐でも   尻尾が９本あるたぐいみてぇだが。）
jpnSearchText:
（っ……狐は狐でも
尻尾が９本あるたぐいみてぇだが。）

engChrName: What is this place?
engSearchText: What is this place?
jpnChrName: ここって……
jpnSearchText: ここって……

engChrName: Well, let's say there's someone livin' out their retirement here who knows the land. Thought it might be wise to check in with them.
engSearchText:
Well, let's say there's someone livin' out their
retirement here who knows the land. Thought it
might be wise to check in with them.
jpnChrName: ま、各方面に通じている御仁が隠居中なんでな。 念のために話してみようと思うんだが……
jpnSearchText:
ま、各方面に通じている御仁が隠居中なんでな。
念のために話してみようと思うんだが……

engChrName: That voice... You came back, did you?
engSearchText: That voice... You came back, did you?
jpnChrName: その声は……また来たのか。
jpnSearchText: <C2>その声は……また来たのか。

engChrName: Now, now, Cody. That's not a polite way to treat our guests. Surely they came because they have some business.
engSearchText:
Now, now, Cody. That's not a polite way to treat
our guests. Surely they came because they have
some business.
jpnChrName: まあまあ、そう邪険にするなコーディ君。 彼らとて縁あって訪ねて来ているのだから。
jpnSearchText:
まあまあ、そう邪険にするなコーディ君。
彼らとて縁あって訪ねて来ているのだから。

engChrName: Well, well, Arkride. Is the person with you...?
engSearchText: Well, well, Arkride. Is the person with you...?
jpnChrName: おや、アークライド君はともかく 隣にいるのはもしや……
jpnSearchText:
おや、アークライド君はともかく
隣にいるのはもしや……

engChrName: Wh-What?! She can't be...THE Judith Lanster?!
engSearchText: Wh-What?! She can't be...THE Judith Lanster?!
jpnChrName: ええっ！？　ま、まさか…… ジュディス・ランスター！？
jpnSearchText:
ええっ！？　ま、まさか……
ジュディス・ランスター！？

engChrName: Why in the world would a top actress be with a spriggan?!
engSearchText:
Why in the world would a top actress be with
a spriggan?!
jpnChrName: 何故あのトップ女優が裏解決屋と一緒に……！
jpnSearchText: 何故あのトップ女優が裏解決屋と一緒に……！

engChrName: (Heh. Didn't fool 'em for a second.)
engSearchText: (Heh. Didn't fool 'em for a second.)
jpnChrName: （やれやれ、即バレかよ。）
jpnSearchText: （やれやれ、即バレかよ。）

engChrName: (S-Shut up! More importantly...)
engSearchText: (S-Shut up! More importantly...)
jpnChrName: （う、うるさいわねっ！　それよりも──）
jpnSearchText: （う、うるさいわねっ！　それよりも──）

engChrName: Are you...the former President Rocksmith?! Why in the world are—
engSearchText:
Are you...the former President Rocksmith?! Why in
the world are—
jpnChrName: もしかしなくても、ロックスミス元大統領……！？ どうしてこんなところに……
jpnSearchText:
もしかしなくても、ロックスミス元大統領……！？
どうしてこんなところに……

engChrName: Wait. 'Someone living out their retirement...'
engSearchText: Wait. 'Someone living out their retirement...'
jpnChrName: もしかして、アンタが言ってた“御仁”って……
jpnSearchText: もしかして、アンタが言ってた“御仁”って……

engChrName: Hmm... I dare say something must have happened, yes?
engSearchText:
Hmm... I dare say something must have
happened, yes?
jpnChrName: ふむ、どうやら何か事情があるようだね？
jpnSearchText: ふむ、どうやら何か事情があるようだね？

engChrName: Yeah. If you'll hear me out—
engSearchText: Yeah. If you'll hear me out—
jpnChrName: ええ、実は──
jpnSearchText: ええ、実は──

engChrName: Van explained how Yumé, the granddaughter of Montmart's owner, disappeared mysteriously this morning to Rocksmith.
engSearchText:
Van explained how Yumé, the granddaughter of
Montmart's owner, disappeared mysteriously this
morning to Rocksmith.
jpnChrName: ヴァンは、ユメ──モンマルトの孫娘が今朝になって 姿を消した事をロックスミス元大統領に伝えた。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンは、ユメ──モンマルトの孫娘が今朝になって
姿を消した事をロックスミス元大統領に伝えた。

engChrName: Goodness. The bistro girl went missing?
engSearchText: Goodness. The bistro girl went missing?
jpnChrName: 何と、あのビストロの孫娘が……
jpnSearchText: 何と、あのビストロの孫娘が……

engChrName: Hold on. You're familiar with Montmart, Mr. Rocksmith?
