engSearchText:
Hold on. You're familiar with Montmart,
Mr. Rocksmith?
jpnChrName: って、閣下もモンマルトを ご存じだったんですか？
jpnSearchText:
って、閣下もモンマルトを
ご存じだったんですか？

engChrName: Oh, yes. That shop is quite well known among certain circles.
engSearchText:
Oh, yes. That shop is quite well known among
certain circles.
jpnChrName: 何と言っても知る人ぞ知る名店だからね。
jpnSearchText: 何と言っても知る人ぞ知る名店だからね。

engChrName: To tell you the truth, I would stop by there for private business sometimes when I was still president.
engSearchText:
To tell you the truth, I would stop by there for private
business sometimes when I was still president.
jpnChrName: 私も大統領時代にプライベートで 時々使わせてもらったことがあったのだよ。
jpnSearchText:
私も大統領時代にプライベートで
時々使わせてもらったことがあったのだよ。

engChrName: The owner knew who I was, of course, but he was happy to turn a blind eye and serve me like just another customer.
engSearchText:
The owner knew who I was, of course, but he was
happy to turn a blind eye and serve me like just
another customer.
jpnChrName: オーナーもお忍びと分かった上で 気負いなく料理を振舞ってくれたものでね。
jpnSearchText:
オーナーもお忍びと分かった上で
気負いなく料理を振舞ってくれたものでね。

engChrName: Man. Small world, huh?
engSearchText: Man. Small world, huh?
jpnChrName: やれやれ、世間は狭いっつーか……
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、世間は狭いっつーか……

engChrName: I guess that would mean you definitely knew about my office for a while, then.
engSearchText:
I guess that would mean you definitely knew about
my office for a while, then.
jpnChrName: となると、当然ウチの事務所についても 以前から把握されていたってワケですか。
jpnSearchText:
となると、当然ウチの事務所についても
以前から把握されていたってワケですか。

engChrName: Haha. Yes, it does mean that.
engSearchText: Haha. Yes, it does mean that.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そういうことになるな。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そういうことになるな。

engChrName: Now, with that said, I'd be more than happy to help find the little lady.
engSearchText:
Now, with that said, I'd be more than happy to help
find the little lady.
jpnChrName: まあ、その意味でも一層力に なりたいのだが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、その意味でも一層力に
なりたいのだが……

engChrName: I'm afraid to say no such girl has come anywhere near here.
engSearchText:
I'm afraid to say no such girl has come anywhere
near here.
jpnChrName: 生憎、こちらにそれらしき少女は来ていなくてね。
jpnSearchText: 生憎、こちらにそれらしき少女は来ていなくてね。

engChrName: Considering the situation, however, that makes it all the more concerning.
engSearchText:
Considering the situation, however, that makes it all
the more concerning.
jpnChrName: ……しかし、この状況でとなると、 一層心配ではあるなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
……しかし、この状況でとなると、
一層心配ではあるなぁ……

engChrName: I hope this turns out to be nothing more than an ordinary missing persons case, but one never knows...
engSearchText:
I hope this turns out to be nothing more than an
ordinary missing persons case, but one never knows...
jpnChrName: 単なる迷子で済めば良いのだが……
jpnSearchText: 単なる迷子で済めば良いのだが……

engChrName: Wait, the situation? What situation?
engSearchText: Wait, the situation? What situation?
jpnChrName: この状況で、ですか……？
jpnSearchText: この状況で、ですか……？

engChrName: Ahh. Well, I'm sure Mr. Arkride has a sense of it already. But of late, there's been an odd presence haunting Longlai.
engSearchText:
Ahh. Well, I'm sure Mr. Arkride has a sense of
it already. But of late, there's been an odd presence
haunting Longlai.
jpnChrName: うむ……アークライド君などは 気づいているかもしれないが……
jpnSearchText:
うむ……アークライド君などは
気づいているかもしれないが……

engChrName: Or say, rather, haunting the entire region of Longlai.
engSearchText: Or say, rather, haunting the entire region of Longlai.
jpnChrName: ここのところ、龍來の──いや、龍來近辺の地域に 何やら不可思議な気配があるようでね……
jpnSearchText:
ここのところ、龍來の──いや、龍來近辺の地域に
何やら不可思議な気配があるようでね……

engChrName: The guild believes it to be an unknown monster, and there's been a number of people who've noticed an unfamiliar presence in the mountains.
engSearchText:
The guild believes it to be an unknown monster, and
there's been a number of people who've noticed an
unfamiliar presence in the mountains.
jpnChrName: ギルドでも、不可解な魔獣を確認したというし、 不穏な気配を山中に感じる者も多いようだ。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドでも、不可解な魔獣を確認したというし、
不穏な気配を山中に感じる者も多いようだ。

engChrName: I suppose that isn't the sort of comment you'd expect from a former president, hmm? Let's just say I've seen many things in my time.
engSearchText:
I suppose that isn't the sort of comment you'd expect
from a former president, hmm? Let's just say I've seen
many things in my time.
jpnChrName: おっと、元大統領らしくない発言だったかな？ なに、これでも色々と経験豊富というだけさ。
jpnSearchText:
おっと、元大統領らしくない発言だったかな？
なに、これでも色々と経験豊富というだけさ。

engChrName: Though perhaps it would be better to say I had to learn to accept and deal with the inexplicable not long before I retired.
engSearchText:
Though perhaps it would be better to say I had to
learn to accept and deal with the inexplicable not long
before I retired.
jpnChrName: 不可思議な現象を受け入れる器量は 引退直前あたりに培った程度だがね。
jpnSearchText:
不可思議な現象を受け入れる器量は
引退直前あたりに培った程度だがね。

engChrName: Hah. Yeah, no surprise. (He probably means the events in Crossbell and the Empire a few years back.)
engSearchText:
Hah. Yeah, no surprise.
(He probably means the events in Crossbell and the
Empire a few years back.)
jpnChrName: ……ハッ、なるほどね。 （数年前のクロスベルや帝国での……）
jpnSearchText:
……ハッ、なるほどね。
（数年前のクロスベルや帝国での……）

engChrName: (Come to think of it, that monster who attacked me yesterday... It definitely didn't feel normal.)
engSearchText:
(Come to think of it, that monster who attacked
me yesterday... It definitely didn't feel normal.)
jpnChrName: （昨日出くわしたあの魔獣……言われてみれば   普通じゃない気配を纏っていた気も……）
jpnSearchText:
（昨日出くわしたあの魔獣……言われてみれば
普通じゃない気配を纏っていた気も……）

engChrName: (Guess that wasn't just my imagination.)
engSearchText: (Guess that wasn't just my imagination.)
jpnChrName: （……やはり気のせいって訳じゃなさそうだな……）
jpnSearchText: （……やはり気のせいって訳じゃなさそうだな……）

engChrName: Anyway, at least that makes it clear Longlai's in some deeper shit than we thought.
engSearchText:
Anyway, at least that makes it clear Longlai's in some
deeper shit than we thought.
jpnChrName: とにかく、今の龍來が 予断を許さない状況なのは分かりました。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、今の龍來が
予断を許さない状況なのは分かりました。

engChrName: We'll go check with other eyewitnesses, but thanks for cluin' us in about the weird stuff.
engSearchText:
We'll go check with other eyewitnesses, but thanks
for cluin' us in about the weird stuff.
jpnChrName: 他でも目撃情報は当たってみますが…… その不可思議な気配にも改めて注意しますよ。
jpnSearchText:
他でも目撃情報は当たってみますが……
その不可思議な気配にも改めて注意しますよ。

engChrName: You have my best wishes, Mr. Arkride. If we find or remember something of use, I'll be in touch.
engSearchText:
You have my best wishes, Mr. Arkride. If we find or
remember something of use, I'll be in touch.
jpnChrName: ああ、どうか頑張ってくれたまえ。 私の方でも何か掴んだら、すぐに連絡しよう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、どうか頑張ってくれたまえ。
私の方でも何か掴んだら、すぐに連絡しよう。

engChrName: I will go get in touch with our various contacts, then.
engSearchText: I will go get in touch with our various contacts, then.
jpnChrName: 改めて各方面にも当たってみましょう。
jpnSearchText: 改めて各方面にも当たってみましょう。

engChrName: If you would. Mr. Arkride, if you need help, you have only to ask.
engSearchText:
If you would. Mr. Arkride, if you need help, you have
only to ask.
jpnChrName: うむ、頼んだ──アークライド君達も、 何かあれば遠慮なく頼ってくれたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、頼んだ──アークライド君達も、
何かあれば遠慮なく頼ってくれたまえ。

engChrName: Yeah. Much appreciated.
engSearchText: Yeah. Much appreciated.
jpnChrName: ええ……恩に着ます。
jpnSearchText: ええ……恩に着ます。

engChrName: A strange presence... You know, I DID kind of feel something. So does this mean someone else is up to something here?
engSearchText:
A strange presence... You know, I DID kind of
feel something. So does this mean someone else is up
to something here?
jpnChrName: 妙な気配……あたしも感じてはいたけど、 やっぱりこの周辺で何かの動きが……
jpnSearchText:
妙な気配……あたしも感じてはいたけど、
やっぱりこの周辺で何かの動きが……

engChrName: Even if it doesn't, it helps to keep aware of it. It could be related to why Yumé's gone missing.
engSearchText:
Even if it doesn't, it helps to keep aware of it. It could
be related to why Yumé's gone missing.
jpnChrName: ……そっちも気をつけるに越した事はねぇが…… ユメがいなくなったのと関係があるかもわからん。
jpnSearchText:
……そっちも気をつけるに越した事はねぇが……
ユメがいなくなったのと関係があるかもわからん。

engChrName: Anyway, we need to collect more information for now.
engSearchText:
Anyway, we need to collect more information
for now.
jpnChrName: とにかく、今はもう少し情報を集めて整理するぞ。
jpnSearchText: とにかく、今はもう少し情報を集めて整理するぞ。

engChrName: R-Right!
engSearchText: R-Right!
jpnChrName: わ、わかってるわよ……！
jpnSearchText: わ、わかってるわよ……！

engChrName: Longlai Station... Oh, right. Doesn't the Transcontinental Railroad pass through here?
engSearchText:
Longlai Station... Oh, right. Doesn't the
Transcontinental Railroad pass through here?
jpnChrName: 龍來駅……そういえば 大陸横断鉄道が通ってるんだっけ。
jpnSearchText:
龍來駅……そういえば
大陸横断鉄道が通ってるんだっけ。

engChrName: I really doubt Yumé boarded the train alone, but still...
engSearchText:
I really doubt Yumé boarded the train alone,
but still...
jpnChrName: さすがにユメちゃんが一人で 列車に乗ったとも思えないけど……
jpnSearchText:
さすがにユメちゃんが一人で
列車に乗ったとも思えないけど……

engChrName: Yeah. That said, it never hurts to ask.
engSearchText: Yeah. That said, it never hurts to ask.
jpnChrName: ああ── ただ、聞くだけ聞いてみるか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──
ただ、聞くだけ聞いてみるか。

engChrName: It IS morning, and it's plenty possible that the fog is disruptin' the train schedules, but it still doesn't hurt.
engSearchText:
It IS morning, and it's plenty possible that the fog is
disruptin' the train schedules, but it still doesn't hurt.
jpnChrName: 朝だし、この霧で列車の運行を 絞っている可能性もありそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
朝だし、この霧で列車の運行を
絞っている可能性もありそうだが……

engChrName: Van and Judith talked to the station staff and discovered that, as they had thought, the fog had reduced the train traffic.
engSearchText:
Van and Judith talked to the station staff and
discovered that, as they had thought, the fog had
reduced the train traffic.
jpnChrName: ヴァンとジュディスは駅員に問い合わせたが やはり霧で列車の便数も絞られているらしく……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンとジュディスは駅員に問い合わせたが
やはり霧で列車の便数も絞られているらしく……

engChrName: With few passengers, the staff could say confidently that no one matching Yumé's description had passed the ticket gate.
engSearchText:
With few passengers, the staff could say confidently
that no one matching Yumé's description had passed
the ticket gate.
jpnChrName: 利用客も少なかったため、ユメらしき少女が 始発から改札を通ったこともないとの事だった。
jpnSearchText:
利用客も少なかったため、ユメらしき少女が
始発から改札を通ったこともないとの事だった。

engChrName: Hmm... Our girl is pretty recognizable. If she'd passed the ticket gate, someone would have noticed, I think.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Our girl is pretty recognizable. If she'd
passed the ticket gate, someone would have noticed,
I think.
jpnChrName: うーん、あの子結構目立つし 改札を通ったら流石に分かるわよね。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、あの子結構目立つし
改札を通ったら流石に分かるわよね。

engChrName: The buses probably aren't running yet, either.
engSearchText: The buses probably aren't running yet, either.
jpnChrName: こんな時間じゃ路線バスなんかも まだ運行していないでしょうし。
jpnSearchText:
こんな時間じゃ路線バスなんかも
まだ運行していないでしょうし。

engChrName: Yeah. And this is just a hunch, but...
engSearchText: Yeah. And this is just a hunch, but...
jpnChrName: ああ…… それとこいつはただのカンだが。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……
それとこいつはただのカンだが。

engChrName: ...I'd bet she wouldn't go outside the range of this fog.
engSearchText: ...I'd bet she wouldn't go outside the range of this fog.
jpnChrName: 多分、この霧が立ちこめている周辺から ユメ坊は離れてねえだろう。
jpnSearchText:
多分、この霧が立ちこめている周辺から
ユメ坊は離れてねえだろう。

engChrName: Huh? What does that—
engSearchText: Huh? What does that—
jpnChrName: ？　それって──
jpnSearchText: ？　それって──

engChrName: Why, it's you. Enjoying a romantic rendezvous in the early morning fog?
engSearchText:
Why, it's you. Enjoying a romantic rendezvous in the
early morning fog?
jpnChrName: あら、お兄はん。 こんな霧やのに朝から逢い引き？
jpnSearchText:
あら、お兄はん。
こんな霧やのに朝から逢い引き？

engChrName: Hello there. Enjoying a little tourism in the early morning fog?
engSearchText:
Hello there. Enjoying a little tourism in the early
morning fog?
jpnChrName: へえ、こんな霧やのに 朝っぱらから観光してはるん？
jpnSearchText:
へえ、こんな霧やのに
朝っぱらから観光してはるん？

engChrName: Oh, uhh... (So I guess this fox shows up during the day, too, huh?)
engSearchText:
Oh, uhh...
(So I guess this fox shows up during the day,
too, huh?)
jpnChrName: アンタは…… （夜じゃなくても出てくんのかよ。）
jpnSearchText:
アンタは……
（夜じゃなくても出てくんのかよ。）

engChrName: A-A ro-ro-rom... Wait! You know her?!
engSearchText: A-A ro-ro-rom... Wait! You know her?!
jpnChrName: あ、逢い引きって…… ──って、知り合いのヒト？
jpnSearchText:
あ、逢い引きって……
──って、知り合いのヒト？

engChrName: Nah. Just someone I ran into last night.
engSearchText: Nah. Just someone I ran into last night.
jpnChrName: ……いや、 昨夜ちょいと話したくらいだが。
jpnSearchText:
……いや、
昨夜ちょいと話したくらいだが。

engChrName: ...? (The way she talks...)
engSearchText:
...?
(The way she talks...)
jpnChrName: ……？ （この口調は……）
jpnSearchText:
……？
（この口調は……）

engChrName: U-Umm...?
engSearchText: U-Umm...?
jpnChrName: え、えっと……？
jpnSearchText: え、えっと……？

engChrName: I must say, I don't believe this beauty is part of your business trip, is she? Clearly you are a man of high standards.
engSearchText:
I must say, I don't believe this beauty is part of your
business trip, is she? Clearly you are a man of
high standards.
jpnChrName: うふふ、慰安旅行の連れやなさそうやけど えらい美人さんやしお安くないなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、慰安旅行の連れやなさそうやけど
えらい美人さんやしお安くないなぁ。

engChrName: Hmm? Do I recognize you from somewhere, miss?
engSearchText: Hmm? Do I recognize you from somewhere, miss?
jpnChrName: ってあら、お姉はんの顔、 どこかで見たことあるような……？
jpnSearchText:
ってあら、お姉はんの顔、
どこかで見たことあるような……？

engChrName: U-Uhh, do you? And, uh, I mean, you're pretty lovely yourself! That kimono is great.
engSearchText:
U-Uhh, do you? And, uh, I mean, you're pretty
lovely yourself! That kimono is great.
jpnChrName: そ、そうかしら？ 貴女こそ素敵な東方風の着物ね。
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうかしら？
貴女こそ素敵な東方風の着物ね。

engChrName: Your hair really goes well with the ensemble, too. Do you work with clothes?
engSearchText:
Your hair really goes well with the ensemble, too.
Do you work with clothes?
jpnChrName: 着付けや髪のセットも完璧だし、 ひょっとして服飾関係のヒト？
jpnSearchText:
着付けや髪のセットも完璧だし、
ひょっとして服飾関係のヒト？

engChrName: Oh, no, no. This is a hobby, not work. My normal outfits are far stuffier than this.
engSearchText:
Oh, no, no. This is a hobby, not work. My normal
outfits are far stuffier than this.
jpnChrName: うふふ、ただの趣味なんよ。 普段からコテコテの着てるくらいやし。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、ただの趣味なんよ。
普段からコテコテの着てるくらいやし。

engChrName: Now, if I may pry, you both seem troubled. Might I ask what's troubling you?
engSearchText:
Now, if I may pry, you both seem troubled. Might I
ask what's troubling you?
jpnChrName: ──それよりどうしはったん？ 何やら気が急いてはるみたいやねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
──それよりどうしはったん？
何やら気が急いてはるみたいやねぇ。

engChrName: W-Well...
engSearchText: W-Well...
jpnChrName: そ、それは……
jpnSearchText: そ、それは……

engChrName: ...Yeah. As it happens—
engSearchText: ...Yeah. As it happens—
jpnChrName: ああ、実はな──
jpnSearchText: ああ、実はな──

engChrName: Aha. I think I know the girl. About six or seven years old?
engSearchText:
Aha. I think I know the girl. About six or seven
years old?
jpnChrName: ああ、それって桃茶色の髪の ６、７歳くらいの女の子のこと？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それって桃茶色の髪の
６、７歳くらいの女の子のこと？

engChrName: She had her hair up in an adorable ponytail.
engSearchText: She had her hair up in an adorable ponytail.
jpnChrName: 髪をおっきなポニーに結んどる。
jpnSearchText: 髪をおっきなポニーに結んどる。

engChrName: That's her, all right.
engSearchText: That's her, all right.
jpnChrName: ああ、まさにその子だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、まさにその子だ。

engChrName: Did you see her somewhere recently?!
engSearchText: Did you see her somewhere recently?!
jpnChrName: どこかで見かけたの！？
jpnSearchText: どこかで見かけたの！？

engChrName: Hmm... As it happens, I caught a glimpse of her as I'd finished checking out of my lodgings. About an hour ago.
engSearchText:
Hmm... As it happens, I caught a glimpse of her as
I'd finished checking out of my lodgings. About an
hour ago.
jpnChrName: んー、１時間くらい前に宿を チェックアウトした時に見かけてなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
んー、１時間くらい前に宿を
チェックアウトした時に見かけてなぁ。

engChrName: She seemed to be having fun, sniffing about the springs' source by the riverside.
engSearchText:
She seemed to be having fun, sniffing about the
springs' source by the riverside.
jpnChrName: 川沿いの源泉のスペースで 匂いをかいで楽しげにはしゃいでたわ。
jpnSearchText:
川沿いの源泉のスペースで
匂いをかいで楽しげにはしゃいでたわ。

engChrName: I was going to approach her—a little girl like that? Out on her own on a foggy morning?
engSearchText:
I was going to approach her—a little girl like that?
Out on her own on a foggy morning?
jpnChrName: 霧の早朝に小さい子一人やったから 声を掛けようかとも思うたんやけど。
jpnSearchText:
霧の早朝に小さい子一人やったから
声を掛けようかとも思うたんやけど。

engChrName: However, she was with a somewhat older boy who seemed a decent sort, so I assumed he could be trusted.
engSearchText:
However, she was with a somewhat older boy who
seemed a decent sort, so I assumed he could
be trusted.
jpnChrName: なんやしっかりした感じの年長の 男の子が話しかけてたからお任せしたわ。
jpnSearchText:
なんやしっかりした感じの年長の
男の子が話しかけてたからお任せしたわ。

engChrName: ...Okay, then. Who was the boy?
engSearchText: ...Okay, then. Who was the boy?
jpnChrName: ……そうだったのか。 その坊主ってのは──
jpnSearchText:
……そうだったのか。
その坊主ってのは──

engChrName: It was Senri, I believe. You may have met him—the boy who's working as a guide?
engSearchText:
It was Senri, I believe. You may have met him—the
boy who's working as a guide?
jpnChrName: ええ、ガイドをやってる センリ君かもしれないわね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ガイドをやってる
センリ君かもしれないわね。

engChrName: I recall he spends his time around the souvenir shop. Perhaps you should check there.
engSearchText:
I recall he spends his time around the souvenir shop.
Perhaps you should check there.
jpnChrName: たしか土産物屋を拠点にしてたから 行ってみましょう。
jpnSearchText:
たしか土産物屋を拠点にしてたから
行ってみましょう。

engChrName: Much as I'd be delighted to help you further, it seems my train's just arrived. Do forgive me, hmm?
engSearchText:
Much as I'd be delighted to help you further, it seems
my train's just arrived. Do forgive me, hmm?
jpnChrName: んー、ウチも手伝いたいところやけど ちょうど列車が来たみたいやし堪忍なぁ。
jpnSearchText:
んー、ウチも手伝いたいところやけど
ちょうど列車が来たみたいやし堪忍なぁ。

engChrName: What?
engSearchText: What?
jpnChrName: え。
jpnSearchText: え。

engChrName: Tch...
engSearchText: Tch...

engChrName: —Thank you for your patience. The Edith-bound passenger train will be arriving momentarily.
engSearchText:
—Thank you for your patience. The Edith-bound
passenger train will be arriving momentarily.
jpnChrName: ──お待たせしました、間もなく 首都行きの旅客列車が到着いたします。
jpnSearchText:
──お待たせしました、間もなく
首都行きの旅客列車が到着いたします。

engChrName: Due to the fog, the number of departures has been reduced. We advise passengers to ensure you board...
engSearchText:
Due to the fog, the number of departures has
been reduced. We advise passengers to ensure
you board...
jpnChrName: 霧のため便数を絞っておりますので くれぐれもお乗り逃しのないよう……
jpnSearchText:
霧のため便数を絞っておりますので
くれぐれもお乗り逃しのないよう……

engChrName: Now, you'd best be off to find your girl. Who knows what sort of peril she could get into on a day such as this?
engSearchText:
Now, you'd best be off to find your girl. Who knows
what sort of peril she could get into on a day such
as this?
jpnChrName: ほな、はよ見つけてあげてなぁ。 恐くてメンドくさいのに絡まれる前に。
jpnSearchText:
ほな、はよ見つけてあげてなぁ。
恐くてメンドくさいのに絡まれる前に。

engChrName: This is Longlai Station, Longlai Station. This train will be stopping here for ten minutes. All passengers—
engSearchText:
This is Longlai Station, Longlai Station. This train
will be stopping here for ten minutes.
All passengers—
jpnChrName: 龍來、龍來です。 １０分ほどの停車となりますので──
jpnSearchText:
龍來、龍來です。
１０分ほどの停車となりますので──

engChrName: Umm, just who the hell was she? She clearly wasn't some average woman!
engSearchText:
Umm, just who the hell was she? She clearly wasn't
some average woman!
jpnChrName: ……えっと、何者？ あからさまに普通じゃないような。
jpnSearchText:
……えっと、何者？
あからさまに普通じゃないような。

engChrName: Worst of all, she didn't feel any need to hide it. Either way—we can just ignore that little question for now.
engSearchText:
Worst of all, she didn't feel any need to hide it.
Either way—we can just ignore that little question
for now.
jpnChrName: ああ、しかもそれを隠そうともしてねぇ。 ──だがまあ、今はスルーでもいいだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、しかもそれを隠そうともしてねぇ。
──だがまあ、今はスルーでもいいだろ。

engChrName: Let's get over to the souvenir shop. We gotta catch that guide kid.
engSearchText:
Let's get over to the souvenir shop. We gotta catch
that guide kid.
jpnChrName: とにかく土産物屋に行ってみるぞ。 あのガイドの坊主を捕まえないとな。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく土産物屋に行ってみるぞ。
あのガイドの坊主を捕まえないとな。

engChrName: Of course! Come on, let's hurry!
engSearchText: Of course! Come on, let's hurry!
jpnChrName: ええ、行ってみましょう！
jpnSearchText: ええ、行ってみましょう！

engChrName: O-Oh, there you are! Great! I was looking for you!
engSearchText: O-Oh, there you are! Great! I was looking for you!
jpnChrName: あ、アンタらは…… よかった、俺もアンタらを探していたんだ！
jpnSearchText:
あ、アンタらは……
よかった、俺もアンタらを探していたんだ！

engChrName: That girl you've been looking for, Yumé—I saw her alone a little while ago and I was wondering if she was okay.
engSearchText:
That girl you've been looking for, Yumé—I saw her
alone a little while ago and I was wondering if she
was okay.
jpnChrName: あのユメって小さい子……少し前に一人で ブラブラしてるのを見て、大丈夫なのかなって……
jpnSearchText:
あのユメって小さい子……少し前に一人で
ブラブラしてるのを見て、大丈夫なのかなって……

engChrName: Are you searching for her too?
engSearchText: Are you searching for her too?
jpnChrName: もしかして、あの子を探している最中なのか？
jpnSearchText: もしかして、あの子を探している最中なのか？

engChrName: Yeah. Our group's split up to look for her.
engSearchText: Yeah. Our group's split up to look for her.
jpnChrName: ああ、手分けして探していたところだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、手分けして探していたところだ。

engChrName: I heard you talked to her for a bit. Any idea where she went?
engSearchText:
I heard you talked to her for a bit. Any idea where
she went?
jpnChrName: お前があの子と話していたって聞いてな、 行き先はわかるか？
jpnSearchText:
お前があの子と話していたって聞いてな、
行き先はわかるか？

engChrName: W-Well, she was wandering around, cheery as could be. I talked to her for a bit, and then she just... took off!
engSearchText:
W-Well, she was wandering around, cheery as
could be. I talked to her for a bit, and then she just...
took off!
jpnChrName: そ、それがやたらと上機嫌に歩いててさ…… 一応話しかけたけど、すぐどこかに行っちゃって。
jpnSearchText:
そ、それがやたらと上機嫌に歩いててさ……
一応話しかけたけど、すぐどこかに行っちゃって。

engChrName: She was staring at all the things around town like it was all special... It was hard to follow her. She seemed different, kinda.
engSearchText:
She was staring at all the things around town like it
was all special... It was hard to follow her. She seemed
different, kinda.
jpnChrName: なんか、物珍しそうに町を見て…… 掴みどころがないというか、雰囲気が違うというか……
jpnSearchText:
なんか、物珍しそうに町を見て……
掴みどころがないというか、雰囲気が違うというか……

engChrName: Then I looked away for one hot second, and she somehow disappeared. I'm so sorry I lost her!
engSearchText:
Then I looked away for one hot second, and she
somehow disappeared. I'm so sorry I lost her!
jpnChrName: それで、目を離したらいつの間にか いなくなってたんだ、見失っちゃってごめん！
jpnSearchText:
それで、目を離したらいつの間にか
いなくなってたんだ、見失っちゃってごめん！

engChrName: Hmm... Did you notice anything else? When did you see her?
engSearchText:
Hmm... Did you notice anything else? When did you
see her?
jpnChrName: うーん、他に何か手がかりは無いのかしら？ ちなみに、見かけたのはいつ頃なの？
jpnSearchText:
うーん、他に何か手がかりは無いのかしら？
ちなみに、見かけたのはいつ頃なの？

engChrName: I wasn't watching the clock, so I'm not sure exactly, but... It was right as I started cleaning, so it would've been about an hour ago.
engSearchText:
I wasn't watching the clock, so I'm not sure
exactly, but... It was right as I started cleaning, so it
would've been about an hour ago.
jpnChrName: 時計は見てないから正確には判らないけど…… 俺が掃除始めてすぐだし、一時間くらい前かな。
jpnSearchText:
時計は見てないから正確には判らないけど……
俺が掃除始めてすぐだし、一時間くらい前かな。

engChrName: Oh! I dunno if it's any help, but she was carrying a fantuan around with her.
engSearchText:
Oh! I dunno if it's any help, but she was carrying a
fantuan around with her.
jpnChrName: あとは……手がかりになるのか分からないけど確か、 飯糰（ファントァン）を一個手に持っていたな。
jpnSearchText:
あとは……手がかりになるのか分からないけど確か、
飯糰（ファントァン）を一個手に持っていたな。

engChrName: She must've bought it from the stand over there, but she was staring at it like she didn't even know what it was while walking around.
engSearchText:
She must've bought it from the stand over there, but
she was staring at it like she didn't even know what it
was while walking around.
jpnChrName: あっちの屋台で買ったんだと思うけど、 やたら物珍しそうに見ながら歩いててさ……
jpnSearchText:
あっちの屋台で買ったんだと思うけど、
やたら物珍しそうに見ながら歩いててさ……

engChrName: That's...odd. She was with us when we went by the stand that sells fantuan yesterday.
engSearchText:
That's...odd. She was with us when we went by the
stand that sells fantuan yesterday.
jpnChrName: なるほど……少し引っかかるな。 飯糰（ファントァン）は昨日、俺らと一緒に見たはずだが。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……少し引っかかるな。
飯糰（ファントァン）は昨日、俺らと一緒に見たはずだが。

engChrName: Sure, but I mean, kids are like that, right?
engSearchText: Sure, but I mean, kids are like that, right?
jpnChrName: でも、子供ってそういうものじゃない？
jpnSearchText: でも、子供ってそういうものじゃない？

engChrName: Maybe. Still think we should keep it in mind.
engSearchText: Maybe. Still think we should keep it in mind.
jpnChrName: まあ、確かにそういう見方もあるが…… 一応気に留めておいた方が良いかもな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、確かにそういう見方もあるが……
一応気に留めておいた方が良いかもな。

engChrName: Also, you're sure nothin' else stood out? Anything, no matter how small.
engSearchText:
Also, you're sure nothin' else stood out? Anything, no
matter how small.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、他には何か気になる事はあったか？ どんな些細な事でもいい。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、他には何か気になる事はあったか？
どんな些細な事でもいい。

engChrName: Well, she seemed to be weirdly focused on the Ishgal Mountains to the south.
engSearchText:
Well, she seemed to be weirdly focused on the Ishgal
Mountains to the south.
jpnChrName: そういえば…… 妙に南のイシュガル山脈の方を気にしてたような。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……
妙に南のイシュガル山脈の方を気にしてたような。

engChrName: That's where the fog's rolling in from, so I can understand why she was kinda interested in it, but it was still weird.
engSearchText:
That's where the fog's rolling in from, so I can
understand why she was kinda interested in it, but it
was still weird.
jpnChrName: この霧もそっち方面から出てるみたいだし 珍しがるのはそこまで変じゃないと思うけど……
jpnSearchText:
この霧もそっち方面から出てるみたいだし
珍しがるのはそこまで変じゃないと思うけど……

engChrName: I told her that the mountains are off limits right now, and she just smiled and disappeared soon after.
engSearchText:
I told her that the mountains are off limits right now,
and she just smiled and disappeared soon after.
jpnChrName: 一応、今は山脈方面は立入禁止だよって声を掛けたら ニヤッて笑ってどこかに行っちゃってさ……
jpnSearchText:
一応、今は山脈方面は立入禁止だよって声を掛けたら
ニヤッて笑ってどこかに行っちゃってさ……

engChrName: Hmm... It sounds like Yumé wasn't actin' the way she normally does. We need a little more info to compare this to.
engSearchText:
Hmm... It sounds like Yumé wasn't actin' the way she
normally does. We need a little more info to compare
this to.
jpnChrName: ふむ……妙にユメらしくねえ言動が多いな。 もう少しほかの情報と併せて考えてみるか。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……妙にユメらしくねえ言動が多いな。
もう少しほかの情報と併せて考えてみるか。

engChrName: Anyway, thanks a bunch. This might be real valuable.
engSearchText: Anyway, thanks a bunch. This might be real valuable.
jpnChrName: お前さんも、一応礼を言っておくぜ。 何かの手掛かりにはなるかもしれねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんも、一応礼を言っておくぜ。
何かの手掛かりにはなるかもしれねぇ。

engChrName: Yeah, of course. I'm just glad to have helped! If I find her, I'll let you know right away!
engSearchText:
Yeah, of course. I'm just glad to have helped! If I find
her, I'll let you know right away!
jpnChrName: ああ、そう言ってもらえると俺も嬉しいよ！ 見かけたら真っ先に知らせに行くな！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そう言ってもらえると俺も嬉しいよ！
見かけたら真っ先に知らせに行くな！

engChrName: Oh! Van, Judith...
engSearchText: Oh! Van, Judith...
jpnChrName: あ、ヴァンさんにジュディスさん……
jpnSearchText: あ、ヴァンさんにジュディスさん……

engChrName: WOOF!
engSearchText: WOOF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ！
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ！

engChrName: Have you found anything on your end?
engSearchText: Have you found anything on your end?
jpnChrName: そっちでは何か手がかりを掴めた？
jpnSearchText: そっちでは何か手がかりを掴めた？

engChrName: We've been having XEROS run around in search mode, but we've had little luck.
engSearchText:
We've been having XEROS run around in search
mode, but we've had little luck.
jpnChrName: こっちは一応、ＸＥＲＯＳの索敵モードで周辺を 調べたけど、やっぱり手がかりが見つからなくて……
jpnSearchText:
こっちは一応、ＸＥＲＯＳの索敵モードで周辺を
調べたけど、やっぱり手がかりが見つからなくて……

engChrName: We were just talking about that, as well as updating the Bracer Guild with our findings.
engSearchText:
We were just talking about that, as well as updating
the Bracer Guild with our findings.
jpnChrName: ギルドにもその辺りの情報共有も併せて、 話をしていたところだよ。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドにもその辺りの情報共有も併せて、
話をしていたところだよ。

engChrName: I got some eyewitness testimonies, but it's not enough to go on yet.
engSearchText:
I got some eyewitness testimonies, but it's not enough
to go on yet.
jpnChrName: 一応は目ぼしい情報もあったが、 まだ十分だとは言えないな。
jpnSearchText:
一応は目ぼしい情報もあったが、
まだ十分だとは言えないな。

engChrName: If I can find a little more we can look it over. Sounds like you're a bust, though.
engSearchText:
If I can find a little more we can look it over.
Sounds like you're a bust, though.
jpnChrName: もう少し情報が揃ったら改めて整理するが…… お前達の方はどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
もう少し情報が揃ったら改めて整理するが……
お前達の方はどうだ？

engChrName: Since she's not turnin' up with our search, that can only mean she went outside the range of XEROS' 'nose.'
engSearchText:
Since she's not turnin' up with our search, that can
only mean she went outside the range of
XEROS' 'nose.'
jpnChrName: サーチでもダメって事は、ＸＥＲＯＳの“鼻”の 範囲外に行った可能性もあるのか。
jpnSearchText:
サーチでもダメって事は、ＸＥＲＯＳの“鼻”の
範囲外に行った可能性もあるのか。

engChrName: Which means we're gonna have to depend on the guild's ability to investigate.
engSearchText:
Which means we're gonna have to depend on the
guild's ability to investigate.
jpnChrName: となると、やはりギルドの捜索力に 期待したいところではあるが……
jpnSearchText:
となると、やはりギルドの捜索力に
期待したいところではあるが……

engChrName: Unfortunately, it doesn't seem like they have anything yet. We did file a formal request to search for her, though.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, it doesn't seem like they have
anything yet. We did file a formal request to search
for her, though.
jpnChrName: 残念ながら今のところは情報もないみたいで…… 一応、捜索依頼は出させてもらったのですが。
jpnSearchText:
残念ながら今のところは情報もないみたいで……
一応、捜索依頼は出させてもらったのですが。

engChrName: Between the fog and yesterday's events, I have a very bad feeling about this whole thing.
engSearchText:
Between the fog and yesterday's events, I have a very
bad feeling about this whole thing.
jpnChrName: まあ、霧が出たのと昨日の一件で 嫌な予感はしていましたから。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、霧が出たのと昨日の一件で
嫌な予感はしていましたから。

engChrName: As it happens, Kazan and Gray are out on morning patrol.
engSearchText:
As it happens, Kazan and Gray are out on
morning patrol.
jpnChrName: ちょうど、カザンとグレイが 朝の巡回に出ていましてね。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど、カザンとグレイが
朝の巡回に出ていましてね。

engChrName: I did contact them, but... Ah! Kazan's back.
engSearchText: I did contact them, but... Ah! Kazan's back.
jpnChrName: 一応連絡しておきましたが…… おや、戻って来たようですね。
jpnSearchText:
一応連絡しておきましたが……
おや、戻って来たようですね。

engChrName: No good, Drusilla. I went all the way to the waterfall and found nothing.
engSearchText:
No good, Drusilla. I went all the way to the waterfall
and found nothing.
jpnChrName: ダメだドルシラさん、 瀑布方面は一通り探ったが……
jpnSearchText:
ダメだドルシラさん、
瀑布方面は一通り探ったが……

engChrName: Oh, good! You're here. That makes this easy. Unfortunately, all I can say is that there's no sign of your girl up to the waterfall.
engSearchText:
Oh, good! You're here. That makes this easy.
Unfortunately, all I can say is that there's no sign of
your girl up to the waterfall.
jpnChrName: ああ、あんたらが丁度来てたんなら話は早い。 少なくとも瀑布方面には子供の気配は無かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あんたらが丁度来てたんなら話は早い。
少なくとも瀑布方面には子供の気配は無かったぜ。

engChrName: You came to that conclusion quickly. Any proof?
engSearchText: You came to that conclusion quickly. Any proof?
jpnChrName: 随分と結論を出すのが早いけど 根拠はあるのですか？
jpnSearchText:
随分と結論を出すのが早いけど
根拠はあるのですか？

engChrName: Oh, come on. You know me—I was born and raised in the mountains.
engSearchText:
Oh, come on. You know me—I was born and raised
in the mountains.
jpnChrName: 相変わらず意地悪いな、ドルシラさん。 俺が山育ちなのは知ってんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
相変わらず意地悪いな、ドルシラさん。
俺が山育ちなのは知ってんだろ？

engChrName: There was no trace of anyone else in the mountains but me. I even checked the path on my way back.
engSearchText:
There was no trace of anyone else in the mountains
but me. I even checked the path on my way back.
jpnChrName: 山の中に俺以外に人間の気配は感じなかった。 戻る時にも、来た道を改めて見直したが……
jpnSearchText:
山の中に俺以外に人間の気配は感じなかった。
戻る時にも、来た道を改めて見直したが……

engChrName: I saw no sign of a child's footprints or any indicator she was there at all. Naturally, the next step will be to head out to the eastern highway.
engSearchText:
I saw no sign of a child's footprints or any indicator
she was there at all. Naturally, the next step will be to
head out to the eastern highway.
jpnChrName: 子供の足跡が増えているなんて事も無かった。 無論、この後は東の街道も見てくるが……
jpnSearchText:
子供の足跡が増えているなんて事も無かった。
無論、この後は東の街道も見てくるが……

engChrName: Well, as you heard. Gray's checking the western highway, for what it's worth.
engSearchText:
Well, as you heard. Gray's checking the western
highway, for what it's worth.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、そういう事です。 西の街道にはグレイが行っていますけど……
jpnSearchText:
……まあ、そういう事です。
西の街道にはグレイが行っていますけど……

engChrName: But it doesn't seem like he's found any trace of your girl, either.
engSearchText:
But it doesn't seem like he's found any trace of your
girl, either.
jpnChrName: 今のところそれらしい形跡なんかは 見つけられていないみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
今のところそれらしい形跡なんかは
見つけられていないみたいですね。

engChrName: ...I see.
engSearchText: ...I see.
jpnChrName: そう……ですか……
jpnSearchText: そう……ですか……

engChrName: Still, that does limit the number of places she could have gone.
engSearchText:
Still, that does limit the number of places she could
have gone.
jpnChrName: でも、これである程度は絞り込めそうですね。
jpnSearchText: でも、これである程度は絞り込めそうですね。

engChrName: If she hasn't been to the waterfall or the highways, then either she's still in town, or...
engSearchText:
If she hasn't been to the waterfall or the highways,
then either she's still in town, or...
jpnChrName: 街道や瀑布にいないとなると、 まだ街を出ていないか或いは……
jpnSearchText:
街道や瀑布にいないとなると、
まだ街を出ていないか或いは……

engChrName: We'll continue searching on our end. If she's gone out of town, the situation could get much worse.
engSearchText:
We'll continue searching on our end. If she's gone out
of town, the situation could get much worse.
jpnChrName: こちらでも引き続き捜索はしておきますよ。 街の外に出ていたら洒落にならないですからねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
こちらでも引き続き捜索はしておきますよ。
街の外に出ていたら洒落にならないですからねぇ。

engChrName: If she's not near the waterfall or the western highway, the alternatives are quite a bit more dangerous.
engSearchText:
If she's not near the waterfall or the western highway,
the alternatives are quite a bit more dangerous.
jpnChrName: まして、西の街道でも瀑布方面でもないとなると 危ない場所も少なくないはずです。
jpnSearchText:
まして、西の街道でも瀑布方面でもないとなると
危ない場所も少なくないはずです。

engChrName: ...I can't help but worry.
engSearchText: ...I can't help but worry.
jpnChrName: ……やっぱり心配だね……
jpnSearchText: ……やっぱり心配だね……

engChrName: Either way, we can't just run around with no clues. We need to get more info to focus our search.
engSearchText:
Either way, we can't just run around with no clues.
We need to get more info to focus our search.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、闇雲に動く訳にはいかねぇ。 他の情報と擦り合わせて更に絞らないとな。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、闇雲に動く訳にはいかねぇ。
他の情報と擦り合わせて更に絞らないとな。

engChrName: For sure. Let's keep looking around.
engSearchText: For sure. Let's keep looking around.
jpnChrName: ええ、もう少し回ってみましょう。
jpnSearchText: ええ、もう少し回ってみましょう。

engChrName: Van, Judith! Have you found anything?
engSearchText: Van, Judith! Have you found anything?
jpnChrName: あ、ヴァンさんにジュディスさん…… そちらは何か掴めましたか？
jpnSearchText:
あ、ヴァンさんにジュディスさん……
そちらは何か掴めましたか？

engChrName: We checked to see if the temple had seen any sign of Yumé.
engSearchText:
We checked to see if the temple had seen any sign
of Yumé.
jpnChrName: 寺院の方にもユメちゃんを見かけてないか 聞いていたんですが……
jpnSearchText:
寺院の方にもユメちゃんを見かけてないか
聞いていたんですが……

engChrName: We got a bit to go on. Can't say it's all that solid yet.
engSearchText: We got a bit to go on. Can't say it's all that solid yet.
jpnChrName: いくつか気になる話はあったが…… まだ十分とは言えないな。
jpnSearchText:
いくつか気になる話はあったが……
まだ十分とは言えないな。

engChrName: We need a little more. You got anything on your end?
engSearchText: We need a little more. You got anything on your end?
jpnChrName: もう少し情報が欲しいところだ、 お前達の方は？
jpnSearchText:
もう少し情報が欲しいところだ、
お前達の方は？

engChrName: From the looks of it, nothing useful on your end?
engSearchText: From the looks of it, nothing useful on your end?
jpnChrName: お前達の反応を見る限りじゃ 目ぼしい話は無さそうだな？
jpnSearchText:
お前達の反応を見る限りじゃ
目ぼしい話は無さそうだな？

engChrName: Well, we can say for sure that she didn't come to the temple. We hit up the other attendees, too.
engSearchText:
Well, we can say for sure that she didn't come to
the temple. We hit up the other attendees, too.
jpnChrName: 少なくとも寺院には来てねぇみてえだな。 他の参拝客にも当たってもらったが。
jpnSearchText:
少なくとも寺院には来てねぇみてえだな。
他の参拝客にも当たってもらったが。

engChrName: Yes—it seems a girl likely to be your child was sighted early in the morning.
engSearchText:
Yes—it seems a girl likely to be your child was sighted
early in the morning.
jpnChrName: ええ、早朝にそれらしい子供を 見かけた方はいらっしゃいましたが……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、早朝にそれらしい子供を
見かけた方はいらっしゃいましたが……

engChrName: I fear that information is now twenty minutes old.
engSearchText: I fear that information is now twenty minutes old.
jpnChrName: その目撃情報も２０分ほど前のものだそうで。
jpnSearchText: その目撃情報も２０分ほど前のものだそうで。

engChrName: Damn. Could be that...
engSearchText: Damn. Could be that...
jpnChrName: チッ……もしかすると……
jpnSearchText: チッ……もしかすると……

engChrName: She could've left town, then. That would be bad.
engSearchText: She could've left town, then. That would be bad.
jpnChrName: 街から出ちゃった可能性もあるって事か。 流石に洒落にならないわね……
jpnSearchText:
街から出ちゃった可能性もあるって事か。
流石に洒落にならないわね……

engChrName: Even so, knowin' what she did after could be critical.
engSearchText: Even so, knowin' what she did after could be critical.
jpnChrName: ……そうだったとしても、その後の動きで 大分話は変わってきそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
……そうだったとしても、その後の動きで
大分話は変わってきそうだ。

engChrName: We can't run around like headless chickens. We need a clear picture of what happened.
engSearchText:
We can't run around like headless chickens. We need
a clear picture of what happened.
jpnChrName: 一通り情報が整理できるまで、 むやみに動くのは控えた方が良いだろう。
jpnSearchText:
一通り情報が整理できるまで、
むやみに動くのは控えた方が良いだろう。

engChrName: If we discover anything more, we'll be sure to contact you.
engSearchText:
If we discover anything more, we'll be sure to
contact you.
jpnChrName: 私どもも何か分かりましたら 連絡させていただきます。
jpnSearchText:
私どもも何か分かりましたら
連絡させていただきます。

engChrName: May the Heavenly Mother guide us all.
engSearchText: May the Heavenly Mother guide us all.
jpnChrName: 天上聖母様のお導きがありますよう……
jpnSearchText: 天上聖母様のお導きがありますよう……

engChrName: Yeah. Thanks.
engSearchText: Yeah. Thanks.
jpnChrName: ああ、ありがとよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、ありがとよ。

engChrName: Okay, we've hit up everyone we could ask.
engSearchText: Okay, we've hit up everyone we could ask.
jpnChrName: さて、一通り聞き込みが 出来そうな場所は当たってみたが……
jpnSearchText:
さて、一通り聞き込みが
出来そうな場所は当たってみたが……

engChrName: I think at this point we can pin down Yumé's movements.
engSearchText:
I think at this point we can pin down
Yumé's movements.
jpnChrName: ある程度はユメの行動が絞れてきたな。
jpnSearchText: ある程度はユメの行動が絞れてきたな。

engChrName: Hmm... The info seems like kind of a mess to me. But you've got an idea, right, Van?
engSearchText:
Hmm... The info seems like kind of a mess to me.
But you've got an idea, right, Van?
jpnChrName: うーん、一見話がばらばらに思えますけど…… ヴァンさんはもう見当がついているんですか？
jpnSearchText:
うーん、一見話がばらばらに思えますけど……
ヴァンさんはもう見当がついているんですか？

engChrName: Yep. From what the temple and Senri said, it's been a while since Yumé was last seen.
engSearchText:
Yep. From what the temple and Senri said, it's been a
while since Yumé was last seen.
jpnChrName: ああ、寺院とセンリから聞いた話じゃ、 ユメが最後に目撃されてから大分経っている。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、寺院とセンリから聞いた話じゃ、
ユメが最後に目撃されてから大分経っている。

engChrName: The Tourism Bureau and the guild were looking into the buildings a child could hide in. However...
engSearchText:
The Tourism Bureau and the guild were looking into
the buildings a child could hide in. However...
jpnChrName: 観光協会や警察の方で、隠れられそうな 施設も一通り捜索してくれているようですが……
jpnSearchText:
観光協会や警察の方で、隠れられそうな
施設も一通り捜索してくれているようですが……

engChrName: We were just updated, and they found no sign of her.
engSearchText: We were just updated, and they found no sign of her.
jpnChrName: 先ほど入った追加連絡では、 それらしい形跡はなかったとの事です。
jpnSearchText:
先ほど入った追加連絡では、
それらしい形跡はなかったとの事です。

engChrName: So she must have left town...
engSearchText: So she must have left town...
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、やっぱり街の外に……？
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ、やっぱり街の外に……？

engChrName: We had the guild check outside of town.
engSearchText: We had the guild check outside of town.
jpnChrName: そちらはギルドの方でも 探ってくれているそうですが……
jpnSearchText:
そちらはギルドの方でも
探ってくれているそうですが……

engChrName: From what we've gathered, she at least hasn't gone to the waterfall or down the western highway.
engSearchText:
From what we've gathered, she at least hasn't gone to
the waterfall or down the western highway.
jpnChrName: 少なくとも西の街道と 龍來瀑布方面の山道には気配は無いって話だ。
jpnSearchText:
少なくとも西の街道と
龍來瀑布方面の山道には気配は無いって話だ。

engChrName: No sign of her at the station, either, so she didn't hop the train.
engSearchText:
No sign of her at the station, either, so she didn't hop
the train.
jpnChrName: 駅でも見かけられていないみたいだし、 列車に乗ったのも無さそうね。
jpnSearchText:
駅でも見かけられていないみたいだし、
列車に乗ったのも無さそうね。

engChrName: The other possibility at this point would have to be...
engSearchText: The other possibility at this point would have to be...
jpnChrName: 他に考えられるとしたら、やっぱり……
jpnSearchText: 他に考えられるとしたら、やっぱり……

engChrName: ...she headed south—on the mountain roads that lead into the Ishgal Mountains.
engSearchText:
...she headed south—on the mountain roads that lead
into the Ishgal Mountains.
jpnChrName: 南の──イシュガル山脈に続く崖道ですか……
jpnSearchText: 南の──イシュガル山脈に続く崖道ですか……

engChrName: Holy... The brat headed out there alone?!
engSearchText: Holy... The brat headed out there alone?!
jpnChrName: おいおい……あんな所に一人で行っちまったってか？
jpnSearchText: おいおい……あんな所に一人で行っちまったってか？

engChrName: That's where the fog is at its worst, too.
engSearchText: That's where the fog is at its worst, too.
jpnChrName: どうも他の場所より霧が濃いみてえだが……
jpnSearchText: どうも他の場所より霧が濃いみてえだが……

engChrName: From what Senri said, Yumé seemed to be somehow focused on it.
engSearchText:
From what Senri said, Yumé seemed to be somehow
focused on it.
jpnChrName: センリ君によると……ユメちゃんが あっちの方を気にしていたそうね。
jpnSearchText:
センリ君によると……ユメちゃんが
あっちの方を気にしていたそうね。

engChrName: Yeah. We can't say why at the moment, but it's our best lead.
engSearchText:
Yeah. We can't say why at the moment, but it's our
best lead.
jpnChrName: ああ、何故かは分からねえが── 調べてみる価値は十分あんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、何故かは分からねえが──
調べてみる価値は十分あんだろう。

engChrName: If that is true, we need to be ready for anything. However, for Yumé's sake, we also need to depart as soon as possible.
engSearchText:
If that is true, we need to be ready for anything.
However, for Yumé's sake, we also need to depart as
soon as possible.
jpnChrName: でしたら、私達も相応の準備は必要ですね…… ユメ様のためには一刻も早く向かうべきですが。
jpnSearchText:
でしたら、私達も相応の準備は必要ですね……
ユメ様のためには一刻も早く向かうべきですが。

engChrName: Yeah...
engSearchText: Yeah...
jpnChrName: そうだな…………
jpnSearchText: そうだな…………

engChrName: Van?
engSearchText: Van?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……？

engChrName: There's just something bothering me.
engSearchText: There's just something bothering me.
jpnChrName: いや……少し気がかりな事があってな。
jpnSearchText: いや……少し気がかりな事があってな。

engChrName: Oh, right. Your custom holo stopped working, right?
engSearchText: Oh, right. Your custom holo stopped working, right?
jpnChrName: あ、さっき言ってた…… 特殊なホロウが反応しないっていう？
jpnSearchText:
あ、さっき言ってた……
特殊なホロウが反応しないっていう？

engChrName: Wait. That means...
engSearchText: Wait. That means...
jpnChrName: それって……
jpnSearchText: それって……

engChrName: Normally you wouldn't think there'd be a connection. Hard to believe it's a coincidence, though.
engSearchText:
Normally you wouldn't think there'd be a connection.
Hard to believe it's a coincidence, though.
jpnChrName: ……普通に考えれば関係ねぇだろう。 だが偶然にも思えなくてな。
jpnSearchText:
……普通に考えれば関係ねぇだろう。
だが偶然にも思えなくてな。

engChrName: Ah! Van, look!
engSearchText: Ah! Van, look!
jpnChrName: ………！　ヴァンさん、これ……！
jpnSearchText: ………！　ヴァンさん、これ……！

engChrName: It's not as strong a reaction as other times, but...
engSearchText: It's not as strong a reaction as other times, but...
jpnChrName: 今までより反応は弱いですけど……
jpnSearchText: 今までより反応は弱いですけど……

engChrName: Yes. It seems to be vibrating, if only slightly.
engSearchText: Yes. It seems to be vibrating, if only slightly.
jpnChrName: うん……微かに振動しているみたいだ。
jpnSearchText: うん……微かに振動しているみたいだ。

engChrName: Could it be a kind of low-power mode? That is quite common on more modern orbments.
engSearchText:
Could it be a kind of low-power mode? That is quite
common on more modern orbments.
jpnChrName: 現代の導力器にも一部で導入されている “低導力モード”のようなものでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
現代の導力器にも一部で導入されている
“低導力モード”のようなものでしょうか？

engChrName: If this is related to Yumé's disappearance...
engSearchText: If this is related to Yumé's disappearance...
jpnChrName: もしユメちゃんの失踪と関係があるとしたら……
jpnSearchText: もしユメちゃんの失踪と関係があるとしたら……

engChrName: Considerin' everything we've seen to date, we'd better keep it in mind.
engSearchText:
Considerin' everything we've seen to date, we'd better
keep it in mind.
jpnChrName: ……今までの事もある、 一応気にかけておいた方がいいかもな。
jpnSearchText:
……今までの事もある、
一応気にかけておいた方がいいかもな。

engChrName: Sounds like we're all in agreement, at least. Let's get going after her!
engSearchText:
Sounds like we're all in agreement, at least. Let's get
going after her!
jpnChrName: 話はまとまったみたいね？ だったらとっとと追いかけるわよ！
jpnSearchText:
話はまとまったみたいね？
だったらとっとと追いかけるわよ！

engChrName: Wait, why are you—
engSearchText: Wait, why are you—
jpnChrName: ってお前さんは──
jpnSearchText: ってお前さんは──

engChrName: I'm already part of this. Did you really think I'd just say, 'Oh, sorry! Good luck out in mountain hell'?
engSearchText:
I'm already part of this. Did you really think I'd just
say, 'Oh, sorry! Good luck out in mountain hell'?
jpnChrName: 乗り掛かった舟ってヤツよ。 途中で投げ出す訳にもいかないでしょ。
jpnSearchText:
乗り掛かった舟ってヤツよ。
途中で投げ出す訳にもいかないでしょ。

engChrName: I mean, I've stuck with you this far, why would I go durdling off now?
engSearchText:
I mean, I've stuck with you this far, why would I go
durdling off now?
jpnChrName: むしろここまで付き合っといて 放っておく理由があるっての？
jpnSearchText:
むしろここまで付き合っといて
放っておく理由があるっての？

engChrName: And honestly, I've got the power TO involve myself. I can't just turn a blind eye to this.
engSearchText:
And honestly, I've got the power TO involve myself.
I can't just turn a blind eye to this.
jpnChrName: “力”を持つ身としても 見過ごせる状況じゃないしね。
jpnSearchText:
“力”を持つ身としても
見過ごせる状況じゃないしね。

engChrName: Heh. Pretty badass of you.
engSearchText: Heh. Pretty badass of you.
jpnChrName: ハッ、勇ましいこった。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、勇ましいこった。

engChrName: Okay, then! Let's see what a proud, principled thief— or, you know, a kinkster—can do for us, huh?
engSearchText:
Okay, then! Let's see what a proud, principled thief—
or, you know, a kinkster—can do for us, huh?
jpnChrName: ま、誇り高き義賊──じゃなくて痴女サマの 実力を改めて見させてもらうか。
jpnSearchText:
ま、誇り高き義賊──じゃなくて痴女サマの
実力を改めて見させてもらうか。

engChrName: Why'd you have to go and throw the kinkster bit in there?!
engSearchText:
Why'd you have to go and throw the kinkster bit
in there?!
jpnChrName: あんたは痴女痴女って…… ていうか、今わざわざ言い直さなかった！？
jpnSearchText:
あんたは痴女痴女って……
ていうか、今わざわざ言い直さなかった！？

engChrName: Rrr! You just watch!
engSearchText: Rrr! You just watch!
jpnChrName: くっ、本当に今に見てなさいよ……！
jpnSearchText: くっ、本当に今に見てなさいよ……！

engChrName: ...Hah, fine.
engSearchText: ...Hah, fine.
jpnChrName: ……ったく、仕方ねえな。
jpnSearchText: ……ったく、仕方ねえな。

engChrName: It would be very reassuring to have you with us, Judith.
engSearchText:
It would be very reassuring to have you with
us, Judith.
jpnChrName: ジュディスさんが同行してくれるなら心強いです。
jpnSearchText: ジュディスさんが同行してくれるなら心強いです。

engChrName: Anyway, if we're ready, we should get going!
engSearchText: Anyway, if we're ready, we should get going!
jpnChrName: とにかく、そうと決まれば 一刻も早く出発しましょう……！
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、そうと決まれば
一刻も早く出発しましょう……！

engChrName: We must make sure we're properly equipped, however.
engSearchText:
We must make sure we're properly
equipped, however.
jpnChrName: 町である程度の準備は 整えていったほうがよさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
町である程度の準備は
整えていったほうがよさそうですね。

engChrName: Yeah. There's no guessin' what we might find out there. Load up for bear, everyone.
engSearchText:
Yeah. There's no guessin' what we might find
out there. Load up for bear, everyone.
jpnChrName: ああ、何があるかもわからねぇ…… 気を引き締めていかねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、何があるかもわからねぇ……
気を引き締めていかねえとな。

engChrName: We're a hands-on shop. We love helping our visitors enjoy making things!
engSearchText:
We're a hands-on shop. We love helping our visitors
enjoy making things!
jpnChrName: うちは体験工房でね、お客さんにも 民芸品作りを楽しんでもらっているんだ。
jpnSearchText:
うちは体験工房でね、お客さんにも
民芸品作りを楽しんでもらっているんだ。

engChrName: If this is your first time doing this sort of thing, I recommend making a wind chime. How about you and your friends give it a try?
engSearchText:
If this is your first time doing this sort of thing, I
recommend making a wind chime. How about you
and your friends give it a try?
jpnChrName: 初めてなら風鈴作りをお勧めしているよ。 お兄さん、お連れさんもいかがかな？
jpnSearchText:
初めてなら風鈴作りをお勧めしているよ。
お兄さん、お連れさんもいかがかな？

engChrName: (A hands-on workshop, huh? Not somethin' you get to do much, so that could be fun.)
engSearchText:
(A hands-on workshop, huh? Not somethin' you get
to do much, so that could be fun.)
jpnChrName: （体験工房か、なかなかない機会だし   たまにはいいかもしれねえな。）
jpnSearchText:
（体験工房か、なかなかない機会だし
たまにはいいかもしれねえな。）

engChrName: (We did give this a spin already... But hey, vacation time, right?)
engSearchText:
(We did give this a spin already... But hey, vacation
time, right?)
jpnChrName: （さっきもやったが……   ま、せっかくの旅行だしな。）
jpnSearchText:
（さっきもやったが……
ま、せっかくの旅行だしな。）

engChrName: (Wait. I'm with someone who's already done this. Should I go change up the crew?)
engSearchText:
(Wait. I'm with someone who's already done this.
Should I go change up the crew?)
jpnChrName: （と、既に誘っちまってるのもいるな。   今のメンツで大丈夫か？）
jpnSearchText:
（と、既に誘っちまってるのもいるな。
今のメンツで大丈夫か？）

engChrName: Spend free time on making wind chimes?
engSearchText: Spend free time on making wind chimes?
jpnChrName: ストックタイムを消費して、風鈴作りをしますか？                {CC_VALUE=now_stock}
jpnSearchText:
ストックタイムを消費して、風鈴作りをしますか？
{CC_VALUE=now_stock}

engChrName: Umm... Are we gonna make the little ring-a-lings?
engSearchText: Umm... Are we gonna make the little ring-a-lings?
jpnChrName: よくわかんないけど、 そのチリンチリンって鳴ってるやつ？
jpnSearchText:
よくわかんないけど、
そのチリンチリンって鳴ってるやつ？

engChrName: Wow! I really wanna try!
engSearchText: Wow! I really wanna try!
jpnChrName: わー、ユメも作ってみたーい！
jpnSearchText: わー、ユメも作ってみたーい！

engChrName: Wind chimes! I'm not familiar with these kinda chimes.
engSearchText:
Wind chimes! I'm not familiar with these
kinda chimes.
jpnChrName: フーリン…… あまり聞いたことはありませんが。
jpnSearchText:
フーリン……
あまり聞いたことはありませんが。

engChrName: We don't have these among the Kruga, so I'd be glad to learn how to make them!
engSearchText:
We don't have these among the Kruga, so I'd be glad
to learn how to make them!
jpnChrName: クルガの里には無い文化ですし、 是非チャレンジしてみたいです！
jpnSearchText:
クルガの里には無い文化ですし、
是非チャレンジしてみたいです！

engChrName: I think these are supposed to be a bit of a summer specialty, so I suppose we're terribly out of season.
engSearchText:
I think these are supposed to be a bit of a summer
specialty, so I suppose we're terribly out of season.
jpnChrName: 夏の風物詩らしいですし、 ちょっと季節はずれな気もしますけど……
jpnSearchText:
夏の風物詩らしいですし、
ちょっと季節はずれな気もしますけど……

engChrName: Still, I've been a little interested in this sort of thing on an artistic level.
engSearchText:
Still, I've been a little interested in this sort of thing
on an artistic level.
jpnChrName: ふふ、実は芸術的な側面もあると聞いて 前から少しだけ興味があったんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、実は芸術的な側面もあると聞いて
前から少しだけ興味があったんですよね。

engChrName: I've heard rumors of this. What an elegant decoration.
engSearchText:
I've heard rumors of this. What an
elegant decoration.
jpnChrName: 噂にはお聞きしています。 風流な工芸品ですよね。
jpnSearchText:
噂にはお聞きしています。
風流な工芸品ですよね。

engChrName: I would very much love to hear how a chime made by my own hand would sound.
engSearchText:
I would very much love to hear how a chime made
by my own hand would sound.
jpnChrName: 自らの手で作った風鈴の音…… 是非とも感じてみたいものです。
jpnSearchText:
自らの手で作った風鈴の音……
是非とも感じてみたいものです。

engChrName: Huh. I made paper lanterns for festivals back in Langport, but I never did wind chimes.
engSearchText:
Huh. I made paper lanterns for festivals back in
Langport, but I never did wind chimes.
jpnChrName: ハッ、提燈（テイトウ）なら 煌都の祭りで作った事もあるが。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、提燈（テイトウ）なら
煌都の祭りで作った事もあるが。

engChrName: Eyes on me, old fart. My master hands'll knock you on your ass!
engSearchText:
Eyes on me, old fart. My master hands'll knock you
on your ass!
jpnChrName: 見てろやオッサン、 ド派手なのを拵（こしら）えてやるからよ。
jpnSearchText:
見てろやオッサン、
ド派手なのを拵（こしら）えてやるからよ。

engChrName: I don't know Eastern culture very well, but still, I'm curious to see how these chimes are engineered.
engSearchText:
I don't know Eastern culture very well, but still, I'm
curious to see how these chimes are engineered.
jpnChrName: あまり馴染みのない文化だけど 工学的にもちょっと興味はあるかな？
jpnSearchText:
あまり馴染みのない文化だけど
工学的にもちょっと興味はあるかな？

engChrName: And, of course, these would probably make nice souvenirs for Gran and Essy.
engSearchText:
And, of course, these would probably make nice
souvenirs for Gran and Essy.
jpnChrName: グランマやエレ姉への いいお土産にもなりそうだしね。
jpnSearchText:
グランマやエレ姉への
いいお土産にもなりそうだしね。

engChrName: Spend free time on making wind chimes?
engSearchText: Spend free time on making wind chimes?
jpnChrName: ストックタイムを消費して、風鈴作りをしますか？                {CC_VALUE=now_stock}
jpnSearchText:
ストックタイムを消費して、風鈴作りをしますか？
{CC_VALUE=now_stock}

engChrName: Van and company, with instruction from Tsuruji, took to making wind chimes like ducks to water, being careful all the while.
engSearchText:
Van and company, with instruction from Tsuruji,
took to making wind chimes like ducks to water,
being careful all the while.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちはツルジに指南を受けながら、 安全に気を付けて風鈴作りを楽しみ……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちはツルジに指南を受けながら、
安全に気を付けて風鈴作りを楽しみ……

engChrName: Finally, they finished by painting their wind chimes as they wished.
engSearchText:
Finally, they finished by painting their wind chimes
as they wished.
jpnChrName: 最後に思い思いに色を塗って完成させた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>最後に思い思いに色を塗って完成させた。

engChrName: That'll do it. Not bad at all, if I do say so myself.
engSearchText: That'll do it. Not bad at all, if I do say so myself.
jpnChrName: ハッ、こんなところかね。 我ながら悪くねえ出来だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、こんなところかね。
我ながら悪くねえ出来だぜ。

engChrName: I'm glad mine came out well! It was fun to make use of the techniques I learned in school.
engSearchText:
I'm glad mine came out well! It was fun to make use
of the techniques I learned in school.
jpnChrName: ふふ、なんとか上手く作れました。 学校で学んだ技術も行かせましたし。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、なんとか上手く作れました。
学校で学んだ技術も行かせましたし。

engChrName: That looks real professional. Lives up to Aramis' rep for quality.
engSearchText:
That looks real professional. Lives up to Aramis' rep
for quality.
jpnChrName: 鮮やかだし中々の完成度だな。 アラミス生の面目躍如ってところか。
jpnSearchText:
鮮やかだし中々の完成度だな。
アラミス生の面目躍如ってところか。

engChrName: This was fun! It was a lot like some of the stuff we make back home.
engSearchText:
This was fun! It was a lot like some of the stuff we
make back home.
jpnChrName: えへへ、ときどき郷で作っていた 民芸品みたいに楽しく作れましたっ。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、ときどき郷で作っていた
民芸品みたいに楽しく作れましたっ。

engChrName: You're pretty dexterous, so I guess it's no shocker you're a natural.
engSearchText:
You're pretty dexterous, so I guess it's no shocker
you're a natural.
jpnChrName: お前さんも割と手先が器用だよな。
jpnSearchText: お前さんも割と手先が器用だよな。

engChrName: Looks like I rock this better than you, huh?
engSearchText: Looks like I rock this better than you, huh?
jpnChrName: へっ、オッサンのよりも 間違いなく俺の方が出来がいいな。
jpnSearchText:
へっ、オッサンのよりも
間違いなく俺の方が出来がいいな。

engChrName: Yeah, right. What'd you hew that out with? A damn pickaxe?
engSearchText:
Yeah, right. What'd you hew that out with? A
damn pickaxe?
jpnChrName: ハン、繊細さが足りねえんだっつうの。
jpnSearchText: ハン、繊細さが足りねえんだっつうの。

engChrName: Hmm... I suppose just having precise data on hand doesn't cut it. I thought I would end up with a better result.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I suppose just having precise data on hand
doesn't cut it. I thought I would end up with a
better result.
jpnChrName: やはりデータ通りにはいきませんね。 もう少し上手く作れそうでしたが。
jpnSearchText:
やはりデータ通りにはいきませんね。
もう少し上手く作れそうでしたが。

engChrName: But hey, you had fun. The vibes are the most important part of this.
engSearchText:
But hey, you had fun. The vibes are the most
important part of this.
jpnChrName: その割に楽しそうだったじゃないか？ こういうのは雰囲気ってな。
jpnSearchText:
その割に楽しそうだったじゃないか？
こういうのは雰囲気ってな。

engChrName: Maybe I should have altered it by another few microrege... I think that could've achieved an even better sound.
engSearchText:
Maybe I should have altered it by another
few microrege... I think that could've achieved an
even better sound.
jpnChrName: うーん、もう数マイクロリジュ拘れたかな。 さらにいい音が出せるはずだけど。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、もう数マイクロリジュ拘れたかな。
さらにいい音が出せるはずだけど。

engChrName: Oh, for... It's supposed to be fun, not somethin' you sweat micro-things over! Just go with the flow and accept what you get!
engSearchText:
Oh, for... It's supposed to be fun, not somethin' you
sweat micro-things over! Just go with the flow and
accept what you get!
jpnChrName: やれやれ、凝り性だねえ…… 頭カラッポにして楽しめっての。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、凝り性だねえ……
頭カラッポにして楽しめっての。

engChrName: Heehee! Look at mine! Did I do a good job?
engSearchText: Heehee! Look at mine! Did I do a good job?
jpnChrName: えへへ、どうだー！ 上手に作れてる？
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、どうだー！
上手に作れてる？

engChrName: You bet! Why, it's hard to believe a kid made this. You did great, Yumes.
engSearchText:
You bet! Why, it's hard to believe a kid made this.
You did great, Yumes.
jpnChrName: ああ、子供が作ったとは思えねえくらいだ。 やるじゃねえか、ユメ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、子供が作ったとは思えねえくらいだ。
やるじゃねえか、ユメ。

engChrName: After showing each other their wind chimes, they secured them in gift boxes so they could be given as souvenirs.
engSearchText:
After showing each other their wind chimes, they
secured them in gift boxes so they could be given
as souvenirs.
jpnChrName: その後、風鈴を持ち帰り用の箱に入れて お土産として受け取ったのだった。
jpnSearchText:
その後、風鈴を持ち帰り用の箱に入れて
お土産として受け取ったのだった。

engChrName: Today...the air of the mountains flows clean and pure.
engSearchText: Today...the air of the mountains flows clean and pure.
jpnChrName: 今日は……お山の気も 淀みなく巡っておるようじゃ……
jpnSearchText:
今日は……お山の気も
淀みなく巡っておるようじゃ……

engChrName: This clarity would let me read your fortune, if you would but lend me your palm.
engSearchText:
This clarity would let me read your fortune, if you
would but lend me your palm.
jpnChrName: 今日は冴える……お前さん達の運勢、 その手相をもって占ってしんぜよう……
jpnSearchText:
今日は冴える……お前さん達の運勢、
その手相をもって占ってしんぜよう……

engChrName: (Palm reading, huh? Not that I believe in it, but they might get a kick out of it.)
engSearchText:
(Palm reading, huh? Not that I believe in it, but they
might get a kick out of it.)
jpnChrName: （手相か……信じるタイプじゃねえが   こいつらなら興味あるかもな。）
jpnSearchText:
（手相か……信じるタイプじゃねえが
こいつらなら興味あるかもな。）

engChrName: (We did give this a spin already...but hey, vacation time, right?)
engSearchText:
(We did give this a spin already...but hey, vacation
time, right?)
jpnChrName: （さっきもやったが……   ま、せっかくの旅行だしな。）
jpnSearchText:
（さっきもやったが……
ま、せっかくの旅行だしな。）

engChrName: (Wait. I'm with someone who's already done this. Should I go change up the crew?)
engSearchText:
(Wait. I'm with someone who's already done this.
Should I go change up the crew?)
jpnChrName: （と、既に誘っちまってるのもいるな。   今のメンツで大丈夫か？）
jpnSearchText:
（と、既に誘っちまってるのもいるな。
今のメンツで大丈夫か？）

engChrName: Spend free time to have a palm reading?
engSearchText: Spend free time to have a palm reading?
jpnChrName: ストックタイムを消費して、手相占いをしてもらいますか？                    {CC_VALUE=now_stock}
jpnSearchText:
ストックタイムを消費して、手相占いをしてもらいますか？
{CC_VALUE=now_stock}

engChrName: Huh? For-chun telling? What's that?
engSearchText: Huh? For-chun telling? What's that?
jpnChrName: うーん、ウラナイ？ よくわからないけど……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、ウラナイ？
よくわからないけど……

engChrName: So the nice lady's gonna look at my palms to see the future? That sounds fun! I wanna try!
engSearchText:
So the nice lady's gonna look at my palms to see
the future? That sounds fun! I wanna try!
jpnChrName: おててを見てもらうの面白そう！ ユメもやってみるー！
jpnSearchText:
おててを見てもらうの面白そう！
ユメもやってみるー！

engChrName: Ahaha... A palm reading feels a little embarrassing...
engSearchText: Ahaha... A palm reading feels a little embarrassing...
jpnChrName: あはは、手相を見られるのは何となく 気恥ずかしい気もしますが……
jpnSearchText:
あはは、手相を見られるのは何となく
気恥ずかしい気もしますが……

engChrName: I have a lot of questions about the future, though. So, well, why not?
engSearchText:
I have a lot of questions about the future, though.
So, well, why not?
jpnChrName: 気になる事も多いですし、 私も占っていただきたいです。
jpnSearchText:
気になる事も多いですし、
私も占っていただきたいです。

engChrName: Hmm... The clan does fortune telling by reading flames. I guess this is different?
engSearchText:
Hmm... The clan does fortune telling by
reading flames. I guess this is different?
jpnChrName: 郷にも焔を使った占いはありましたけど、 全然違う感じなんですね。
jpnSearchText:
郷にも焔を使った占いはありましたけど、
全然違う感じなんですね。

engChrName: I'm kinda curious now! I'd love to have my palms read!
engSearchText:
I'm kinda curious now! I'd love to have my
palms read!
jpnChrName: せっかくなのでしっかり見てもらいたいですっ。
jpnSearchText: せっかくなのでしっかり見てもらいたいですっ。

engChrName: Hmm... I doubt whatever she's going to say has any scientific basis...
engSearchText:
Hmm... I doubt whatever she's going to say has any
scientific basis...
jpnChrName: うーん、科学的根拠は気になるけど。
jpnSearchText: うーん、科学的根拠は気になるけど。

engChrName: ...but you don't meet a fortune teller every day, so it wouldn't hurt to see what she says is in my future.
engSearchText:
...but you don't meet a fortune teller every day, so it
wouldn't hurt to see what she says is in my future.
jpnChrName: なかなかこんな機会もなさそうだし 僕も見てもらおうかな？
jpnSearchText:
なかなかこんな機会もなさそうだし
僕も見てもらおうかな？

engChrName: Man, fortune telling! Back in Langport there was this lady who used a crystal ball and some other stuff.
engSearchText:
Man, fortune telling! Back in Langport there was this
lady who used a crystal ball and some other stuff.
jpnChrName: そういや煌都でも、 昔は水晶玉やら易経やら使うのが来ていたな。
jpnSearchText:
そういや煌都でも、
昔は水晶玉やら易経やら使うのが来ていたな。

engChrName: I don't give a shit about knowing my future or whatever, but it might be cool to talk about after.
engSearchText:
I don't give a shit about knowing my future or
whatever, but it might be cool to talk about after.
jpnChrName: ま、正直興味はねえが 話のタネ程度にやってみるのもアリか。
jpnSearchText:
ま、正直興味はねえが
話のタネ程度にやってみるのもアリか。

engChrName: Wait, uhh... Your hands...
engSearchText: Wait, uhh... Your hands...
jpnChrName: っと、そういやお前さんは……
jpnSearchText: っと、そういやお前さんは……

engChrName: Oh, I doubt it will be a problem. My hands are recreated in quite precise detail.
engSearchText:
Oh, I doubt it will be a problem. My hands are
recreated in quite precise detail.
jpnChrName: ふふ、お気遣いなく。 掌もそれなりに再現されたものですし。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、お気遣いなく。
掌もそれなりに再現されたものですし。

engChrName: If anything, it should be interesting to see what results these hands give.
engSearchText:
If anything, it should be interesting to see what
results these hands give.
jpnChrName: どういった結果が出るか ある意味楽しみです。
jpnSearchText:
どういった結果が出るか
ある意味楽しみです。

engChrName: Oh... O-Okay, then? (I guess she doesn't really think about it?)
engSearchText:
Oh... O-Okay, then?
(I guess she doesn't really think about it?)
jpnChrName: そ、そうか。 （割り切ってるっつうか……）
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうか。
（割り切ってるっつうか……）

engChrName: Spend free time to have a palm reading?
engSearchText: Spend free time to have a palm reading?
jpnChrName: ストックタイムを消費して、手相占いをしてもらいますか？                    {CC_VALUE=now_stock}
jpnSearchText:
ストックタイムを消費して、手相占いをしてもらいますか？
{CC_VALUE=now_stock}

engChrName: Let me see... Oh, your hand shows what we call the 'cross line.'
engSearchText:
Let me see... Oh, your hand shows what we call the
'cross line.'
jpnChrName: ふむ……お前さんの手には“十字線”が 出ておるように見えるが……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……お前さんの手には“十字線”が
出ておるように見えるが……

engChrName: Hmm... This is a difficult one. All I can say is...
engSearchText: Hmm... This is a difficult one. All I can say is...
jpnChrName: ……ううむ……わしに言える事は……
jpnSearchText: ……ううむ……わしに言える事は……

engChrName: What's up, ma'am?
engSearchText: What's up, ma'am?
jpnChrName: どうしたんだ婆さん？
jpnSearchText: どうしたんだ婆さん？

engChrName: ...The cross line can mean a few things. It can be the Cross of Secrets, the mark of one who possesses abnormal powers—or incredible luck.
engSearchText:
...The cross line can mean a few things. It can be the
Cross of Secrets, the mark of one who possesses
abnormal powers—or incredible luck.
jpnChrName: ……十字線には異能や強運を持つ者に現れる “神秘十字”をはじめ……
jpnSearchText:
……十字線には異能や強運を持つ者に現れる
“神秘十字”をはじめ……

engChrName: It may also be the Cross of the Sun, speaking to artistic talent or yet more meanings. It all depends on what parts show most strongly... Hmm...
engSearchText:
It may also be the Cross of the Sun, speaking to
artistic talent or yet more meanings. It all depends on
what parts show most strongly... Hmm...
jpnChrName: 芸術の才を持つ者の“太陽十字”など、 現れる部分に応じて色々あるのじゃがのう……
jpnSearchText:
芸術の才を持つ者の“太陽十字”など、
現れる部分に応じて色々あるのじゃがのう……

engChrName: Your cross line... It is odd, for it lies near many signs yet fades at the last moment, becoming none and taking a strange middle ground.
engSearchText:
Your cross line... It is odd, for it lies near many signs
yet fades at the last moment, becoming none and
taking a strange middle ground.
jpnChrName: お前さんの十字線は……そのどれともとれぬ、 微妙な位置に出ておって……どう言ったものか……
jpnSearchText:
お前さんの十字線は……そのどれともとれぬ、
微妙な位置に出ておって……どう言ったものか……

engChrName: (...) Not sure what all that's about, but thanks, I guess. Food for thought.
engSearchText:
(...)
Not sure what all that's about, but thanks, I guess.
Food for thought.
jpnChrName: （…………） ま、よく分からねぇが参考にはしておくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
（…………）
ま、よく分からねぇが参考にはしておくぜ。

engChrName: Young lady, your hands show the 'destiny line.' This line speaks of your luck, for weal or woe.
engSearchText:
Young lady, your hands show the 'destiny line.'
This line speaks of your luck, for weal or woe.
jpnChrName: お嬢さんは……“運命線”が出ておるの。 これは大まかな運勢の良し悪しを表すものじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
お嬢さんは……“運命線”が出ておるの。
これは大まかな運勢の良し悪しを表すものじゃ。

engChrName: Its direction and branches have many meanings, but it is easy to mark when you will meet your destiny with it.
engSearchText:
Its direction and branches have many meanings, but it
is easy to mark when you will meet your destiny
with it.
jpnChrName: 向きや本数で多くの意味を持つが、 時期を見るには良いと言われておってな……
jpnSearchText:
向きや本数で多くの意味を持つが、
時期を見るには良いと言われておってな……

engChrName: What I can see is that, very soon, you will have an encounter that will alter your life forever.
engSearchText:
What I can see is that, very soon, you will have an
encounter that will alter your life forever.
jpnChrName: おそらく、近いうちに 大きな出会いが運命を変えるじゃろう……
jpnSearchText:
おそらく、近いうちに
大きな出会いが運命を変えるじゃろう……

engChrName: That makes sense. I suppose I...do stand at a turning point right now.
engSearchText:
That makes sense. I suppose I...do stand at a turning
point right now.
jpnChrName: なるほど……確かに、 私は今、大きな転機にいると思いますが……
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……確かに、
私は今、大きな転機にいると思いますが……

engChrName: Thanks to all the people I've met recently, I've overcome many trials, too.
engSearchText:
Thanks to all the people I've met recently, I've
overcome many trials, too.
jpnChrName: 思えば、多くの出会いのおかげで いくつもの試練を乗り越えて来ました……
jpnSearchText:
思えば、多くの出会いのおかげで
いくつもの試練を乗り越えて来ました……

engChrName: I...think I choose to believe that suggests a positive direction for my future.
engSearchText:
I...think I choose to believe that suggests a positive
direction for my future.
jpnChrName: そう思えば……未来をもう少し 前向きに捉えても良いのかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
そう思えば……未来をもう少し
前向きに捉えても良いのかもしれませんね。

engChrName: Child, your hands clearly show the 'growth line.'
engSearchText: Child, your hands clearly show the 'growth line.'
jpnChrName: お嬢ちゃんは“向上線”が随分と はっきりしておるのう……
jpnSearchText:
お嬢ちゃんは“向上線”が随分と
はっきりしておるのう……

engChrName: Clearly, you are someone who spares no effort in everything you do.
engSearchText:
Clearly, you are someone who spares no effort in
everything you do.
jpnChrName: きっと大層な努力家なのじゃろうな……
jpnSearchText: きっと大層な努力家なのじゃろうな……

engChrName: The growth line... It is a curious one, for I have heard it can shift even the destiny line at times.
engSearchText:
The growth line... It is a curious one, for I have heard
it can shift even the destiny line at times.
jpnChrName: 向上線はな……時として運命線に 変わる事もあると言われておってのう……
jpnSearchText:
向上線はな……時として運命線に
変わる事もあると言われておってのう……

engChrName: Should your growth bear fruit, it will likely open a grand future for you.
engSearchText:
Should your growth bear fruit, it will likely open a
grand future for you.
jpnChrName: 努力が実れば、大いなる運命を 切り拓く事も出来るかもしれんのう……
jpnSearchText:
努力が実れば、大いなる運命を
切り拓く事も出来るかもしれんのう……

engChrName: R-Really? Does that mean I'll be as good as my brother, someday?
engSearchText:
R-Really? Does that mean I'll be as good as my
brother, someday?
jpnChrName: ほ、本当ですかっ？ いつかお兄ちゃんのことも……
jpnSearchText:
ほ、本当ですかっ？
いつかお兄ちゃんのことも……

engChrName: Well, then! I'd better work even harder to become a true warrior worthy of the name!
engSearchText:
Well, then! I'd better work even harder to become a
true warrior worthy of the name!
jpnChrName: そのためにも一流の戦士を目指して 一層精進したいです！
jpnSearchText:
そのためにも一流の戦士を目指して
一層精進したいです！

engChrName: Hmm... Young man, your hands show the 'rebellion line.'
engSearchText:
Hmm... Young man, your hands show the
'rebellion line.'
jpnChrName: ……ふむ、“反抗線”が出ておるの……
jpnSearchText: ……ふむ、“反抗線”が出ておるの……

engChrName: That in itself is not a bad thing. It shows you are one who holds strong to your own principles. You rebel against that which you cannot accept.
engSearchText:
That in itself is not a bad thing. It shows you are
one who holds strong to your own principles. You
rebel against that which you cannot accept.
jpnChrName: いや、別にこれは悪い意味では無いぞえ。 己の信念をしっかり持っとるという事……
jpnSearchText:
いや、別にこれは悪い意味では無いぞえ。
己の信念をしっかり持っとるという事……

engChrName: It is a symbol of those who would force their will upon the world rather than simply accept the status quo.
engSearchText:
It is a symbol of those who would force their will
upon the world rather than simply accept the
status quo.
jpnChrName: 納得のいかない事に反抗し、自分の意見を 貫くという反骨精神の象徴じゃよ……
jpnSearchText:
納得のいかない事に反抗し、自分の意見を
貫くという反骨精神の象徴じゃよ……

engChrName: ...Huh. You're actually the real thing.
engSearchText: ...Huh. You're actually the real thing.
jpnChrName: ハッ、バアさん、 中々見る目あるじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、バアさん、
中々見る目あるじゃねえか？

engChrName: Looks like I've got official approval from my hands to keep doing whatever the hell I want!
engSearchText:
Looks like I've got official approval from my hands to
keep doing whatever the hell I want!
jpnChrName: いや～、お墨付きももらったことだし 今後も好き勝手やらせてもらうかねえ。
jpnSearchText:
いや～、お墨付きももらったことだし
今後も好き勝手やらせてもらうかねえ。

engChrName: Miss, your...hands have a strong 'work line.'
engSearchText: Miss, your...hands have a strong 'work line.'
jpnChrName: お嬢さんは……“仕事線”が強めじゃな。
jpnSearchText: お嬢さんは……“仕事線”が強めじゃな。

engChrName: This line doesn't speak of your successes or failures in your profession, but instead tells of how your work has changed your life.
engSearchText:
This line doesn't speak of your successes or failures in
your profession, but instead tells of how your work
has changed your life.
jpnChrName: これは仕事が成功するか否かというより、 仕事が人生をどれだけ変えるかを示す……
jpnSearchText:
これは仕事が成功するか否かというより、
仕事が人生をどれだけ変えるかを示す……

engChrName: I see...that your efforts in work will be the key to your future.
engSearchText:
I see...that your efforts in work will be the key to
your future.
jpnChrName: 今後も仕事によって道を切り拓いていく…… そんな未来が見えるのう。
jpnSearchText:
今後も仕事によって道を切り拓いていく……
そんな未来が見えるのう。

engChrName: Oh, my. You are quite insightful. It is certainly true that my life has been changed by my work—in many, many ways.
engSearchText:
Oh, my. You are quite insightful. It is certainly true
that my life has been changed by my work—in many,
many ways.
jpnChrName: ふふ……見事な慧眼かと。 たしかに色々と人生を変えられていますね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……見事な慧眼かと。
たしかに色々と人生を変えられていますね。

engChrName: However... I remain the person I have always been. I cannot say if I will always be so in the future, though.
engSearchText:
However... I remain the person I have always been.
I cannot say if I will always be so in the
future, though.
jpnChrName: ですがあくまでわたくしはわたくし…… 今後はどうかまでは分かりませんが。
jpnSearchText:
ですがあくまでわたくしはわたくし……
今後はどうかまでは分かりませんが。

engChrName: Hmm... Young la... No? Young man?
engSearchText: Hmm... Young la... No? Young man?
jpnChrName: ふむ、お嬢ちゃ……いや──お坊ちゃん……？
jpnSearchText: ふむ、お嬢ちゃ……いや──お坊ちゃん……？

engChrName: Ahem! Your hands have a clear 'intelligence line' drawn on them.
engSearchText:
Ahem! Your hands have a clear 'intelligence line'
drawn on them.
jpnChrName: ……コホン…… お前さんは“知能線”がとても明瞭じゃ。
jpnSearchText:
……コホン……
お前さんは“知能線”がとても明瞭じゃ。

engChrName: As you might think, it speaks to the clarity of your mind... Its branches, in turn, show the many talents that might bloom within you.
engSearchText:
As you might think, it speaks to the clarity of
your mind... Its branches, in turn, show the many
talents that might bloom within you.
jpnChrName: これはその名の通り、知恵を表す手相じゃ…… 枝分かれは、何かの才能の開花を意味する。
jpnSearchText:
これはその名の通り、知恵を表す手相じゃ……
枝分かれは、何かの才能の開花を意味する。

engChrName: Your intelligence line is long, and has many branches. No doubt you will see great success in your academic pursuits.
engSearchText:
Your intelligence line is long, and has many branches.
No doubt you will see great success in your
academic pursuits.
jpnChrName: お前さんは知能線も深く、枝分かれもある。 きっと学問で大成できるぞえ……
jpnSearchText:
お前さんは知能線も深く、枝分かれもある。
きっと学問で大成できるぞえ……

engChrName: I'm not quite sure what to make of that confusion at the start...
engSearchText:
I'm not quite sure what to make of that confusion at
the start...
jpnChrName: ……最初に呼び方に迷ってたのは 引っかかるけど……
jpnSearchText:
……最初に呼び方に迷ってたのは
引っかかるけど……

engChrName: Thank you regardless, ma'am. I'll take your comments as an encouragement to study.
engSearchText:
Thank you regardless, ma'am. I'll take your comments
as an encouragement to study.
jpnChrName: ありがとう、お婆さん。 今後も一層学問に励む事にするよ。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとう、お婆さん。
今後も一層学問に励む事にするよ。

engChrName: Dear child... For such a young girl, you have a powerful marriage line on you.
engSearchText:
Dear child... For such a young girl, you have a
powerful marriage line on you.
jpnChrName: お嬢ちゃんは……幼子にしては なかなか立派な結婚線があるのう……
jpnSearchText:
お嬢ちゃんは……幼子にしては
なかなか立派な結婚線があるのう……

engChrName: It won't be soon, of course, but I can see you will be blessed with a wonderful husband and a happy family.
engSearchText:
It won't be soon, of course, but I can see you will be
blessed with a wonderful husband and a happy family.
jpnChrName: まだ先じゃろうが……きっと良い旦那様に恵まれ、 幸せな家庭を築けるぞえ……
jpnSearchText:
まだ先じゃろうが……きっと良い旦那様に恵まれ、
幸せな家庭を築けるぞえ……

engChrName: Yay! That sounds like a happy for-chun for the next lady of the bistro!
engSearchText:
Yay! That sounds like a happy for-chun for the next
lady of the bistro!
jpnChrName: やったー！　それならモンマルトの カンバンムスメとしてしょうらいアンタイだね！
jpnSearchText:
やったー！　それならモンマルトの
カンバンムスメとしてしょうらいアンタイだね！

engChrName: (Sure...if Victor, that lunkhead, ever lets you get married.)
engSearchText:
(Sure...if Victor, that lunkhead, ever lets you
get married.)
jpnChrName: （ビクトルのおやっさんが   許せばの話かねえ……）
jpnSearchText:
（ビクトルのおやっさんが
許せばの話かねえ……）

engChrName: Afterwards, they had a great time sharing their results with each other.
engSearchText:
Afterwards, they had a great time sharing their results
with each other.
jpnChrName: その後、それぞれの占い結果を聞いて 仲間同士盛り上がるのだった。
jpnSearchText:
その後、それぞれの占い結果を聞いて
仲間同士盛り上がるのだった。

engChrName: This little pond is one of Longlai's hot springs.
engSearchText: This little pond is one of Longlai's hot springs.
jpnChrName: こちらは龍來の源泉の一つでしてね。
jpnSearchText: こちらは龍來の源泉の一つでしてね。

engChrName: We use this space to make one of the famous treats of spring towns, hot springs eggs!
engSearchText:
We use this space to make one of the famous treats of
spring towns, hot springs eggs!
jpnChrName: 温泉郷名物の一つ、 “温泉卵”作りの体験ができますよ。
jpnSearchText:
温泉郷名物の一つ、
“温泉卵”作りの体験ができますよ。

engChrName: (Hmm... Boiling some eggs in the hot springs? Could be nice. I wouldn't mind a snack.)
engSearchText:
(Hmm... Boiling some eggs in the hot springs?
Could be nice. I wouldn't mind a snack.)
jpnChrName: （温泉卵作りか……いいねぇ。   ちょいと小腹が空いてきちまうぜ。）
jpnSearchText:
（温泉卵作りか……いいねぇ。
ちょいと小腹が空いてきちまうぜ。）

engChrName: (We did give this a spin already...but hey, vacation time, right?)
engSearchText:
(We did give this a spin already...but hey, vacation
time, right?)
jpnChrName: （さっきもやったが……   ま、せっかくの旅行だしな。）
jpnSearchText:
（さっきもやったが……
ま、せっかくの旅行だしな。）

engChrName: (Wait. I'm with someone who's already done this. Should I go change up the crew?)
engSearchText:
(Wait. I'm with someone who's already done this.
Should I go change up the crew?)
jpnChrName: （と、既に誘っちまってるのもいるな。   今のメンツで大丈夫か？）
jpnSearchText:
（と、既に誘っちまってるのもいるな。
今のメンツで大丈夫か？）

engChrName: Spend free time to make some hot springs eggs?
engSearchText: Spend free time to make some hot springs eggs?
jpnChrName: ストックタイムを消費して、温泉卵作りをしますか？                 {CC_VALUE=now_stock}
jpnSearchText:
ストックタイムを消費して、温泉卵作りをしますか？
{CC_VALUE=now_stock}

engChrName: You can use hot springs to cook stuff? Neat!
engSearchText: You can use hot springs to cook stuff? Neat!
jpnChrName: 温泉で料理を作るなんて面白いですねっ。
jpnSearchText: 温泉で料理を作るなんて面白いですねっ。

engChrName: This seems like it could be great survival training!
engSearchText: This seems like it could be great survival training!
jpnChrName: サバイバル技術としても 応用が利くかもしれませんし！
jpnSearchText:
サバイバル技術としても
応用が利くかもしれませんし！

engChrName: Hot springs eggs? I think I saw a stand selling some, come to think of it.
engSearchText:
Hot springs eggs? I think I saw a stand selling some,
come to think of it.
jpnChrName: 温泉卵……そういえば、 屋台でも売っていましたね。
jpnSearchText:
温泉卵……そういえば、
屋台でも売っていましたね。

engChrName: Still, I bet it'll be even tastier if we make them ourselves.
engSearchText:
Still, I bet it'll be even tastier if we make
them ourselves.
jpnChrName: ふふ、自分で作ればきっと より美味しく感じられそうです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、自分で作ればきっと
より美味しく感じられそうです。

engChrName: Oh, hey! I love boiled eggs. Had them all the time back in Langport. Goes great with pork belly. If you simmer it just right, it's like heaven.
engSearchText:
Oh, hey! I love boiled eggs. Had them all the time
back in Langport. Goes great with pork belly. If you
simmer it just right, it's like heaven.
jpnChrName: 煌都でも茹で卵自体は馴染みはあるな、 角煮によく合うから好きだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
煌都でも茹で卵自体は馴染みはあるな、
角煮によく合うから好きだぜ。

engChrName: Not sure how different they'll taste if you boil them in a hot spring, but hey, if they taste good, I'm not gonna complain.
engSearchText:
Not sure how different they'll taste if you boil them in
a hot spring, but hey, if they taste good, I'm not
gonna complain.
jpnChrName: ま、温泉で茹でるってのはよくわかんねぇが、 美味くなりゃ何でもいいってもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、温泉で茹でるってのはよくわかんねぇが、
美味くなりゃ何でもいいってもんだ。

engChrName: Using the heated water of a hot spring to boil an egg...
engSearchText:
Using the heated water of a hot spring to boil
an egg...
jpnChrName: 温泉で卵を茹でるのか……
jpnSearchText: 温泉で卵を茹でるのか……

engChrName: Aha! That's a very clever use of geothermal energy, and if it's lightly sulfuric... I'm quite interested in this cultural phenomenon.
engSearchText:
Aha! That's a very clever use of geothermal energy,
and if it's lightly sulfuric... I'm quite interested in this
cultural phenomenon.
jpnChrName: ふふ、地熱を使った料理だと捉えると なかなか興味深い文化だね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、地熱を使った料理だと捉えると
なかなか興味深い文化だね。

engChrName: Hmm... I've heard of hot springs eggs, but I have never made one myself.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I've heard of hot springs eggs, but I have
never made one myself.
jpnChrName: 知識としては知っていますが、 実際に作るのは初めてですね。
jpnSearchText:
知識としては知っていますが、
実際に作るのは初めてですね。

engChrName: But as they say, everything is worth a try once. I would be glad to have the experience.
engSearchText:
But as they say, everything is worth a try once.
I would be glad to have the experience.
jpnChrName: 何事も経験…… これを機に挑戦してみましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
何事も経験……
これを機に挑戦してみましょうか。

engChrName: Ooh! I'm good at boiled eggs! Mommy taught me how to make them!
engSearchText:
Ooh! I'm good at boiled eggs! Mommy taught me
how to make them!
jpnChrName: ゆでたまごならトクイだよ！ ママにもおしえてもらったからねー！
jpnSearchText:
ゆでたまごならトクイだよ！
ママにもおしえてもらったからねー！

engChrName: I bet I could make a real gour-may hot springs egg!
engSearchText: I bet I could make a real gour-may hot springs egg!
jpnChrName: ふふん、ユメがゴクジョーの オンセンタマゴをつくってあげるね！
jpnSearchText:
ふふん、ユメがゴクジョーの
オンセンタマゴをつくってあげるね！

engChrName: Spend free time to make some hot springs eggs?
engSearchText: Spend free time to make some hot springs eggs?
jpnChrName: ストックタイムを消費して、温泉卵作りをしますか？                 {CC_VALUE=now_stock}
jpnSearchText:
ストックタイムを消費して、温泉卵作りをしますか？
{CC_VALUE=now_stock}

engChrName: Van and company were given a simple explanation by the staff...
engSearchText:
Van and company were given a simple explanation by
the staff...
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは職員から 温泉卵づくりのコツを聞き……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは職員から
温泉卵づくりのコツを聞き……

engChrName: They then took to boiling their eggs, each of them cooking them in different heat and for differing times as they saw fit.
engSearchText:
They then took to boiling their eggs, each of them
cooking them in different heat and for differing times
as they saw fit.
jpnChrName: 温度や時間を思い思いに測りながら 温泉卵を茹で上げたのだった。
jpnSearchText:
温度や時間を思い思いに測りながら
温泉卵を茹で上げたのだった。

engChrName: Man, I used to make these a lot when I trained here. Good to see I still got it.
engSearchText:
Man, I used to make these a lot when I trained here.
Good to see I still got it.
jpnChrName: 修行してた時によく作ってたが うん、鈍っちゃいねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
修行してた時によく作ってたが
うん、鈍っちゃいねぇな。

engChrName: Now, if you want these to taste real good, you put some syrup on 'em. That's a flavor to die for.
engSearchText:
Now, if you want these to taste real good, you put
some syrup on 'em. That's a flavor to die for.
jpnChrName: 結構、黒蜜をかけて食うと 合うんだよなこれが。
jpnSearchText:
結構、黒蜜をかけて食うと
合うんだよなこれが。

engChrName: Hmm... Mine ended up a little harder than I'd have liked.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Mine ended up a little harder than I'd
have liked.
jpnChrName: うーん、ちょっと 固くなっちゃいました。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、ちょっと
固くなっちゃいました。

engChrName: That's a bit embarrassing. Not quite the same as baking confections, I suppose.
engSearchText:
That's a bit embarrassing. Not quite the same as
baking confections, I suppose.
jpnChrName: あはは……お菓子作りとは やっぱり違うものですね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……お菓子作りとは
やっぱり違うものですね。

engChrName: Yeah. It's a little different than, say, bakin' some cookies in an oven.
engSearchText:
Yeah. It's a little different than, say, bakin' some
cookies in an oven.
