jpnChrName: まあ、オーブンでクッキーを焼く 感覚とじゃあ、ちと違うな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、オーブンでクッキーを焼く
感覚とじゃあ、ちと違うな。

engChrName: It's more like...meltin' chocolate. You gotta handle it real delicate—
engSearchText:
It's more like...meltin' chocolate. You gotta handle it
real delicate—
jpnChrName: どっちかというと……生ショコラを 扱うように、繊細に気遣って──
jpnSearchText:
どっちかというと……生ショコラを
扱うように、繊細に気遣って──

engChrName: I think I see why yours came out so well, Van.
engSearchText: I think I see why yours came out so well, Van.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんが上手に作れた理由…… 何となく察せた気がします……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんが上手に作れた理由……
何となく察せた気がします……

engChrName: Aww. These are, like, hot springs sorta-warmed eggs. I should've boiled them for longer.
engSearchText:
Aww. These are, like, hot springs sorta-warmed eggs.
I should've boiled them for longer.
jpnChrName: むぅ……ほとんど生ですねぇ。 もう少し長く茹でたほうがよかったかもです。
jpnSearchText:
むぅ……ほとんど生ですねぇ。
もう少し長く茹でたほうがよかったかもです。

engChrName: Yeah, I noticed it seemed like you just put 'em in and pulled them right back out.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I noticed it seemed like you just put 'em in and
pulled them right back out.
jpnChrName: 確かにさっとお湯に通したような 印象があったな。
jpnSearchText:
確かにさっとお湯に通したような
印象があったな。

engChrName: Why'd you go with that?
engSearchText: Why'd you go with that?
jpnChrName: どうしてそうしたんだ？
jpnSearchText: どうしてそうしたんだ？

engChrName: Well, you see, I cooked meat using a geyser we found during a march through the mountains this one time.
engSearchText:
Well, you see, I cooked meat using a geyser we found
during a march through the mountains this one time.
jpnChrName: 以前、山の行軍中に見つけた間欠泉で 生肉を調理したことがあって……
jpnSearchText:
以前、山の行軍中に見つけた間欠泉で
生肉を調理したことがあって……

engChrName: I think I just tried to cook it like I did with the geyser.
engSearchText: I think I just tried to cook it like I did with the geyser.
jpnChrName: その時の感覚で やっちゃったのかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
その時の感覚で
やっちゃったのかもしれません。

engChrName: Hah! Yeah, Longlai's hot springs ARE hot, but that's lukewarm compared to a freakin' geyser.
engSearchText:
Hah! Yeah, Longlai's hot springs ARE hot, but that's
lukewarm compared to a freakin' geyser.
jpnChrName: はは、龍來の温泉も熱い方ではあるが、 間欠泉に比べりゃぬるま湯同然だよな。
jpnSearchText:
はは、龍來の温泉も熱い方ではあるが、
間欠泉に比べりゃぬるま湯同然だよな。

engChrName: These aren't so bad though, yeah?
engSearchText: These aren't so bad though, yeah?
jpnChrName: ま、これはこれでウマいんじゃないか？
jpnSearchText: ま、これはこれでウマいんじゃないか？

engChrName: Yours came out pretty rocklike, huh? You left 'em in the water for way too long.
engSearchText:
Yours came out pretty rocklike, huh? You left 'em in
the water for way too long.
jpnChrName: だいぶ堅そうじゃねぇか？ 念入りに熱し過ぎだと思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
だいぶ堅そうじゃねぇか？
念入りに熱し過ぎだと思うぜ。

engChrName: Please! They're hard boiled! Just like a real man.
engSearchText: Please! They're hard boiled! Just like a real man.
jpnChrName: ハッ、男ならハードボイルドだろが。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、男ならハードボイルドだろが。

engChrName: Besides, this is about what you want if you're gonna pair them with some nice, Langport-flavored pork belly.
engSearchText:
Besides, this is about what you want if you're gonna
pair them with some nice, Langport-flavored
pork belly.
jpnChrName: これくらいの方が煌都風味付けの 角煮にも合うと思うしな？
jpnSearchText:
これくらいの方が煌都風味付けの
角煮にも合うと思うしな？

engChrName: Hey, you do you. I dunno if they've got the spices for Langport flavor here, though.
engSearchText:
Hey, you do you. I dunno if they've got the spices for
Langport flavor here, though.
jpnChrName: ま、好きにすりゃ良いんじゃないか？ 合う香辛料がここにあるのか知らねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、好きにすりゃ良いんじゃないか？
合う香辛料がここにあるのか知らねぇが。

engChrName: Hmm... They came out a touch undercooked. This is more difficult than it seems.
engSearchText:
Hmm... They came out a touch undercooked. This is
more difficult than it seems.
jpnChrName: 少々生すぎましたか。 中々難しいものですね。
jpnSearchText:
少々生すぎましたか。
中々難しいものですね。

engChrName: Yeah. Hot springs egg cookin' is about experience and intuition. Normal skills need not apply, y'know?
engSearchText:
Yeah. Hot springs egg cookin' is about experience
and intuition. Normal skills need not apply, y'know?
jpnChrName: こればっかりは経験と感覚だろうからな。 料理上手でも難しいんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
こればっかりは経験と感覚だろうからな。
料理上手でも難しいんじゃねえか？

engChrName: I see what you mean, but it was still very fun. Before I do it again, I should get my thermographic sensor upgraded...
engSearchText:
I see what you mean, but it was still very fun. Before I
do it again, I should get my thermographic
sensor upgraded...
jpnChrName: ふふ、ですが楽しくもあります。 次は熱源センサーを強化して挑戦を……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ですが楽しくもあります。
次は熱源センサーを強化して挑戦を……

engChrName: Uhh... Think we can leave crazy super-tech at home.
engSearchText: Uhh... Think we can leave crazy super-tech at home.
jpnChrName: いや、そこまでやることじゃねえだろ。
jpnSearchText: いや、そこまでやることじゃねえだろ。

engChrName: Well, well. Yours came out pretty good, huh?
engSearchText: Well, well. Yours came out pretty good, huh?
jpnChrName: へぇ、お前もなかなかやるじゃないか。
jpnSearchText: へぇ、お前もなかなかやるじゃないか。

engChrName: Lemme guess! You calculated the precise boiling time based on thermodynamic transfer across...something or other?
engSearchText:
Lemme guess! You calculated the precise boiling time
based on thermodynamic transfer across...something
or other?
jpnChrName: 科学的に熱伝導を計算したとか、 そんな感じだったりするのか？
jpnSearchText:
科学的に熱伝導を計算したとか、
そんな感じだったりするのか？

engChrName: Haha! Actually, Gran and Essy made sure I knew how to cook.
engSearchText:
Haha! Actually, Gran and Essy made sure I knew
how to cook.
jpnChrName: はは、グランマやエレ姉から、 それなりに料理なんかも教わってるからね。
jpnSearchText:
はは、グランマやエレ姉から、
それなりに料理なんかも教わってるからね。

engChrName: I hope we can come here together and I can treat them to some eggs next time... Especially if Yang can join us.
engSearchText:
I hope we can come here together and I can treat
them to some eggs next time... Especially if Yang can
join us.
jpnChrName: いつかまたご馳走したいな…… もちろんヤン兄も含めて。
jpnSearchText:
いつかまたご馳走したいな……
もちろんヤン兄も含めて。

engChrName: How are mine, Van? I bet they're really yummy!
engSearchText: How are mine, Van? I bet they're really yummy!
jpnChrName: どうヴァン！？ じょうずにできてるでしょー！
jpnSearchText:
どうヴァン！？
じょうずにできてるでしょー！

engChrName: Yeah, they sure are real good.
engSearchText: Yeah, they sure are real good.
jpnChrName: おお……確かに絶妙の出来だな。
jpnSearchText: おお……確かに絶妙の出来だな。

engChrName: Looks like you've inherited Victor's skills some, huh?
engSearchText: Looks like you've inherited Victor's skills some, huh?
jpnChrName: 流石はビクトルのおやっさんの 孫なだけはあるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
流石はビクトルのおやっさんの
孫なだけはあるぜ。

engChrName: Heh heh heh! Yep, I'm pretty good!
engSearchText: Heh heh heh! Yep, I'm pretty good!
jpnChrName: ふっふーん、どんなもんだい！
jpnSearchText: ふっふーん、どんなもんだい！

engChrName: I can make breakfast for you sometime if you'd like, Van!
engSearchText:
I can make breakfast for you sometime if you'd
like, Van!
jpnChrName: こんどヴァンのアサゴハンにも 作ってあげるねー。
jpnSearchText:
こんどヴァンのアサゴハンにも
作ってあげるねー。

engChrName: Oh, yeah? Looking forward to it!
engSearchText: Oh, yeah? Looking forward to it!
jpnChrName: ああ、楽しみにしてるぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、楽しみにしてるぜ。

engChrName: And so they had a pleasant time sharing their hot springs eggs with each other.
engSearchText:
And so they had a pleasant time sharing their hot
springs eggs with each other.
jpnChrName: その後、お互いの作った温泉卵をシェアして 楽しんだのだった。
jpnSearchText:
その後、お互いの作った温泉卵をシェアして
楽しんだのだった。

engChrName: Our temple has a unique service you might not find in other regions: Eastern tea is free for visitors.
engSearchText:
Our temple has a unique service you might not find in
other regions: Eastern tea is free for visitors.
jpnChrName: 当寺院では、他の地域とは一風変わって、 東方のお茶を無料で振舞っているんです。
jpnSearchText:
当寺院では、他の地域とは一風変わって、
東方のお茶を無料で振舞っているんです。

engChrName: Preparing tea and providing it to your guests is a ritual with many meanings far to the East.
engSearchText:
Preparing tea and providing it to your guests is a
ritual with many meanings far to the East.
jpnChrName: 東方では、お茶を立て、客人をもてなす事にも 様々な意味を見出す文化がございまして。
jpnSearchText:
東方では、お茶を立て、客人をもてなす事にも
様々な意味を見出す文化がございまして。

engChrName: If you have the time, would you like to experience some Longlai tea, made with local tea leaves and local water?
engSearchText:
If you have the time, would you like to experience
some Longlai tea, made with local tea leaves and
local water?
jpnChrName: ふふ、よろしければこの機会に、 龍來の茶葉と水で淹れた“龍來茶”はいかがですか？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、よろしければこの機会に、
龍來の茶葉と水で淹れた“龍來茶”はいかがですか？

engChrName: (Well, couldn't hurt to do things the Longlai way.)
engSearchText: (Well, couldn't hurt to do things the Longlai way.)
jpnChrName: （せっかく龍來に来たんだ、   幽玄ってやつを味わっていくか？）
jpnSearchText:
（せっかく龍來に来たんだ、
幽玄ってやつを味わっていくか？）

engChrName: (We did give this a spin already...but hey, vacation time, right?)
engSearchText:
(We did give this a spin already...but hey, vacation
time, right?)
jpnChrName: （さっきもやったが……   ま、せっかくの旅行だしな。）
jpnSearchText:
（さっきもやったが……
ま、せっかくの旅行だしな。）

engChrName: (Wait. I'm with someone who's already done this. Should I go change up the crew?)
engSearchText:
(Wait. I'm with someone who's already done this.
Should I go change up the crew?)
jpnChrName: （と、既に誘っちまってるのもいるな。   今のメンツで大丈夫か？）
jpnSearchText:
（と、既に誘っちまってるのもいるな。
今のメンツで大丈夫か？）

engChrName: Spend free time to have some Longlai tea?
engSearchText: Spend free time to have some Longlai tea?
jpnChrName: ストックタイムを消費して、龍來茶を楽しみますか？                 {CC_VALUE=now_stock}
jpnSearchText:
ストックタイムを消費して、龍來茶を楽しみますか？
{CC_VALUE=now_stock}

engChrName: Pfft! Talk about a good time...for old people. Still, sure—let's see how good that tea is.
engSearchText:
Pfft! Talk about a good time...for old people.
Still, sure—let's see how good that tea is.
jpnChrName: ハン、ジジ臭くてつまんねー気もするが お手並み拝見といこうじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ハン、ジジ臭くてつまんねー気もするが
お手並み拝見といこうじゃねえか？

engChrName: The flavor of Longlai tea! I can't even imagine what it's like.
engSearchText:
The flavor of Longlai tea! I can't even imagine what
it's like.
jpnChrName: 龍來のお茶ですか…… どんな味がするんでしょうねっ。
jpnSearchText:
龍來のお茶ですか……
どんな味がするんでしょうねっ。

engChrName: Oh, I've heard of that tea. I've never had it before, of course. I'm curious!
engSearchText:
Oh, I've heard of that tea. I've never had it before,
of course. I'm curious!
jpnChrName: ふふ、聞いた事はありますが、 実際に飲むのは初めてです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、聞いた事はありますが、
実際に飲むのは初めてです。

engChrName: Oh, my. Afternoon tea, is it?
engSearchText: Oh, my. Afternoon tea, is it?
jpnChrName: ふふ、それでは アフタヌーンティーと参りましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それでは
アフタヌーンティーと参りましょう。

engChrName: I'd rather have some juice...but okay! I'll try to drink it!
engSearchText:
I'd rather have some juice...but okay! I'll try to
drink it!
jpnChrName: ユメ、ジュースがいいな～…… でもせっかくだしチャレンジしてみる！
jpnSearchText:
ユメ、ジュースがいいな～……
でもせっかくだしチャレンジしてみる！

engChrName: It shouldn't be much different from black or green tea...right?
engSearchText:
It shouldn't be much different from black or green
tea...right?
jpnChrName: 紅茶や緑茶と原料は同じだろうけど…… どんな違いがあるのかな？
jpnSearchText:
紅茶や緑茶と原料は同じだろうけど……
どんな違いがあるのかな？

engChrName: Spend free time to have some Longlai tea?
engSearchText: Spend free time to have some Longlai tea?
jpnChrName: ストックタイムを消費して、龍來茶を楽しみますか？                 {CC_VALUE=now_stock}
jpnSearchText:
ストックタイムを消費して、龍來茶を楽しみますか？
{CC_VALUE=now_stock}

engChrName: Having accepted, Van and company marveled at Izumi's tea artistry...
engSearchText:
Having accepted, Van and company marveled at
Izumi's tea artistry...
jpnChrName: その後、イズミが見事な“茶芸”を披露するのを 感心しながら見つつ……
jpnSearchText:
その後、イズミが見事な“茶芸”を披露するのを
感心しながら見つつ……

engChrName: ...and once the tea was served, they took to drinking it.
engSearchText:
...and once the tea was served, they took to
drinking it.
jpnChrName: やがて振舞われたお茶を楽しむのだった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>やがて振舞われたお茶を楽しむのだった。

engChrName: Ahh...
engSearchText: Ahh...
jpnChrName: はああ～……
jpnSearchText: はああ～……

engChrName: Man. It's been forever since I had Longlai tea. It's just seepin' into me.
engSearchText:
Man. It's been forever since I had Longlai tea.
It's just seepin' into me.
jpnChrName: 久しぶりの龍來茶…… 身体に染み渡るぜ。
jpnSearchText:
久しぶりの龍來茶……
身体に染み渡るぜ。

engChrName: It's stuff like this that makes you see how tea culture became so important for things like welcoming guests—and even mental trainin'.
engSearchText:
It's stuff like this that makes you see how tea culture
became so important for things like welcoming
guests—and even mental trainin'.
jpnChrName: 東方で、客人をもてなす文化やら 精神修行として発展したってのも納得だ。
jpnSearchText:
東方で、客人をもてなす文化やら
精神修行として発展したってのも納得だ。

engChrName: Oh, wow! This is so calming. I feel so much more relaxed now.
engSearchText:
Oh, wow! This is so calming. I feel so much more
relaxed now.
jpnChrName: ふふ、心が落ち着いて、 ほぐれてくるような気がしてきます。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、心が落ち着いて、
ほぐれてくるような気がしてきます。

engChrName: (...Back when I was little, I remember spending days with my family like this... I miss those days.)
engSearchText:
(...Back when I was little, I remember spending days
with my family like this... I miss those days.)
jpnChrName: （……随分前に家族でこんな日も……   ふふっ、懐かしいな……）
jpnSearchText:
（……随分前に家族でこんな日も……
ふふっ、懐かしいな……）

engChrName: Glad to see you like it.
engSearchText: Glad to see you like it.
jpnChrName: ……気に入ったみたいじゃないか。
jpnSearchText: ……気に入ったみたいじゃないか。

engChrName: It's wonderful, thank you.
engSearchText: It's wonderful, thank you.
jpnChrName: はい、とっても。
jpnSearchText: はい、とっても。

engChrName: Hmm... This scent carries the breath of the natural world in it.
engSearchText:
Hmm... This scent carries the breath of the natural
world in it.
jpnChrName: うーん、この香り…… 自然の息吹も感じられますね。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、この香り……
自然の息吹も感じられますね。

engChrName: I bet it would be super fun to do something like this with my clan!
engSearchText:
I bet it would be super fun to do something like this
with my clan!
jpnChrName: ふふ、クルガの里で同じような事を やってみても面白いかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、クルガの里で同じような事を
やってみても面白いかもしれませんね。

engChrName: Well, that's what they say about culture: it spreads, mixes, and advances in the doin'.
engSearchText:
Well, that's what they say about culture: it spreads,
mixes, and advances in the doin'.
jpnChrName: はは、こうやって文化ってのは 混ざり合って発展していくものなのかね。
jpnSearchText:
はは、こうやって文化ってのは
混ざり合って発展していくものなのかね。

engChrName: Oh, man! I take back that thing about this being for old people. It's actually real good—especially with the snacks.
engSearchText:
Oh, man! I take back that thing about this being for
old people. It's actually real good—especially with
the snacks.
jpnChrName: ハッ、ジジ臭いと思ってたが 茶菓子と合わせて美味いモンじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、ジジ臭いと思ってたが
茶菓子と合わせて美味いモンじゃねぇか。

engChrName: I've always been an oolong kinda guy, but this Longlai tea is worth a drink, too.
engSearchText:
I've always been an oolong kinda guy, but this
Longlai tea is worth a drink, too.
jpnChrName: 茶は烏龍茶と相場は決まってるが 龍來茶ってのもこうしてみると悪くねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
茶は烏龍茶と相場は決まってるが
龍來茶ってのもこうしてみると悪くねぇ。

engChrName: Heh. Well, I'm glad it's earned your approval.
engSearchText: Heh. Well, I'm glad it's earned your approval.
jpnChrName: ハッ、お眼鏡にかなったようでなによりだ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、お眼鏡にかなったようでなによりだ。

engChrName: The flavor is warm and gentle, one that seeps into the drinker. It feels as if it is spreading into the very depths of my senses...
engSearchText:
The flavor is warm and gentle, one that seeps into
the drinker. It feels as if it is spreading into the very
depths of my senses...
jpnChrName: 温かさと優しい味わいが染み渡りますね。 わたくしの感覚の奥にまでも……
jpnSearchText:
温かさと優しい味わいが染み渡りますね。
わたくしの感覚の奥にまでも……

engChrName: I hadn't considered it before now, but I haven't had the time for relaxing tea like this in a long while.
engSearchText:
I hadn't considered it before now, but I haven't had
the time for relaxing tea like this in a long while.
jpnChrName: 思えばこんなゆったりとした ティータイムは久しぶりかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
思えばこんなゆったりとした
ティータイムは久しぶりかもしれません。

engChrName: Yeah, you work hard. Which is good all on its own, but it also means you deserve all the rest you can get.
engSearchText:
Yeah, you work hard. Which is good all on its own,
but it also means you deserve all the rest you can get.
jpnChrName: お前さんはただでさえ働きまくってるからなぁ。 せいぜい休んでくれや。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんはただでさえ働きまくってるからなぁ。
せいぜい休んでくれや。

engChrName: That tea ceremony was an incredible show! Precisely choreographed, calculated down to the tea's target temperature...
engSearchText:
That tea ceremony was an incredible show!
Precisely choreographed, calculated down to the tea's
target temperature...
jpnChrName: それにしてもさっきの茶芸、見事だったね。 お茶の温度とかも計算の上で盛り込まれてて──
jpnSearchText:
それにしてもさっきの茶芸、見事だったね。
お茶の温度とかも計算の上で盛り込まれてて──

engChrName: A perfect fusion of artistry and logic. Eastern culture has so much depth to it.
engSearchText:
A perfect fusion of artistry and logic. Eastern culture
has so much depth to it.
jpnChrName: 精神性と合理性の絶妙な融合…… 改めて東方文化は奥深いって感じるよ。
jpnSearchText:
精神性と合理性の絶妙な融合……
改めて東方文化は奥深いって感じるよ。

engChrName: I'm sure you've got a lotta exciting finds ahead of you as you discover more of it.
engSearchText:
I'm sure you've got a lotta exciting finds ahead of you
as you discover more of it.
jpnChrName: はは、お前ならもっと体験してみりゃ、 さらにいろいろ発見できるかもな。
jpnSearchText:
はは、お前ならもっと体験してみりゃ、
さらにいろいろ発見できるかもな。

engChrName: Mmm... Tea's kinda bitter. But the more I drink it, the more I like it!
engSearchText:
Mmm... Tea's kinda bitter. But the more I drink it,
the more I like it!
jpnChrName: ん～、ちょっとニガいけど だんだんおいしくなってきたかもー！
jpnSearchText:
ん～、ちょっとニガいけど
だんだんおいしくなってきたかもー！

engChrName: I know grandpa drinks tea sometimes, so it must be good!
engSearchText:
I know grandpa drinks tea sometimes, so it must
be good!
jpnChrName: おじーちゃんも時々飲むみたいだけど けっこういいもんだねー。
jpnSearchText:
おじーちゃんも時々飲むみたいだけど
けっこういいもんだねー。

engChrName: Heh. It takes a pretty smart cookie to be able to appreciate tea, Yumes.
engSearchText:
Heh. It takes a pretty smart cookie to be able to
appreciate tea, Yumes.
jpnChrName: この良さが分かるとは ユメ坊もツウだねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
この良さが分かるとは
ユメ坊もツウだねぇ。

engChrName: And so Van and company spent a relaxing time enjoying and talking over tea.
engSearchText:
And so Van and company spent a relaxing time
enjoying and talking over tea.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちはそのままゆったりと 解れるようなお茶の時間を楽しむのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちはそのままゆったりと
解れるようなお茶の時間を楽しむのだった。

engChrName: Fishing is something one can attain mastery of, too. To become one with the mountains, to read the flow of the rivers...
engSearchText:
Fishing is something one can attain mastery of, too.
To become one with the mountains, to read the flow
of the rivers...
jpnChrName: 釣りもまた極めれば“理”に至れるもの…… 霊山と一体となり、川の流れを読む……
jpnSearchText:
釣りもまた極めれば“理”に至れるもの……
霊山と一体となり、川の流れを読む……

engChrName: (What's with this old guy? Guess he's a fisherman?)
engSearchText: (What's with this old guy? Guess he's a fisherman?)
jpnChrName: （何だこの爺さんは……釣り師のようだが。）
jpnSearchText: （何だこの爺さんは……釣り師のようだが。）

engChrName: Hmm? You there, sir. You seem interested in fishing. No need to restrain yourself! Come! Free yourself and embrace fishing with me!
engSearchText:
Hmm? You there, sir. You seem interested in fishing.
No need to restrain yourself! Come! Free yourself and
embrace fishing with me!
jpnChrName: む？　お主、何やら興味がありげじゃな。 遠慮は要らん、儂と共に釣りに興じぬか？
jpnSearchText:
む？　お主、何やら興味がありげじゃな。
遠慮は要らん、儂と共に釣りに興じぬか？

engChrName: I am Kukai, a master of fishing in the East! I'm holding a bit of a fishing competition.
engSearchText:
I am Kukai, a master of fishing in the East!
I'm holding a bit of a fishing competition.
jpnChrName: 儂は東方流の釣りを極めしクウカイという。 ちょっとした釣り大会をしておったところじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
儂は東方流の釣りを極めしクウカイという。
ちょっとした釣り大会をしておったところじゃ。

engChrName: I hoped to convey the true mystery of fishing to the people of this land while I am here.
engSearchText:
I hoped to convey the true mystery of fishing to the
people of this land while I am here.
jpnChrName: 釣りの極意、これを機にこの地の者らにも 伝授してしんぜようと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
釣りの極意、これを機にこの地の者らにも
伝授してしんぜようと思ってな。

engChrName: Oh, yeah?
engSearchText: Oh, yeah?
jpnChrName: へえ……？
jpnSearchText: へえ……？

engChrName: Well, this is the season for dragon trout. And so I chose to make the most of it while the time was on us.
engSearchText:
Well, this is the season for dragon trout. And so I
chose to make the most of it while the time was
on us.
jpnChrName: 今は龍魚（ドラグナートラード）がよくかかる時期でな。 思い立って開催したのじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
今は龍魚（ドラグナートラード）がよくかかる時期でな。
思い立って開催したのじゃ。

engChrName: Of course, no early registration required. Competition is both the joy and the source of self-improvement in fishing.
engSearchText:
Of course, no early registration required.
Competition is both the joy and the source of
self-improvement in fishing.
jpnChrName: 飛び入り参加も歓迎するぞ、やはり釣りは 皆で互いを高め合ってこそじゃからな。
jpnSearchText:
飛び入り参加も歓迎するぞ、やはり釣りは
皆で互いを高め合ってこそじゃからな。

engChrName: Would you like to join the fishing competition? Now is the best season to catch dragon trout!
engSearchText:
Would you like to join the fishing competition?
Now is the best season to catch dragon trout!
jpnChrName: おぬしも釣り大会に参加するか？ 今は龍魚（ドラグナートラード）がよくかかる時期でな。
jpnSearchText:
おぬしも釣り大会に参加するか？
今は龍魚（ドラグナートラード）がよくかかる時期でな。

engChrName: Of course, no early registration required. Competition is both the joy and the source of self-improvement in fishing.
engSearchText:
Of course, no early registration required.
Competition is both the joy and the source of
self-improvement in fishing.
jpnChrName: 飛び入り参加も歓迎するぞ、やはり釣りは 皆で互いを高め合ってこそじゃからな。
jpnSearchText:
飛び入り参加も歓迎するぞ、やはり釣りは
皆で互いを高め合ってこそじゃからな。

engChrName: (As I recall, that's a common fish around Longlai. Didn't plan on a fishin' trip, but it's a valid tack.)
engSearchText:
(As I recall, that's a common fish around Longlai.
Didn't plan on a fishin' trip, but it's a valid tack.)
jpnChrName: （龍來で良く釣れる魚だったか。   旅先で釣りってのも趣ありそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（龍來で良く釣れる魚だったか。
旅先で釣りってのも趣ありそうだな。）

engChrName: (We did give this a spin already...but hey, vacation time, right?)
engSearchText:
(We did give this a spin already...but hey, vacation
time, right?)
jpnChrName: （さっきもやったが……   ま、せっかくの旅行だしな。）
jpnSearchText:
（さっきもやったが……
ま、せっかくの旅行だしな。）

engChrName: (Wait. I'm with someone who's already done this. Should I go change up the crew?)
engSearchText:
(Wait. I'm with someone who's already done this.
Should I go change up the crew?)
jpnChrName: （と、既に誘っちまってるのもいるな。   今のメンツで大丈夫か？）
jpnSearchText:
（と、既に誘っちまってるのもいるな。
今のメンツで大丈夫か？）

engChrName: Spend free time to join the fishing competition?
engSearchText: Spend free time to join the fishing competition?
jpnChrName: ストックタイムを消費して、釣り大会に参加しますか？                   {CC_VALUE=now_stock}
jpnSearchText:
ストックタイムを消費して、釣り大会に参加しますか？
{CC_VALUE=now_stock}

engChrName: A fishing competition we just happened to be in time for? What a curious form of serendipity.
engSearchText:
A fishing competition we just happened to be in
time for? What a curious form of serendipity.
jpnChrName: 旅行先での釣り大会…… これもある種のご縁でしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
旅行先での釣り大会……
これもある種のご縁でしょうか。

engChrName: Fine by me! If we're gonna do this, I'll get the biggest fish of any of us!
engSearchText:
Fine by me! If we're gonna do this, I'll get the biggest
fish of any of us!
jpnChrName: ハン、せっかくだし 誰がデケェのを釣り上げるか勝負すっか！
jpnSearchText:
ハン、せっかくだし
誰がデケェのを釣り上げるか勝負すっか！

engChrName: Oh, just you wait! I'll show you the mighty fishing powers of the Warriors of Kruga!
engSearchText:
Oh, just you wait! I'll show you the mighty fishing
powers of the Warriors of Kruga!
jpnChrName: 戦士団のキャンプで 鍛えた腕の見せ所ですっ。
jpnSearchText:
戦士団のキャンプで
鍛えた腕の見せ所ですっ。

engChrName: The water is so clear and clean. I'm sure you can catch a lot here.
engSearchText:
The water is so clear and clean. I'm sure you can catch
a lot here.
jpnChrName: ふふ、綺麗な水ですし たくさん釣れそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、綺麗な水ですし
たくさん釣れそうですね。

engChrName: I'm more the indoor type. Still, it can't hurt to go out of my comfort zone once in a while.
engSearchText:
I'm more the indoor type. Still, it can't hurt to go out
of my comfort zone once in a while.
jpnChrName: うーん、インドア派には似合わないけど たまにはこういうのもアリかな？
jpnSearchText:
うーん、インドア派には似合わないけど
たまにはこういうのもアリかな？

engChrName: Wow, fishing! I've never done this before. Just watch! I'm gonna fish up dinner tonight!
engSearchText:
Wow, fishing! I've never done this before. Just watch!
I'm gonna fish up dinner tonight!
jpnChrName: えへへ、サカナツリって初めてかも！ 今日のバンゴハンはユメが釣ってあげるねー！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、サカナツリって初めてかも！
今日のバンゴハンはユメが釣ってあげるねー！

engChrName: No, Yumé, you get to watch this time. Don't want you slippin' into the river, 'specially in this season.
engSearchText:
No, Yumé, you get to watch this time. Don't want
you slippin' into the river, 'specially in this season.
jpnChrName: いや、ユメ坊は見学だ。 勢いあまってうっかり足滑らせそうだしな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、ユメ坊は見学だ。
勢いあまってうっかり足滑らせそうだしな。

engChrName: Don't worry. I'll catch a big fish for the both of us, so you're on my team, got it?
engSearchText:
Don't worry. I'll catch a big fish for the both of us, so
you're on my team, got it?
jpnChrName: お前さんの分まで釣り上げるから せいぜい応援しといてくれや。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんの分まで釣り上げるから
せいぜい応援しといてくれや。

engChrName: Oh, okay! You go get the fish, Van!
engSearchText: Oh, okay! You go get the fish, Van!
jpnChrName: んー、わかった！ 頑張ってねー、ヴァン！
jpnSearchText:
んー、わかった！
頑張ってねー、ヴァン！

engChrName: Spend free time to join the fishing competition?
engSearchText: Spend free time to join the fishing competition?
jpnChrName: ストックタイムを消費して、釣り大会に参加しますか？                   {CC_VALUE=now_stock}
jpnSearchText:
ストックタイムを消費して、釣り大会に参加しますか？
{CC_VALUE=now_stock}

engChrName: So, Van and company joined the fishing competition just to enjoy the fishing...
engSearchText:
So, Van and company joined the fishing competition
just to enjoy the fishing...
jpnChrName: こうしてヴァンたちは 気負いなく釣り大会に参加し……
jpnSearchText:
こうしてヴァンたちは
気負いなく釣り大会に参加し……

engChrName: Though they did compare the fish they managed to catch.
engSearchText:
Though they did compare the fish they managed
to catch.
jpnChrName: 釣り上げた中で最も大きな魚を 比べてみるのだった。
jpnSearchText:
釣り上げた中で最も大きな魚を
比べてみるのだった。

engChrName: Ahh, that's a pretty big one.
engSearchText: Ahh, that's a pretty big one.
jpnChrName: ふう、けっこうデカイのが釣れたな。
jpnSearchText: ふう、けっこうデカイのが釣れたな。

engChrName: Wow, Van! That's great!
engSearchText: Wow, Van! That's great!
jpnChrName: やったねー、ヴァン！
jpnSearchText: やったねー、ヴァン！

engChrName: Bet'cha couldn't do it without me helping, huh?
engSearchText: Bet'cha couldn't do it without me helping, huh?
jpnChrName: ふっふっふ、ユメが オウエンしたおかげかなー？
jpnSearchText:
ふっふっふ、ユメが
オウエンしたおかげかなー？

engChrName: You know it, Yumes. Would've been hopeless without you.
engSearchText:
You know it, Yumes. Would've been hopeless
without you.
jpnChrName: はは、違いねえ。 ありがとよ、ユメ坊。
jpnSearchText:
はは、違いねえ。
ありがとよ、ユメ坊。

engChrName: Oh, my! That is a very impressive dragon trout! I didn't think you had it in you to pull up one that big.
engSearchText:
Oh, my! That is a very impressive dragon trout!
I didn't think you had it in you to pull up one
that big.
jpnChrName: うむうむ、随分と立派な“龍魚”じゃ！ まさかそこまでの大物を釣り上げるとは。
jpnSearchText:
うむうむ、随分と立派な“龍魚”じゃ！
まさかそこまでの大物を釣り上げるとは。

engChrName: You're quite skilled. Have you considered taking up the rod professionally?
engSearchText:
You're quite skilled. Have you considered taking up
the rod professionally?
jpnChrName: なかなかやるのう、お前さん。 これを機に、本格的に釣りの道はどうじゃ？
jpnSearchText:
なかなかやるのう、お前さん。
これを機に、本格的に釣りの道はどうじゃ？

engChrName: Nah, I'm good. I only fish as a hobby sometimes.
engSearchText: Nah, I'm good. I only fish as a hobby sometimes.
jpnChrName: いやまあ、普段は嗜む程度しか 釣りはやっていないんだが……
jpnSearchText:
いやまあ、普段は嗜む程度しか
釣りはやっていないんだが……

engChrName: Still, it's a good hobby to have.
engSearchText: Still, it's a good hobby to have.
jpnChrName: ま、たまにはこういうのも悪くはねぇな。
jpnSearchText: ま、たまにはこういうのも悪くはねぇな。

engChrName: Great, got another big one.
engSearchText: Great, got another big one.
jpnChrName: よし、またデカいのが釣れたぜ。
jpnSearchText: よし、またデカいのが釣れたぜ。

engChrName: Wow, Van! That's great!
engSearchText: Wow, Van! That's great!
jpnChrName: やったねー、ヴァン！
jpnSearchText: やったねー、ヴァン！

engChrName: Bet'cha couldn't do it without me helping, huh?
engSearchText: Bet'cha couldn't do it without me helping, huh?
jpnChrName: ふっふっふ、ユメが オウエンしたおかげかなー？
jpnSearchText:
ふっふっふ、ユメが
オウエンしたおかげかなー？

engChrName: You know it, Yumes. Would've been hopeless without you.
engSearchText:
You know it, Yumes. Would've been hopeless
without you.
jpnChrName: はは、違いねえ。 ありがとよ、ユメ坊。
jpnSearchText:
はは、違いねえ。
ありがとよ、ユメ坊。

engChrName: Amazing. To catch such large fish, and not just once...
engSearchText:
Amazing. To catch such large fish, and not
just once...
jpnChrName: おお、それほど立派な龍魚を 立て続けに釣れるとはな……
jpnSearchText:
おお、それほど立派な龍魚を
立て続けに釣れるとはな……

engChrName: You truly have talent for fishing. Are you sure you don't want to fish professionally?
engSearchText:
You truly have talent for fishing. Are you sure you
don't want to fish professionally?
jpnChrName: やはりお主には才能があるようじゃ、 本格的に釣りを極めてはどうじゃ？
jpnSearchText:
やはりお主には才能があるようじゃ、
本格的に釣りを極めてはどうじゃ？

engChrName: I told you, I'm not gonna get serious about it.
engSearchText: I told you, I'm not gonna get serious about it.
jpnChrName: だからそこまで 入れ込む気はねぇっての。
jpnSearchText:
だからそこまで
入れ込む気はねぇっての。

engChrName: Hey, that's a pretty good one—'specially considering your level of experience.
engSearchText:
Hey, that's a pretty good one—'specially considering
your level of experience.
jpnChrName: へぇ、お前にしてはなかなかの サイズのを釣ったみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、お前にしてはなかなかの
サイズのを釣ったみたいだな。

engChrName: If you can already catch fish like this, you can probably get pretty good.
engSearchText:
If you can already catch fish like this, you can
probably get pretty good.
jpnChrName: これくらいだと、そこそこ 引きも強そうではあるが。
jpnSearchText:
これくらいだと、そこそこ
引きも強そうではあるが。

engChrName: I still don't feel terribly confident, but I do feel like I've learned something thanks to you, Van.
engSearchText:
I still don't feel terribly confident, but I do feel like
I've learned something thanks to you, Van.
jpnChrName: 釣り自体はまだ不慣れですけど…… ヴァンさんのお陰で何かと鍛えられましたし。
jpnSearchText:
釣り自体はまだ不慣れですけど……
ヴァンさんのお陰で何かと鍛えられましたし。

engChrName: I guess even I can manage to catch fish like these with reasonable ease.
engSearchText:
I guess even I can manage to catch fish like these with
reasonable ease.
jpnChrName: これくらいなら、私でも難なく 釣りあげられるみたいです。
jpnSearchText:
これくらいなら、私でも難なく
釣りあげられるみたいです。

engChrName: Heh. Gettin' pretty handy at this, huh?
engSearchText: Heh. Gettin' pretty handy at this, huh?
jpnChrName: ハハ、頼もしくなったんじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText: ハハ、頼もしくなったんじゃねぇか？

engChrName: Agh... I was hoping to catch a real big one.
engSearchText: Agh... I was hoping to catch a real big one.
jpnChrName: むぅ……大きい獲物を 狙ってたんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
むぅ……大きい獲物を
狙ってたんですけど……

engChrName: Hey, no use sweatin' the one that got away. At least you're not emptyhanded, yeah?
engSearchText:
Hey, no use sweatin' the one that got away. At least
you're not emptyhanded, yeah?
jpnChrName: ハハ、別にボウズって ワケでもねえしいいんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、別にボウズって
ワケでもねえしいいんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Sure, but it means I lose the competition, and losing is lame! Let's do it again, Van!
engSearchText:
Sure, but it means I lose the competition, and losing
is lame! Let's do it again, Van!
jpnChrName: 勝負で負けるのは悔しいです！ もう一回やりましょう、ヴァンさん！
jpnSearchText:
勝負で負けるのは悔しいです！
もう一回やりましょう、ヴァンさん！

engChrName: Hey, look at that—you did totally okay-ish. Not as big as the one I fished up, of course.
engSearchText:
Hey, look at that—you did totally okay-ish. Not as
big as the one I fished up, of course.
jpnChrName: へえ、俺の釣ったヤツ程じゃねぇが なかなかやるじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
へえ、俺の釣ったヤツ程じゃねぇが
なかなかやるじゃないか。

engChrName: Already blind as a bat, eh? Mine's WAY bigger than yours.
engSearchText:
Already blind as a bat, eh? Mine's WAY bigger
than yours.
jpnChrName: おいおい、アンタの目は節穴かよ、 どう見ても俺のほうがデケェだろうが？
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、アンタの目は節穴かよ、
どう見ても俺のほうがデケェだろうが？

engChrName: Pfft. Just admit you lost.
engSearchText: Pfft. Just admit you lost.
jpnChrName: ハッ、素直に負けを認めろっての。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、素直に負けを認めろっての。

engChrName: You wanna piece of this?!
engSearchText: You wanna piece of this?!
jpnChrName: アァン……！？
jpnSearchText: アァン……！？

engChrName: (Like two peas in a pod.)
engSearchText: (Like two peas in a pod.)
jpnChrName: （似たり寄ったりじゃがのう。）
jpnSearchText: （似たり寄ったりじゃがのう。）

engChrName: Well, hell. You got a pretty big one, too, huh?
engSearchText: Well, hell. You got a pretty big one, too, huh?
jpnChrName: おお、お前さんも 中々の大物を釣り上げやがったな。
jpnSearchText:
おお、お前さんも
中々の大物を釣り上げやがったな。

engChrName: Indeed. I attempted to fish in a fitting manner suggested by the aggregate data reported of the area.
engSearchText:
Indeed. I attempted to fish in a fitting manner
suggested by the aggregate data reported of the area.
jpnChrName: ふふ、統計データに基づいた 適切なフィッシングを心掛けましたので。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、統計データに基づいた
適切なフィッシングを心掛けましたので。

engChrName: With that said, the sensation of the fish tugging the moment it lands on the hook is as thrilling an experience as I'd heard.
engSearchText:
With that said, the sensation of the fish tugging the
moment it lands on the hook is as thrilling an
experience as I'd heard.
jpnChrName: 針がかかった瞬間の魚の躍動する感触…… 聞いていた通り心躍るものがありますね。
jpnSearchText:
針がかかった瞬間の魚の躍動する感触……
聞いていた通り心躍るものがありますね。

engChrName: Good to hear you liked it. Just don't go turnin' into a hardcore fishmonger on me, yeah?
engSearchText:
Good to hear you liked it. Just don't go turnin' into a
hardcore fishmonger on me, yeah?
jpnChrName: ハハ、気に入っちまったか？ ハマりすぎねぇようにな。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、気に入っちまったか？
ハマりすぎねぇようにな。

engChrName: Hmm... Not much of a catch, is it?
engSearchText: Hmm... Not much of a catch, is it?
jpnChrName: うーん、正直振るわなかったかな？
jpnSearchText: うーん、正直振るわなかったかな？

engChrName: Hey, it's fine. Fishin' ain't just about landing the biggest lunker.
engSearchText:
Hey, it's fine. Fishin' ain't just about landing the
biggest lunker.
jpnChrName: いやいや、上出来だろ。 釣りは魚のデカさだけじゃないってね。
jpnSearchText:
いやいや、上出来だろ。
釣りは魚のデカさだけじゃないってね。

engChrName: ...You know, somehow hearing that makes it all the more frustrating.
engSearchText:
...You know, somehow hearing that makes it all the
more frustrating.
jpnChrName: ……むう、そういう言い方されると ちょっと悔しくなってくるな。
jpnSearchText:
……むう、そういう言い方されると
ちょっと悔しくなってくるな。

engChrName: Next time, I'll use FIO's active sonar to locate the fish habitats in advance so I can—
engSearchText:
Next time, I'll use FIO's active sonar to locate the fish
habitats in advance so I can—
jpnChrName: 次はＦＩＯのアクティブソナーも使って 魚の棲家を事前に特定して──
jpnSearchText:
次はＦＩＯのアクティブソナーも使って
魚の棲家を事前に特定して──

engChrName: At that point you're straight-up cheatin'.
engSearchText: At that point you're straight-up cheatin'.
jpnChrName: いや、ズルすぎるっつの。
jpnSearchText: いや、ズルすぎるっつの。

engChrName: And so they spent a bit more time wetting their lines, enjoying the peaceful moments fishing.
engSearchText:
And so they spent a bit more time wetting their lines,
enjoying the peaceful moments fishing.
jpnChrName: その後もしばらく糸を垂らしながら ゆっくりと過ごしたのだった。
jpnSearchText:
その後もしばらく糸を垂らしながら
ゆっくりと過ごしたのだった。

engChrName: So he's still not back?
engSearchText: So he's still not back?
jpnChrName: そんじゃ、 あいつはまだ戻っていないってのか？
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃ、
あいつはまだ戻っていないってのか？

engChrName: That's bad. A newbie like him out alone in this situation...?
engSearchText:
That's bad. A newbie like him out alone in this
situation...?
jpnChrName: 参ったな、この状況で駆け出し一人ってのは……
jpnSearchText: 参ったな、この状況で駆け出し一人ってのは……

engChrName: Enough. Why weren't you keeping an eye on him, Kazan?
engSearchText:
Enough. Why weren't you keeping an eye on
him, Kazan?
jpnChrName: ふう、カザンこそ何故ちゃんと 見ておかなかったのですか。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、カザンこそ何故ちゃんと
見ておかなかったのですか。

engChrName: I'm sure you must have realized that he...
engSearchText: I'm sure you must have realized that he...
jpnChrName: 気づいてはいたんでしょう、あの子が……
jpnSearchText: 気づいてはいたんでしょう、あの子が……

engChrName: I-I get it! I'll go out looking for him in a bit.
engSearchText: I-I get it! I'll go out looking for him in a bit.
jpnChrName: わ、わかってるよ…… この後、オレも探しに行くって。
jpnSearchText:
わ、わかってるよ……
この後、オレも探しに行くって。

engChrName: But what bad timing. Especially as we kept an eye on the Kunlun Mountains and the eastern highway...
engSearchText:
But what bad timing. Especially as we kept an eye on
the Kunlun Mountains and the eastern highway...
jpnChrName: しかし、崑崙方面やら東の街道やらを 警戒してたタイミングでこうなるとは……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、崑崙方面やら東の街道やらを
警戒してたタイミングでこうなるとは……

engChrName: Rather than complaining, may I suggest you get back to work?
engSearchText:
Rather than complaining, may I suggest you get back
to work?
jpnChrName: そう言ってる間にも さっさと手を動かしなさい。
jpnSearchText:
そう言ってる間にも
さっさと手を動かしなさい。

engChrName: Yeah, yeah, I'm going.
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah, I'm going.
jpnChrName: ああ、言われなくとも行くさ……
jpnSearchText: ああ、言われなくとも行くさ……

engChrName: (Looks like they're busy. Searchin' for someone, I guess?)
engSearchText:
(Looks like they're busy. Searchin' for someone,
I guess?)
jpnChrName: （取り込み中のようだが……   誰か探しているのか。）
jpnSearchText:
（取り込み中のようだが……
誰か探しているのか。）

engChrName: (Though hang on—that stupid-serious newbie's not here.)
engSearchText:
(Though hang on—that stupid-serious newbie's
not here.)
jpnChrName: （そういや、昼間にいたグレイって   生真面目な新米の姿が見えねぇが……）
jpnSearchText:
（そういや、昼間にいたグレイって
生真面目な新米の姿が見えねぇが……）

engChrName: (Hey, wait. Over there.)
engSearchText: (Hey, wait. Over there.)
jpnChrName: （あそこにいるのは……）
jpnSearchText: （あそこにいるのは……）

engChrName: (That junior bracer was supposed to be travelin' between the branches as part of his training, right?)
engSearchText:
(That junior bracer was supposed to be travelin'
between the branches as part of his training, right?)
jpnChrName: （準遊撃士のグレイ……研修で   支部巡りをしているって話だったが。）
jpnSearchText:
（準遊撃士のグレイ……研修で
支部巡りをしているって話だったが。）

engChrName: (Guessin' he's the one they were talkin' about at the guild...)
engSearchText:
(Guessin' he's the one they were talkin' about at
the guild...)
jpnChrName: （やっぱりさっきギルドで話していたのは……）
jpnSearchText: （やっぱりさっきギルドで話していたのは……）

engChrName: (One way or another, it's not a night to be out on the mountains alone. Should I follow him just in case?)
engSearchText:
(One way or another, it's not a night to be out on the
mountains alone. Should I follow him just in case?)
jpnChrName: （ともあれ、こんな夜に一人で山に入るもんじゃねぇ。   ――念のために後を追ってみるか？）
jpnSearchText:
（ともあれ、こんな夜に一人で山に入るもんじゃねぇ。
――念のために後を追ってみるか？）

engChrName: (I saw that junior bracer not too long ago.)
engSearchText: (I saw that junior bracer not too long ago.)
jpnChrName: （さっき見かけたのは   準遊撃士のグレイだよな……）
jpnSearchText:
（さっき見かけたのは
準遊撃士のグレイだよな……）

engChrName: (Should I follow him just in case?)
engSearchText: (Should I follow him just in case?)
jpnChrName: （――念のために後を追ってみるか？）
jpnSearchText: （――念のために後を追ってみるか？）

engChrName: Well, I'm not eager to stick my nose into guild business.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm not eager to stick my nose into
guild business.
jpnChrName: ギルドの問題に首を突っ込むのもなんだが……
jpnSearchText: ギルドの問題に首を突っ込むのもなんだが……

engChrName: I've run into him back in Edith a few times, though, so it's not like he's a stranger. I'd feel bad if something happened to him.
engSearchText:
I've run into him back in Edith a few times, though,
so it's not like he's a stranger. I'd feel bad if
something happened to him.
jpnChrName: 一応、首都でも何度か顔を合わせてる奴だしな。 放っておくのも後味が悪いか。
jpnSearchText:
一応、首都でも何度か顔を合わせてる奴だしな。
放っておくのも後味が悪いか。

engChrName: Best case scenario, I can get the guild to owe me one. Let's go check up on him.
engSearchText:
Best case scenario, I can get the guild to owe me one.
Let's go check up on him.
jpnChrName: せいぜいギルドに恩を売るとでも思って 様子を見に行くとすっか。
jpnSearchText:
せいぜいギルドに恩を売るとでも思って
様子を見に行くとすっか。

engChrName: That said, even if I'm gonna follow him, I should make sure I'm ready for anything.
engSearchText:
That said, even if I'm gonna follow him, I should
make sure I'm ready for anything.
jpnChrName: ……後を追うにしても 準備はしておきたいところだな。
jpnSearchText:
……後を追うにしても
準備はしておきたいところだな。

engChrName: 'Sides, this is the guild's problem. I can just see how it develops for now.
engSearchText:
'Sides, this is the guild's problem. I can just see how it
develops for now.
jpnChrName: 何よりギルドの問題でもあるしな…… ちょいと様子見するか。
jpnSearchText:
何よりギルドの問題でもあるしな……
ちょいと様子見するか。

engChrName: Quest Finding Gray started!
engSearchText: Quest Finding Gray started!
jpnChrName: クエスト【準遊撃士グレイの捜索】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>準遊撃士グレイの捜索<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: So I caused a lot of trouble for all of you, didn't I?
engSearchText: So I caused a lot of trouble for all of you, didn't I?
jpnChrName: 今回はその……ご迷惑をおかけしました。
jpnSearchText: 今回はその……ご迷惑をおかけしました。

engChrName: I-I'm prepared to accept whatever responsibility you require of me...
engSearchText:
I-I'm prepared to accept whatever responsibility you
require of me...
jpnChrName: こ、この責任は僕が何らかの形で……
jpnSearchText: こ、この責任は僕が何らかの形で……

engChrName: Enough. Don't want to hear any more of that—we want to know why you did it.
engSearchText:
Enough. Don't want to hear any more of that—we
want to know why you did it.
jpnChrName: そういうのはもう聞き飽きてる。 知りてぇのは理由の方だ。
jpnSearchText:
そういうのはもう聞き飽きてる。
知りてぇのは理由の方だ。

engChrName: I get that you have to get strong, and I've seen you working at it...
engSearchText:
I get that you have to get strong, and I've seen you
working at it...
jpnChrName: お前が強くなりてぇのはわかってる。 散々相手になってきたからな。
jpnSearchText:
お前が強くなりてぇのはわかってる。
散々相手になってきたからな。

engChrName: ...but charging into the mountains at this hour to fight every single monster you meet is insane.
engSearchText:
...but charging into the mountains at this hour to
fight every single monster you meet is insane.
jpnChrName: だが……こんな時間に一人で山に入って 魔獣と片っ端からやり合うなんて正気じゃねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
だが……こんな時間に一人で山に入って
魔獣と片っ端からやり合うなんて正気じゃねぇ。

engChrName: What's driving you so damn hard?
engSearchText: What's driving you so damn hard?
jpnChrName: 一体、何がお前をそこまで駆り立てるんだ……？
jpnSearchText: 一体、何がお前をそこまで駆り立てるんだ……？

engChrName: You're Gray, right? Seen you around Edith a few times.
engSearchText:
You're Gray, right? Seen you around Edith a
few times.
jpnChrName: グレイだったか、お前の事は首都でも 何度か見かけちゃいるが……
jpnSearchText:
グレイだったか、お前の事は首都でも
何度か見かけちゃいるが……

engChrName: As far as I understand, people think pretty highly of you. You got a bright future.
engSearchText:
As far as I understand, people think pretty highly
of you. You got a bright future.
jpnChrName: 周りはお前の事を買っているようだし、 間違いなく有望なんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
周りはお前の事を買っているようだし、
間違いなく有望なんだろう。

engChrName: Do you think the Immovable, Hazel, and Elaine ain't gonna worry about you doin' stuff like this?
engSearchText:
Do you think the Immovable, Hazel, and Elaine ain't
gonna worry about you doin' stuff like this?
jpnChrName: だが不動やヘイゼルの爺さん、 エレインが心配していないとでも思うか？
jpnSearchText:
だが不動やヘイゼルの爺さん、
エレインが心配していないとでも思うか？

engChrName: I see that you've got some things going on. Not that having a complicated history is rare in the bracer business.
engSearchText:
I see that you've got some things going on. Not that
having a complicated history is rare in the
bracer business.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、事情はあるんだろうよ。 訳ありの遊撃士だって珍しくもねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
……まあ、事情はあるんだろうよ。
訳ありの遊撃士だって珍しくもねぇ。

engChrName: But you have to realize that it's time to man up and talk it out, all right?
engSearchText:
But you have to realize that it's time to man up and
talk it out, all right?
jpnChrName: だが、流石にケジメとしても、 言ってくれても良いんじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
だが、流石にケジメとしても、
言ってくれても良いんじゃねぇか？

engChrName: Who knows? Maybe we can even help.
engSearchText: Who knows? Maybe we can even help.
jpnChrName: 何なら力になれるかもしれねぇし……
jpnSearchText: 何なら力になれるかもしれねぇし……

engChrName: ...I'm not from Calvard. I'm originally from Leman State.
engSearchText:
...I'm not from Calvard. I'm originally from
Leman State.
jpnChrName: ……僕は実はカルバード人じゃないんです。 本当はレマン自治州の人間で……
jpnSearchText:
……僕は実はカルバード人じゃないんです。
本当はレマン自治州の人間で……

engChrName: Whoa, wait. So you... You're a junior bracer, though. Does the Leman branch send their newbies out to train in foreign countries?
engSearchText:
Whoa, wait. So you... You're a junior bracer, though.
Does the Leman branch send their newbies out to
train in foreign countries?
jpnChrName: おいおい……って事は、お前は駆け出しなのに いきなり異郷で働いてたって事なのか？
jpnSearchText:
おいおい……って事は、お前は駆け出しなのに
いきなり異郷で働いてたって事なのか？

engChrName: Even I did my early training back home in the East.
engSearchText: Even I did my early training back home in the East.
jpnChrName: オレですら準遊撃士時代は東方にいたのに。
jpnSearchText: オレですら準遊撃士時代は東方にいたのに。

engChrName: Leman's the HQ of the entire Bracer Guild, but I've never heard of them sending pure newbies out of the country to train.
engSearchText:
Leman's the HQ of the entire Bracer Guild, but I've
never heard of them sending pure newbies out of the
country to train.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士協会の総本山とは言え……確かに、 準遊撃士を他国に出すってのは聞かない話だ。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士協会の総本山とは言え……確かに、
準遊撃士を他国に出すってのは聞かない話だ。

engChrName: If I had to guess, the folks at headquarters don't know about this.
engSearchText:
If I had to guess, the folks at headquarters don't know
about this.
jpnChrName: 総支部の連中も知らなかったようだが……
jpnSearchText: 総支部の連中も知らなかったようだが……

engChrName: ...I know I've caused trouble for all of you. But I really can't say any more.
engSearchText:
...I know I've caused trouble for all of you. But I really
can't say any more.
jpnChrName: ……皆さんに迷惑をかけている事も承知です。 ですが……今は、これ以上は言えません。
jpnSearchText:
……皆さんに迷惑をかけている事も承知です。
ですが……今は、これ以上は言えません。

engChrName: When the time comes...I'll tell everyone—even the people back at the head branch in Edith. For now, please, don't tell anyone!
engSearchText:
When the time comes...I'll tell everyone—even the
people back at the head branch in Edith. For now,
please, don't tell anyone!
jpnChrName: 時が来たら……総支部の方々にもお伝えします、 だから、今は……！
jpnSearchText:
時が来たら……総支部の方々にもお伝えします、
だから、今は……！

engChrName: I see... Hmm...
engSearchText: I see... Hmm...
jpnChrName: なるほどねぇ……ふむ。
jpnSearchText: なるほどねぇ……ふむ。

engChrName: You know anything about this, Drusilla?
engSearchText: You know anything about this, Drusilla?
jpnChrName: ドルシラさん、あんたは何か知ってるのか？
jpnSearchText: ドルシラさん、あんたは何か知ってるのか？

engChrName: Nothing specific. But let's say my imagination is healthy.
engSearchText:
Nothing specific. But let's say my imagination
is healthy.
jpnChrName: いいえ、特には。 でも、一応想像力には自信がある方です。
jpnSearchText:
いいえ、特には。
でも、一応想像力には自信がある方です。

engChrName: Either way, I think it's all going to come down to the path you walk, and your determination to walk it.
engSearchText:
Either way, I think it's all going to come down to the
path you walk, and your determination to walk it.
jpnChrName: まあ、ここから先は──あなたの 覚悟と“道”次第というところですか……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ここから先は──あなたの
覚悟と“道”次第というところですか……

engChrName: Gray... Gray Arnold.
engSearchText: Gray... Gray Arnold.
jpnChrName: グレイ──アーノルド君。
jpnSearchText: グレイ──アーノルド君。

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?

engChrName: (Hmm... There's somethin' I'm missin' here, but I'll just file this away for now.)
engSearchText:
(Hmm... There's somethin' I'm missin' here, but I'll
just file this away for now.)
jpnChrName: （ふむ……事情は分からねえが、   ちょいと気に留めておくとするか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふむ……事情は分からねえが、
ちょいと気に留めておくとするか。）

engChrName: Well, I think we've said enough for tonight.
engSearchText: Well, I think we've said enough for tonight.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、今夜は このくらいにしておきましょう。
jpnSearchText:
……まあ、今夜は
このくらいにしておきましょう。

engChrName: The guild will pay for your time, Arkride.
engSearchText: The guild will pay for your time, Arkride.
jpnChrName: 依頼料に関してはギルドの方から 振り込んでおくとします。
jpnSearchText:
依頼料に関してはギルドの方から
振り込んでおくとします。

engChrName: No! I should be the one to pay—
engSearchText: No! I should be the one to pay—
jpnChrName: そんな、依頼料なら僕が……
jpnSearchText: そんな、依頼料なら僕が……

engChrName: Shut it, newbie. You've got a long way to go before you get to have an opinion on Drusilla's decisions.
engSearchText:
Shut it, newbie. You've got a long way to go before
you get to have an opinion on Drusilla's decisions.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、駆け出しの分際でドルシラさんの 判断にケチをつけんじゃねえよ。
jpnSearchText:
ヘッ、駆け出しの分際でドルシラさんの
判断にケチをつけんじゃねえよ。

engChrName: Works for me. I wasn't happy about taking mira from a newbie bracer, anyway.
engSearchText:
Works for me. I wasn't happy about taking mira from
a newbie bracer, anyway.
jpnChrName: ああ、流石にルーキーから ミラを受け取るのは気が引けるしな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、流石にルーキーから
ミラを受け取るのは気が引けるしな。

engChrName: Anyway, buddy, make sure you try to learn from tonight's events, yeah?
engSearchText:
Anyway, buddy, make sure you try to learn from
tonight's events, yeah?
jpnChrName: とにかくお前さんは 今夜のことを深く反省するこった。
jpnSearchText:
とにかくお前さんは
今夜のことを深く反省するこった。

engChrName: I'm very sorry...
engSearchText: I'm very sorry...
jpnChrName: すみません……
jpnSearchText: すみません……

engChrName: Thank you very much, all of you.
engSearchText: Thank you very much, all of you.
jpnChrName: 皆さん、本当にありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText: 皆さん、本当にありがとうございました。

engChrName: Quest Finding Gray completed!
engSearchText: Quest Finding Gray completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【準遊撃士グレイの捜索】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>準遊撃士グレイの捜索<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: HP, EP, and CP fully restored, and S-Boost Gauge increased 3 points!
engSearchText:
HP, EP, and CP fully restored, and S-Boost Gauge
increased 3 points!
jpnChrName: ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復、 Ｓブーストゲージが３上昇、 ＣＰが２００上昇した！
jpnSearchText:
ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復、
Ｓブーストゲージが３上昇、
ＣＰが２００上昇した！

engChrName: (Now's not the time for a bath.)
engSearchText: (Now's not the time for a bath.)
jpnChrName: （……風呂に入ってる場合じゃねえな。）
jpnSearchText: （……風呂に入ってる場合じゃねえな。）

engChrName: (Quatre's probably still in there. I'll look for another chance to take a dip.)
engSearchText:
(Quatre's probably still in there. I'll look for another
chance to take a dip.)
jpnChrName: （まだカトルが入ってるはずだが──   頃合いを見て俺も入り直してもいいな。）
jpnSearchText:
（まだカトルが入ってるはずだが──
頃合いを見て俺も入り直してもいいな。）

engChrName: (We got access to the bath. Be a damn shame not to use it. Should I ask around and see if people wanna grab another soak?)
engSearchText:
(We got access to the bath. Be a damn shame not to
use it. Should I ask around and see if people wanna
grab another soak?)
jpnChrName: （せっかくの温泉宿だ。   皆に声をかけて、もうひと風呂入るか？）
jpnSearchText:
（せっかくの温泉宿だ。
皆に声をかけて、もうひと風呂入るか？）

engChrName: Notes and requests are strewn across the bulletin board.
engSearchText:
Notes and requests are strewn across the
bulletin board.
jpnChrName: 掲示板には様々なことが書かれてある。
jpnSearchText: <C1>掲示板には様々なことが書かれてある。

engChrName: No information of particular note appears to be posted.
engSearchText:
No information of particular note appears to
be posted.
jpnChrName: 特に目ぼしい情報はないみてえだな。
jpnSearchText: 特に目ぼしい情報はないみてえだな。

engChrName: Ehh, either way, I'd much rather spend today taking a load off.
engSearchText:
Ehh, either way, I'd much rather spend today taking a
load off.
jpnChrName: いずれにせよ、今日くらいは アイツらにも羽を伸ばしてもらわねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
いずれにせよ、今日くらいは
アイツらにも羽を伸ばしてもらわねえとな。

engChrName: Notes and requests are strewn across the bulletin board.
engSearchText:
Notes and requests are strewn across the
bulletin board.
jpnChrName: 掲示板には様々なことが書かれてある。
jpnSearchText: <C1>掲示板には様々なことが書かれてある。

engChrName: Already got all the 4SPGs here.
engSearchText: Already got all the 4SPGs here.
jpnChrName: ──４ｓｐｇなら回収済みだ。
jpnSearchText: ──４ｓｐｇなら回収済みだ。

engChrName: HP and EP were fully restored!
engSearchText: HP and EP were fully restored!
jpnChrName: ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復した！
